akhadas in the capital as well as towns around delhi the wrestlers got more comfortable with sitting in public at first we were nervous about what to expect but that went away some people were wondering if we were embarrassed to sit on the ground in front of everyone but we have all started our pehelwani in mitti the driven earth in which traditional kushti is played so we were returning to that says vinesh with police permission given for the protest between 12m and 6m each day the wrestlers spent as much time as they could at the protest site women wrestlers usedsulabh toilet complex some 50 metres away from the site where they would change their clothes and freshen up other non worldly support camelittle further away there isfamous hanuman temple in janpath we go and pray in the morning but before that we manage to takebath at the premises said asian medallist jitender kumar related babita phogat joins oversight committee panel formed against wfi while simply taking the first step to protest had beenmajor step for many it was not enough to get what they wanted the resignation of the wfi president with brij bhushan sharan singh denying the charges and refusing to step aside the matter was at loggerheads on the second day the players said they would seek the registry of an fir regarding their accusation of harassment if their demands were not met over the next few hours but that deadline came and went meanwhile there waspush back from the other side several female wrestlers made videos some obviously coached where they spoke in favour of sharan singh others pointed out that the most serious accusation of harassment was brought up far later than other charges others pointed out that one of the protesters sakshi malik wasmember of the wfiown sexual harassment committee others wondered what was the role of babita phogatmember of the ruling bjp who is also bajrangsister in law and vineshcousin babita had showed up on the second day and said she was speaking to the government on the players behalf brij bhushan sharan singh denied the charges and refused to step aside photo credit ani people are going through what we spoke dissecting everything we spoke but we never prepared how we were going to speak none of us have trained for this we are wrestlers we barely know how to speak and put our point forward we hadnplanned anything we hadnspoken to any lawyers we just assumed that people will believe us why would we risk our careers if we didnbelieve what we were saying was the truth says vinesh in the meantime the ministry of sports got involved on the first day of the protest the ministry issuedletter to the wfi requiring them to answer the charges put forward by the protesting athletes within three days the players met representatives of the ministry of sports on the second day without resolution and then went to the home of the sports minister anurag thakur later that night it is learned that several women athletes repeated their claims of harassment at that meeting however that meeting too ended withoutsolution it was only on the night of the third day that the deadlock was broken the sports minister addressedmeeting with five others bajrang vinesh sakshi ravi and babita the minister stated that brij bhushan would step aside formonth whilefive member oversight committee would investigate the charges in turn bajrang said the protest would be called offday later the wfi assistant secretary vinod tomar was also removed from his post while that and the suspension of the activities of the federation seems to bestep forward it also raises several other questions says supreme court lawyer rahul mehra thereno doubt the government has the right to suspend the working of the federation if there is violation of the national sports code you have to specify what is the specific violation and then you can proceed with the suspension ideally it is throughshow cause notice once the reply is not satisfactory you can derecognise the body he says mehra raises the specific example of the wfiown sexual harassment committee what is most problematic is the fact that the wfiinternal complaints committee on sexual abuse violates the vishakha guidelines this is in direct violation of the national sports code 2011 which obliges federations to implement it in suchsituation the intervention of the sports authority of india sai and ioa is necessary says mehra according to the vishakha guidelines for cases of sexual harassment of women at workplace the chairperson of this committee has to bewoman and more than half of the members of the committee will also be women none of this though was followed in the wficommittee notes mehra but there is another issue says mehra while there wasclear violation of the code the ministry has been looking the other side in this case it was the mp from the ruling party so there was no question of derecognising or suspending this body the problem with the violations of all these issues is not so much in the federation who are anyway at fault but with the government of india and ministry of sport which has chosen to look the other way says mehra as it stands the wfi has still not been derecognised or suspended neither has the wfi president stepped down he has merely stepped away from handling the day to day functions of the federation while the five member committee has said they would speak to the alleged victims of harassment there have been questions raised on the neutrality of the committee which is headed by olympic medallist mary kom who was elected to the rajya sabha by the the ruling party another member olympic medallist yogeshwar dutt has also contested state elections onbjp ticket and had also raised the possibility of the allegations being fake when the matter is of suchmagnitude you want the committee to be as neutral as possible and one in which the athletes will have complete confidence in testifying to this doesnseem like that says mehra indeed it is learned that at least one wrestler who says she was harassed and was initially adamant she would tell her story has now takenstep back the prospect of public scrutiny andpotentially long media trial she says has caused her to change her mind union minister of sports and youth affairs anurag thakur along with wrestlers bajrang punia vinesh phogat sakshee malikkh babita phogat and ravi kumar dahiya addressesjoint press conference regarding the wrestlers protest against the wrestling federation of india wfi and its chief brij bhushan sharan singh the protest was called off after this meeting photo credit ani the protesting wrestlers too said that they were not taken into confidence by the government when the committee was being formed and asked the government to include two members of their choice one of whom it is learned was babita phogat on january 31week andhalf after first announcing the formation of the oversight committee the sports ministry did finally include babita phogat while she had once hoped forquick resolution vinesh doesnregret going down this path itnot as ifm sleeping well in factve been barely able to sleep since the first day but the arrow has already left the bow and now therenothing else to do but see whether it hits the target she says the wrestlers themselves have made their peace with the knowledge that the battle will belong one vinesh who had initially been upset over not being included in the team for the croatia ranking series has pulled out of the competition bajrang ravi dahiya and sakshi have done the same as well initially we had protested because it wasquestion of our wrestling careers but now we know that the matter is much bigger than that our wrestling career is not the first priority right now says vinesh vinesh says alongside the messages of support there have been those including some close to her who question the wisdom in going up againstpowerful politician even now we have family members telling us maybe we shouldnhave done this there is so much at stake here but there was no option but to go ahead at the end of this only one of us us or brij bhushan is going to be standing but regardless of what happens at least there will besense of fear in people so that all that had happened doesnhappen again nervousness has given way to wry humour vinesh compares the situation to that ofwrestling competition he wfi president thought athletes would never speak up normally what are we in comparison tobig neta politician agaryeh competition hota he must have seen us and thought he was in an easy bracket he thought he hadbye he didnrealise he was up against us she says wrestlers protesttimeline on january 18 2023 several of indiatop wrestlers sat onpublic protest in new delhijantar mantar against the wrestling federation of india and itpresident brij bhushan sharan singh the protesters raised several issues from sexual exploitation of women athletes mental harassment death threats as well as the poor planning of competition and training the protests eventually led to the government to appoint an oversight committee to look into the charges take charge of the functioning of the wfi and also have brij bhushan sharan step aside from the day to day working of the organisation problems between the players and the wfi had been simmering for several years and had surfaced publicly onfew occasions here islook back

Title: teacher turned let terrorist arrested for allegedly carrying multiple blasts in jammu
Article: feb 02 2023 03 45pm ist source times nowgovernment school teacher turned lashkartaiba terrorist was arrested for allegedly carrying out multiple blasts including one inbus carrying vaishno devi pilgrims director general of jammu and kashmir police dilbag singh said on thursday the arrest of arifresident of reasi district follows investigations in the recent twin blast case at narwal in jammu an improvised explosive device ied planted insideperfume bottle was recovered from his possession singh told reporters here

Title: 1 arrested for assaulting doctor at patiala hospital hunt on for 2 others
Article: patiala the police here have arrested one of the accused who allegedly assaultedgovernment doctor for not attending to their patient first dr rao varinder singh faced multiple injuries including four fractures after being assaulted by the accused who were allegedly drunk the incident took place on saturday night when the accused entered the ent ward at government rajindra hospital and misbehaved with the staff includingdoctor and the nursing staff dr varinder claimed that he was informed by his staff that some miscreants were misbehaving and demanding to examine their patient first at 2am around seven eight persons along with their patient entered ward no 21 ent ward and misbehaved with the staff the patientattendants were drunk and attacked me before escapinghave suffered four fractures including two nasal bone fractures andcheek bone fracture the patient they brought for examination was already admitted in our hospital he told policecase has been registered against the accused under sections 353 assaults or uses criminal force to any person beingpublic servant 186 voluntarily obstructs any public servant in the discharge of his public functions 323 punishment for voluntarily causing hurt 148 rioting and 149 offence is committed by any member of an unlawful assembly of the indian penal code sho civil lines police stations kahlon said we have arrested one of the accused while the hunt to nab two others is on the family members of the patient did not have any role in assaulting the doctor the accused who assaulted were under the influence of liquor tnn

Title: iraids on 10 premises in punjab linked to 2 controversial influential pastors
Article: jalandhar the investigation wing of the income tax department on tuesday raided more than 10 premises linked to two controversial self styled christian pastors harpreet deol and barjinder singh in punjab the action involving 50 taxation officials and staff who were assisted by paramilitary forces cameday after bajinderteam announced on his facebook page that he had openednew branch of prophet bajinder singh ministries in dubai the two pastors happen to be among the most influential among their peers in punjab and their weekly congregations get thousands of participants from across the state and even other parts of the country deolheadquarters is at khojewal village where he hasbig church while barjinder has his church near chandigarh and also in jalandhar apart from branches at different places income tax officials landed at deolchurch and house at khojewal located on the jalandhar kapurthala road in the morning the raid was continuing till eveningseparate team along with security personnel of crpf reached barjinderchurch at tajpur on the jalandhar nakodar road barjinderchurch has been mired in controversy in the past too in septemberfour year old cancer patient had come to the church in tajpur in the hope of getting cured but she died at the church itself when the pastor was holdingprayer and healing session her family had claimed that doctors at aiims delhi had given up on treating the girl and they had been coming to the church for nine months sources said the action had also been carried out at kapurthala jalandhar and new chandigarh at presentt officials are assessing documents property papers and bank accounts it is unclear whether the department has come across any specific discrepancies action was still on when this report was filed officials of thet department refused to divulge any information about the raids the two pastors have also been accused of practising exorcism and claiming miraculous cure for chronic serious diseases in the last few years several new self styled pastors and churches have emerged there have also been allegations of aggressive proselytization by them over the past decade mostly hindu groups affiliated to rss had been opposing these christian groups and accusing them of proselytization however in the past few months there had been tension between pastors and sikh groups however things did not spill out of control as leaders of mainline churches and some sikh activists engaged with each other and managed to defuse the tension with inputs from mohit behl in ludhiana

Title: gangster who attacked former classmate arrested in ludhiana
Article: ludhianawanted criminal andmember of the puneet bains gang major singh sandhu was arrested by ludhiana city police on monday he was wanted incase of firing in which he assaulted his former classmate and fired in the air at an amusement park in ladhowal in may 2022 police recovered32 bore pistol withmagazine and one live cartridge from him asi bhupinder singh investigating officer said that the accused major singh of guru arjun dev nagar was arrested from sector 32 market followingtip off on frisking police recovered an illegal pistol and ammunition from his possession on may 5 2022 major along with his aides monu jatin divyanshu bagga and mani thrashed21 year old woman and molested her the victim had gone to the amusement park with her friend the accused assaulted her friend also and opened fire in the air before fleeing the woman said that the accused used to study with her in class 10 in 2018 major and his gang members have indulged in scuffles on previous occasions as well

Title: aap worker arrested with 5 illegal weapons
Article: ludhiana khanna police on tuesday arrested an alleged aam aadmi party aap worker of malaud area with five illegal weapons the accused was identified as deepak goyal of malaud area who is in his 30s it was afterchain of arrests that cops reached him cops said acting ontip off police had arrested akashdeep singh of malerkotla district on january 26 and seized an illegal austria made glock pistol an imported and sophisticated weapon mostly used by the police they said on questioning the accused had disclosed about the sarpanch ofvillage who was arrested in the case police said on being interrogated the village head had revealed the name of deepak who had illegal weapons they said after getting the information the crime investigating agency cia wing of khanna police raided his house seized five illegal 32 bore pistols and arrested deepak sources said deepak had got these weapons before the state elections last year they said the accused had enmity withpradhan leader from khanna because of which he got weapons withmotive to kill him and for his self defence as well aap sources said deepak along with his father sanjeev goyal had joined the party as workers before state elections in the presence of aappunjab affairs co incharge jarnail singh and manwinder singh giaspura mla from payal they said the family which owns rice shellers and seed factories was with the shiromani akali dal sad earlier before joining the aap meanwhile malaud police has registeredcase against the accused under relevant sections of the arms act police officials saidprobe is under way to find out from whom the accused had got the illegal weapons and for what purpose he was to use those they added that the accused may have been preparing to contest municipal council elections meanwhilepicture of the accused with aappunjab affairs co incharge jarnail singh and manwinder singh giaspura mla from payal has surfaced talking to toi the aap mla suggested that on election time many persons get pictures clicked with them he said the aap government has zero tolerance against crimes and if anyone is found involved in crime strict action will be taken against him the mla said the aap government has even acted against ministers so no one will be allowed to indulge in crimes

Title: peshawar mosque attack brother of slain taliban commander claims peshawar attack calls it act of revenge
Article: with inputs from agencies new delhi in yet another terror strike pakistan taliban or tehreektaliban pakistan ttp carried outdeadly suicide bombing onmosque in peshawar leaving at least 46 dead and scores injured also see pakistan bomb blast live updates shortly after the attack the banned outfit claimed responsibility for the bombing ttp had threatened to carry outseries of terror attacks in pakistan after ending its ceasefire with the shehbaz sharif government last year the peshawar mosque attack is by far the biggest in the serious of attacks that ttp has been conducting targeting the security forces and their installations sarbakaf mohmandcommander for the pakistani taliban claimed responsibility for the attack on twitter the main spokesman for the militant group was not immediately available for comment mohmand is the brother of slain ttp commander umar khalid khurasani according to reports he claimed that the suicide attack was part of the revenge attack for his brother who was killed last august in afghanistan most of the casualties in the attack were police officers it was not clear how the bomber was able to slip into the walled compound which houses the northwestern city of peshawarpolice headquarters and is itself is located inhigh security zone with other government buildings more than 300 worshippers were praying inside the mosque with more approaching when the bomber set off his explosives vest many were injured when the roof came down according to zafar khanlocal police officer

Title: tom brady retires insisting this time itfor good
Article: tom brady who wonrecord seven super bowls for new england and tampa has announced his retirement brady the most successful quarterback in nfl history and one of the greatest athletes in team sports posted the announcement on social media wednesday morningbrief video lasting just under one minute good morning guysll get to the point right away brady says as the message beginsm retiring for good he briefly retired after the 2021 season but wound up coming back for one more year with the tampa bay buccaneers he retires at age 45 the owner of numerous passing records in an unprecedented 23 year career truly grateful on this day thank you pic twitter com j2s2sezvss tom brady february 1 2023year ago when he retired it was in the form oflong instagram post but about six weeks later he decided to come back for one more run the buccaneers with whom he wonsuper bowl two seasons ago made the playoffs again this season losing in their playoff opener and at the time it begged the question about whether brady would play again onlycouple weeks later he has given the answerknow the process waspretty big deal last time so whenwoke up this morningfiguredd just press record and let you guys know first brady says in the videowonbe long winded you only get one super emotional retirement essay andused mine up last yearreally thank you guys so much to every single one of you for supporting me my family my friends teammates my competitorscould go on forever theretoo many thank you guys for allowing me to live my absolute dreamwouldnchangething love you all advertisement brady is the nflcareer leader in yards passing 89 214 and touchdowns 649 hethe only player to win more than five super bowls and has been mvp of the game five times famously underrated coming into the nfl he was picked 199th in the 2000 draft by the patriots behind six other quarterbacks three kickers andpunter brady certainly wasnexpected to become synonymous with greatness he played in one game asrookie completing one of three passes for six yards the next year it all changed brady took over as the patriots starter the team beat the st louis rams in the super bowl that capped the 2001 season and he and new england coach bill belichick were well on their way to becoming the most successful coach qb duo in football history advertisement more super bowl wins came after the 2003 and 2004 seasons the patriots returned to footballmountaintop forfourth time in bradyeradecade later to cap the 2014 season the start of three more titles inspan of five years in 2020 he joined the buccaneers and won his seventh super bowl he spent his last three years with tampa bay getting them to the playoffs in each of those seasonsthinkve been on the record dozens of times saying thereno quarterbackd rather have than tom brady andstill feel that way belichick said in 2021 shortly before tampa bay with brady came to new england and beat the patriots ingame dubbed the returnwas very lucky to have tom as the quarterback to coach him and he was as good as any coach could ever ask for brady has won three nfl mvp awards beenfirst team all pro three times and selected to the pro bowl 15 times brady and supermodel gisele bndchen finalized their divorce this past fall during the bucs season it ended13 year marriage between two superstars who respectively reached the pinnacles of football and fashion advertisement it was announced last year that when brady retires from playing he would join fox sports astelevision analyst in10 year 375 million deal

Title: mo farah returns for london marathon mccolgan to make her debut
Article: britainfour times olympic champion mo farah will take part in his home london marathon in april after missing the race last year the long distance runner said on tuesday farah who won the chicago marathon in 2018 and is also the national record holder in the marathon missed the london marathon last year when he was forced to withdraw due to injurywas really disappointed to miss last octoberlondon marathon because of injury butm so happy the event has returned to april for 2023 asdonhave to waitwhole year to get another chance farah who won 5 000 metres and 10 000m gold in the 2012 and 2016 olympics said instatement the london marathon has always been special to me andam looking forward to being back out there on the roads of my home town farah will be joined by reigning commonwealth games 10 000 metres champion eilish mccolgan who also withdrew ahead of her debut last year due tomedical issue the 32 year old is the daughter of the 1996 winner liz mccolgan it was disappointing not to have taken part in last yearlondon marathonhad suchfantastic summer on the track and the plan was always to follow that with my marathon debut in london the 2021 birmingham games gold medallist said buthave been able to take further time to fully prepare for runningmarathon and april will come around very quickly soam extremely excited advertisement the london marathon is obviouslyspecial event for me and my family with my mum having won the 1996 race andjust canwait to experience it for myself the race will be held on the streets of london on april 23 the full elite field will be announced on wednesday

Title: asked why she was out late up woman throws acid on hubby
Article: kanpur35 year old woman allegedly threw acid at her 40 year old husbandface in kanpurcooperganj area just because he asked her the reason for returning home late at night the husband dabbu gupta sustained severe burns all over his face his wife poonam was arrested and sent to jail late sunday inviral video gupta was seen narrating his ordeal to the media at the police station premises he claimed that when he asked his wife the reason for her delay in returning home she retorted saying it was none of his business soon after he claimedfight broke out between them following which she threw acid on his face while demanding imprisonment for poonam gupta also sought better treatment facilities in the video as per gupta poonam had returned home around 12 30am saturday police said when he questioned her she started quarrelling with him later when she physically assaulted him gupta too beat her up this however enraged poonam who picked upbottle of acid kept in the bathroom and splashed it on his face saidcop when police questioned locals they alleged that gupta wasliquor addict they said that he often quarrels with his wife it seems that his wife took such an extreme step after being perturbed over his drinking habit saidpolice source

Title: covid vax drive boosts budget spend on health
Article: indiabudgeted expenditure on the health sector reached 2 1 of the gdp in financial year 2023 budget estimates and 2 2 in fy 2022 revised estimates this is closer to the recommendations made in the national health policy 2017 as well as the 15th finance commission both recommended increasing the governmenthealth expenditure to 2 5 by 2025 according to the economic survey the share of expenditure on health in the total expenditure on social services has increased from 21 in fy 2019 to 26 in fy 2023 be this underscores the rising importance of public healthcare and social security in ensuring universal health coverage the finance ministry said instatement sources said one of the major factors for increased expenditure on health over the last two financial years is the expenditure incurred in the national covid 19 vaccination programme as of january 6 2023 the government said india has been able to administer over 220 crore covid vaccine doses across the country 97 of eligible beneficiaries have received both the doses more than 22 crore people have been administered precautionary doses also the economic survey report states that under the aatmanirbhar bharat abhiyaan the union government focused on scaling up expenditure on health infrastructure in view of the pandemic the government invested in setting up critical care hospital blocks in all districts and to strengthen the laboratory network and surveillance the report mentions in fy 2023 an intensified mission indradhanush mi programme to achieve full immunisation coverage for all children and pregnant women was conducted in 416 districts across 32 states and uts the aim of this exercise was to cover children and pregnant women who missed routine immunisation during the covid 19 pandemic ayushman bharat pradhan mantri jan arogya yojana ab pm jay is the worldlargest health insurance scheme in 2018 as of january 4 approximately 21 9 crore beneficiaries have been verified under the scheme around 4 3 crore hospital admissions amounting to rs 50 409 crore have also been authorised the government said

Title: samsung galaxy s23 series to launch tomorrow what to expect timings and more
Article: samsung galaxy s23 series samsung galaxy book3 laptop series samsung is all set to launch its flagship samsung galaxy s23 series of smartphones the company has scheduled its first galaxy unpacked event of the year on february 1 where it will launch its smartphone series along with the new smartphones the company has also confirmed that it will launch its latest galaxy book3 laptop series at the same event the event will take place on february 1 and it will begin at 10 am pst 11 30 pm ist the event will be live streamed on the companyofficial website and social media channels the samsung galaxy s23 series of smartphones consists of three phones galaxy s23 galaxy s23 and galaxy s23 ultrarecent online report revealed the likely details about the upcoming galaxy s23 and galaxy s23 ultra smartphones as perreport by galaxyclub the samsung galaxy s23 could pack4 700mah battery which is about 100mah bigger than the one in the galaxy s22 the top of the line galaxy s23 ultra however is said to pack5 000mah battery which is identical to what is found in the galaxy s22 ultra the report further adds that the galaxy s23 may get an improved 12mp front camera sensor but the telephoto camera is reported to carry the same 10mp sensor and 3x optical zoom capability it is also claimed that the sensor in the ultra wide angle camera wonchange much the galaxy s23 and galaxy s23 are said to feature the same 12mp ultra wide angle camera as it was in their predecessors the report further notes there is no clarity on whether the galaxy s23 ultra will get the same 12mp sensor as its siblings or not the company is expected to launch samsung galaxy book 3 samsung galaxy book 3 360 samsung galaxy book 3 pro samsung galaxy book 3 pro 360 and the samsung galaxy book 3 ultrarecent online report revealed that the samsung galaxy book 3 ultra may sportmacbook like design and may come ingrey colour option the report also suggests that the device may be lighter as compared to the macbook pro

Title: wrestlers protest halfway to probe committee deadline questions linger and sport in limbo
Article: itbeenlittle over two weeks since the wrestlers protests came to an end with the sports ministry formingfive member oversight committee to investigate the charges made against the wrestling federation of india and its president brij bhushan sharan singh the committee was givenfour week deadline to complete its investigation into the allegations of sexual exploitation intimidation harassment and financial irregularities of the federation and its president however halfway through there are no signs of the committee having made any progress meanwhile the wrestlers whose protests led to the investigation have been vocal in their criticism of the committeecomposition on their social media wrestlers vs wfi how the protest built up over months there have been signs of further tension between the athletes and the administration and there is also some concern over the staging of the asian wrestling championships scheduled to take place in new delhi from march 28top wrestler who was part of the protest says that the committee has not shared any updates with them the wrestlers have also not been told whether the asian championships will go ahead committee composition on january 23 sports minister anurag thakur announced the scope of the five member oversight committee the committee is headed by mary kom and includes former wrestler yogeshwar dutt ex badminton player and mission olympic cell member trupti murgunde ex tops ceo rajesh rajagopalan and former sai executive director teams radhica sreeman it should be noted that the committee had no representative from the legal fraternity orneutral person from outside the system all five members were from within the sporting system given the nature of charges it would be expected to function almost asposh committee and so should have had some legal and outside representation additionally mary kom is an mp nominated by the bjp and so is essentially brij bhushancolleague while dutt is very closely aligned with the party and had sided with the administration during the protests in response bajrang vinesh and sakshi malik tweeted that despite being given assurances the government did not consult them before forming the committee this resulted inchange and former wrestler babita phogat was included in the committee it is believed that the protesting wrestlers wanted her on the committee but the criteria for her addition are unclear meanwhilesimilar committee appointed by the indian olympic association seems to have disbanded ceding the probe to the sports ministry in their first action since taking over the committee named the indian contingent 11 greco roman 13 male freestyle and 12 women wrestlers for the zagreb open grand prix top wrestlers including ravi dahiya bajrang punia and vinesh phogat pulled out of the event by stating they were not competition ready as things stand there are stillnumber of administrative and investigative questions left india are hosts of the asian championship which will decide the seeding for the world championship later this year which will serve asparis olympics qualifier the committee has to not only decide the logistics for it but also how the indian squad will be chosen this usually requires trials in advance which means the wrestlers have to start preparing even as the oversight committee balances both the probe and the administration indian wrestling remains inlimbo

Title: punjab vigilance bureau arrests ex minister sadhu singh dharamsot in disproportionate assets case
Article: chandigarh the punjab vigilance bureau on monday arrested former forest minister sadhu singh dharamsot for amassing assets disproportionate to his known sources of income the former minister would be produced before the mohali court on tuesday dharamsot has been arrested following investigations ofvigilance enquiry an fir under sections 13 113 2 of the prevention of corruption act has been registered against him at vigilance bureau range police station at mohali in disproportionate assets case it came to fore during the vigilance probe that during the check period from march 1 2016 to march 31 2022 dharamsot and his familyincome was rs 2 37 12 596 while the expenditure was rs 8 76 30 888 his expenditure was rs 6 39 18 292 or 269 more than his known sources of income the vigilance bureau probe is in progress to ascertain more assets of the former minister the vigilance bureau had earlier arrested dharamsot on june 7 last year with his two aides for their involvement in organized corruption regarding issuance of permits for cutting of khair trees transfer of government officials purchases and issuance of no objection certificates he was later granted bail by the punjab and haryana high court on september 5 last year dharamsot was close to former punjab chief minister capt amarinder singh who was dropped from the charanjit singh channi cabinet

Title: translate law into punjabi upload it on website board told
Article: patiala the punjab state information commission while hearingright to information rti plea has directed the bocw welfare board secretary cum welfare labour commissioner to get the punjab bocw act 1996 and the punjab bocw rules translated into punjabi language and get these uploaded on the boardwebsite the directions came after an rti applicant and labour rights activist had approached the commission after being refused to provide information in punjabi language on grounds that the building and other construction workers bocw act and rules were available in english language only the bocw welfare board while replying to an rti application not only refused the applicant to provide the copies of the bocw act and rules in punjabi language but also asked the applicant to pay rs 676 for getting the copies of the act in english the activist was also advised to get the act and rules translated into punjabi on his own applicant vijay walia who hails from patiala then filed an appeal with the appellate authority the commission said the complainant had rightly pointed out that the bocw act and the rules must be available and be provided in punjabi since these pertain to thousands of workers and labourers

Title: wrestler ashu clinches bronze at zagreb open ranking series
Article: zagreb asian championships bronze medallist ashu clinched the 67kg bronze medal for india in the greco roman category on the concluding day of the zagreb open ranking series here on sunday the 23 year old addedsecond bronze to indiatally defeating lithuaniaadomas grigaliunas 5 0 the indian had three points in the first period and two in the second as the judges declaredwin by decision under 23 world champion aman sehrawat had won bronze in men57kg freestyle on the inaugural day ashu who lost iranreza mahdi abbasi 9 0 in the qualification round came back strongly in the repechage bouts defeating hungaryadam phoilec 8 0 before overcoming norwayhaavard joergensen 9 0 to make the bronze medal round another indian greco roman wrestler sagar lost his 63kg repechage round bout to austriaaker schmid al obaidi after his quarterfinal rival iranaref hossein khoun mohammadi entered the final in other bouts on sunday birmingham commonwealth games silver medallist samantha stewart got the better of indiaasian championships bronze medallist sushma shokeen with the canadian effectingfall in the the women53kg quarterfinal sushma had beaten francetetiana profatilova and chinayuhong zhong in the earlier rounds more disappointment was in store for india as 72kg wrestler reetika could not make it to the semifinals through the round robin format while kiran 76kg also failed to advance

Title: 2 accused held police inaction moneylenders menace come to fore
Article: varanasi the ballia police on saturday arrested two accused in connection with the suicide of gun shop owner nandlal gupta in the district on february 1 sp ballia raj karan nayyar said on saturday in the nandlal gupta suicide case the kotwali police has found involvement of rajiv mishra alias raju of parikhara and awadhesh thakur of apritpali area both of them have been arrested while search for other accused is in progress claiming harassment and mental torture by moneylenders from whom he had borrowed money 45 year old gun shop owner gupta had shot himself in the head while streaming the act live on facebook from his shop on station road in kotwali police station area of ballia on february 1 on the complaint of guptawife moni kumarinamed fir against 13 identified persons including hanuman singh shailendra singh ajay singh devnarain singh sahjanand singh anil chaubey rahul chaubey rohit chaubey akhilesh pratap singh alok singh sunil mishra raju mishra ms jyot armoury kanpurrinkle singh and five unidentified persons has been lodged under sections 306 420 406 and 506 ipc mishra was named as an accused while thakurinvolvement came to light during police investigation meanwhilewoman of krishna nagar under kotwali police station rajani soni showed the copy of an fir lodged by her against moneylenders including devnarain who is also an accused in guptasuicide case she said that her husband arun kumar had borrowed money from lenders 12 years ago on january 15 devnarain and his accomplices kidnapped arun from goshala road and took him to his place near bhrigu ashram and thrashed him brutally she alleged that kotwali police lodged an fir against devnarain and kushal singh on january 17 however no action was taken against the duo by the police she added regarding rajni sonicase nayyar said that details of action initiated in this case had been sought from kotwali police while process for cancellation of bail incase lodged against devnarain has also been started he said that process to book devnarain and his accomplices under gangster act has been started

Title: mohan bhagwat mohan bhagwat all equal before god priests made castes says rss chief mohan bhagwat
Article: mumbai conscience and consciousness are all the same in the country just the opinions differ rashtriya swayamsevak sangh rss chief mohan bhagwat said on sunday he was addressing an evenat the auditorium of ravindra natya mandir on the occasion of the 647th birth anniversary of saint shiromani rohidas bhagwat said when we earnlivelihood we have also responsibility towards the society when every work is for the greater good of the society how can any work be big small or different to our maker we are equal there is no caste or sect these difrere nces werecreated by our priests which was wrong he added he further said saint rohidas hasstature greater than tulsidas kabir and surdas which is why he is considered saint shi romani although he couldnwin over the brahmins in shastrath he was able to touch many hearts and made them believe in god he said bhagwat added that saint rohidas gave four mantras to the society truth compassion inner purity and continuous hard work and effort pay attention to all that it happening around you but donleave you religion under any circumstances the rss chief said

Title: pil in hc for cancellation of sirsa dera chiefparole
Article: chandigarh claiming that dera sacha sauda chief gurmeet ram rahim singhhas disturbed public harmony an sgpc member has filedpetition before the punjab and haryana high court for quashing the haryana government decision to grant him 40 day parole bhagwant singh sialka has also claimed the violation of statutory rules in granting parole the petitioner has sought directions to quash the january 20 2023 order passed by the divisional commissioner rohtak to grantparole to gurmeet against the provisions of section 11 of the haryana good conduct prisoners temporary release act 2022 sialka who is also an advocate has submitted that he has no personal interest in the present matter but has filed this petition aspublic interest litigation pil in view of the dangers of gurmeet on parole and thereby jeopardizing the sovereignty integrity of india according to the petitionperusal of the parole order clearly shows that he has been granted temporary release in the case in which he has been convicted it adds thatwarrant of sentence was issued by the special cbi court panchkula on august 28 2017 and no reference has been made about his conviction in two murder cases in two different firs in which he was sentenced to life imprisonment on january 17 2019 and october 18 2021 he was in jail and undergoing sentences under three orders of the competent courts but the order of temporary release has been issued only in one case in view of the clear cut provisions of section 11 of the haryana good conduct prisoners temporary release act 2022 he could not have been released from jail there is no linking of the fact in the impugned order that he was on bail in all the other cases thereby committing the violation of section 11 1 of the act states the petition that may come up for hearing next week it has also been submitted that the dera chief delivering sermons while on parole has annoyed the sikh community which can lead to violence in punjab and other states thereby jeopardizing tranquillity and public order particularly in punjab according to the petitioner the dera chief is in the habit of giving poisonous propaganda against guru granth sahib ji which is revered asliving guru by the sikhs

Title: tennis nick kyrgios pleads guilty to assaulting ex girlfriend escapes conviction
Article: tennis the charge was for an incident in 2021 australian tennis star nick kyrgios has admitted to assaulting an ex girlfriend but avoidedcriminal conviction with the magistrate calling the incidentsingle act of stupidity or frustration it was reported back in 2021 that world no 20 had shoved his ex girlfriend chiara passari afterheated argument later krgyios pleaded to the court to remove the charges against him citing mental health issues magistrate beth campbell heard his plea and said that the matter is not grave therefore the charges can be dropped campbell said kyrgios acted poorly but the offense was not planned or pre meditated it wassingle act of stupidity byyoung man attempting to extricate himself fromtense situation kyrgios was s2aid to have shoved passari who was preventing him from leaving her canberra apartment campbell described the incident as an act of stupidity and frustration krygios showeddeep sense of regret as he saidrespect todayruling and am grateful to the court for dismissing the charges without convictionwas not ingood place when this took place andreacted todifficult situation inwaydeeply regretknow it wasnok andm sincerely sorry for the hurtcaused kyrgios ex girlfriend passari reported this incident in early february almostmonth after the incident had originally happened the couple initially put it behind them and moved on however they broke up later that year indian sports live coverage on khel now his lawyer claimed that krygios had lawfully asked the woman to move away from his car 3 it is in that context and the frustration that resulted that my client reacted and the offense occurred kukulies smith added the lawyer later added that the incident wasrelationship between the mental health and the offending even though he no longer suffers it to the same extent today sam borenstein said that the tennis player suffers from recurrent mental health issue and thoughts of self harm after listening to the entire account the magistrate saidam dealing with you in the same waywould deal with any young man in this court you areyoung man who happens to hittennis ball particularly well krygios finished second in wimbledon 2022 he had to pull out of the recently finished australian open due toknee injury for more updates follow khel now on facebook twitter and instagram and join our community on telegram

Title: gajendran popular filmmaker actortgajendran no more
Article: chennai noted filmmaker and actorp gajendran passed away on sunday due to ill health at his residence in the city he was 68 gajendran madestride asdirector during 2000s withseries of films such as budget padmanaban 2000 bandha paramasivam 2003 middle class madhavan 2001 featuring actor prabhu in the lead in all the movies portraying the struggles of middle class families incomic way his debutant film veedu manaivi makkal 1998 itself wascomplex family drama with so many characters but presented with zero confusion director actor visu with whom gajendran worked as an assistant director played the lead role in the film however for this generation he is rather known ascomedian who played small roles on the big screen he has directed 15 films but has acted in more than 100 films even on the day of his demise on sunday the scene from the movie pammalsambantham where gajendran and kamal haasan have an argument of sorts was repeatedly shared on social media kamal haasan himself shared the dialogues between them on twitter to condole gajendrandeath last year gajendran becametopic of discussion afterk stalin visited him at his residence to inquire about his health after which it became known that both were college mates condoling gajendrandeath the chief minister said his contribution to the cinema cannot be dispensed with apart from the chief minister other film industry personalities such as radha ravi goundamani senthil vyapuri also paid last tributes to gajendran in person

Title: delhi kabaddi player accuses coach of rape extortion blackmail case filed
Article: the complainantstatement is being recorded in court file weeks after some of the countrytop wrestlers made sexual misconduct and harassment allegations against wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh triggeringwave of similar accusations from athletes across the country27 year old kabaddi player from delhi today accused her coach of raping her extorting money and blackmailing her by threatening to leak private pictures police saidpolice case was registered at the baba haridas nagar police station in west delhi against the coach joginder the complainant informed the police that she had been preparing for kabaddi competitions in hirankudna near mundka in west delhi since 2012 and her coach made sexual relation with her without her consent in 2015 she further accused the coach of forcing her to give himpart of earnings fromcompetition she won in 2018 she transferred rs 43 5 lakh to the bank account of the accused coach joginder the kabaddi player then got married in 2021 and the accused is blackmailing her by threatening to leak her private photos she said the police have registeredcase against the coach charging him with rape and criminal intimidation based on the complaint the delhi police have started investigation and the complainantstatement is being recorded in court

Title: jamia violence case delhi court discharges student activists sharjeel imam asif iqbal tanha
Article: with inputs from pti 2019 jamia violence case delhi court discharge sharjeel imam asif iqbal tanha new delhicity court on saturday discharged student activists sharjeel imam and asif iqbal tanha in the 2019 jamia violence case additional sessions judge arul verma discharged them incase registered at the jamia nagar police station in 2019 however imam will continue to remain in jail as he is an accused in the larger conspiracy case of the 2020 northeast delhi riots police had registered an fir under various sections of the indian penal code including rioting in connection with the communal violence that erupted afterclash between police and people protesting against the citizenship amendment act caa

Title: sports council president mercy kuttan to step down
Article: kerala state sports council kssc president mercy kuttan will step down after being told by the government to relinquish her post the government has also asked the standing committee members to quit reported manorama news olympian mercy had taken over as kssc chief in 2019 during the tenure of the first pinarayi vijayan ministry she became the third woman after padmini thomas and anju bobby george to head the kssc mercy the first indian woman long jumper to clear the 6 metre mark was alsomember of the 4x400m relay team which won gold at the 1989 asian athletics championships in new delhi

Title: us china ties deflate further over spy balloon fracas
Article: pentagon tracking chinese spy balloon spotted in us skies washington us china relations already edgy overrange of issues is in danger of deflating further after the pentagon said it has detectedsurveillance balloon over montanastate that is home to some of americamost lethal nuclear inter continental ballistic missiles icmbs us officials said thursday that the military has been tracking the spy balloon for several days and has even considered shooting it down butdecision on this has been deferred in the interest of public safety the balloon is traveling at an altitude well above commercial air traffic and in its current state it does not presentmilitary or physical threat to people on the ground officials said the disclosure coming just days before secretary of state antony blinken is due to visit beijing threatens to aggravate an already fraught relationship between the two countries chinese infiltration of us on the ground and now in the air has stirred disquiet in both strategic and political circles us lawmakers and military analysts have been warning about proposed chinese land purchases in neighboring north dakota saying it could be cover for spying onnearby military facility where drone test flights are conducted some us lawmakers and officials notably florida governor ron desantis have even suggested chinese entities should be banned from buying american real estatecanada which also tracked the chinese spy balloon and suggested there wassecond one has gone so far as to ban foreigners from buying real estate to cool prices chinese homebuyers accounted for nearly one third of vancouverreal estate market in 2015 according toreport by the national bank of canada america is looking to follow suit we donwant to have holdings by hostile nations desantis said last month revealing that he is considering asking the florida legislature to ban china from real estate investments in washington leaders ofhouse select committee on china issuedjoint statement saying the chinese communist party should not have on demand access to american airspace not only is thisviolation of american sovereignty coming only days before secretary blinkentrip to china but it also makes clear that the chinese communist partyrecent diplomatic overtures do not representsubstantive change in policy lawmakers mike gallagherand raja krishnamoorthisaid adding the incident demonstrates that the threat posed by china is not confined to distant shores it is here at home and we must act to counter this threat president biden reportedly sought military options after being briefed on the incursion but was told the pentagon had acted immediately to prevent collection of sensitive information senior military officers including gen mark milley chairman of the joint chiefs of staff reportedly advised against shooting down the balloon said to be the size of three buses citing concerns that falling debris could put people and property at risk in beijing chinese foreign ministry spokesperson mao ning said china was assessing the situation and that speculation and hype were unhelpful while facts were still being clarified china isresponsible country that always abides by international law and has no intention of infringing on any countryterritory and airspace mao said but american officials said thes intelligence community has very high confidence the balloon belongs to china and washington has engaged with chinese officials with urgency through multiple channels on the matter we have communicated to them the seriousness with which we take this issue we have made clear we will do whatever is necessary to protect our people and our homelandsenior military general told journalists atbackground briefing us officials acknowledged china has been undertaking similar activity spanningperiod of several years mainly over us territories such as hawaii and guam in the pacific

Title: bruhat bengaluru mahanagara palike lifts curbs on non veg hotels near aero show area
Article: bengaluru barelyfew days after imposingblanket ban on sale of meat and prohibiting hotels from serving non vegetarian food within10km radius of yelahanka air force station for the aero show bbmp on saturday relaxed the rules bengaluruit has allowed non vegetarian hotels to operate during the show provided they dispose of meat waste scientifically but the ban on sale of meat chicken and fish continues till february 20 with the 10km radius of the air base the civic agency had ordered the curbs on sale of meat chicken fish and operation of non vegetarian hotels from january 30 to february 20 the palike had said the ban was to ensure safe and smooth conduct of aero india 2023 since meat attracts birds especially large ones like kites increasing the risk of bird strikes collision of birds with aircraft the clampdown on non vegetarian food however met with intense criticism and backlash from many citizens sources in the defence ministry revealed that indian air force was also flooded with complaints subsequently yelahanka air force stationaerospace safety and inspection officer raised the issue with bbmp officials and discussed its likely impact on the general public and livelihood based on the recommendations of air force officials bbmp on saturday allowed non vegetarian hotels to operate within the 10km radius provided they agree to scientific disposal of meat waste without dumping it in the open

Title: bill gates tries hand at making roti draws pm modipraise
Article: new delhi billionaire businessman and philanthropist bill gates stab at cookingroti drew praise from prime minister narendra modi who encouraged him on saturday to try his hand at making millet dishes too gates the microsoft co founder posted on instagramvideo of him makingroti superb pm modi reacted and said that the latest trend in india are millets known to be healthy there are many millet dishes too which you can try making the prime minister said withsmiling emoji

Title: ford returning to formula one in 2026
Article: ford will return to formula one in 2026 when the sport entersnew engine era thes carmaker said on friday ahead oflaunch in new york by world champions red bull ford are expected to partner red bull powertrains the company established to build future engines for both red bull and sister team alphatauri the statement said more details would be provided later on friday the news today that ford is coming to formula one from 2026 is great for the sport and we are excited to see them join the incredible automotive partners already in formula one formula one chief executive stefano domenicali said in the statement ford sold their jaguar branded team to red bull in 2004 and the current champions are still based at the same factory in central england the blue oval last appeared in formula one with jordan in 2004 but the company remains the sportthird most successful engine manufacturer of all time this is the start ofthrilling new chapter in fordmotorsports story that began when my great grandfather wonrace that helped launch our company said executive chairman bill ford advertisement ford is returning to the pinnacle of the sport bringing fordlong tradition of innovation sustainability and electrification to one of the worldmost visible stages formula one will havenew power unit from 2026 using 100 sustainable fuels andgreater electrical component fordannouncement comes after rival general motors and their cadillac brand teamed up with andretti autosport who are seeking to enter formula one as an 11th team advertisement formula onegoverning body on thursday formally startedprocess that could lead to new teams entering the championship from 2025

Title: tax hurdle for foreign holidays
Article: kolkata the travel trade fraternity fears international tours that were just beginning to revive after takingtwo andhalf year hit due to the pandemic will again seeslump following the proposal to collect 20 tax from outbound passengers two leading travel trade bodies are drafting letters to union finance minister nirmala sitharaman requestingroll back of the proposal in the budget the tax collected at source tcs has been hiked by four times from 5 to 20 on both overseas tour packages and remittances without any threshold exemption this is in addition to the 5 gst that is levied on the travel invoice according to travel agents the proposal would deter many middle class travellers particularly those in service from taking foreign trips forfamily of four who need to book two rooms the cost could go up by as much as rs 28 000 forseven day trip to east asia or west asia by rs 84 000 for14 day trip to europe and rs 1 26 lakh forthree week trip to the us the tcs is only applicable on tour packages purchased from indian operators and not on hotel bookings by the travel online through an international travel portal

Title: erode bypoll inl extends support to evks elangovan
Article: erode the indian national league inl has extended its support to congress candidate evks elangovan for the upcoming byelection in erode east inmedia statement on behalf of the party inl state presidentmuniriddin sheriff thanked the dmk high command and chief minister mk stalin for allocating the erode east constituency to the congress party forsecond time inl will campaign intensively to defeat the communal powers which are calculating to win the byelection he said

Title: brij bhushan sharan singh the bahubali neta
Article: although the former wfi head has stepped down temporarily the bjp will probably go easy on him now in uttar pradesh brij bhushan sharan singh is known asbahubali neta muscleman leader riding high on the politics of mandal kamandal metaphorically caste and religion that raged in uttar pradesh in the 1990s singh was first elected to the lok sabha onbjp ticket from gonda in 1991strongman withcriminal history he served as an mp for six terms five times for the bjp and once for the samajwadi party sp in gonda district singhsupporters spanning caste groups consider himguardian angel because of the development work he has done in his constituency but the recent allegations by the wrestlers have brought him under the scannerviral video shows him coming out of the gym accompanied by at least 20 people while in another video from december 2021 he can be seen slappingwrestler during the under 15 national wrestling championship tournament in ranchi also read female wrestlers change script by speaking out against wfi chief although the wfi head has stepped down for the time being the bjp will probably go easy on singh now with the general election justyear away singhlaw graduate of avadh university was elected to the lok sabha from balrampur in 2004 however in 2008 he quit the bjp and joined the samajwadi party he won the kaiserganj seat on the sp ticket in 2009 but in the lead up to the 2014 parliamentary election he rejoined the bjp and won the same seat once more brij bhushan sharan singh isstrong figure with significant swaying power in the gonda balrampur area before acting against him the party bjp will consider all those factors saidprominent lucknow based journalist more stories from this issue

Title: female wrestlers change script by speaking out against wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh
Article: published feb 07 2023 16 50 ist before bollywood films like dangal 2016 brought women wrestlers to the public eye wrestling was primarily seen asmale sport withfew female wrestlers gracing the sidelines in the last decade or so however women wrestlers have been winning championships locally and internationally dangal merely gave them the spotlight they had long been denied in recent years they have been feted not just as athletes but also as stars but if their recent allegations of sexual misconduct against people in power at the wrestling federation of india wfi are any indication their celebrity has not saved them from exploitation on the bitterly cold morning of january 18 several top wrestlers including olympic medallist sakshi malik and 2022 commonwealth games gold medallist vinesh phogat protested at delhijantar matar against brij bhushan sharan singh the president of the wfi accusing him of sexual misdemeanour and of being autocratic they raised issues of financial irregularity in the wfi saying they would not put up with the way singhbjp mp from uttar pradeshkaiserganj was running the organisation interestingly the women wrestlers were joined by world wrestling championship medallist bajrang punia and mahavir phogat coach and father of wrestlers geeta and babita phogat wrestlers sarita mor sangeeta phogat satyawart malik jitender kinha and sumit malik were also present they demanded the dissolution of the wfi and its reconstitution withsportsperson at its head the protest went on until january 20 it was called off after union minister of youth affairs and sports anurag thakur promised the wrestlers that an oversight committee would be formed to investigate the matter it has takenlot of courage for us to come together and protest the wrestlers wrote inletter to former athletet usha who is the head of indian olympic association ioa andrajya sabha member since 2022 the letter said that singh had sexually harassed several young wrestlers and that on account of the mental torture she faced vinesh phogat felt suicidal after failing to bring home an olympic medal speaking at the dharna vinesh said she knew at least 10 to 20 girls who had been sexually harassed at wrestling camps their identities have not been revealed as that might endanger their lives she added in its defence the wfi has claimed that the protesting athletes havehidden agenda singh and his supporters have tried to give the protestspolitical colour by alleging that the wrestlers all from haryana have the support of haryana congress leader deepender singh hooda however haryana chief minister manohar lal khattar came out in defence of the athletes the safety of our women athletes is very important and we take it seriously we will not let their morale down all the issues raised by the athletes will be taken seriously he said also read brij bhushan sharan singh the bahubali neta taking cognisance of the allegations anurag thakur initially announced thatfive member oversight committee headed by boxing legendc mary kom will investigate the charges against singh and manage the day to day affairs of the wfi until the committee submits its report other members of the committee include khel ratna awardee yogeshwar dutt executive council member ioa trupti murgunde member mission olympic cell radhica sreeman and ex executive director teams sports authority of india sai rajesh rajagopalan the constitution of the committee did not go down well with the protesters vinesh phogat bajrang puniya and sakshi malik who spearheaded the protest said they were not consulted before the formation of the committee so on january 31 the sports ministry added babita phogat to the committee significantly kom was nominated to the rajya sabha by the bjp in 2016 and yogeshwar dutt joined the bjp in 2019 dutt has publicly come out in support of singh meanwhile singh who stepped down temporarily as president of the wfi denied all charges and declared himself ready to be hanged if even one female wrestler could establish the sexual harassment claim against him similar cases while complaints of sexual harassment are common in the indian sports fraternity investigations into them are often inadequate after initial responses in may 2022prominent sports coachnagarajan was accused of sexual harassment bynational level runner in chennai the 19 year old claimed that nagarajan touched female athletes inappropriately while giving them physiotherapy and helping them with stretches two months after she filed her complaint seven more athletes made similar allegations nagarajan now faces charges under the indian penal code and the protection of children from sexual offences act the indian womenunder 17 football teamassistant coach alex ambrose was accused of sexually abusingyoung athlete in june 2022 when the team was training in norway ambrose who served as the head of scouting for the all india football federation aiff was suspended and expelled from the camp the 40 year old former india striker sent the aifflegal notice while denying any misconduct afterrider reported sexual harassment duringtraining trip to slovenia indiahead cycling coachk sharma was punished with termination of contract even as the sai opened an investigation into the issuefew days after the initial complaint sharma was accused of harassing three other cyclists no resolution most of these cases have dragged on for years with no resolution in sight several times the accused are let off with minor punishments ranging from transfers to meagre cuts in pay or pensionformer sai executive director who spoke to frontline on condition of anonymity said that many girls who come from rural and impoverished backgrounds are coerced by senior officials into giving sexual favours on the basis of false promises for these young female athletes the stakes are highfact which probably ensures their silence norris pritamsenior sports journalist who has covered six olympic games told frontline that while sexual harassment was quite prevalent in the world of sports onlyfew cases got publicised onlyminuscule section of such incidents gets reported because of fear of superiors family pressure and societal issueshave met many women who have left promising careers because of sexual harassment he said indian sports federations are still male dominated said pritam even when the federations receive such complaints they mishandle them and nothing much comes out of the investigations and committees that are formed however pritam believes that the recent protest will at least encourage men and women to speak out it will also send outmessage to officials and coaches who should be alarmed he said it has takenlot of courage for us to come together and protest the wrestlers wrote inletter to the head of indian olympic associationt ushap mohan former sports editor of the hindu pointed out that over the decades sports activities have changed from beinghobby or passion to becomefull fledged industry involving money sponsors and advertisers because of which they have come under political influence historically too the heads of sports federations in india have been either politicians or have strong ties with politics politicians who arengenuinely interested inparticular sport start heading it because it ispowerful position to be in muscle power has replaced genuine love for sports in recent times he said vinesh was outspoken in her allegations at the press conference the protesters addressed this exploitation is happening every day why does the training camp happen in lucknow the reason ithappening over there is because he singh hashouse there and so iteasy to exploit the girls they trouble us too much they get into our personal lives and relationships they want to know everything no matter where the case ends the wrestlers have spoken up fearlessly against powerful opponents and that in itself isgood start the crux on january 18 several top indian wrestlers protested at delhijantar matar against brij bhushan sharan singh the president of the wfi accusing him of sexual misdemeanour and of being autocratic while complaints of sexual harassment are common in the indian sports fraternity investigations into them are often inadequate after initial responses no matter where the case ends the wrestlers have spoken up fearlessly against powerful opponents more stories from this issue

Title: akal takht jathedar suggests using hsgmc act
Article: jalandhar akal takht jathedar giani harpreet singh suggesting that if there is no success in getting all india gurdwara act then the shiromani gurdwara parbandhak committee sgpc should strive to take itself out of parliament and the centrecontrol reflects an alternate thinking similar views were earlier expressed bysection of prominent sikh intellectuals and experts who held that the separation of haryana sikh gurdwara parbandhak committee hsgmc was actually an opportunity to end central intervention in the sgpc affairs by bringing the sikh gurdwara act back to the punjab assembly the jathedar has made these remarks after the supreme court dismissedreview petition on upholding the constitutional validity of the haryana sikh gurdwara management act till now the developments formation ofseparate gurdwara committee for haryana and the apex court upholding it have been projected by sad and sgpc leaders as major adversity for the sikh community this despite sikh gurdwara management bodies in delhi jammu kashmir takht hazur sahib maharashtra being formed by exclusive acts and the patna sahib management committee bihar being governed bycommon act the akal takht jathedarstatement reflects fresh thinking on the issue after the sc upheld the formation haryana gurdwara act senior advocates phoolka had had called itchance to end central intervention

Title: himachalpong and janjehli to be developed under swadesh darshan yojna ii cm sukhvinder singh sukhu
Article: shimla the chief minister sukhvinder singh sukhu met union tourism ministerkishan reddy at new delhi on thursday late evening and requested him to include the stateplaces of tourists under swadesh darshan yojna ii in the next phase he said that himachal pradesh is blessed with immense tourism potential which includes water bodies reservoirs religious destinationslot for adventure lovers and striking mountain ranges sukhvinder singh sukhu said that the pong dam reservoir in district kangra and janjehli area of mandi district will be developed under swadesh darshan yojna ii he said thatconsultancy approved by the union ministry will soon preparedetailed project report for further execution of this project he also requested to include other places of tourist interest under the ambit of the scheme to develop district kangra as the tourism capital of the state he said that the state government would preparedetailed project report and submit it to the union ministry for setting uptent city at the base camp of dhauladhar ranges he said that adequate land and road connectivity will be ensured for the tent city project which will have more than 200 encampments with all the luxury and comfort he said that efforts would be made to develop kangra an all time favourite tourist destination for both domestic and international tourists and strengthen the tourism related infrastructure in the district under the vibrant village programmedetailed project report will be prepared for developing 25 places in the state as tourist attractions these destinations will be equipped with ample amenities to facilitate the tourists visiting the state he said sukhu said thatconvention centre would also be constructed at dharamshala with assistance from the asian development bank he said that for the expansion of kangra airport the land acquisition process was in progress and would soon be completed the state government mulls constructing heliports across the state so that air connectivity could playsignificant role in promotion of tourism inbig way he also advocated for including the state for development of heritage sites the cm said that chintpurni temple would also be developed under prasad scheme various amenities would be available for the pilgrims under the scheme union minister said that an investors meet was scheduled to be held in new delhi in the month of april this year and suggested to preparedetailed and comprehensive presentation based on tourism potential available in the state the mechanism to ease the process for land transfer and other necessary documentation to set up tourism ventures so that huge investments could be attracted

Title: yogi woos voters with ayodhya temple says left cong questioned ramexistence
Article: invoking hindutva and appealing to voters from the community uttar pradesh chief minister yogi adityanath on tuesday said the bjp has given justice to people by building the ram mandir in ayodhya and hit out at the congress left alliance for tripura assembly polls for protesting against construction of the temple and questioning the existence of lord ram addressingrally in bagbassa constituency where the bjp has fielded jadab lal debnath adityanath said the congress protested against construction of the temple they play with peoplesentiments they raised questions on lord ramexistence days after union home minister amit shah said while addressing rallies in the state that the ram mandir would be completed and opened to the public by january 1 2024 adityanath saidmagnificent temple is in its last stages of construction and would be completed soon also read how two veterans of manybattle between cpm congress in tripura are steering their new ties taking on the left congress alliance he said the congress and communists have always tried to block the construction of kashi vishwanath temple corridor they do not want to honour faith he accused the alliance of conspiring against development and progress ushered in under the double engine government of prime minister narendra modi at the centre and chief minister manik saha in agartala and said people are now provided with houses under the pm awas yojana gas connections under pm ujjwala yojana toilets under swachh bharat abhiyan drinking water under atal jal dhara mission as well as benefits of pm kisan samman nidhi and ayushman bharat among others under the previous government of the cpiled left front adityanath said there was little employment generation people did not get benefits of government schemes and women lacked security also read tripura cm manik saha dy cm jishnu devvarma among 45 crorepati candidates he alleged that the congress and the left are fighting the assembly elections together to spread anarchy in the state they are trying to confuse people and deprive them of their rights and legitimate benefits he said and appealed to people to vote in the double engine government again adityanath subsequently addressed another election rally in kalyanpur where the party has fielded pinaki das chowdhury as its candidate

Title: 17 year old held with 5kg heroine rs 8 4 lakh cash in amritsar
Article: amritsar sleuths of the counter intelligent ci wing of the police arrested17 year old boy and recovered 15kg heroin and rs 8 4 lakh cash from his possession punjab director general of police dgp gaurav yadav said that the arrested teen wasresident of amritsar following an intelligence inputpolice team laidnaka on ram tirath road and arrested the juvenile who along with his accomplice identified as resham singh was going to deliver the contraband after retrieving it from village kakkar preliminary investigations revealed that the consignment was airdropped by pakistan based smugglers bydrone the dgp said about ten days back the police had bustedtrans border drug smuggling cartel with the arrest ofdrug smuggler and recovery of 5kg heroin and rs 12 5 lakh cash duringspecial checking operation at village thattha in amritsar one resham singh was believed to be the mastermind of the trans border narcotics smuggling racket who managed to flee from the spot the dgp saidpolice officer said that the father and grandfather of the arrested juvenile were already undergoing imprisonment under the ndps act

Title: life term penalty up to rs 10 crore for using unfair means in competitive exams in uttarakhand
Article: dehradun following the major protest in the state capital by unemployed youth against the recent instances of scams in recruitment exams the pushkar singh dhami government late on late thursday night approved the uttarakhand competitive examination measures for prevention and prevention of unfair means in recruitment ordinance 2023 to ensure transparency and fairness in competitive exams in the state besides this any property acquired by using unfair means will be attached the offence under this ordinance would be cognizable non bailable and non compoundableprovision of imprisonment forlife term along withpenalty up to rs 10 crore has been made for any person printing press service provider organisation management system coaching institute etc found involved in unfair means in the entire competitive exam processprovision ofthree year jail term andrs 5 lakh penalty has been made for any candidate found indulging in unfair means incompetitive examination either by copying or by making other candidates copy ifcandidate is found guilty again in another competitive examination thenprovision has been made for the imprisonment ofminimum of 10 years andfine of at least rs 10 lakhs similarly ifperson is found conspiring with any firm conducting an organised examination he she will be awarded life imprisonment andfine of up to rs 10 crore if any examinee is found cheatingprovision has been made to debar him for two to five years from the date of filing of the charge sheet and in case of conviction the guilty will be debarred from all competitive examinations for 10 years ifcandidate is found cheating againprovision has been made to debar him from all competitive examinations for five to 10 years which can go up to life imprisonment for repeat
