offenders cm dhami said our cabinet had already announced to make the strictest possible anti copying act in the country we have included strict provisions in this ordinance we have exposed many recruitment scams in the state and we will act strongly against anyone found involved in wrong and illegal practices

Title: eight held for ganja smuggling in hyderabad
Article: hyderabad lb nagar special operations team sot sleuths arrested eight smugglers including an engineering dropout andbusinessman in lb nagar on thursday while transporting ganja from odisha to hyderabad and seized 10 kg contraband from their possession the accused shaik abbas 24college dropoutdinesh reddy 22 engineering dropout from nagole ch chandu 22 an iti diploma holder from lb nagarsriram charan teja 22 andsandeep 22tech final year students from lb nagar azhar pasha 27cook from nagole sahil singh 24 and abhishek singh 22businessmen from mangalhat were arrested during interrogation the accused confessed they procured the contraband from ram babu of sileru and anjaneyulu of odisha through mediator bhukya srikant of warangal the trio is yet to be arrested police also recoveredweighing machine and rs 56 930 cash from the accused the accused along with the seized material were handed over to lb nagar police for further investigationcase was registered against the accused under the ndps act the offenders were produced before the court and sent to judicial remand

Title: influential political person trying to launder coal scam cash ed
Article: new delhihighly influential political person was making an attempt to launder the proceeds of crime originating from coal smuggling through his close confidant manjit singh grewal alias jitti bhai the enforcement directorate ed said on thursday the agency said it has seized rs 1 4 crore cash from grewalpremises in kolkata and the cash seizure was proceeds of crime from coal smuggling makingserious allegation against the governing political establishment in kolkata the agency said preliminary analysis of material on record suggestsgreater nexus and it appears that this person was also involved in handling illegal cash of the ministerspecific intelligence input was gathered that one highly influential political person was making an attempt to launder the proceeds of crime originating from coal smuggling through his close confidant manjit singh grewal bhai the ed saidsearch conducted by the agency on wednesday in the office of gajraj group in kolkata led to the seizure of rs 1 4 crore cash and also incriminating media from there this money was unaccounted cash part of the total cash payment of approximately rs 9 crore forproperty called salasar guest house at undervalued price the market value of this property is more than rs 12 crore however deed value is shown around rs 3 crore the agency has said

Title: valentine not valentineday its cow hug day here is why
Article: feb 09 2023 10 55am ist source toi in the animal welfare board of india awbistatutory advisory body on animal welfare laws has declared february 14 valentineday as cow hug day noting that vedic traditions are on the verge of extinction due to the advancement of western culture over time in view of the immense benefit of the cow huggingcow will bring emotional richness hence will increase our individual collective happiness therefore all the cow lovers may also celebrate february 14 as cow hug day keeping in mind the importance of mother cows and making life happy and full of positive energy said the board in its general appeal issued on monday

Article: stories in mocktale are works of fiction intended to bringsmile to your face they bear no connection to events and characters in real life disclaimer this iscompilation of tweets being shared by netizens around the world times of india neither condones nor endorses any of the views shared in this article here

Title: pm modispeech instilled new hope among youth revived trust of poor tribals amit shah
Article: new delhi union home minister amit shah on wednesday hailed prime minister narendra modispeech in lok sabha and said it instilled new hope among the youth and revived the trust he has built among the poor tribals and the deprived by giving them their rights shah said with his power packed positive approach modi validated that there is no looking back for india in its amrit kaal while setting new examples of best parliamentary practice in his speech pm ji today instilled new hope among the youth with his power packed positive approach pm modi validated that there is no looking back for india in its amrit kaal the home minister tweeted prime minister modispeech revived the trust he has built among the poor tribals and the deprived by giving them their due rights and lifting their living standards shah said and this bedrock of trust now cannot be shaken by the ones who kept them deprived for decades after independence he said in another tweet in his speech prime minister modi said the trust reposed in him by crores of people was his protective shield against the lies allegations and abuses of his critics as he launchedstinging counterattack on the opposition over its bid to target him over the adani hindenburg issue replying to the debate on the motion of thanks on the presidentaddress in lok sabha modi said he had spent every moment of his life working for the nation and contrasted the lost decade of the congress led upa rule with the advent of indiadecade under his government in his nearly 85 minute speech modi said the world was looking at india with hope and positivity amid instability in many parts of the globe due to the once incentury pandemic in covid 19 and conflicts the trust of global institutions in india is due to the presence ofstable and decisive government he stressed this government has the strength to take decisions in national interest and carries out reforms not out of compulsion but conviction he said

Title: jessica pegula reveals her mother kim pegulahealth crisis
Article: pro tennis player jessica pegula has revealed that her mother buffalo bills and buffalo sabres co owner and president kim pegula went into cardiac arrest in june and is still recovering while dealing with significant language and memory issues in an essay that the players tribune published tuesday jessica pegula detailed for the first time the medical crisis that abruptly removed her mother from the public eye and suggested that her mother may not resume the same level of involvement in the familysports franchises kim pegula she wrote went into cardiac arrest while sleeping and received lifesaving cpr from another daughter until paramedics arrived and restored her heartbeat the family previously said only that kim pegula was receiving medical care for some unexpected health issues that arose shortly after she celebrated her 53rd birthday my mom is working hard in her recovery she is improving but where she ends up is still unknown jessica pegula 28 wrote she said she decided to write about her motherordeal after bills player damar hamlin went into cardiac arrest on the field duringjan 2 game in cincinnati in what pegula described as some bizarre messed up full circle moment my stomach sunk because it felt like the exact same thing all over againwas sitting on the bench fortennis event in sydney australiawanted to throw up wrote jessica pegula who is no 4 in the wtasingles rankingswas supposed to go on for mixed doubles in 15 minutes andremember telling one of my teammatesamlittle freaked out right now this is too close to home andfeel likeam going to havepanic attack as hamlin began his recovery jessica pegula joined in an outpouring of support from fans and the nfl and worewhite screen printed patch with hamlinuniform number while playing at the australian open it didnfeel like it was just for him it felt like it was for my mom as well she said advertisement jessica pegula had been home in florida months earlier when she gotcall from her sister kelly around midnight on their motherbirthday and learned that their mother was being rushed to the hospital my mom was asleep when my dad woke up to her going into cardiac arrest and she was unresponsive for quitewhile she wrote kelly pegula who was staying with their parents performed cpr just three months after telling her family that she planned to become certified in the procedure forjobremember her telling us what she was doing in our family group chat jessica pegula wrote and my mom even responded nice kells now if we haveheart attack you can revive us advertisement today kim pegula can read write and understand pretty well but she has trouble finding the words to respond jessica pegula wrote it is hard to deal with and it takeslot of patience to communicate with her butthank god every day that we can still communicate with her at all the doctors continue to be blown away by her recovery considering where she started and her determination is the driving force of that as the first woman to serve as president of an nhl and nfl team at the same time kim pegula lived it and loved it and it was felt by everyone she met jessica pegula wrote now we come to the realization that all of that is most likely gone that she wonbe able to be that person anymore

Title: manimajra cbi arrests asi for taking 25k bribe at manimajra police stn
Article: chandigarh the cbi on wednesday arrested assistant sub inspector asi balkar singh for allegedly acceptingbribe of rs 25 000 from an accused in an abetment to suicide case at the manimajra police stationgurpreet singhresident of manimajra alleged the asi was demandingbribe of rs 50 000 to clear his name from the case in which he was arrested in december last year he was currently out on bail the asi called him with rs 25 000 gurpreet filedcomplaint with the cbitrap was laid near the police station as the accused accepted the bribe amount cbi sleuths nabbed him the manimajra police had booked gurpreet singh around 11 months afterwoman preet of darshani bagh manimajra allegedly committed suicide by hanging herself fromceiling fan in manimajra on january 21 2022 police had recoveredsuicide note in which the woman had alleged gurpreet singh was inrelationship with her despite being married when she came to know about his marital status he allegedly refused to accept her police had sent the suicide note to cfsl for matching the handwriting of the victim after receiving the report and taking legal opinion police had registeredcase under section 306 abetment to suicide of the ipc against gurpreet

Title: moldova zelenskyy ukraine intercepted plans to destroy moldova
Article: brussels ukrainian president volodymyr zelenskyy said thursday that his country has intercepted plans by russian secret services to destroy moldova speaking to european union leaders in brussels zelenskyy said he recently told moldovan president maia sandu about the alleged schemehave informed her that we have intercepted the plan of the destruction of moldova by the russian intelligence zelenskyy said throughtranslator zelenskyy said the documents showed who when and how the plan would break the democracy of moldova and establish control over moldova zelenskyy said the plan was very similar to the one devised by russia to take over ukraine he added that he did not know whether moscow ultimately ordered the plan to be carried out russian foreign minister sergey lavrov charged last week that the west was considering turning moldova into another ukraine he alleged that the west backed the 2020 election of the pro western sandu claiming that she is eager to take the country into nato merge moldova with romania and practically is ready for anything in december moldovanational intelligence agency warned that russia could launchnew offensive this year with the aim of creatingland corridor through southern ukraine to moldovamoscow backed breakaway region of transnistria transnistria broke away after1992 civil war but is not recognized by most countries it extends roughly 400 kilometers 250 miles from the eastern bank of the dniester river to the countryborder with ukraine russia has about 1 500 troops nominally as peacekeepers in the breakaway region

Title: moheen presidency university students plan fundraiser concert for moheenbapi da in kolkata
Article: kolkata students of presidency university have decided to organisefundraiser concert to help bapi da co founder of moheener ghoraguli who is undergoing treatment for lung cancer at sskm hospital the concert scheduled on february 18 at the presidency greens will have performances by anindya chattopadhyay upal sengupta rupankar bagchi sidhu borno anonyo moheen ekhonbondhura and others tapas das also known as bapi da is one of the last surviving members of bengalfirst band moheener ghoraguli formed in 1975 by gautam chattopadhyay barishan rayug student of english said bapi da has performed with his new band moheen ekhonbondhura several times on presidency campus the last show was in 2022 anwesha dey another ug english student said we have grown up hearing songs of moheen so listening to him was an emotional experience it was heartbreaking to know he is suffering from cancer while ug economic student atri deb chowdhury felt that songs of moheener ghoraguli are an inseparable part of presidency life ug history student apalak bhattacharya said the concert will celebrate bapi da and moheener ghoraguli we hope people who have grown up hearing their songs will donate for bapi da said bhattacharya daswife sutapa ghosh also the manager of mohin ekhonbondhura is touched by the love from students we have no problem taking help from the students she said she is also thankful to the state for bearing the expenses of dastreatment toi tried to contact dean of students arun maiti but he did not respond

Title: hajj indian enters pakistan to complete his journey on foot to saudi arabia for hajj
Article: lahore an indian national who was earlier deniedvisa bypakistani court entered the country on tuesday to complete his marathon journey on foot to saudi arabia to perform hajj shihab bhai 29 arrived in pakistan via the wagah border and was welcomed by sarwar taj who had filedwrit petition in the supreme court on behalf of shihab and bhagat singh memorial foundation pakistan chairman imtiaz rashid qureshi qureshi told pti that shihab was very happy to get the visa to continue his journey to mecca he has broughtmessage of love friendship and brotherhood qureshi said adding he wanted to organise an event in shihabhonour on the premises of lahore high court but could not do so because of security issues shihab who hails from kerala embarked on3 000 km journey on foot in october last year from his home state to the wagah border where he was stopped by pakistanimmigration authorities as he did not havevisa shihab pleaded before the immigration authorities that he was going to perform hajj on foot and had already travelled 3 000 kms and should be allowed to enter the country on humanitarian grounds he wantedtransit visa to reach saudi arabia via iranfederal investigation agency official had said hajj is an annual islamic pilgrimage to mecca in saudi arabia considered the holiest city for muslims tajresident of lahore filedpetition in the lahore high court lhc requesting that shihab be grantedtransit visa to allow him to travel to saudi arabia he argued that just like the pakistan government issues visas to sikh pilgrims from india to take part in the birth anniversary of guru nanak and on other occasions it should also grantvisa to shihab the lhc dismissed his petition observing that the petitioner was not related to the indian citizen nor did he hold his power of attorney to approach the court taj later challenged the decision in the supreme court of pakistan

Title: doctor found dead stuffed in drawer at betalbatim
Article: colva27 year old doctor working inhospital at nuvem was found dead in the apartment he was staying in at betalbatim on wednesday the victim dr nishant bharat wasnative of bihar the police said the body was recovered by colva police it was found stuffed insidedrawer since his legs were bound police suspect it to be case of murder that occurredday prior an alarm was raised when the doctor did not turn up for his duties at the hospital his co workers could not get in touch with him as all phone calls went answered the police were informed immediately after which they swung into action police told toi that the victim had employedmale person to help him with household chores further investigations are in progress

Title: in chennai rs 50 fine for peeing in public
Article: chennai the next time you get the urge to urinate and decide to go inpublic place you could be fined 50 greater chennai corporation commissioner gagandeep singh bedifew days ago instructed officials to enforce the rule strictly to keep the city clean and hygienic the commissioner said they would also create awareness it will be coupled with maintenance of toilets we will have the urinals clean and ensure people use them if people urinate around toilets they will be fined he said the offending individual would be givenchallan with name detail of violation and fine amount sanitary inspectors have been told to carry out regular inspections across the city sanitary inspectors and conservancy inspectors will levy the fines the commissioner said the corporation has multiple provisions to fine residents under the chennai city municipal corporation act 1919 which prohibits individuals from sullying public places by any means causing an health hazard residents want clean and hygienic toiletssandhya of anna nagar said open urination was rampant in the area 50 issmall amount still irrespective of amount enforcement is the key sathish galley of omr said gcc should ensure toilets are maintained well only then mindset of the user will change sridhar venkatraman of mylapore said most delivery personnel have no access to toilets and urinate in the open collecting fine is reasonable after they think through the problems find the root causes implement solutions and then start regulating it

Title: those in custody must be allowed to appear for lekhpal exam uttarakhand cm pushkar singh dhami
Article: dehradun afterdelegation of the uttarakhand state unemployed association and other representatives of the ongoing protest against unfair exam practices in the state met chief minister pushkar singh dhami and said some of the protesters taken into police custody on thursday could miss are meant to appear for the lekhpal exam on sunday the cm asked dgp ashok kumar to make sure the candidates appear in the exam on sunday dhami said our government has acted tough in all matters which have come to the fore asresult people involved in wrong practices have been placed behind the bars we have initiated stringent measures and it has helped in bringing out the wrongdoings we have fulfilled our commitment of coming up with stringent laws with strict provisions against those resorting to illegal means in the recruitment exams the delegation that met the cm said because offew corrupt people several hard working aspirants were getting deprived governor lt gen gurmit singh retd gave his approval for the uttarakhand competitive examination measures for prevention and prevention of unfair means in recruitment ordinance 2023 on friday after thursdayprotest and violence the uttarakhand government had approved the ordinance and sent it to the governor for his consent the ordinance has provisions for imprisonment up to life term and rs 10 crore penalty

Title: singh koshyari bhagat singh koshyarireturn to uttarakhand will add another power centre
Article: dehradun bhagat singh koshyari who has stepped down as the governor of maharashtra after completing almost three andhalf years of tenure is all set to return to uttarakhand even before the octogenarian politicianarrival in the state speculations are on about the possible impact of bhagat da as popularly called by party workers return in the politics of uttarakhand of which he has been the most dominant force since the state was carved out of up in 2000 his return will create one more power centre in bjp and uttarakhand he has been24x7 career politician before he was made governor in september 2019 in fact he was still pulling strings in uttarakhand politics despite being away said sma kazmi political expert kazmi added that being an accessible politician and popular rajput leader from kumaon koshyari is liked by partygrass root workers who will again makebeeline outside his house which is going to cause jitters among other party leaders

Title: himachal pradesh cm sukhvinder singh sukhu gets serious patient from remote pangi valley airlifted for treatment
Article: shimla himchal pradesh chief minister sukhvinder singh sukhu has once again stepped in to saveprecious life by providing his chopper so thatpatient under medical emergency could be airlifted in time for treatment this time sukhu gotserious patient airlifted from the killar town of pangi valley in chamba district in his official chopper by cancelling his scheduled tour few days back insimilar gesture he had airliftedserious patient from remote mayar valley of lahaul spiti district the patient who had received serious throat injury in an accident needed immediate specialised treatment as specialist doctors are not there in killar so doctors after giving him primary treatment referred to outside the valley on which the family members requested the government to make arrangements to airlift him through the chopper on which he was shifted from killar to government medical college at tanda in kangra district the patient is being attended as per the reports received from the doctors cm sukhvinder singh sukhu has directed the hospital authorities to treat the patient free of cost and provide him every possible assistance he said that the government mulls to strengthen the health facilities in the far off and tribal regions of the state he said that adequate doctors will be posted in such areas so that the people living in hard and tribal regions could get adequate medical attention with the best facilities invideo message pritam lal the brother of the patient has thanked the chief minister whom he termed as saviour for their family for saving the life of his brother recently the chief minister had provided his official chopper to airliftseriously ill patient from chhaling village of mayar valley in lahaul spiti district sukhu has been in the limelight for his compassion towards the needy and destitute since he has assumed the office of the chief minister after taking oath he went straight to an orphanage to enquire the wellbeing of the inmates and immediately tookdecision that the state government will constitute chief ministersukh ashraya sahayata kosh with an outlay of rs 101 crore so that the facility of higher education could be provided to needy children and destitute women later he also announced to provide rs 500 as festive allowance to the students

Title: reluctant trainee to race walking qualifier for paris olympics clocking 1 19 55 akshdeep singh 23 has comelong way
Article: askid growing up in kahne ke village in barnala district of punjab akshdeep singh often practiced running around the two acre farm owned by his father gurjant singh to pursue his dream of getting enrolled in the indian army from the recruitment drives at bathinda singh becamerace walker in subsequent seasons and joined indian navy last year under the sports quota on tuesday the 23 year old became one of two indian athletes alongwith priyanka goswami to bag the first qualifying berths for paris olympics withnew national record of one hour and 19 55 minutes in the men20 km race walk event at the tenth indian open race walking championship at ranchi my father ownstwo acre farm in our village and my aim was to get enrolled in the army assoldier and support my family seeing the elder village youth train for the recruitment drivesspent my time running around the farm and later at the nearby stadium in an effort to prepare myself for the coming years after making the national record todaytold my father about qualifying for the paris olympics and the first thing he asked me was paise da arrangement karna hai tan das di if you want money then tell me shared singh while speaking with the indian express priyanka goswami secured her spots while akshdeep singh setnational record and also qualified for both the events day 2 promises more actionwatch it live on afiyoutube and facebook channels pic twitter com hbrip0sadf athletics federation of india february 14 2023 singhinterest in running grew with village youths passing his home in the morning to train in the fields or along the road to the nearby town of barnala the youngster would train for 800m races at the village apart from undertaking the 30 minute bus journey to the baba kehar singh stadium in barnala it was the transfer of his initial coach jaspreet singh that led to the punjab youngster going to patiala to train as an athlete with his coach suggesting he train under former race walk national champion and coach gurdev singh the youngster faced the dilemma of training asrunner or race walker kadhi kise nu eh khed karde dekhya hi nahi sihad never watched any one competing inrace walk ever when coach gurdev singh told me to train asrace walker in 2016did not even train with full effort formonth or sowas fascinated by races and could not imagine myself walking remembers singh gurdev singh who has coached the likes of kt irfan who finished tenth in the london olympics was impressed by singhnatural walking action and persisted with training the youngster in race walk while the veteran coach made singh train for one hour training sessions initially the training sessions increased as well as his traineewillingness to continue in the discipline whenmade akshdeep give the race walk trialswas impressed by the balance of his heel kick for close to two months he did not show his willingness but when he met some of the seniors and other athletes in the camp his interest grew his posture was good for race walking but we had to gradually work on the placement of knee and heel on the track as his muscles were trained for running slowly we made him run on the road and would increase the distance to 30 40 kms during one training session says gurdev singh wonsilver medal in the18 junior nationals in vijayawada withtiming of 43 35 minutes within an year of training and followed the medal withsilver in all india inter university the same year in 2018 singh clocked his first sub 43 minute timing of 42 36 minutes and won the bronze in 10km race walk in the junior federation cup at coimbatore the youngster missed his chance to compete in junior asian championship but madenew junior national record of 44 791 in 10 km race walk event in ranchi the same year race walking national championships update race walkers akshdeep singh win national race walking championships and in the process also qualify for 2023 world ch ps 2024 olympics congratulations on your achievements rockstars keep rocking pic twitter com b23kwwdelg sai media february 14 2023 in 2019 the youngster sufferedknee injury which kept him out for ten months which also meant that he missed the world university games in italy the first race walk shoebought was for rs 4500 and the shoes would break after 2 3 months my father and mother would save whatever money they could and my coaches and seniors too helped me whenbroke the new junior national recordhad my passport made injury de karan passport bina kise vise di stamp toh reh gaya due to injury my chance to getvisa stamp on passport remained unfulfilled says singhkhelo india scholarship kept his training needs fulfilled to some extent and the youngster competed in his first senior competition in 2020 where he gave his personal best 20 km race walk timing of one hour and 26 12 minutes to finish 11th in eighth indian open race walking competition in ranchi days before covid 19 lockdown advertisement the last two years have seen him makingnew khelo india university games record as wellbronze medal in national games andsilver in open nationals in bengaluru singh has also been training under russian coach tatyana sibileva at bengaluru at the last asian games the men20 km race walk title went at the timing of one hour and 22 04 minutes and singh believes that he can winmedal despite chinese runners being in familiar territory committing fewest fouls race walking is all about committing less fouls and getting the technique perfect coach tatyana has made us focus on hip and knee exercises and posture to make contact with the track as straight and maintain contact with track during all the times she has made us train for long steps andfast heel kick to make the heel balance during my time at the village in lockdownalso saw videos of world leader perseus karlstrom of sweden 2012 olympic champion chen ding and 2016 olympic champion wang zhen of china to observe their technique said singh who now works aspetty officer with the indian navy as for his village singh knows how the village will celebrate his feat of qualifying for the paris olympics my village is very proud of me and racewalking whenever there iskabaddi mela at the village or nearby villages they invite me to demonstrate race walking in the field so that more and more kids know about the sport jad sari duniya de samne chal kaiya fer pind de samne chalan di ki sharam whenhave walked in front of the world why shouldhesitate in walking in front of village kids says singh

Title: chinese spy balloon us recovers sensor parts from downed chinese balloon says military
Article: washington the united states has recovered important sensor and electronics parts fromsuspected chinese surveillance balloon it shot down earlier this month the us military said on monday crews have been able to recover significant debris from the site including all of the priority sensor and electronics pieces identified as well as large sections of the structure the us northern command said instatement china insists the balloon which spent several days flying over north america was an errant weather observation aircraft with no military purpose but the united states says it wassophisticated high altitude spying vehicle that is part ofprogram with global reachus22 raptor fighter jet shot it down off the coast of south carolina on february 4 and teams have since been working to recover the debris for analysis american warplanes have downed three other objects since then one near alaska another over canada andthird over lake huron but authorities have not identified their origin or purpose

Title: took some time to understand what coach wanted from us bipin singh
Article: panaji mumbai city fc have takengreat leap this season from fifth last season to champions now it has been quitetransformation for des buckinghamside they conceded 31 goals last season and just 18 so far in the indian super league isl despite introducing only one new foreign defender royston griffiths to the starting lineup six of the goals interestingly came from their first game against hyderabad fc 3 3 at home and the last one against fc goa 5 3 at fatorda while defence has seen the biggest change the goals from indian wingers can hardly be ignored wingers bipin singh and lallianzuala chhangte have collectively been involved in 23 of mumbai city fc53 goals this season while chhangte has notched up ten goals and six assists to remain the top indian goalscorer bipin has six goals and two assists in his bag so how did mumbai become unstoppable when the coach took charge he spoke to us individually but maybe his plans it did not immediately register with the players bipin said on monday in the second season with the coach giving us the confidence to perform everyone understood what the coach wanted what his game plan is we can see the results on the field bipin was an important player during sergio loberatime at the club and continues to set the wing on fire with his speed and ability to score important goals he has scored 18 goals in the last three seasons and nine assists quiteturnaround in fortunes for someone who had just four goals in his first three seasons in the top tier of indian football before joining mumbaispentyear at atk having moved there from theleague this is my fifth year in mumbai itlike home my dream was to win the isl trophy once three years afterjoined we won the shield and trophy that felt great to become champions again iswonderful feeling said bipin

Title: iranian journalist released on bail week after arrest
Article: tehran iranian authorities have released journalist elnaz mohammadi from the hammihan newspaper on bail one week after her arrest media reported sunday but her sister alsoreporter remains in custody elnaz was detained after going to the prosecutoroffice for an explanation but has since been released from evin prison on bail the reformist daily hammihan reported her sister elahe was arrested on september 29 after reporting for hammihan from the funeral of mahsa aminifuneral and remains in custody iran has witnessed nationwide protests since the september 16 death in custody of amini22 year old ethnic kurd who had been arrested for an alleged breach of strict dress rules for women elahe was charged with propaganda against the system and conspiracy to act against national security thousands of iranians including public figures journalists and lawyers have been arrested ten of the journalists arrested over the protests are still in custody tehran journalists association said

Title: turkey ahmedabad businessman returns from quake ravaged turkey
Article: ahmedabad an ahmedabad based businessman rakesh singh who returned to the city with his family recounted the devastating earthquake in turkey terming the scenes after the quake as horrific and scary 53 year old singh who has textile business interests in turkey indonesia and thailand said that he got up to drinkglass of water when the whole building began shaking likependulum singh was with his wife and son on the second floor of an apartment in gaziantep city which bore the brunt of the first quake which hit the region at 4 17am on february 6woke up to drinkglass of water and just then the building started shaking violently we rushed out without even waiting to take our phones the weather outside was chilly with rain and snow falling people were wailing and desperately looking for their loved ones he recounted on sunday singh said that he later got his phone and passports of family members from the building and called his colleagues who are also from different cities of gujarat thankfully they all were also safe he said singh who returned with his family to ahmedabad on saturday morning said that the situation in turkey is still very grim with people having to wait for more than two days in queues for petrol having business interests in turkey singh visits turkey often and spends aboutmonth there this time he had taken his wife and son along as it snows in that country at around this time of the year gaziantep ismajor centre for carpet manufacturing and export he said

Title: kcr telangana cm slams pm modi mocks 3 1 trillion economy claim
Article: 01 06 why did centre not allow pfizer to enter the indian market kcr hyderabad telangana cmchandrashekar rao called pm narendra modi the most ineffective pm in the nationhistory and termed the nda as no data available government in his most scathing attack against the bjp led centre and the pm intwo hour speech in the assembly sunday kcr said former pm manmohan singh excelled in his performance but lacked the ecosystem to flaunt his achievements like his successor modi inpointed counter to modiremarks that india will always remember the decade preceding 2014 as the lost decade and the decade of 2030 will be known as indiadecade kcr gathered ammunition from the book lost decade 2008 18 and quoted from its pages to attack the pm duringdebate on the money appropriation bill in the assembly he claimed manmohan singh managed the countrydebt to gdp ratio better than modi singh brought down the ratio by 10 but it rose by 5 during pm moditenure the poor man did not boast but modi and his followers are full of praise for themselves he said he also mocked the 3 1 trillion economy claimed by the nda government saying this was not an actual indicator of development what matters is the money with the people india ranks poorly on the per capita income parameter we are ranked 138th far behind nations like bangladesh and bhutan he said

Title: apple apple maps privacy bug why iphone users donneed to worry
Article: how iphone users were not at risk what apple had to sayrecently reported apple maps bug was reportedly allowing apps to collect user location data without permission several apps could have exploited this privacy bug to their advantage according toreport by 9to5macbrazilian food delivery app named ifood accesseduserlocation data in ios 16 2 even after the user denied all location access to the app the cupertino based tech giant started rolling out to the general public last month among other new features the latest ios version also includedlist of security updates the apple maps privacy bug that allowed an app to bypass privacy preferences was also addressed by one of these fixes the report also claims that the company has clarified that iphone users were never at risk due to this security flaw the company also denied the report regarding the brazillian food delivery app accessing user locations without permission in ios 16 2 as per the report apple has explained that the maps vulnerability that was patched could only be exploited from unsandboxed apps on macos moreover the company added the fix to all of applesoftware updates including ios and ipados tvos and watchos this was done by the company as the codebase is shared by all these operating systems apple has also claimed that the suggestion that this vulnerability could have allowed apps to circumvent user controls on iphone is false the company also concluded that the app was not circumventing user controls through any mechanism the apple maps security flaw was first discovered by an anonymous researcher instatement to 9to5mac apple said at apple we firmly believe users should choose when to share their data and with whom last week we issued an advisory forprivacy vulnerability that could only be exploited from unsandboxed apps on macos the codebase that we fixed is shared by ios and ipados tvos and watchos so the fix and advisory was propagated to those operating systems as well despite the fact that they were never at risk the suggestion that this vulnerability could have allowed apps to circumvent user controls on iphone is falsereport also incorrectly suggested an ios app was exploiting this or another vulnerability to bypass user control over location data our follow up investigation concluded that the app was not circumventing user controls through any mechanism

Title: interpretation of law must keep pace with the changing needs of society supreme court
Article: new delhi holding that the courtinterpretation of the constitution must be in tune with the changing times and some of its earlier interpretations are no longer valid the supreme court has said that excommunication or ostracisation ofperson in society is against constitutional ethos as it will result in his civil death and decided to re examine its six decade old verdict permittingreligious community to excommunicate its dissidentsfive judge bench of justices sanjay kishan kaul sanjiv khanna abhayoka vikram nath andk maheshwari said the apex court1962 judgment protecting the rights of the bohra community to excommunicate its members required reconsideration it said much water has flown after that decision and the court at that time did not examine that article 26which talks about the right to manage its own affairs in matters of religion is also subject to morality for example the narrow interpretation given to article 21 in thek gopalan era is no longer valid the concept of freedom has undergone changes in the 21st century society looks completely different from what it looked in the last century we seechange in the socio cultural ethos of society thus the interpretation of law must keep pace with changing needs of society justice oka said the court did not agree with the earlier constitution bench verdict and said the issue needed to be decided bylarger bench it held that excommunication or ostracisation is anathema to the concepts of liberty and equality and against anti discriminatory ethos which formspart of constitutional morality even assuming that the excommunication of members of the dawoodi bohra community is always made on religious grounds the effect and consequences thereof on the person excommunicated needs to be considered in the context of justiciable constitutional rights it saidperson who is excommunicated by the community will not be entitled to use the communitycommon property and its burial cremation grounds insense suchperson will virtually become untouchable ingiven case it will result in his civil death the court said

Title: three killed 20 injured in suicide attack in pakistan
Article: peshawar at least three soldiers were killed and 20 others injured insuicide attack onvehicle of the security forces in pakistanrestive northwestern region on saturday police said the incident happened in the countrynorth waziristan tribal district when the suicide bomber ridingtri wheeler laden with bomb hit the vehicle of security forces that was escorting employees ofpetroleum company the suicide bomber ridingtri wheeler hit vehicle of the security forces on duty with mpcl petroleum company in khajori chowk in north waziristan tribal district bordering afghanistan three soldiers were killed and 20 others injuredsenior police official said the employees of petroleum company were on their way back to their rest place under tight security after duty hours when the bomber ambushed one of the forcevehicle escorting them the mpcl company is engaged in exploration of oil in the area

Title: justice nk singh appointed as chief justice ofk ladakh high court
Article: post by rk online desk on sunday february 12 2023 justice nongmeikapam kotiswar singh judge of the gauhati high court has been appointed as chief justice of the high court of jammu and kashmir and ladakh according to an order in exercise of the powers conferred by clause 1 of article 217 of the constitution of india the president is pleased to appoint shri justice nongmeikapam kotiswar singh judge of the gauhati high court to be chief justice of the high court of jammu kashmir and ladakh with effect from the date he assumes charge of his office

Title: eye on civic polls maharashtra cm eknath shinde deputy cm devendra fadnavis to inaugurate projects worth rs 105 6 crore in kalyan ulhasnagar
Article: kalyan maharashtra chief minister eknath shinde and deputy chief minister devendra fadnavis will visit kalyan and ulhasnagar in maharashtrathane district on wednesday to inaugurate development works worth rs 105 6 crore political observers believe the visit is crucial especially for shinde as along with the brihanmumbai municipal corporation elections to the kalyan dombivli municipal corporation and ulhasnagar municipal corporation are due with both the leaders having stressed strengthening the alliance in the region allotments of 397 houses and 119 commercial shops under basic services for urban poor scheme in kalyan city inauguration of beautified bhagva talao kala talao and naming it as prabhodhankar thackeray sarovar inauguration of two sewage treatment centers and distribution of grants and goods to the beneficiaries of various schemes are scheduled shinde is visiting ulhasnagar for the first time after becoming chief minister recently the issue of authorisation of unauthorised buildings in ulhasnagar city which has been pending for many years was taken up by him in ulhasnagar the cm will inaugurate vehicles of swachh bharat abhiyan 22 72 crores charging stations for electric vehicles 53 87 lakhs and sewerage center at khadegolvali 12 42 crores area along with thiscomputer system for the disabled anddog sterilization center will also be inaugurated kalyan and ulhasnagar township that come under thane district are shinde strongholds in both towns most of the corporators of shiv sena have joined the shinde faction shindeson dr shrikant shinde who is lok sabha mp from kalyan has been bringing major projects to the region

Title: shraddha walkar murder case aaftab poonawala seeks chargesheet in folders certificates
Article: new delhi aaftab poonawala accused of killing his live in partner shraddha walkar has moved two applications before court seeking supply of the chargesheet and video footage and his education certificate one of the applications stated that aaftab hadcopy of the chargesheet but didnhave writing materials likepen pencil ornotebook he wants to assist his counsel so he urgently needs the pencil pen as well asnotebook it said aaftab also sought his certificates as he wants to pursue higher studies his lawyer requested the court to pass an order directing the investigating officer to hand over all educational certificates in another application before the saket courts it was submitted that on the last date of hearing on february 7 the applicant was supplied withsoft copy of the chargesheet onpen drive the pen drive is overloaded and is not supported by any advanced computer and the video footage are very mismanaged the plea said the court was requested to pass an order directing the investigating officer to supply the soft copy infolder wise manner and the footage on another pen drive

Title: shiromani akali dal president sukhbir singh badal dares punjab cm bhagwant mann over rs 40 000 crore investment 2 5 lakh jobs claim
Article: 02 29 punjab missing from budget cm bhagwant mann 01 03 punjab cm bhagwant mann visits bombay stock exchange for ceremonial ringing of the bell jalandhar launchingvitriolic attack on the punjab government over claims that it had attracted an investment of rs 40 000 crore besides giving jobs to 2 5 lakh youths shiromani akali dal president sukhbir singh badal on wednesday dared punjab chief minister bhagwant mann to give names of 500 youth to whom jobs had been given by the claimed investment the cm is lying as no investment has come into the state in fact the industry is moving out to uttar pradesh and other states the chief minister should list the addresses of new industries which have been set up in the state badal said if the figure of 2 5 lakh jobs was to be believed it meant that 20 jobs had been given in each village in the state this is an outright liechallenge the chief minister to give names of 500 youths who have been given jobs with the claimed investment he said while interacting with media at adampur ahead of the jalandhar parliamentary bypoll criticising theg cm for asserting that the state governor could not ask him any questions because he was selected and not elected sukhbir said that at the same time the cm was allowing aap convener arvind kejriwal to run the affairs of punjab he questioned the cm if kejriwal and manish sisodia had been elected from punjab that they were interfering in punjab affairs as sisodia framed the excise policy of the state even raghav chadha who has not been directly elected by punjabis is deciding on all civil and police postings sukhbir said holding the cm responsible for the constitutional crisis in punjab the sad leader said that the cm was refusing to answer governorquestions pertaining to corruption and illegal decisions after the government blocked queries from political parties and even rti applications on certain issues the parties approached the governor after which he asked the cm he said maintaining that the sad had always beenvotary of federalism and was against central interference in the affairs of states sukhbir said however many of the issues raised by the governor pertain to corruption and the aap government should not shy away from coming clean on these issues of public welfare he also said that the sad had approached governor banwari lal purohit requesting him to make aap accountable for all advertisements issued by the government outside punjab in himachal pradesh and gujarat prior to the assembly elections there to recover the entire public money

Title: jaap chairman quits over its disconnect with public issues returns to panthers party
Article: senior aam aadmi party aap leader harsh dev singh on thursday quit the party and returned to thek national panthers party jknpp which he had quit in may last yearfew days before the death of its founder and his uncle bhim singh announcing his decision to strengthen the jknpp invideo statement singh who was the chairman of the aapjcoordination committee said he has consulted his former jknpp colleagues and decided to work towards reviving it our ancestors had sacrificedlot for this party he said adding that its revival would be in the interest of the people singh said he decided to leave the aap as no one in the party was raising their voice over rising public problems on key issues like power water schools ration and pension besides the bjp was bringing new laws every day and foisting them on the people whose lands were being snatched and houses demolished he charged with old age pensions stopped and new guidelines made for widowpension ink he claimed that new orders were being issued daily by the administration to harass the common man over the issuance of aadhaar cards new formats of income tax and domicile certificates etc he added that no political party was raising their voice against the bjp as all of them barring the panthers party have some vested interests he went on to say that he has taken up the project of reviving the panthers party at the behest of the people as the jknpp is their only voice in the region singh who had been elected mla on the panthers partyticket from ramnagar constituency in udhampur district for three consecutive terms from 1996 had joined the aap in may 2022 following on the defection of former jknpp mlas yash pal kundal and balwant singh mankotia to the arvind kejriwal led party like singh kundal was alsoformer minister in the mufti mohammad sayeed led pdp congress coalition government formed in 2002 singh and mankotia are cousins while kundal is still with the aap mankotia has switched to the bjp advertisement amit kapoorseniork aap leader who claimed he had brought harsh dev singh into the party alleged that the latter had resigned after the aap high command had declined to grant him rs 12 lakh per month to run the partyaffairs in the union territory he added that singh had raised the demand for money through one of his gurney supporters at the aap meeting in delhi on january 23 kapoor added that singh had unsuccessfully tried to convince the party leadership to scrap the existing aap team and make him the partyjchief singh was not available for comments on these allegations the jknpp recognised by the election commission was founded by bhim singh in 1982 assplinter outfit of the indian national congress bhim died on may 31 2022 following which the party saw an exodus of senior leaders from its fold bhim singh had been elected mla twice from chenani oncongress ticket in 1977 and again in 1983 attime when elections were held ink every 6 years he was later nominated to the legislative council too during the mufti sayeed led coalition government he had also contested the 1997 lok sabha by election from udhampur in which despite leading by 30 000 votes at the end of counting was declared to have lost inrepoll the result was overturned by thek high court after singh challenged the decision advertisement after bhim singhdeath the jknpp split into two groups one headed byk ganjoo the other by vilakshan singh his another nephew both factions have now filed their claims for recognition before the ec vilakshan singh said their efforts to bring back those who had left the party have yielded results with the return of harsh dev singh expected to boost the party further meanwhile hakikat singh general secretary of the ganjoo led faction said theirs wasduly elected group by the partyworking committee

Title: mohali comes out on 28 day parole in mohali
Article: mohali one of the bandi singhs gurmeet singh engineer joined the qaumi insaaf morcha in mohali on wednesday after he was granted 28 day parole engineer was welcomed at the morcha site by gurcharan singh father of beat singh assassin jagtar singh hawara and morcha activist inderbir singh he was presentedsiropa too engineer was granted parole earlier too he had graduated from thapar engineering college in patiala and was staying at phase iv in mohali sharing the room with beant singhassassin dilawar singh babbar now known as dilavar singh jaisinghvala gurmeet and two other convicts lakhwinder and shamsher singh were released on parole afterformer militant gurbaksh singh khalsa sat onfast unto death in 2013 for their release gurmeet singh was sentenced to life on august 1 2007 byspecial cbi court chandigarh after his conviction along with other accused for their role in the assassination of beant singh in 1995

Title: medico killing human blood on accusedt shirt says jj hospital
Article: mumbai the forensic report from jj hospital has confirmed that bloodstains fou nd on the buoy ring andshirt of lifeguard mithu singh were ofhuman singh and his assistant jabbar ansari have been arrested for allegedly killing mbbs student swadichcha sane 22 at bandra bandstand in 2021 police are awaiting the dna report from the forensic science lab for dna testing they had sent swadichchafatherhair to match with the bloodstains police said if the report comes positive there will be strong evidence against singh as of now they have only circumstantial evidence that he had killed her and dumped the body into the sea police claimed on november 29 2021 swadichcha who lived inhostel in palghar was seen on cctv cameras takingtrain from virar to andheri then taking another train to bandra and reaching bandstand at 1 09am later she is seen with singh on the rocks he tookselfie with her and shared it with ansari

Title: nri 11 months after death of nri second wife parents booked
Article: mohali around 11 months after the death ofsingapore nri the police have booked his wife and her parents on charges of culpable homicide not amounting to murder and other sections of the ipc and it act singapore citizen brij nandan singh soin junior died of cancer in march 2022 the case was registered against his second wife kamalpreet kaur and her parents gurbaksh singh and samarjit kaur all residents of rai kot ludhiana the fir said soinson ashwin nandan singh soin 26 alsosingapore citizen but presently residing in sector 15 chandigarh had lodgedcomplaint with director bureau of investigation punjab alleging kamalpreet had murdered his father and his body was cremated burnt rather than being buried according to rituals of christianity to destroy proof of the murder he had alleged the accused had not updated records mentioning his fatherdeath and withdrew money from his bank accounts ashwin had alleged he had filedcomplaint with mohali police in june 2022 and later approached the nri wing kamalpreet and her father and mother were booked under sections 304 419 420 120of the ipc and under sections 66and 66of the it act ashwin had alleged his father met kamalpreet kaur in india and both started living together as his father divorced his mother he and kamalpreet kaur had got married he was then detected with cancer and kamalpreet had admitted him toprivate hospital in zirakpur when doctors told her that his condition was serious she had allegedly got him discharged against doctors advice forged will papers and transferred rs 15 lakh from his account the entire property was also transferred in the name of kamalpreet on forged documents ashwin had alleged

Title: congress pm modi cantolerate slightest criticism from western media
Article: new delhi lashing out against the it raids on the bbc congress on wednesday said pm narendra modi turns every honour fromwestern body intopr campaign but cantolerate the slightest criticism from the western media alleging that foreign press is now being muzzled like the indian media has been attacked over last eight years aicc spokesman pawan khera said pm modi has not tired of calling india the mother of democracy since the country recently received the rotational presidency of g20 yes india is mother of democracy but why is the pm becoming the father of hypocrisy he jibed addressingpress conference khera said it was ironical that the pm and the bjp ecosystem were screaming against the british decades after their ideological forebears licked the soles of the british as informers and sought clemency from the british crown while indian people were on the streets fighting them is it because the real truth of modirole in the gujarat riots now stands exposed yet another time he asked referring to the bbc documentary that is alleged to be reason behind the raids on the global broadcasting giant the aicc dubbed the bbc raids as part ofpattern recounting coercive action on nine media organisations in recent years india hasdubious position of 150th in the press freedom index 135 journalists were arrested interrogated or detained from 2014 2020 and 37 journalists have been killed since 2014 indian media has been repeatedly strangulated and bulldozed by the modi government just becausesmall minority of them have refused to toe the line of bjp khera said he said modi had promised to run start up india but it turned into shut up india

Title: 4 storey commercial building in mumbailower parel catches fire
Article: mumbaimajor fire was reported at raghuvanshi mill compound on senapati bapat marg in lower parel at 7 15pm on friday the fire spread across an office on the second and third floors offour storey commercial structure eight fire engines four jumbo water tankersquick response vehicle andbreathing apparatus van were rushed to the site bmcdisaster control room said it waslevel iii fire the number of fire engines was then increased to 12 and jumbo water tankers were increased to six former mumbai brigade fire chief prabhat rahangdale who happened to be at the site to meetfriend said he noticed the blaze and immediately rushed to the site there were 20 25 people stuck inside andtried to get them all out but the flames kept on flaringrushed to save as many ascould he said tnn

Title: hamlinmeant no religious disrespect for wearing jacket
Article: buffalo bills safety damar hamlin said wednesday he never intended to offend anyone for attending the super bowl wearingjacket that critics deemed to feature an offensive depiction of jesus after talking with my parentsunderstand how my coat could have offended some people hamlin wrote innote posted on his twitter account it was never my intentions to hurt or disrespect anyone the coat is abstract art to me hamlin closed his two post thread by saying he will continue to learn from the situation while adding my beliefs and relationship with god is not tied to symbolic images after talking with my parentsunderstand how my coat could have offended some people it was never my intentions to hurt or disrespect anyone the coat is abstract art to me it says eternal whicham eternally thankful to my savior 1 2   february 15 2023 the second year player continues recovering after having to be resuscitated on the field after going into cardiac arrest duringgame in cincinnati six weeks ago createdstir for being pictured wearingkanye west eternal saint blue varsity jacket during pregame ceremonies and sitting in nfl commissioner roger goodellbox at the super bowl in arizona on sunday the back of the jacket featured an abstract illustration of jesus on the cross under the word eternal the front featured an abstract depiction of jesus face and appears to referencebible verse that reads without end or beginning there is no day and no night among the critics were former nfl running back adrian peterson who referred to the jacket as blasphemy on mondayday later peterson wrote in an instagram post that he has since cleared the air with hamlin after speaking with damarhave an understanding that it didncome fromplace of ill intent peterson wroteapologize for offending youjust felt offended in that moment asman who loves and respects our lord and savior advertisement hamlin who received the nflpaalan page community award last week took part inpregame ceremony in which the nfl honored the bills and bengals training and medical staffs and first responders who treated the 24 year old from the pittsburgh area on the field and the staff at the university of cincinnati medical center where he spent nearlyweek recovering

Title: us says iran based saif al adel is new al qaida chief
Article: washington saif al adel an iran based egyptian has become the head of al qaida following the july 2022 death of ayman al zawahiri the us state department said wednesday our assessment aligns with that of the un that al qaidanew de facto leader saif al adel is based in iranstate department spokesperson said the united nations report released tuesday said that the predominant view of member states is that adel is now the groupleader representing continuity for now but the group has not formally declared him emir because of sensitivity to the concerns of the taliban authorities in afghanistan who havenwanted to acknowledge that zawahiri was killed byus rocket inhome in kabul last year according to the un report in addition the un report said the sunni islamist al qaida is sensitive to the issue of adel residing in largely shiite iran his location raises questions that havebearing on al qaidaambitions to assert leadership ofglobal movement in the face of challenges from isil the un report said referring to another name for the rival islamic state group adel 62 isformer egyptian special forces lieutenant colonel and figure in the old guard of al qaida he helped build the groupoperational capacity and trained some of the hijackers who took part in the september 11 2001 attack on the united states according to the us counter extremism project he has been in iran since 2002 or 2003 at first under house arrest but later free enough to make trips to pakistan according to ali soufanformer fbi counter terrorism investigator saif is one of the most experienced professional soldiers in the worldwide jihadi movement and his body bears the scars of battle soufan wrote in2021 article for the west point combating terrorism centerctc journal when he acts he does so with ruthless efficiency he said

Title: after tampon row michael johnson takes dig at tiger woods says he has never beenleader and has learned nothing
Article: legendary american sprinter michael johnson has blasted golf superstar tiger woods after the latter discreetly handed justin thomastampon after outdriving his playing partner at the genesis invitational on friday the incident on day one drew criticism on social media with many stating it was disrespectful to women woods apologised for the incident it was supposed to be all fun and games and obviously it hasnturned out that way said woods 47 ifoffended anybody in any way shape or formm sorry he added it was not intended to be that way we play pranks on one another all the time and virallythink this did not come across that way but between us it was itdifferent however four time olympic gold medallist johnson saw right through the apology saying that woods is still heralded after all his mistakes and that media focus is always on his recovery not why the need for recovery johnson tweeted apology starting with ifoffended anyone is no apology but this is tiger never beenleader and heteflon still heralded after all the mistakes so helearned nothing media focus always on miraculous recovery never why the need for recovery apology starting with ifoffended anyone is no apology but this is tiger never beenleader and heteflon still heralded after all the mistakes so helearned nothing media focus always on miraculous recovery never why the need for recovery michael johnson february 18 2023 woods is playing in his first competitive pga tour event since missing the cut at the open in july the 15 time major champion was ingroup with pga championship winner thomas and four time major winner rory mcilroy for the first two rounds advertisement itnot the first time that woods and thomas have been involved in controversial incidents in their careers woods was involved incar crash in november 2009 which eventually led to admissions of infidelity and the breakdown of his marriage he then tookbreak from golf but returned shortly afterward in 2017 woods was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence when he was found asleep at the wheel of his car he later pleaded guilty to reckless driving advertisement in 2021 thomas apologised for usinghomophobic slur during the third round of the sentry tour of champions in hawaii

Title: chinese tech billionaire goes missing company
Article: beijing the chinese billionaire chairman of investment bank china renaissance has gone missing the firm said as shares in the company plunged in hong kong on friday bao fan who is also executive director of the bank ismajor figure in the chinese tech industry and has playedkey role in the emergence of various domestic internet startups the company has been unable to contact mr bao china renaissance said in an announcement to the hong kong stock exchange without offering further details shares in the firm slumped as much as 30 percent following the statement according to financial news outlet caixin the 52 year old dealmaker had been unreachable for two days as of thursday evening china renaissance was not immediately available for comment after being contacted by afp founded in 2005 the group has supervised the ipos of several domestic internet giants including leadingcommerce firm jd com bao also facilitatedblockbuster 2015 merger between major ride hailing firm didi and its top competitor at the time kuaidi dache the case of china renaissance is reminiscent ofpattern of investigations into top financiers from the country in recent years in 2017 chinese canadian businessman xiao jianhua was arrested by mainland authorities and received13 year jail sentence under corruption charges last august known to hold close ties to top chinese communist party leaders the billionaire was reportedly abducted from his hong kong hotel room by plainclothes police officers from beijing at the time of his arrest xiao was one of the richest men in china with an estimated fortune of 6 billion according to caixin china renaissance president cong lin was taken into custody last september as authorities launchedprobe into his work at the financial leasing unit of state owned bank icbc

Title: chinese consular office in islamabad temporarily closed due to technical issues
Article: islamabad china has temporarily closed down the consular section of its embassy in pakistan due to technical issues days after advising chinese citizens in this country to be cautious due to the deteriorating security situation the embassy announced this on its website refraining from providing specific information about the nature of the technical issue or the timeline for the closure due to technical issues the consular section of the chinese embassy in islamabad will be temporarily closed from february 13 2023 until further notice the notice said the notification follows last weeknotice by the chinese government advising chinese citizens to be cautious while in pakistan saying they might be at risk due todeteriorating security situation pakistan has seenrise in terror attacks since late last year when the pakistani taliban group called offfragile truce with the government various militant groups in pakistan have frequently attacked chinese nationals working on the ambitious china pakistan economic corridor cpec aiming to threatenmajor segment of beijingbelt and road infrastructure initiative the cpec is65 billion network of roads railways pipelines and ports in pakistan connecting china to the arabian sea the bri is expected to help pakistan expand and modernise its economyfemale suicide bomber last april killed three chinese teachers in karachi along with their local driver targeting nationals from pakistanmost important partner and seeking to underminerelationship on which islamabadfinancial survival largely depends

Title: apple apple visual look up feature on iphone how to use
Article: how to use visual look up on your iphone apple support apple visual look up feature on iphone what do you need apple visual look up feature on iphone how to use apple visual look up feature on iphone things to remember conclusion apple offers iphone usersgoogle lens like feature that can recognise things from images the visual look up feature works only with certain apple apps on iphones and can identify particular objects which include pets art landmarks and more by using this feature iphone users can get more information about the subject in the image the cupertino based tech giant has also recently postedvideo on the apple support channel on youtube to promote the feature this new video also explains how this feature works and how users can access this feature on their iphones inblog post apple has outlined some of the prerequisites needed to use this feature the company has mentioned that iphone users need to be ios 15 or later to use the visual look up feature meanwhile ipad users have to run ipados 15 1 or later to access the feature however this feature is not available on all ipad models apple visual look up feature is available on ipad pro 12 9 inch 3rd generation or later ipad pro 11 inch all models ipad air 3rd generation or later ipad 8th generation or later or ipad mini 5th generation or later this feature works only with certain apple apps which include mail messages notes and others in these apps iphone users have to tap and hold on an image and then tap on the info button the info button is denoted bylowercasewhich is placed insidecircle withsparkle on tapping it the feature will open the safari browser to offer more info about the subject in the picture in safari when users tap on the look up button in the options menu another icon starts appearing inside or below the photo for example the image will getpaw icon for images of pets and animals orleaf icon for flowers and plants users can tap on these icons to get more information about the imagesubject and other pictures of the same from the internet and siri knowledge users need to keep in mind that this feature will not be available for all images if theicon inpicture hascircle withoutsparkle it means that visual look up is not available for that particular image the feature works likelimited version of google lens which is also available for iphone users via the google app google lens offers more information like sites from where you can buyparticular product and how much is it priced across different retailers to take on google lens apple is expected to expand visual look up in the coming days currently the apple feature is limited while google lens is also powered by search and assistant

Title: mercedes ceo we need strategic patience for chinese ev premium market to grow
Article: chinaelectric vehicle market has so far grown at the bottom of the price range where mercedes benz does not havesignificant product offering its ceo said on friday saying the carmaker must wait for the premium segment to grow it is absolutely true that the growth of the electric market in china has been from the bottom segments where we almost donhave anything ola kaellenius said premium and upper luxury is still in its infancy we have to apply some strategic patience here and look at how this grows

Title: avaya networking giant avaya files for chapter 11 bankruptcy 5 things to know
Article: what is chapter 11 actions not to impact employees assets and liabilities listed microsoft among creditors avaya ceo speak former networking giant avaya holdings corp has filed for chapter 11 bankruptcy and securedfinancing of 780 million as it restructures its business earlier in september avaya had also announced restructuring including job cuts to reduce costs avayashares have fallen nearly 99 last year this is the second time that avaya has filed for bankruptcy avaya previously filed for bankruptcy in 2017 chapter 11 issection of the us bankruptcy code that allows companies to reorganize their capital structures while they continue to operate their businesses in the normal course avaya said instatement that these actions will not impact the companycustomers channel and strategic partners suppliers vendors or employees the company stresses that it is not going out of business our business will remain intact and we are not selling or splitting off any of its parts the company said the company said it expects this financial restructuring to be completed within 60 to 90 days in its bankruptcy court filing avaya lists total assets of between 1 billion and 10 billion and total liabilities of between 1 billion and 10 billion the company lists its number of creditors as being between 25 001 and 50 000 completing the financial restructuring will reduce our total debt by more than 75 from approximately 3 4 billion today to approximately 800 million additionally it will substantially increase our cash and liquidity position enabling us to make significant investments in our innovative cloud based communications portfolio and position avaya for long term success the company said instatement in the court filing the company listed the creditors with the largest unsecured claims these include verint americas in the amount of 22 93 million microsoft for 9 01 million wistron corp for 8 9 million and shi international for 7 71 million alan masarek avayachief executive officer saidjoined avaya to help unlock the power of its iconic brand global customer footprint massive partner ecosystem large scale communications deployments and outstanding team building on this tremendous foundation we have made significant progress pioneering an ambitious business model transformation establishingcompetitive product strategy for our subscription and cloud delivered services and implementing operational efficiencies to better serve the avaya ecosystem strengthening avayacapital structure iscritical step to fully realize our transformation and we are excited to move ahead aswell capitalized company with one of the strongest balance sheets in our industry that includes substantial cash to invest in our own success

Title: 7 new battalions 9 400 personnel india to bolster itbp amid tensions with china
Article: most muscle along lac frontier force along china border nod to shinkun la tunnel with inputs from agencies new delhi withhawk eye on china the government has sanctioned seven new battalions of the indo tibetan border police itbp which will come up in the next few years indiadecision to bolster its border security forces comes amid continous tensions with neighbour china that led to deadly border clashes in 2020 and scuffles late last year the proposal was cleared during the meeting of the cabinet committee on security ccs that was chaired by prime minister narendra modi union information and broadcasting minister anurag thakur told reporters duringpost cabinet press briefing the move is expected to increase the strength of the central armed police force capf to more than 10 per cent according to reports according to the government sanction the fresh manpower will be utilised for manning 47 new border posts anddozen staging camps or troops bases to be created along this frontier largely in arunachal pradesh these bases were sanctioned in 2020 the same year indian and chinese troops were involved in one of the deadliest clashes in decadessenior officer said that the new bases were sanctioned to ensure effective guarding of the lac adding that now seven battalions andnew sector headquarter comprising about 9 400 personnel have also been givengo ahead the battalions and the sector headquarter are expected to be put in place by 2025 26 thakur said he saidnon recurring expenditure of rs 1 808 15 crore is estimated to be spent for land acquisition creation of office and residential buildings and arms and ammunition whilerecurring annual expenditure of rs 963 68 crore will be done under the salaries and rations head for the fresh manpower officials said the creation of 47 new border posts will lead to26 per cent increase in the strength of these bases while the induction of 9 400 fresh personnel will enhance its strength by 10 per cent the force has 176 border posts at the lac currently the itbp which is about 90 000 personnel strong was raised in the aftermath of the 1962 chinese aggression it is tasked with guarding the 3 488 km long line of actual control lac on indiaeastern flank stretching from the karakoram pass in ladakh in indianorth to jachep la in arunachal pradesh state in the east the force is working along with the army at this front even as the militaries of india and china are engaged instandoff at ladakh from 2020 the ccs also gave its nod for the construction of4 km long shinkun la tunnel with an approach road with an aim of providing all weather connectivity between ladakh and the rest of the country providing details of the cabinet decision union minister anurag thakur said the tunnel will be completed by december 2025 atcost of rs 1 681 crore this project is also very important as far as the security and safety of the country is concerned it will also help in the movement of our security forces in that region thakur said before this the atal tunnel was inaugurated by prime minister narendra modi linking manali to leh and it provides all weather connectivity throughout the year he said

Title: mason educationist john mason who led doon school to new heights no more
Article: kolkata educationist john mason who headed several schools during his career including st james school the doon school and modern high school in dubai died in chennai on friday he had been admitted tohospital there after sustainingfemur fracture fromfall he was 78 born in dehradun on january 10 1945 jonathan anthony mason studied at la martiniere for boys and did his graduation and masterin english from jadavpur university he taught english in la martiniere before moving to st james where he became an institution himself mason had also written several text books in english after retiring fromfull time teaching career mason had settled down in dehradun and was working onvillage project near meerut mason and his wife anjoo had gone to kerala recently to visit his sister in law the granddaughters of the freedom fighter and lawyer sir tej bahadur sapru they returned via pondicherry where he fell and broke his femur post surgery complications led him to chennai for treatment he died there on friday st james school will holdmemorial service in memory of mason on monday la martiniere for boys secretary supriyo dhar said the school also plans to offertribute to the academician academics recall how mason had first instilled discipline shortly after he took over the reins of st james in 1978 and then went on to recruit several key teachers who turned around the
