schoolacademic record and made it into one of the cityforemost english medium schools by the time he left the school in 1992 it was among the top icse schools in india students at st james recalled his flamboyance he was always nattily dressed insuit for many of us he represented the quintessential englishman he even had blonde hair he was likeprincipal from the english novels we read recounted ex st james student indranil poddar mason was also famous for not putting up kindly with nuisance he hadfundamental kindness but was always strict about academics students recall how he maintainedregister on the academic record of all senior students in his office and consulted it when there wascomplaint of indiscipline to check how the studentacademic record was monday was inspection day anyone who was dressed well used to get plus points and those dressed poorly were given negative points recounted

Title: tax not paid on certain remittances by bbc group entities survey unearthed crucial evidence income tax dept
Article: feb 18 2023 01 24am ist source toi inday after its survey at bbc offices in india ended the income tax department releasedstatement the statement accuses bbc group entities of showing lower income profits it also claimed that crucial evidences were unearthed during the survey at the bbc offices in delhi and mumbai the department also accused the media firm of using dilatory tactics during the tax survey

Title: jawan beaten to death by dmk councillor sons and relatives in tnkrishnagiri district
Article: krishnagiri an army jawan was beaten to death bydmk councillor his sons and relatives near pochampally in krishnagiri district of tamil nadu the incident took place on february 8 and the jawan died on tuesday night while undergoing treatment inhospital in hosur on wednesday police arrested nine people including the councillor in connection with the murder the deceased jawan has been identified asprabhu 28 of nagojanahalli according to the nagarasampatty police prabhu and his elder brotherprabhakaran 30 who is also working in the army came to their native village on leave on february 28 prabhakaranwife priya 25 was washing her clothes atpublic drinking water tapchinnasamy 50 who iscouncillor ward 1 in nagojanahalli town panchayat chided priya for washing the clothes at the drinking water tapverbal duel erupted between priya and chinnasamy saidconstable at the nagarasampatty police station prabhakaran and his brother also joined the verbal duel supporting priya villagers pacified both sides later chinnasamy went to the two jawans house along with eight people his sons rajapandi 30 guru suriyamoorthy 26 and gunanithi 23 and relatives manikandan 32 mathaiyan 60 pulipandi 24 vediappan 55 kaliappan 40 and attacked them with iron rods prabhu sustained head injuries the constable said prabhakaran also suffered injuries the family members admitted prabhu toprivate hospital in hosur prabhu succumbed to his injuries on tuesday night he added based on the complaint lodged by prabhakaran the nagarasampatty police registeredcase and arrested chinnasamy and eight others suriyamoorthy one of the arrested accused is an armed reserve police constable working in chennai

Title: isis affiliate calls pakistan cancer in the name of islam
Article: new delhi pakistan is no stranger to being berated on global platforms the islamic nationdoublespeaks and dubious track records including on security matters harbouring terrorists and nuclear proliferation have in the past earned it epithets like international migraine pathological liar and more now it has been calledcancer state in the name of islam not bywestern diplomat but an islamic terrorist organisation the islamic state khorasan province iskpregional affiliate of the dreaded isis has trained its guns on pakistanreligious scholars as well as its system of governance in its khorasan ghag magazine iskp has claimed that pakistan is run by an establishment which follows instructions from the united states to buttress the claim it cited the example of imran khanascension to and ousting from power it said khan was brought into power through rigging and removed after he visited russia it added that pakistan army chief gen asim munirrecent visit to us was to take orders it has vowed to continue working against the pakistani state and keep up its own agenda of jihad against us agents the magazine also dedicated substantial space torecent confrontation between pakistani scholar mufti taqi usmaniproponent of so called islamic banking and the tehriktaliban pakistanttp mufti noor wali usmani had slammed wali and ttp for acting against the pakistani state pakistan issanctuary for numerous islamic militant organisations with overlapping and conflicting ideologies allegiances and complicated inter relations the iskp sprang out of dissenting afghan taliban ttp and al qaida cadres in the af pak region around 2015 15 it was also joined by some defectors from jud let and other extremist groups with presence in pakistan it has received support from the islamic statecore leadership in iraq and syria since its founding it has been active in afghanistan pakistan tajikistan and uzbekistan and has claimed responsibility for several high profile attacks the iskp just like the ttp targets the pakistani state and its interests it also tries to delegitimize the afghan taliban and undermine the latterclaims of restoring peace in afghanistan

Title: singh chouhan cm new policy will discourage drinking
Article: bhopal cm shivraj singh chouhan said on monday that it has been their endeavour to bring an excise policy which discourages drinkingas cm had decided that no new liquor shops would be opened earlier each timenew excise policy was declared 150 300 new liquor shops would be proposed but we decided not to open new shops and the number of liquor shops in the state is static he said

Title: rjd mla sudhaker singh takesdig at bihar cm nitish kumar postsletter on farmers issue
Article: patna rjd mla sudhaker singh whose insolence had cost him his cabinet berth on saturday shot off an angry letter to chief minister nitish kumar alleging that the veteran leader had lost trust of the people the legislator on whom the party had recently slappedshow cause notice but stopped short of taking disciplinary action shared his letter running into three pages on social media the first term mla appeared to have taken to heart the cmassertion the day before that his outbursts over farmers woes in bihar betrayed ignorance of the governmentachievements in agricultureportfolio he had held for barelycouple of months singh whose father jagadanand singh is the rjdstate president andconfidant of party supremo lalu prasad signed off tauntingly as an mla with zero knowledge in his lengthy note singh sought to rubbish the longest serving cmclaims of agricultural growth adding you seem to have developedfondness for living in delusions it may not affect your health but it is bad for the people singh who was asked to resign as minister by deputy cm tejashwi yadav son and heir apparent of lalu after he repeatedly attacked the government twisted the knife in the penultimate para of his letteragree with just one averment of yours that the people are supreme janata maalik hai said singh referring tostock in trade phrase used by the veteran jdleader do choose any constituency that suits you in the next elections the people will show you that they indeed are supreme and you have lost their trust added the mla jdchief spokesperson and mlc neeraj kumar came out with an angry video message asriposte which he shared on twitter tagging the rjd mla his party his father besides the deputy cm referring tocase pending againstrice mill owned by the mla which the bjp had flagged to oppose his induction into the state cabinet neeraj said you have been an accused incase of 420 cheating the way you reeled out statistics to buttress your misleading points shows that you have become420 in your mind as well meanwhile state bjp spokesman nikhil anand said in 2021 when we were alliance partners of jdour mlc tunnaji pandey was suspended for speaking against nitish ji but today the rjd is allowing singh to have his way the cm is looking helpless

Title: 2 injured in road rage 11 booked in ludhiana
Article: ludhiana two brothers landed inhospital with serious injuries after becoming victims ofroad rage in the city though the incident occurred on february 18 division number 6 police on tuesday registeredcase againstman and his accomplices formurder bid the victims ranjeet singh and his brother mandeep singh of janta nagar and the accused parminder singh sunny jatinder singh honey bawa of janta nagar and their eight unidentified accomplices lived in the same locality but didnhave any rivalry the fir was registered on the complaint of kamaljeet singh brother of the victims kamaljeet alleged that he along with his brother ranjeet singh was returning home from their plant in dhandari in their bmw around 9pm on february 18 whenhyundai verna car started honking from behind near bhagwan chowk as the man behind the wheels used abusive language against them they stopped the car to confront the man for his behaviour the accused alighted from the car and indulged inverbal spat with them soon the accused called his accomplices to the spotalso called my brother mandeep and friend jagdeep singh of jaimal road parminder hit ranjeet in his head repeatedly after which ranjeet fell unconscious other accused attacked mandeep with iron rods before fleeing kamaljeet said inspector satwant singh sho division number 6 police station said police are conducting raids to arrest the accused

Title: nia gautam navlakha was in touch with man arrested by fbi in 2011 for receiving funds from pakistan nia
Article: mumbai gautam navlakha delhi based activist arrested and accused of maoist links in 2018 elgar parishad case was in touch with ghulam nabi fai who the federal bureau of investigation fbi had arrested in the us in july 2011 for accepting funds from isi and pakistan government said the national investigation agency nia opposing his bail application before the bombay high court in the case under the special anti terror law the unlawful activities prevention act uapajuly 19 2011 release issued by the us department of justice stated fai is accused ofdecades long scheme with one purpose to hide pakistaninvolvement behind his efforts to influence thes governmentposition on kashmir saids attorney macbride his handlers in pakistan allegedly funneled millions through the kashmir center to contribute tos elected officials fund high profile conferences and pay for other efforts that promoted the kashmiri cause to decision makers in washington it said fai serves as the director of the kashmiri american council kac the nia said navlakha 70 is trying to portray his criminal activities as work for human rights when he actively involved in commission of offences he is charged with the affidavit by nia filed on monday said during investigation it was established that navlakha visited usa thrice to address kashmiri american council kac conference organized by ghulam nabi fai it is established that navlakha was introduced topakistani isi general for his recruitment by ghulam nabi fai on the direction of inter services intelligence isi showing his nexus and complicity with fai and pakistan isi said the affidavit filed by nia submitted before hc through its counsel sandesh patil the nia sought time and navlakhaplea for bail filed last year was adjourned by the hc bench of justices as gadkari andd naik to next monday navlakha who has worked on fact finding missions and written articles is presently under house arrest following orders of the supreme court which permitted his plea last november on grounds of his ill health navlakha had written and submitted letters on behalf of fai the judge of the us court trying faicase for clemency said the nia the agency said scrutiny of documents seized from navlakha shows they are related to cpi maoist strategy party formation critical secret communication with underground senior leaders of the party which establishes his deep involvement the activities of cpi maoist partysearch of co accused professor hany babupremises revealed the code names given to cpi maoist cadre said the nia which had filed its additional charge sheet against navlakha and others on october 9 2020 invoking offences inkling waging war sedition and terror offences under uapa the nia cited and referred to various letters recovered from navlakha and his co accused to oppose his bail plea and to argue that it has sufficient material evidence on record to substantiate the charges against him which he is trying to trivialise the nia said in april 2010 one letter addressed to him and two others about their visit to dandkarnya dk an advancing guerrilla zone of revolutionary movement by cpi maoistletter from the laptop of co accused surendra gadling to navlakha regardingprogramme at hyderabad arranged by co accused varavara rao presently on medical bail the nia said cpi maoist members who are infact finding team havewell known practice of givingnegative report on lawful anti naxal operations to gain sympathy from general public and to create hatred against lawfully established government

Title: toshakhana case anti graft body summons imran
Article: islamabad pakistananti corruption watchdog on tuesday summoned former pm imran khan to appear before it on march 9 in connection with the toshakhana scam related to purchase of gifts from the state depository by him the national accountability bureau nab summoned the pti chief hours after the watchdogchairman aftab sultan resigned from his post after reportedly refusing to toe the governmentline sultan according to media reports was asked to do certain things that were unacceptable to him the nabinquiry proceedings revealed that imran retained some state gifts presented to him by various foreign dignitaries during his tenure as prime minister these included five rolex wrist watches one iphone pairs of cufflinks two rings an unstitched suit andpen the watchdog asked him to appear before the combined investigation team at its islamabad office and record his statement the nab had opened an inquiry against imran after the election commission disqualified him in october last year in the toshakhana reference declaring him dishonest and untrustworthy for making false statement and incorrect declaration before the poll body in the statement of assets and liabilities filed by him for 2020 21

Title: pakistan pakistancurrent account deficit shrinks 90 in jan state bank of pakistan
Article: islamabad the state bank of pakistan sbp said the countrycurrent account deficit shrank by 90 per cent in january from the same month last year as the government continued with its strategy to restrict imports to evade an external payment crisis pakistancurrent account deficit fell to 0 24 billion in january from 2 47 billion in the same month of the previous year recording90 3 per cent decrease xinhua news agency reported citing sbp data onmonth on month basis the current account deficit went down from 0 29 billion in december 2022 showing17 per cent decrease according to the data cumulatively the current account deficit stood at 3 80 billion in july january of the current fiscal year 2023 compared with 11 56 billion in the same period of the fiscal year 2022 the central bank added

Title: magh mela prelude to kumbh over 9 crore took holy dip this magh mela
Article: lucknow inrecord of sorts as many as nine crore devotees visited the sangam during the 44 day magh mela this yeargovernment spokesperson said on sunday the state government had decided to organize this yearmagh mela the biggest annual religious and cultural gathering of faith on the banks of sangam asrehearsal for prayagraj mahakumbh 2025 the spokesperson added to make this event grand the government had allocated the biggest budget for any magh mela till date he said adding that cm yogi adityanath personally monitored the event magh mela police in charge and sp rajeev narayan mishra said more than nine crore devotees tookdip during magh mela this is the largest number of devotees recorded so far in magh mela which isrecord of sorts in 2021 22 4 3 crore devotees had attended the magh mela many experiments security and cleanliness arrangements were made by the state government he said officials said that huge crowd also gave boost to business according to the state president of the confederation of all india traders cat mahendra goyal there has beentrade of about rs 156 crore in this yearmagh mela apart from this due to the magh mela of prayagraj the business situation has strengthened in the areas around the pilgrimage sites like varanasi ayodhya and vindhyachal goyal said that over 2 lakh people got temporary employment during magh mela which wasbig achievement

Title: russia china diplomat says russia ties rock solid xi may visit moscow
Article: moscow chinatop diplomat told one of president putinclosest allies on tuesday that beijingrelationship with moscow was rock solid chinano limits partnership with russia has come under scrutiny in the west after the us said it was concerned that beijing might be considering supplying weapons to russiayear since the invasion of ukraine atmeeting in moscow wang yi told nikolai patrushev secretary of russiapowerful security council that he looked forward to discussions about security chinese russian relations are mature in character they are rock solid and will withstand any test inchanging international situation wang told comrade patrushev throughrussian interpreter in remarks aired on state television wang said russia and china should work out new joint steps to ensure the security of both countries without elaborating patrushev who is close to putin told comrade wang that beijing wastop priority for russian foreign policy and that the two countries must stick together against the west in the context ofcampaign that is being waged by the collective west to contain both russia and china the further deepening of russian chinese cooperation in the international arena is of particular importance ria cited patrushev meanwhile chinese president xi jinping is preparing to visit moscow forsummit with putin in the coming months the wall street journal reported on tuesday citing people familiar with the plan preparations for the trip are at an early stage and the timing has not been finalised the wsj said adding that xi could visit in april or early may when russia celebrates its wwii victory

Title: three teenage girls and gunman dead in texas shooting
Article: galena park authorities say three teenage girls including one who was pregnant were fatally shot by man who also sexually assaulted12 year old girl who later escaped then fatally shot himself no names have been released the killings occurred at the home of the gunmangirlfriend in the houston suburb of galena park at about 10 30m saturday the girls who were killed were 19 14 and 13 according to harris county sheriff ed gonzalez the 38 year old man then attacked the 12 year old and then told her to run out of the house gonzalez said she grabbed1 year old baby girl and fled she ran out of the residence without any clothing to the home ofneighbor who called galena park police when she ran out she managed to think about it thankfully and was able to grab the 1 year old and ran away gonzalez said both girls were hospitalized for treatment of injuries that were not life threatening according tostatement from galena park police the investigation has been turned over to the sheriffdepartment authorities did not immediately return messages to the associated press for additional comment on sunday gonzalez said the mangirlfriend was the mother of the 12 year old and the 19 year old the older victim was the mother of the baby and was pregnant the sheriff said the girlfriend was not at home at the time of the shootings the sheriff said authorities were working to determine the relationships of the other two teenagers who were shot but described them as family members gonzalez offered no suspected motive for the shooting saying it makes no sense itall tragic thes has seendeadly start to 2023 including six mass killings inthree week period in january according to an associated press usa today database it definesmass killing as four or more people dead not including the perpetrator six people were killed inmass shooting friday in mississippi and there have beennumber of mass shootings in which fewer people were slain such as mondayshooting at michigan state university in which three people were killed and five were wounded

Title: pakistan police identify ttp terrorists involved in karachi police chiefoffice attack
Article: peshawar heavily armed pakistani taliban militants who carried out an audacious attack on the office of the karachi police chief have been identified as residents of two tribal districts in northwest pakistan bordering afghanistan police said on sunday the incident took place at 7 10 pm local time on friday during which tehreektaliban pakistan ttp terrorists stormed the five storey karachi police office kpo building situated in the countrymost populous city the outlawed tehreektaliban pakistan ttp claimed responsibility for the attack instatement issued by its spokesperson mohammad khurasani in the hours long operation between the pakistan police commandos and paramilitary soldiers three ttp terrorists were killed and four others including three security personnel also lost their lives according to police terrorists zala noor and kifayatullah were identified as residents of north waziristan and lakki marwat districts respectively both terrorists conducted complete recce of the location formonth before the attack they wanted to target the additional ig office in the police office they said police conductedraid at the house of alleged terrorist kifayatullah in his village wanda ameer in lakki marwat district on saturday and interrogated his family members kifataullah in his 20s had fled from home five months ago and since then the family were not aware of his whereabouts the family members said they came to know about kifayatullahpresence in pakistan after the karachi blast as they were expecting him in afghanistan police sources said kifayatullah wastrained terrorist and hadhistory of frequent visits to afghanistan he fought in the afghan war from the taliban side and had affiliation with ttptipu gul group they said pakistanlaw enforcement agencies and the sindh government will conductsecurity audit into the serious security lapses that led to the attack security officials agreed the attack had raised several questions andproper exercise was needed that includedsecurity audit according tomedia report said on saturday

Title: taliban how taliban plan to use former foreign military bases in afghanistan
Article: with inputs from agencies afghanistan taliban plans to turn former foreign military bases into sezs new delhi the taliban regime in afghanistan is planning to convert former foreign military bases into special economic zones to promote economic activities acting deputy prime minister for economic affairs mullah abdul ghani baradar said on sunday that the ministry of industry and commerce will take control of the military bases of foreign forces with the intention of converting them into special economic zones underpilot plan foreign military bases in the capital kabul and in northern balkh province will be converted into economic zones according toreport by reuters in december last year the acting commerce minister had said he was was working onplan for former american and nato military bases afghanistaneconomy has been struggling ever since the taliban took over in 2021 as foreign troops withdrew after 20 years of war aid agencies have warned there is an impending humanitarian crisis as the takeover sparkedcut in development funding freezing of foreign held central bank assets and sanctions on the banking sector the taliban administrationdecision to curtail the rights of women has further isolated the country from the international stage its move to bar women from working in ngos exacerbated the problem as most aid agencies suspended operations in the crisis hit nation the taliban have said they are focused on boosting economic self sufficiency through trade and investment some foreign investors however have expressed concerns overseries of attacks including athotel popular with chinese businessmen claimed by the islamic state the world bank though has noted that exports rose and the taliban administration managed to keep revenues largely steady in 2022

Title: asian indoor medallist triple jumper praveen chithravel overcomes field cold to land on podium
Article: from training at the warm and cosy iis facilities in bellary karnataka to competing in nur sultan kazakhstan at the asian indoor championships itself was half the battle won for triple jumper praveen chithravel chithravel returned withsilver his first major international medal withbest effort of 16 98m less thanfortnight ago the 21 year old who has spent most of his life in southern india admits he has an aversion to cold weather it was no less thannightmare for him to land in nur sultan when the minimum temperature was dipping below 24forget training outside it was so cold out there that you couldneven walkfew hundred metres out there says chithravel who is still in the middle of his off season training the tamil nadu athlete didneven have the luxury of time to get himself acclimatised to the massive difference in weather landing from 30to 25forget training outside it was so cold out there that you couldneven walkfew hundred metres out there says chithravel who is still in the middle of his off season training forget training outside it was so cold out there that you couldneven walkfew hundred metres out there says chithravel who is still in the middle of his off season trainingcouple of years agoyounger chithravel would have given up hopes of doing well at the first sight of nur sultanunforgiving weather but in his own words hea different person now thatthe difference betweennormal athlete andprofessional athlete everything has changedhave changedhave realised how minute the difference between winning and losing is he says at nur sultan chithravel landed on the day of his competition which turned out to beblessing in disguise his team cracked the code withvery simple approach stay indoors from the airport to the hotel from the hotel bus to the indoor stadiumtried my best to not expose myself to the weather outside says chithravel who was holed up in his hotel room for hours before the competition whenever he lands innew city forcompetition he likes to venture out and explore the surroundings but couldntake that risk in kazakhstan my foreign training stints have taught me to think and work likeprofessionalhave observed how disciplined and focused top athletes areasked myself whyhave come here the answer was to compete sowas clear thatwasngoing to step out until my competition gets over says chithravel he made up for his time indoors post his meet evident by his snow filled instagram reels advertisement chithravel has been training under two time world championship medallist cuban yoandri betanzos for almostyear now at jswiis facilities in bellary chithravel has been training under two time world championship medallist cuban yoandri betanzos for almostyear now at jswiis facilities in bellary steady progress chithravel has been training under two time world championship medallist cuban yoandri betanzos for almostyear at jswiis facilities in bellary betanzos power first approach seems to be working well for chithravel who has added zing to his technique since the cubanarrival my training has improved immensely he focuses both on power and technique he corrected the waywas lifting my feet during jumps and that has helped me add more explosiveness says chithravel despite the silver medal chithravel feels he iswork in progress and nowhere close to realising his true potential itbeen justyear with coach betanzos and there are plenty of things to improve in my jump he says advertisement the asian indoor silver has come asbalm for chithravel who missed the bronze at the 2022 commonwealth games by just 3cms if he had wonmedal at birmingham it would have beenpodium sweep for india with eldhose paul and aboobacker winning gold and silver respectivelywas obviously shattered thatmissed the medal by suchsmall margin it wasnthat 3cm that bothered me but my technique and approach ifhad landed the jump the wayhad trained those three centimetres wouldnhave mattered that dayrealised how important every single aspect of your jump is he says chithravel has been on the circuit forwhile and his outgoing nature has made him popular among athletes he admits that he waslittle too casual during his early days as an athlete it is not just the training but everythingused to sleep at around 12 earlier but nowam off to bed at 10have limited my social media use and never miss training he says but the biggest and toughest change as per the youngster has been controlling his diet chithravel loves his seafood withgenerous amount of spice at iis we get fish but itbland however thatthe best for my body oh then therebiryani crabs prawns lists outcomplete menu but nowhave to keepcheck on my eating habitsamprofessional now

Title: pvl ahmedabad defenders crush chennai blitz
Article: hyderabad ahmedabad defenders picked up their third win inrow in the second season of the prime volleyball league after beating the chennai blitz 15 11 15 13 15 10 15 9 15 12 at the gachibowli indoor stadium in hyderabad on sunday nandagopal subramaniyam was named the player of the match for his eye catching performance chennai blitz took charge with akhin leading the middle with his spirited attacks but middle blocker lm manoj levelled the playing field for ahmedabad defenders with ferocious blocks danial moatazedihard spikes gave chennai no breathing room as the game becamebattle of the middle akhinrole became crucial for the blitz chennaistrategy to switch jobin varghese to the left side helped blitz but manoj and nandagopal kept ahmedabad ahead with consistent blocks with spike errors from angamuthu and santhosh ahmedabad defenders started leaking points moyo and renato constantly started switching directions giving blitz an opening buta perfectly executed combo move between skipper muthusamy appavu and angamuthu shut down chennairebellion and the defenders took control of the proceedings muthusamy kept delivering the ball to his attackers in the middle despite getting in awkward positions at times danialtowering presence only added to chennaiworries akhin kept trying to create an impact from the middle for chennai but found little support and ahmedabad closed down the game within straight sets with the opportunity to climb to the top position with5 0 win the defenders went all in nandagopal kept getting better and chennai found no replies to his powerful serves and ahmedabad completed the clean sweep win to get 3 points from the match kolkata thunderbolts will be up against mumbai meteors and ahmedabad defenders will be up against calicut heroes on monday

Title: cbi submits to court how agents mopped up 10cr from ssc aspirants
Article: kolkata three agents arrested by cbi in connection to the ssc cash for job scam collected rs 10 crore from aspiring candidates the cbi told the court on monday the three accused shahid imam ali imam and kaushik ghosh pleaded to record their statements under 164 crpc the cbi on monday produced shahid ali kaushik and abdul khalek at the special cbi court in kolkata shahid was sent to judicial custodyday after he was arrested the judge sent the others to judicial custody till march 2 present at the court of judge arpan chatterjee the cbi submitted that shahid ali and kaushik were operating in connivance with prasanna roy prasanna who was already arrested by cbi allegedly used to take money from chandan mandal alias ranjan and hand over the amount to influential persons in the network cbi said the cbi so far has found that ali mopped up rs 6 7 crore shahid collected rs 1 4 crore and kaushik collected rs 1 9 crore from aspiring candidates during searches officials retrievedlaptop andmobile phone these gadgets might also help to dig deeper into the network of agents and sub agents the cbi said tapas mandal who was also taken to the court on monday alleged that he had demanded rs 19 5 crore from kuntal ghosh that he had collected from the market it is not rs 50 lakhdemanded rs 19 5 crore from himhave not taken any moneydemanded money from him kuntaldemanded the money kuntal was paidhave been turned into an accused becausehave accused several persons in the case he said before being taken to the court the judge on monday asked the cbi why they are not takingp sinha in police custody for further interrogation when many of the accused persons were being linked directly to him are you trying to prepare paneer butter masala without paneer the judge observed the cbi said that they are atcrucial juncture of the investigation the judge on monday sent tapas kuntal and niladri to cbi custody till february 23 while coming out of the court kuntal said that his allegations proved to be true after cbi made recent arrests another cbi team questioned shyamal sen an alleged collection agent of tapas at his baruipara residence on monday the investigating agency has also got some more names hriday saha and prabhakar jana who allegedly used to work for tapas arrested actor and producer sk shahid also told the investigating agency that he would makemagisterial statement on how the proceeds of the ill gotten money school recruitments made their way to the entertainment and film industry

Title: gujrera gujrera posts vacant 150 projects in limbo
Article: ahmedabad the gujarat real estate regulatory authority gujrera has not had two of the mandatory three members appointed formonth andhalf now due to this no new projects have received rera registration numbers according to sources in the body there are 150 odd new project files awaiting approval apart from over 250 complaints pending with the authority real estate developers are demanding that the state government appoint the rera chairman and two members even on an in charge basis so that regular functioning of the authority can continue according to sources the post of gujrera chairman has been vacant since november 2022 when amarjit singh retired after that rera memberp joshi also retired so the authority currently has only one member according to the rules only the chairman and two rera members can approve projects credai ahmedabad president tejas joshi said no new project has been givenrera registration number since mid january because the authority does not have the full committee we demand that the project approval process be started as soon as possible sources said some 150 projects have completed all necessary processes but are still without registration numbers and are thus unable to open bookings this could potentially have serious financial implications for such developers

Title: viral video tigress and leopard come face to face at panna tiger reserve what happens next
Article: feb 20 2023 03 06pm ist source toi intigress andleopard came face to face at panna tiger reserve in madhya pradesh the leopard maintainedfixed gaze on the tiger as the tiger circled it the tigress took pity on the leopard and spared its life tourists captured the rare moment on their mobile phones the video has gone viral on social media

Title: suv driver failed to control steering on flyovercurve
Article: lucknow three gym trainers were killed and one injured after the suv they were riding flipped and fell from30 foott high flyover in lucknow in the early hours of sunday40 second cctv footage of the accident got viral on social media which shows the speeding suv collapsing from the flyover around 12 45 am when they reached the middle of polytechnic flyover cruising around 120 km hour amit kumar who was on the steering failed to control the vehicle on the sudden sharp horizontal curve of the flyover making the ill fated suv ram into the cement concrete barrier and within seconds crash landing on the munshipuliya road causingloud thud and bringing the thin traffic togrinding halt said the police the police received the first call in the control room about the accident from the injured victim harsh shukla he said that they had fallen off the polytechnic flyover in the meantime the passers by had also stopped and began informing the police control room said bharat pathak sub inspector polytechnic police outpostpolice team immediately rushed to the spot and with the help of locals including passers by pulled out bodies of the four occupants from the mangled pieces of the suv by using gas cutters and rushed all the four to rml institute of medical sciences however the doctors amit priyanshu and raj brought dead and referred harsh to kgmu trauma centre said pathak shubham shukla elder brother of victim priyanshu was shell shocked to know about the death of his younger brotherearnlivelihood asdriver and had taken my parents to an event on saturday nightgotcall from priyanshu last night that he would be late in reaching home he said shubham further added that all the four were likefamily and closely knit they have been together for the last six years he said similar sentiments were conveyed by parents of two other victims amit and raj younger brother of harsh prem said that his brother is still battling for life at kgmu my father ajay shukla is caretaker ofresort in nainital he said

Title: neglected by kerala government long jumper sreeshankar joins rbi
Article: kottayam long jumpersreeshankar who did the country proud by clinching silver at the commonwealth games last year has been appointed as an assistant manager at the thiruvananthapuram branch office of the reserve bank of india rbi on the basis of his sporting credentials he decided to accept the employment offer from the rbi after the kerala government made him wait for years forjob under the sports quota the 23 year old palakkad based athlete who became the first indian male long jumper to qualify for the world athletics championships finals in july 2022 joined duty on monday apart from sreeshankar malayali footballer ashique kuruniyan cricketers shubman gill ishan kishan and smriti mandhana have also securedjob with the rbi under the sports quota after proving their mettle in their chosen discipline the current national record holder withjump of 8 36 metres sreeshnkar had applied forstate government job in 2021 as he had securedrank in bsc mathematics from the calicut university he was eligible fortop post in the state government service however as there had been no response from the authorities concerned he approached the rbi forjob while the state government sat on his application for overyear the rbi authorities completed the formalities quickly and issued the appointment order last week the state government has also not fulfilled the promise of providing jobs to commonwealth games medal winners from the state as the world athletics championship and the asian games are scheduled to take place this yearjob of permanent nature and the security it offers would boost my confidence and help me do well said sreeshankar sreeshankar who has been winning medals for kerala at national championships since 2014 wants to represent the state in the future as well

Title: indian wrestlers vs wfi oversight committee given two week extension to submit report
Article: new delhi the ministry of youth affairs and sports myas has given an extension of two weeks to the oversight committee for wrestling to submit its report regarding the complaints of indiatop wrestlers like tokyo olympic bronze medalist bajrang punia world championships medalist vinesh phogat and rio olympics bronze medalist sakshee malikkh the wrestlers had gone ondharna at jantar mantar in the national capital in january this year protesting againstplethora of issues the biggest allegation among them was that wrestling federation of india chief brij bhushan sharan singh had abused his position and sexually harassed women wrestlers there were other claims as well like financial misappropriation on the part of the wfi and its office bearersrelease from the myas on thursday stated that the oversight committee had requested fortwo week extension the committee includes olympic medal winners like mary kom and yogeshwar dutt besides former shuttler trupti murgunde and wrestler turned politician babita phogat radhica sreeman who is the former executive director of teams at sports authority of india and crd retd rajesh rajagopalan who is the former ceo of target olympic podium scheme are also members of the six person committee the extension means that the oversight committee will also be in charge of day to day affairs of wfi for two more weeks at least

Title: vinesh phogat accuses sportsperson member of wrestling oversight committee of leaking information
Article: world championships medal winning wrestler vinesh phogat on sunday accused an unnamed member of the wrestling oversight committee of leaking contents of the complaints made by the nationtop wrestlers against the wrestling federation of indiachief brij bhushan sharan singh and the wfi she urged the government to remove the member whom she did not name she did however identify the person assportsperson member of the committee beingsportsperson it is extremely disheartening to seefellow sportsperson of the oversight committee has behaved so recklessly their attitude towards women is evident from such behaviour she said instatement posted on twitter requirement of action againstmember of oversight committee for leaking sensitive information to the press pic twitter com cupdduxhaf vinesh phogat february 26 2023 she added that the member has been acting against the interest of women from day one and said she was sure that sharan singh was finding support from the member the lack of empathy and insensitivity displayed by this sportsperson was shocking during the proceedings of the committee she further said while requesting that action be taken against the member she went to add all this has placed great mistrust towards the committee proceedingsm feeling let down at not just weak but also strategic attempts of this committee member towards what should have beenfair and just investigation how canwoman expect to find justice if such highly sensitive and confidential proceedings are leaked by such esteemed member ofcommittee sakshee malikkh february 26 2023 the six member oversight committee is chaired by olympic bronze medal winning boxer mary kom london olympics bronze medal winning wrestler yogeshwar dutt and wrestler babita phogat who is bajrangsister in law andcousin of vinesh are also in the oversight committee former badminton player trupti murgunde is the last former athlete to be part of the committee the other two members are radhica sreeman former executive director teams of the sports authority of india and rajesh rajagopalan the former ceo of the target olympic podium scheme indiatop wrestlers like bajrang punia vinesh sakshi malik and sarita mor had gone ondharna in january to protest against wfi and sharan singh who they accused of sexually harassing women wrestlers it is shameful howsportsperson member of the oversight committee has been allegedly leaking contents of the complaint of sexual harassmentrequest that strict action should be taken against the member and they should be immediately from the committee sarita mor february 26 2023 advertisement in response the ministry of youth affairs and sports had set upfive member oversight committee to look into the allegations upon the wrestlers insistence babita was added as the sixth member of the committee the committee was recently giventwo week extension to come up with the report

Title: asian championships moved from new delhi to astana because of wrestling scandal
Article: asian championships moved from new delhi to astana because of wrestling investigation in india this yearasian championships have been moved from new delhi to kazakhstancapital astana due to an ongoing inquiry into allegations of sexual misconduct financial irregularities and misgovernance at the wrestling federation of india wfi it has been announced the decision taken by united world wrestling uww comeslittle more than one month before the indian capital had been due to stage the championships from march 28 to april 2 the wfi oversight committee has been granted an additional two weeks to complete its investigation into the governing bodyaffairs the start of the asian championships in astana has been pushed back by 10 days to april 7 and it is due to run until april 15 although this is provisional with final dates to be confirmed uww claimed it had taken the decision because of recent developments in indian wrestling andpending inquiry by the indian sports ministry against the wrestling federation of india allegations of misconduct and sexual harassment by wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh have been made by several indian wrestlers getty images an oversight committee led by olympic bronze medallist boxer and indian olympic association ioa athletes commission chair mary kom was established by the ministry of youth affairs and sports last month to investigate the wfi the oversight committee was also tasked with managing the wfiaffairs this followed allegations by three time commonwealth games gold medallist vinesh phogat and olympic bronze medallists bajrang punia and sakshi malik of misconduct and sexual harassment by wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh and other officials wrestlers had protested in new delhi for three days calling for the dismissal of singh and dissolution of wfi singh has denied all the allegations but has stepped aside until the investigation concludes the oversight committee had initially been granted one month to complete its investigation but the ministry of youth affairs and sports has agreed totwo week extension brij bhushan sharan singh has stepped aside as wfi president for the duration of an investigation into its affairs with an oversight committee granted an additional two weeks to complete its work getty images phogat punia and malik have previously claimed they were not consulted on the creation of the oversight committee wrestlers also opted not to attendmeeting with an ioa panel established to investigate the allegations last month arguing it did not make sense because some of its members were part of the oversight committee too kom is chairing the oversight committee and ioa panel astana held the asian championships in 2014 in wrestling and the world championships in 2019 almaty in kazakhstan also held the asian championships in 2004 2006 and 2021

Title: amritpal singh deep sidhusuccessor 29 yr old radical returned from dubai to leadfollowing
Article: soon afterhuge band of his followers many of them armed stormed ajnala police station here wednesday morning and succeeded in gettingman accused in kidnapping and assault discharged amritpal singh 29 stoutly defended the violent action twisting it into another authorities versus him battle some papers wrote amritpal is desperate he is isolated see how the devout have supported me he told the media they provoked us we exercised patience for so many days even today we were marching peacefully now we will continue sitting here until singh is freed tomorrow he said this is not the first time the radical preacher and his followers have hadrun in with the police but this is easily the most audacious waris punjab de followers enter ajnala police station near amritsar thursday express photo by rana simranjit singh waris punjab de followers enter ajnala police station near amritsar thursday express photo by rana simranjit singh amritpal first caused consternation with his radical rhetoric when he flew back from dubai to take over as the chief of waris punjab depressure group formed by actor activist deep sidhu now deceased last september his elevation took place at rode the native village of jarnail singh bhindranwale amid pro khalistan slogans the self styled preacher who was clean shaven until november 2021 has traversed quitedistance in the last few months with his amrit sanchar baptism mission reminiscent of the one started by bhindranwale in the early 1980s five days ago he was among 25 people booked for abduction assault and snatching followingcomplaint byformer follower advertisement varinder singhsikh preacher had alleged that he was kidnapped and beaten up soon after he uploadedvideo accusing amritpal and his followers of spreading false propaganda lovepreet singh tufan now in ajnala policecustody was among the accused earlier this week there were murmurs that amritpal who married an nri from london on february 11 was softening his stance when inpress conference on february 21 he clarified that he had not issued any threat to union home minister amit shah this statement came two days after some sections of the media reported that he had issuedveiled threat to shah on the death anniversary of deep sidhu while mentioning the assassination of former pm indira gandhi amritpal who not only dresses like bhindranwale but also uses the same language calls the latter his inspiration advertisement before he returned from dubai last september most people in the state had only seen or heard amritpal on social media that too after the farmers agitationresident of jallupur khera in amritsar amritpal is the youngest of three children of tarsem singh and balwinder kaur while tarsem keeps shuttling between dubai and india balwinder lives in the village although he remained active on facebook since 2012 when he went to dubai often taking up issues concerning punjab amritpal who worked asdispatcher in his family owned transport business for 10 years never got much traction before 2019 when he came out in support of farmers agitation against the now repealed agri laws he was alsovocal supporter of deep sidhu and the role the punjabi actor played in the farm stir interestingly during his dubai days amritpal used social media to target regional and national political parties feminists activists khalsa aid and even some pro khalistan groups such as dal khalsa duringfacebook live session in 2019 responding to allegations fromperson that he was being funded by pakistanintelligence agency amritpal had said onlighter note now donwish me ram ram wish me salam waleikum nowam being connected with the isi advertisement last year the union ministry of home affairs mha wrote to the punjab government expressing concern over the alleged suspicious activities of amritpal former chief minister and bjp leader capt amarinder singh warned the aam aadmi party government to wake up against the activities of such forces which are inimical to punjab and the nation people of punjab want to know who are the forces behind this youth who had recently moved to punjab from dubai it is the duty and responsibility of the state government to confront such forces and their activities said the veteran leader advertisement finance minister harpal cheema had subsequently assured the state assembly that the aap government would investigate amritpalbackground known for his offensive language and unapologetic nature amritpal defended deep sidhu on social media especially after the actor was arrested and most political parties and farmer groups had shunned him advertisement but deepbrother mandeep has said that the family never made amritpal the head of waris panjab de none of us including deep ever met him he was in touch with deep over phone for sometime but later he had blocked amritpal we do not know how he has declared himself head of waris punjab de he is misusing our name to propagate anti social activities mandeep had earlier told the indian express

Title: delhi marathon man singh belliappa ab and karthik kumar qualify for asian games with podium finish
Article: athletics evergreen jyoti gawate won the gold medal in the womenevent indiaelite runners man singh belliappa ab and karthik kumar clinched the podium positions in the apollo tyres new delhi national marathon here on sunday and also qualified for the 2023 asian games in september all three went under the qualifying mark of 2 hours and 15 minutes in an exciting run that went down to the wire much to the delight of cheering fans all along the picturesque route in the heart of the capital man singh who recorded his personal best of 2 16 58 just last month clocked an impressive 2 14 13 to win the coveted gold medal as well as the cash prize of rs 1 50 000 belliappa 2 14 15 who was breathing down his neck in the final leg finished just two seconds behind to improve upon his own best by over 2 minutes he pocketed the silver medal in the process karthik kumar 2 14 19 crossed the line four seconds behind to take the bronze evergreen jyoti gawate took home the gold medal among elite women but could not book her flight ticket to hangzhou in china she however managed 2 53 04 while the target for the women was 2 47 minutes ashvini jadhav 2 53 06 and jigmet dolma 2 56 41 took the other two positions on the podium indian sports live coverage on khel now we at neb sports had done everything possible to create the best ambience and platform for the athletes to qualify for the asian games we are delighted that three elite men have made it ita proud moment for us nebnagraj adiga the race director saidwas stumped by the enthusiasm among the runners couldnstop myself from cheering assaw indiatop marathoners enter the nehru stadium well under the qualifying mark world record holder and double olympic champion david rudisha the brand ambassador of ndm gushedcongratulate the three qualifiers and wish them all the best for the big one in september he added we are delighted with the response from the running community for the apollo tyres new delhi marathon it is heartening that three male athletes have breached the qualifying standards for the hangzhou asian games satish sharma president asia pacific middle east africa of apollo tyres ltd said over 16 000 runners took part in the four categories making it one of the biggest turnouts in the country the elite marathoners set off on their mission at 5 in the morning with david rudisha flagging them off along with other dignitaries results marathon elite men 1 man singh 2 14 13 2 belliappa ab 2 14 15 3 karthik kumar 2 14 19 women 1 jyoti gawate 2 53 04 2 ashvini jadhav 2 53 06 3 jigmet dolma 2 56 41 half marathonmen 1 kiran matre 1 05 57 2 nano guta 1 06 03 3 tirtha pun 1 06 21 women 1 neetu kumari 1 17 14 2 bisle bikaye 1 18 26 3 ujala ujala 1 21 31 10kmen 1 rishipal singh 0 32 56 2 abdisa wolde 0 32 57 3 sunny kumar 0 34 14 women 1 ekta rawat 0 38 12 2 rozi 0 38 13 3 priti priti 0 39 22 for more updates follow khel now on facebook twitter and instagram and join our community on telegram

Title: watch bruins goaltender linus ullmark scores into empty net
Article: goaltender linus ullmark scored into an empty net in the final minute and the nhl leading boston bruins beat the vancouver canucks 3 1 on saturday might for their sixth straight victory ullmark madesave and firedhigh wrist shot the length of the ice to become the 13th goalie in nhl history to scoregoal defenseman hampus lindholm and brad marchand had first period goals for the bruins and ullmark made 26 saves the boston bruins are elite in every category pic twitter com d6ronljsvg andrew mangiapane is the best breadman february 26 2023 brock boeser scored for vancouver lindholm opened the scoring onpower play with 2 52 left in the first period beating goalie arturs silovs withone timer from the point marchand made it 2 0 with 35 seconds left in the first darting to the middle onbreak and beating silovs to the far side for his 19th goal of the season boeser scored for vancouver at 7 24 of the third silovs stopped 32 shots

Title: wrestlers protest oversight committee gets 2 more weeks to complete probe allegations against wfi chief
Article: the sports ministry has extended by two weeks the deadline given to the oversight committee to submit its report on sexual harassment allegations against wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh

Title: rajendra singh godavaricondition is likepatient in icu rajendra singh
Article: nashik well known water conservationist and magsaysay award winner rajendra singh on thursday likened the condition of godavari river topatient in icu singh who is on two day visit to nashik since wednesday told reporters that he failed to notice any change in the condition of one of the countrymajor rivers godavari since he visited nashik around four years ago whathave seen during my visit is that the river is full of filth due to the effluents released from the surrounding areas said singh singh who had meeting with nashik municipal corporation nmc officials including municipal commissioner chandrakant pulkundwar on the issue of river pollution suggested that the civic body must find the main cause of river pollution and start taking remedial measures during the meeting singh was also critical of the beautification of the godavari river being undertaken by the nashik municipal smart development corporation ltd nmscdcl he said that instead of spending on beautification the focus should be on making the river pollution free singh also criticised the excavation at bramhagiri mountain the origin of the godavari river the holiness associated with the river is due to the bramhagiri mountain hence there isneed to protect it said singh singh also praised former district collector of nashik suraj mandhare for taking efforts to declare the bramhagiri mountain an eco sensitive zone

Title: bjp fuelling fire of hatred targeting minorities dalits tribals women congress leader sonia gandhi
Article: nava raipur chhattisgarh former congress chief sonia gandhi launched an all out attack on the bjp government on saturday accusing it of fuelling the fire of hatred and viciously targeting minorities women dalits and tribals she urged the congress workers to tackle the current regime with vigour and reach out to people to convey the partymessage addressing the party85th plenary session here sonia accused the government of causing economic ruin by favouringparticular businessman makingveiled attack on prime minister narendra modi overcontroversy involving the business empire of industrialist gautam adani she said in this crucial time every congress worker bearsspecial responsibility towards the party and the country gandhi said the congress is not justpolitical party but it reflects the voices of people of all religions castes and genders she asserted that the party will fulfil the dreams of all of them this isparticularly challenging time for the congress and the country prime minister narendra modi and the bjp have captured every institution the bjp is fuelling the fire of hatred and viciously targeting minorities women dalits and tribals she alleged the former congress chief also alleged that the governmentactions show contempt for the values enshrined in the constitution the situation today reminds me of the time whenfirst entered parliament she said gandhi urged the congress workers to achieve the goal of defeating the bharatiya janata party bjp in the 2024 lok sabha polls under the leadership of party president mallikarjun kharge we must tackle this regime with vigour we must reach out to people and convey our message with clarity we must be ready to put aside our personal ambitions she said gandhi also said she is happy that her innings as the president of the congress party ended with the bharat jodo yatra

Title: pakistan denies salary stop reports amid cash crunch
Article: islamabad prime minister shehbaz sharifgovernment saturday denied having issued instructions to stop pension and salary payments terming reports to that effect completely false after it stoked fresh anxiety about cash strapped pakistanplight pakistani daily the news reported saturday that the finance ministry had asked the authorities to stop clearing all federal ministries and attached departmentbills until further orders even the clearance of salary bills has also been stopped claimed the report which quoted top official sources as saying operational cost related releases faced difficulties mainly because of lingering financial difficulties being faced by the country finance minister ishaq dar tweeted that fake news was being spread to cause harm to the national economic interests kindly refrain from circulating such reports and news the finance ministry termed the report rumours this is false as no such instructions have been given the ministry said the accountant general of pakistan revenue has confirmed that pay and pension have already been processed and will be paid on time the ministry said

Title: unga session india slams pakistan after it rakes upk during unga session on ukraine
Article: united nations exercising its right of reply duringspecial session of the united nations general assembly on ukraine india on thursday slammed pakistan for raking up jammu and kashmir issue and advised the neighboring state to examine its track record of harbouring and providing safe havens to terrorists with impunitym taking the floor today to say that india chooses this time not to respond to pakistanmischievious provocations our advice to the delegate of pakistan is to refer to our numerous rights of reply that we have exercised in the past pratik mathur counsellor in indiapermanent mission to the un said mathur exercised indiaright of reply after pakistanenvoy at the un munir akram referred to jammu and kashmir while delivering the explanation of vote on the un general assembly resolution on ukraine during the emergency special session mathur described pakistanuncalled for provocation as regrettable and stated that after two days of intense discussions all members present at the un agreed that the only path to resolve conflict and discord is through peace india has prioritized the listing of pakistani based terrorists during its tenure in the unsc in 2021 22 and five names including makki were submitted for designation under 1267 in 2022 in january abdul rehman makki the deputy chief of lashkartaiba letpakistan based terrorist group was designatedglobal terrorist india prioritized the listing of pakistani based terrorists during its tenure in the unsc in 2021 22 five names including makki were submitted for designation under 1267 in 2022 all 14 members of the council except for china initially agreed to their listing makki was convicted of terrorism financing bypakistani anti terrorism court in 2020 and sentenced to prison according to the us state department

Title: g20 fms meet china and russia block communique
Article: bengaluru determined resistance by china and russia toreference to the war in ukraine led to the meet of g20 finance ministers concluding here on saturday without issuing the standard communique which reflects the consensus of participant countries and instead settling for the chairsummary and outcome document bringing forth the standpoint of individual members of the powerful grouping the outcome document has used the language from last yearg20 leaders declaration in bali with the footnote mentioning that the two paragraphs on the issue were agreed to by all member countries except russia and china we reiterated our national positions as expressed in other fora most members strongly condemned the war in ukraine there were other views and different assessments of the situation and sanctions the outcome document said noting the differences russia and china didnwant those two paras in the communique it was agreed to by all countries they didnagree because the leaders had prepared that and it was fine for the circumstances that prevailed then and therefore now they didnwant it finance minister nirmala sitharaman said while noting the progress made on other fronts economic affairs secretary ajay seth said both russia and china took the position that fms and central bank governors havemandate to deal with economic and financial issues and should not takeview on geopolitical issues you cannot havecommunique withfootnote explained an official involved with the exercise any reference to the war has deeply divided the g7 members led by the us and russia and china in fact at one point of time russian officials went on to say that the war did not start in february 2022 but in 2014reference to nato commencing its support to capacity building in ukraine besides russia insisted that there should be no reference to sanctions in the document an official said along with mexico and turkiye finance ministers from russia and china were not physically present at the meeting here sitharaman said discussions inside the negotiating room were very cordial and added that india will look at its interests in importing oil and other commodities although india was seen to be among countries that did not oppose the inclusion of war in the communique officials argued that only the stated position of the country has been recognised in the outcome document

Title: railway to float tender for 35 hydrogen trains
Article: new delhi fast tracking its plan to roll out hydrogen trains indian railways is readying the proposal to floattender for procuring 35 such green energy driven trains sources said the trains would cost around rs 2 800 crore officials said the railways helddetailed meeting with over halfdozen major technology players including siemens cummins hitachi bhel and medha servo this week and they have shown interest inmanufacturing the trains which will be introduced on heritage routes officials said the meeting with the industry was fruitful and they have given their views to expedite the plan after taking their inputs we willfloat the tender said one of them currently medha servo is undertaking the pilot project for the retro fitment of hydrogen fuel cells on an existing diesel electric multiple unit train it ll be the first prototype hydrogen train which is likely to start operation on the jind sonipat route by this year recently the railway ministry had informed rs that each hydrogen train would cost about rs 80 crore and the ground infrastructure would require an investment of nearly rs 70 crore per route on various heritage and hill routes

Title: miscreant stones orlem grotto cross
Article: mumbai in yet another act of vandalism against christian symbolsmiscreant threwstone and broke the glass ofgrotto of mother mary outside orlem church malad early on thursday he then proceeded to stone the cross located in an apartment building nearby and escaped malad police said they are scanning cctv footage though they did not file an fir an official said it was likely to be an incident of mischief fr michael pinto parish priest of our lady of lourdes orlem said the incident befell at 5 30 6am we went and foundsmall stone used to break the glass of the grottoprovided cctv footage to policesubmittedwritten complaint wherespecified community sentiments have been hurt the incident is similar to the desecration of the graveyard of st michaelchurch mahim in january the orlem crime caused consternation especially since the 40 day holy observance of lent began on wednesday parishioner david vaz sought police action dolphysouza president bombay catholic sabha said this is an anguishing moment for residents who venerate mother mary here this grotto hashistory of over 100 years is therepattern in mindless destruction of sacred objects of christian community in the city we urge serious police probe

Title: rpp rpp decides to withdraw support from prachanda led government in nepal
Article: kathmandu the rashtriya prajatantra party pppkey partner in the seven parties ruling alliance in nepal has decided to withdraw its support to prime minister pushpa kamal dahal prachanda led government citing changes in the political equation four ministers from the rpp including the partychairman and deputy prime minister and energy minister rajendra lingden who was part of the coalition government on saturday submitted their resignations to prachandajoint meeting of the partycentral executive committee and lawmakers on saturday decided to withdraw its support to the prachanda led government and the provincial governments the kathmandu post reported in view of the sudden change in the political equation and cooperation within the ruling government the rastriya prajatantra party has decided to quit the government saidstatement issued by rpp spokesperson mohan kumar shrestha the party believes that the recent changes are clear signs of inherent instability and it would be inappropriate for the party to remain in power in the changed context shrestha added we have decided to withdraw the support given to the government and quit the government with effect from today the post reported quoting the statement the party also carries the same belief in the context of the provincial governments and hence has decided to withdraw the support given to the provincial governments as well the rpp is the fifth largest party in the house of representatives with 14 seats in the 275 member house maoist center chairman and prime minister prachanda has dealtblow to the ruling alliance by selectingpresidential candidate from outside the ruling alliance the presidential election scheduled for early next month has putserious question mark on the future of the seven party ruling alliance

Title: putinwarstrategic failure for kremlin says us treasury secretary janet yellen
Article: bengaluru us treasury secretary janetyellen on thursday said russiaeconomy has become increasingly isolated and the impact of sanctions against that country for war against ukraine is being seen since the early days of the war we have partnered withmultilateral coalition of over 30 countries to impose severe economic costs on russia for its brutal assault our twin goals are to degrade russiamilitary industrial complex and reduce the revenues that it can use to fund its war we are seeing the impacts of these actions yellen said speaking to reporters here she said the russian military is struggling to replace over 9 000 pieces of heavy military equipment that it has lost since february 2022 it has suffered production shut downs at key defence industrial facilities further russiaeconomy has become increasingly isolated estimates indicate that nearlymillion russians may have left the country last year this is putting downward pressure on its productive capacity going forward she added yellen was speaking to reporters ahead of the first g20 finance ministers and central bank governors fmcbg meeting under the g20 indian presidency scheduled on february 24 and 25 here as us joe president biden has said we will stand with ukraine in its fight for as long as it takes the treasury secretary said we commend our allies for stepping up their direct assistance and we believe itcritical that the imf move swiftly towardfully financed program for ukraine as they have said they will do continued robust support for ukraine will bemajor topic of discussion during my time here in india noting that when russian president vladimir putin launched his brutal assault one year ago some believed that russia would securequick and decisive victory over kyiv she said putin himself thought that he would achievevictory at minimal cost in the words of cia director bill burns one year later putinwar has beenstrategic failure for the kremlin ukraine still stands and nato and our global coalition stand united behind it responding toquestion on concerns about chinadeepening ties with russia and her message to china yellen said with respect to sanctions and aid to russia we have made clear that providing material support to russia or assistance with any type of systemic sanctions evasion would bevery serious concern to us we would certainly continue to make it clear to the chinese government and to companies and banks in their jurisdiction about what the rules are regarding our sanctions and the serious consequences they would face for violating them she added earlier in the day union finance minister nirmala sitharaman on thursday met yellen here and held discussions

Title: shekhawat devisingh shekhawat husband of ex prez dies
Article: pune dr devisingh shekhawatformer mla and the husband of indiafirst woman president pratibha patil died at kem hospital in pune on friday he was 89 he is survived by his wife and two childrenson anddaughter shekhawat was admitted withcardiac issue the hospital said instatement he recently hadfall resulting in hospitalization for fracture fixation during recovery he had cardiac symptoms and was also diagnosed withchest infection and was shifted to kem hospital the hospital said his health deteriorated as he developed kidney complications and he passed away around 9 30am on february 24renowned agriculturist andmember of the congress shekhawat was an mla from amravati constituency between 1980 and 1990 several politicians across party lines expressed their condolences my thoughts are with our former president smt pratibha patil ji and her family on the passing away of dr devisingh shekhawat ji prime minister narendra modi said intweet he mademark on society through his various community service efforts om shanti nationalist congress party chief sharad pawar said deeply saddened by the demise of the senior congress leader and renowned agriculturist shri devisingh ransingh shekhawat ji the veteran leader served as the first mayor of amravati and wasstrong support system for smt pratibha tai as the first gentleman of india former president ram nath kovind said he was shocked by the demise my condolences with smt pratibha singh patil ji and her family in this hour of grief he tweeted

Title: cop killed over monetary dispute in punjabropar district 3 booked
Article: patiala52 year old cop of punjab home guard succumbed to injuries on wednesday withinfew hours after being attacked by some villagers in chamkaur sahib of ropar district the deceased has been identified as surjit singh 52 of sarangpur village of chamkaur sahib and was posted at government railway police grp samrala in ludhiana police said that surjit was attacked by the accused with the wooden rods following which he was rushed to hospital in machhiwara from where he was referred for higher institute but succumbed to injuries the cop was allegedly attacked atlink road between sarangpur mohanmajra villages in chamkaur sahib at around 9am the police claimed that three injuries have been reported by the doctors in the medico legal report mlr of the deceased the accused have been identified as kaka singh and his two brothers jagtar singh and ravinder singh of fatehgarh viran village of chamkaur sahib in ropar district however none have been arrested so far the police have registered the case of murder and common intention against these accused at chamkaur sahib police station on the complaint of balwinder singh son in law of the deceased cop station house officer chamkaur sahib inspector rupinder singh said the cop was attacked by the accused overmonetary dispute of rs 40 000 in relation to payment of sugarcane crop the cop surjit used to travel to and fro from his house in sarangpur village to grp samrala and was also involved in farming surjitson in law claimed that surjit was practicing farming in his own seven acres and also over 25 acres of leased farm after being attacked by the accused the cop surjit was rushed to hospital in machhiwara from where he was referred for higher institute but later succumbed to injuries the hunt to nab the accused is going on and soon they will be nabbed added sho

Title: drdo officer in odisha held for leaking defence info to isiwoman agent
Article: a technical officer of drdointegrated test range at chandipur in odishabalasore district was arrested friday for allegedly leaking defence secrets topakistani woman suspected to be working for isi after falling for her charms on social media reports debabrata mohapatra baburam dey 51 was part of the facilitytelemetry department and had access to classified information about testing of missiles rockets and cluster bombs by drdo and other defence agencies police said besides information about future testing he stands accused of sharing with the pakistani woman pictures of prohibited areas within the test range and the equipment kept there investigators learnt that dey had been communicating with the woman from two phone numbers the suspected pakistani spy usedwhatsapp number the ip address of which was traced to rawalpindi

Title: wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh appears before the oversight committee
Article: february 28 2023 09 31 pm updated march 01 2023 07 17 am ist kolkata the beleaguered president of the wrestling federation of india wfi brij bhushan sharan singh on tuesday appeared before the union sports ministry appointed six member oversight committee in person as part of the ongoing enquiry it is learned that the interaction between thec mary kom chaired committee members and singh in delhi lasted close to three hours the ministry had formed the oversight committee on january 23 to look into the allegations of sexual misconduct harassment and intimidation financial irregularities and administrative lapse levelled by some prominent wrestlers such as vinesh phogat bajrang punia sakshi malik and ravi dahiya within four weeks later its tenure was extended by two weeks the committee was also tasked with the job of handling the day to day affairs of the wfi as singh was asked to step aside during the enquiry asresult of the ongoing enquiry the united world wrestling moved the asian championships from delhi to astana

Title: ram rahim singh haryana defends dera chief says henothardcore criminal
Article: chandigarh dera sacha sauda chief gurmeet ram rahim singh isna hardcore criminal and his conviction in two murder cases cannot be termed serial killings the haryana government has claimed in response topetition challenging its january 21 order granting him 40 day parole he has been held guilty of criminal conspiracies with the co accused in these killings he has been punished under section 302 of the ipc only with the aid of section 120section 120is an independent offence the charges under this section are framed independently and in case of conviction the sentencing is to be read with the actual offence committed states the governmentsubmission in the punjab and haryana high court another argument made out by the government is that gurmeet wasnproved to be the assailant in either murder gurmeet is currently serving 10 years each in two rape cases and life imprisonment in separate cases pertaining to the murder of former dera manager ranjit singh and journalist ram chander chhatarpati he has four more criminal cases against him including one filed by the cbi regarding the alleged castration of some disciples and three others related to sacrilege the governmentresponse was submitted through suneel sangwan superintendent of rohtaksunaria jail the petition challenging the dera chief40 day parole was filed by the shiromani gurdwara parbandhak committee sgpc the jail superintendent mentioned that the high court had already upheldprevious order to grant temporary furlough to the dera chief this was on april 7 last year standing by its
