approval for parole the state government said the main purpose of suchprovision was to give prisoners an opportunity to solve their personal and family problems and enable them to maintain their links with the society parole is also consideredrehabilitation tool it said according to the governmentresponse the dera chief had already availed of temporary parole or furlough on three different occasions peacefully and that no untoward incident happened during those periods the state also said around 1 000 more convicts had been granted parole or furlough but sgpc chose to challenge only the order pertaining to the dera chiefrelease even citizens of this country havevested interest in preparing offenders for successful re entry into society those who leave prison without strong networks of support without employment prospects withoutfundamental knowledge of the communities to which they will return and without resources standsignificantly higher chance of failure when offenders revert to criminal activity upon release they frequently do so because they lack hope of merging into society as accepted citizens the governmentwritten submission states

Title: haryana organizes ratri bhoj par samvad for20 delegation attending anti corruption working group meeting at gurugram
Article: gurugram the haryana government organizedratri bhoj par samvad dialogue over dinner in honour of20 delegations attending an anti corruption working group meeting in guurugram on wednesday chief minister manohar lal khattar while welcoming the foreign guests at ratri bhoj par samvad said that it ismatter of great pride for india to have assumed the g20 presidency under the leadership of prime minister narendra modi the state uses this opportunity to introduce the tradition and rich art culture of haryana to the foreign delegates at the dinner the delegates were served special dishes and sweets prepared from coarse grains millets the foreign guests were welcomed with tilak and were introduced to the stateart and culture with presentation through traditional instruments and traditional folk songs the representatives of countries like canada italy austria mauritius switzerland and indonesia appreciated the hospitality of haryana they also appreciated the delicacies served during the ratri bhoj par samvad programme and painting exhibition based on art and culture during the ratri bhoj prorgramme the team of information public relations languages and culture department haryana demonstrated the haryanvi folk style at the venue giving collective presentation of traditional folk dances loor ghoomar dhamal phag googa dhamoda etc related to various festivals crop ripening and other occasions in the state along with this flute players subhash ghosh and suleman also gavecultural presentation during the programme on the occasion haryana governor bandaru dattatraya chief minister manohar lal khattar and deputy chief minister dushyant chautala along with other haryana cabinet colleagues welcomed the union minister of state independent charge science technology minister of state independent charge earth sciences minister of state pmo personnel public grievances pensions atomic energy and space dr jitendra singh

Title: punjab govt urged to give addicts opium poppy husk on prescription
Article: chandigarh an ngo has urged the punjab government to give opium or poppy husk on prescription to drug addicts incontrolled way it said due to synthetic drugs addicts are becoming impotent crime is rising and so are cases of divorce it has been submitted that the punjab cabinet should amend the ndps act and there should be no police case against those possessing 5g opium and 500g poppy husk the letter written to the governor the chief minister and all the mlas by iqbal singh gill retd ips officer and general secretary jaswant singh chhapa member and dr inderjeet singh project director of dr dwarka nath kotnis health and education centre charitable acupuncture hospital and research centre ludhiana states as for your information if one takes synthetic drugs it is physically and mentally harmful but it has been noticed that if one takes opium or poppy husk there are no physical or mental side effects

Title: india should use g20 to help end ukraine war italymeloni
Article: new delhi italian prime minister giorgia meloni on thursday said she hoped india would use its g20 presidency to broker an end to the ukraine war and also unveilednew strategic partnership with new delhi melonivisit to the indian capital comes as the city hosts the worldtop diplomats for the group of 20 foreign ministers meeting with russiainvasion of its western neighbour at the top of the agenda the government of her indian counterpart narendra modi is walkingdelicate balancing act between its increased security cooperation with western countries and its reliance on russia for defence and oil imports prime minister modi knows very well italyposition which is giving full support to the territorial integrity of ukraine meloni told reporters we both hope that india having the presidency of the g20 may playcentral role in facilitatingnegotiated process for the cessation of hostilities forjust peace longstanding security ties with russia have put host india in an awkward diplomatic position after it refused to condemn the ukraine invasion over the past year while india has stopped short of condemnation modi told putin last year this was nottime for war in comments seen asrebuke to moscow right from the start of the ukraine war india has made it clear that only dialogue and diplomacy can solve this conflict modi said at thursdaypress conference india is ready to contribute fully to any peace process at their meeting the italian and indian leaders committed tonew strategic partnership which would include greater defence cooperation and the start of joint military exercises modi said india welcomed italycommitment to active participation in the indo pacific region and said both countries were exploring cooperation on renewable energy and other areas

Title: kerala triple jumper gayathry sivakumar sets meet record
Article: bellary kerala triple jumper gayathry sivakumar setnew meet record in the second indian open jumps competition at the inspire institute of sport vidyanagar on thursday the 22 year old achievedpersonal best of 12 98m to better aleena joseprevious record of 12 68m

Title: thuong vietnam parliament elects vo van thuong as new state president
Article: hanoi vietnamnational assembly elected on thursday communist party veteran vo van thuong as the countrynew president the chairman of the parliament vuong dinh hue said in an extraordinary session lawmakers confirmed thuong after the ruling communist party picked him on wednesday as presidentlargely ceremonial role but one of the top four political positions in the southeast asian nation thuong was elected with 98 38 of the votes according to the parliamentonline portalwill be absolutely loyal to the fatherland the people and the constitution striving to fulfill the tasks assigned by the party the state and the people thuong said inbrief statement to parliament after his election which was broadcast on vietnamstate television thuong 52 is the youngest member of the partypolitburo the countrytop decision making body but is consideredveteran of the party having began his political career at university in communist youth organisations

Title: jaishankar jaishankar holds bilateral talks with counterparts from several countries
Article: new delhi external affairs ministerjaishankar on wednesday held separate bilateral talks with his counterparts from the uk russia mexico south africa the netherlands argentina nigeria and comoros withfocus on agenda of g20 under indiapresidency and two way cooperation in key areas he is likely to hold bilateral talks with chinese foreign minister qin gang who is scheduled to arrive in delhi early on thursday the dignitaries are visiting delhi to attend the india hosted g20 foreign ministers meeting on march 1 and 2 our conversation focused on the g20 agenda and the ukraine conflict appreciated the steady growth of india eu cooperation jaishankar said on twitter after meeting european unionhigh representative for foreign affairs josep borrell fontelles on talks with his russian counterpart sergey lavrov the external affairs minister said they exchanged views on bilateral cooperation and g20 issues jaishankar said he thanked south african foreign minister naledi pandor for her countrycontribution in enhancing indiabiodiversity by sending cheetahs alwayspleasure to meet fm naledi pandor of south africa this time in new delhi for discussed g20 focus areas and the agenda of our ministerial also exchanged views on brics appreciated the growth in our bilateral relationship jaishankar tweeted in their meeting jaishankar and his argentinian counterpart santiago cafiero discussed cooperation in areas of trade and defence so nice to welcome fm of argentina this evening glad to see the steady progress in our relations trade has expanded significantly even as defence cooperation unfolds our nuclear partnership has also been mutually beneficial jaishankar said in another tweet on his talks with british foreign secretary james cleverly jaishankar said the two sides reviewed the progress in ties since their last discussion noted in particular the commencement of the young professional scheme he said in their meeting jaishankar and his mexican counterpart marcelo ebrarddiscussed the g20 agendawarm meeting with fm of mexico on sidelines noted our strong multilateral cooperation and discussed the g20 agenda focused on issues related to growth and development the external affairs minister said jaishankar said he and the foreign minister of the netherlands wopke hoekstra heldgood discussion on technology mobility and innovation about his meeting with nigerian foreign minister geoffrey onyeama jaishankar said he underlined indiastrong commitment to the global south and the interests of the african union noted recent developments in our bilateral cooperation especially in educational exchanges welcomed direct flights between our two countries he said

Title: iisc iisc study shows chemically modified nanosheets can aid drug delivery
Article: bengaluru inrecent study researchers from the indian institute of scienceiisc department of organic chemistry oc and materials research centre mrc show that surface modifications of two dimensional molybdenum disulphide an inorganic compound composed of molybdenum and sulphur or 2d mos2 nanosheets can make them highly effective for applications like delivering drugs to diseased cells researchers modified the surface of 2d mos2 nanosheets with thiol sulphur containing ligands and found that these thiols can be exchanged with naturally occurring thiols in biological systems which could allow drugs attached to these nanosheets to be released these chemically modified nanosheets were also found to be safe to use inside living cells our study shows that thiol exchange on 2d mos2 nanosheets is effective and the nanomaterial is stable in the presence of various biomolecules this is an important observation as it will make this nanomaterial highly beneficial for biomedical applications like drug delivery said mrinmoy de associate professor department of oc and senior author of the study published in acs nano the team first usedfluorescent thiol called boron dipyrromethene bod sh to modify the surface of the 2d mos2 nanosheets in order to createfunctionalised version bod mos2 then they tested the possibility of thiol to thiol exchange on bod mos2 using glutathione gshnaturally occurring thiol found in abundance in cancer cells they found that gsh molecules swapped places with bod sh on the surface of the nanosheetprocess that they confirmed using fluorescence techniques when researchers attached an anti cancer drug named doxorubicin dox to the nanosheet surface they found that thiol exchange could also happen between gsh and dox allowing dox to get dropped off at the diseased site because the exchange happens only in the presence of high concentrations of gsh found in diseased cells drugs like dox can be delivered specifically to cancer cells without affecting normal cells which can also potentially reduce any side effects iisc said nanomaterials usually need to be modified or customised depending on the application to improve their efficiency typically they are chemically modified throughprocess called functionalisation which involves attaching ligands small or large molecules to the surface of the nanomaterial previous efforts have focused on using gold nanoparticles for such biomedical applications according to the researchers but these nanoparticles are expensive and have limited efficiency due to their non selectivity between mono thiols and disulphides iisc said pradipta beherapostdoctoral research scholar at iisc and the first author of the study said their experiments show that 2d mos2 nanosheets can be an effective substitute for gold nanoparticles and they will be greatly beneficial in the field of nanomedicine the mos2 nanosheets were found to be stable in the presence of biofluids they also havehigher surface area than gold nanoparticles which means that they can be more efficient moving forward iisc said the team plans to work on improving the stability of the nanomaterial in the presence of various thiol containing liquids and exploring alternative surface modification approaches to customise the nanosheets for other applications this work on 2d mos2 nanosheets can be developed in the future as an alternative to rna and dna delivery applications which can be useful for detecting and treating infections such as covid 19 behera added

Title: do you think governments are better prepared for the next pandemic watch bill gates reply
Article: mar 01 2023 10 10pm ist source toi in bill gates co chair and trustee of bill melinda gates foundation said the indian government acted very quickly they werelot smarter the vaccine coverage rates in india that were achieved are some of the best in the worldlot of philanthropists came together to create respiratory care facilities that was pretty impressive some of that infrastructure will have value even though we are out of the acute phase of that epidemic

Title: 19 wild cows killed in us aerial shooting operation
Article: albuquerquespecialized team of wildlife managers has killed 19 wild cows in the gila wilderness in southwestern new mexico as part ofcontested project to rid the area of the unauthorized animals the three day operation usedhelicopter and high powered rifles to take out the cows inrugged area where federal officials and environmentalists say the animals have been trampling stream banks damaging habitat for other species and ruining water quality the us forest service had estimated there were as many as 150 of the unauthorized cows in an area along the gila river the agency said tuesday that searches were conducted with the naked eye and through thermal imagery the crew spotted significant numbers of elk deer javelina and even rabbits but no additional cattle were found following the operation the carcasses will be left in the forest to decompose and the forest service plans to monitor the area ranchers had opposed the project saying rounding up the animals and removing them would have beenmore humane way to clear them out of the wilderness they accused the forest service of violating its own policies butfederal judge denied their request to sideline the project saying the cows were indeed feral and the forest service had the authority to kill them gila forest supervisor camille howes saidcombination of ground based and aerial removal efforts since october 2021 have substantially reduced the feral cattle population we are committed to removing these feral cattle as safely efficiently and humanely as possible to ensuregila wilderness that is safe and resilient for generations to come she said instatement she also said the forest service is committed to working with the ranching community and will coordinate with permittees to remove any branded cattle from areas where they re not supposed to be ranchers have said fewer people are maintaining fences and the rural neighbors who used to help corral wayward cows are gone some have left the business because of worsening drought making water scarce for cattle and skyrocketing costs for feed and other supplies increased use of public lands including hunting and hiking also has resulted in knocked down fences the ranchers said elk too are to blame for damaging fences meant to keep cows in check new mexico gov michelle lujan grisham even weighed in on the fight over the gilawild cows saying last week that the federal government needed to dobetter job of listening to residents the forest service on tuesday reiterated its position that killing the cows was the most efficient and humane way to deal with this issue

Title: airbnb airbnb may ban users for being closely associated withprohibited user
Article: why airbnb is implementing such restrictions how this change is affecting users airbnb background checks what is it airbnbother safety features airbnb isus based service where users can look for short term homestay rentals the company acts asbroker between the client and the property owners and chargescommission from each booking the short term rental booking company is now reportedly banning people who are associated with users who are already prohibited from the platform according toreport by motherboard users who get banned for their relationship withperson that airbnb considerssafety risk can return to the platform only if they can prove that they arenclosely associated with the originally restricted user users who get prohibited from airbnb due to their association with other banned users will also be allowed to return to the platform if their acquaintance appeals to the ban successfully in an email sent to techcrunch the company informed that in certain circumstances whenperson has been removed from airbnb for safety reasons the platform may also restrict the accounts of the people who are expected to travel with the banned person airbnb has explained that this isnecessary safety precaution airbnb has also explained its decision to ban people who are associated with prohibited users is not specifically based on background check removals the new ban policy will extend to any type of safety related issue as per the report airbnb has also recently informeduser that she has been restricted as she was closely associated withperson who was banned from the platform this user bookedrental on airbnb from her boyfriendcredit card who hadcriminal record the user also appealed the removal to which airbnb informed her that it will uphold the ban to safeguard its community in 2016 the company started doing background checks on its users these checks have led to users getting banned from the platform for incidents like broken tail lights or unleashed dogs over the past few years airbnb has prioritised safety to keep both hosts and users safe in 2020 after users were harmed at rentals arranged through the platform the company announcedglobal ban on all parties and events at its listing airbnbparty ban was made permanent in 2022 the company also introduced an anti party tech to identify potential rule breakers in 2022 airbnb detects these users by checking their history of reviews how long they have been on the platform the length of the trip and the distance to the listing while launching this new tech airbnb mentioned that it is designed to prevent bookings that have the potential to turn into unauthorised parties

Title: househelp held for stealing ornaments worth rs 7 5 lakh from kandivali residentflat
Article: mumbai40 year old househelp working at the residence ofkandivali homemaker in mumbai was arrested for stealing jewellery worth rs 7 58 lakh police said the accused deepika pawar continued to come to work so that nobody would suspect her involvement pawar had started working at the kandivali homemakerresidence in mahavir nagar about four months ago after gold ornaments disappeared from her cupboard the homemaker doubted pawarinvolvement but pawar continued to come to work except for one day the homemaker registeredpolice complaint the cops waited for her to arrive at the apartment for work and then interrogated her eventually she admitted that she couldnt resist the temptation on spotting gold ornaments in her employercupboard she owned two houses one at borivali and the other at mira bhayander most of the stolen ornaments worth rs 7 13 lakh were recovered from her mira bhayander home said investigating officer indrajeet bhise while investigating this case of theft of ornaments the police stumbled onto another case ofstolen autorickshaw autorickshaw driver ajaykumar patel had lodgedpolice complaint after his auto was stolen from sv road at kandivali where it was parked on january 21 while bhise and his team were commuting on the western express highway they noticed the stolen auto moving atgreat speed the police team chased the auto and intercepted it at goregaon rinku giri 20 who had been driving the auto was intercepted he admitted to having stolen the vehicle with his associate barkat ali pathan both men were arrested giri isdriver by profession while pathan islabourer police said

Title: rvnl russia major rvnl emerge lowest vande bharat bidder
Article: new delhi russialargest train manufacturer cjsc transmashholding tmh in partnership with railway psu rail vikas nigam limited rvnl has emerged the lowest bidder l1 for manufacturing of 200 next generation vande bharat trains the over rs 40 000 crore tender also includes maintenance of these trains for 35 years in this keenly watched tender the tmh rvnl consortium has quoted rs 120 crore for making each 16 coach vande bharat train with sleeper facility much below the anticipated price of rs 130 crore the joint venture of bhel titagarh have the second lowest bid l2 of rs 139 8 crore per train as per the tender condition the l1 will manufacture and maintain 120 trains and the second highest bidder will manufacture the remaining 80 trains however the l2 has to match the price quoted by l1 to get the orders sources said in case of sanctions against russian entities because of the ongoing war in ukraine the second highest bidder would get the order for manufacturing of trains after matching the price quoted by l1 five entities and jv have put their financial bids the bids are being evaluated and we have not yet awarded the contract said an official

Title: raise support price for cashew nut rane
Article: valpoi poriem mla deviya rane pitched for raising the minimum support price for cashew nurs stating that many families earnlivelihood on the crop rane said that cashew plantations occupy the largest area among horticultural crops in goa we must increase the minimum support price of cashew as many families in sattari pernem canacona and dharbandora primarily eke outliving on cashew production she said rane said that farmers deserve better returns as they toil hard in their plantations and stressed on increasing production using latest methods she was speaking at the one day district level seminar on cashew crop organised by the directorate of cashew nut and cocoa development board kochi directorate of agriculture goa through the sattari taluka darmers service co op society at valpoi recently the seminar was presided over by the director of research venkatesh hubali and director of agriculture nevil alphonso in the presence of valpoi municipal council chairperson shaizin shaikh deputy chairperson anil katkar zp member sagun wadkar pandurang gawas and zonal agricultural officer vishwanath gawas the seminar focused on planting and management of cashew plants

Title: ravi shankar prasad aam aadmi party is all about 3cs cut commission corruption
Article: feb 28 2023 07 38pm ist source toi in bjp leader ravi shankar prasad slammed the aam aadmi party aap and cm arvind kejriwal after manish sisodia and satyendar jain resigned as ministers cm kejriwal also accepted their resignations the move came after the supreme court refused to entertain delhi deputy cm manish sisodiapetition for quashing of the fir or in the alternative grant him bail from cbi custody in the excise policy case ravi shankar prasad saidused to think that cut and commission are the legacy of only one party but today it has to be said that 3c is also for kejriwal jiparty cut commission and corruption the bjp leader further slammed sisodia and kejriwal and said people who claimed to be flag bearers of the fight against corruption and used to announce names of corrupt and honest in public life have ensured governance which increases the number of alcohol users in delhi the supreme court today refused to grant any indulgence to one of the most prominent faces of the anti corruption movement led by anna hazare manish sisodia to go and suffer the consequence incourt of law

Title: djokovic says return to top spot more special after tough year
Article: djokovic finds another gear to down machac in dubai opener novak djokovic was made to work in his first match since winning the australian open last month needing three close sets to move past world no 130 tomas machac in dubai on tuesday

Title: wplgreat platform to learn from the experience of overseas players harmanpreet kaur
Article: edwards expects massive impact with inputs from pti new delhi with the inaugural edition of the womenpremier league set to commence from march 4 india and mumbai indians skipper harmanpreet kaur is confident that the competition will hugely benefit the domestic talents mumbai indians will kick start the much awaited five team competition against gujarat giants at the dy patil stadium in navi mumbai and the skipper said that rubbing shoulders against the best of womencricketers in the world will do wonders to the confidence of young domestic players harman pointed out that playing in wbbl and the hundred helped her gainlot of confidence and she expects that the wpl will help the india players insimilar way and will help unearth the hidden talents the wpl is great platform to know overseas players take something from their experience the amount of experience and confidencegot playing in wbbl and the hundredwant the young indian domestic players to get such the newly appointed mi womenteam skipper told media duringvirtual interaction it isgreat opportunity for them to spent time with overseas players the wpl will also personally provide me chance to havelook at some young talent from close quarters harmanpreet addedthink this wpl is great platform for all indian players we have been missing this tournament forlong time in australia the wbbl and the hundred in england has produced so many hidden talent after the wpl we are definitely going to get some great talents she said harmanpreet wants to take everyone together while leading mi to their maiden wpl title for me it is very important to be supporting each and every member and give chances to everyone give them equal responsibility and respect for us it isgreat platform to perform keep enjoying and backing each other she said asked if she would feel the pressure of donning the mi jersey while captaining the side the right handed batter replied not at all we are here to play cricket keep doing things which we enjoy and express myself the momentjoined mi the atmosphere was totally different first timeam experiencing this this is something we were waiting forlong time mi womenteam head coach charlotte edwards echoed similar sentiments and said the wpl is going to have massive impact on indian cricket the hundred is really special for womencricketonly expect wpl is only going to be bigger it is massive for india cricket make the indian team stronger for couple of years the former english cricketer said it is going to carve out unbelievable talent the tournament is going to make indiapowerhouse of womencricket for the next few years head coach edwards said they canwait to take the field on saturday we hadbrilliant first week we playedcouple of warm up games young indian talent looks exciting internationals have come in the last few days and we cant just wait to get started she said we havevery good coaching team we hadgood 10 days togetherfeel really ready and the players are ready to go we will focus more on team than individuals they are very clear what their roles are going to be

Title: olympic medallist sakshi malik threatens to quit wrestling
Article: image indiatop wrestlers have staged protests and are still awaiting the decision of the oversight committee photograph photograph anushree fadnavi reuters the wrestling federation of india finds itself in hot waters after wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh was accused of sexual misconduct and intimidation by the wrestlers following the accusations the wrestlers including indiatop stars took part inprotest as they demanded the removal of the president some notable names including bajrang punia sarita mor sangeeta phogat anshu malik sonam malik satywart malik and jitender kinha took part in the protests as the wrestlers wait for the decision of the oversight committee rio olympic medallist sakshi malik threatened to quit the sport if the decision went against them speaking to ani sakshi said if the decision does not come in our favour and president remains as it is then we will have to quit wrestling both me and vinesh have the same thinking sakshi who was present at the sports conclave held in kolkata said the decision of the committee should have come earlier despite the delay the olympic medallist believes the committee will rule in favour of the wrestlers the decision should have come by now but they need 10 more days time and we expectingresult in our favour because we musteredlot of courage before starting the protest we did this because we had enough of what we are going through over the years and we donwant future wrestlers to face what we faced said sakshi though the indian wrestler rued the delay in the decision sakshi went on to thank the work wfi was doingam happy with the progress andwant the decision to comebit faster because we want to be stress free and focus on our game because asian games are coming and we will have the trials for it so the main thing is that the result should come fast and they are doingfine job added sakshi we are fighting against suchstrong person and we cango through all that again we cango back and face the same thing again the tournaments the fights etc but why are you speaking negative we have never thought of losing this battle we are positive that it will come in our favour we are not doing anything wrong we are fighting fornew fresh start asserted sakshi meanwhile with womenday just around the corner the indian wrestler sharedspecial message womenday is not only for women but also the men because men havebig role to play behind those women who are working everyone should support their daughters sisters and wife for them womenday should be every day not just one single day and should encourage them to do what they want to do for their country signed off sakshi

Title: be vigilant ready for unpredictable future conflicts rajnath tells armed forces
Article: new delhi the armed forces must maintain high operational readiness along the borders with china and pakistan as well as the entire coastline while also focusing on futuristic capability development to effectively thwart emerging threats defence minister rajnath singh said on monday future conflicts will be unpredictable the constantly evolving world order has forced everyone to re strategize singh said addressing top naval commanders on board indigenous aircraft carrier ins vikrant off the goa coast constant vigil on the northern and western borders as well as the entire coastline must be maintained we need to be ready to deal with all future challenges he added with the navy standing firm and responsive in protecting national interests in the maritime domain its mission based deployments have also strengthened indiaposition as the preferred security partner of friendly foreign countries in the indian ocean region secure borders are the primary requirement to ensure social and economic progress the minister said while asserting that india under pm narendra modileadership is moving forward in amrit kaal with renewed thrust and zeal to achieve this objective emphasising that economic prosperity and security go hand in hand singh said the defence sector has emerged asmajor demand creator that is boosting the economy and ensuring the countrydevelopment in the next 5 10 years orders worth over 100 billion are expected to be placed through the defence sector and it will becomemajor partner in the economic development of the country he said today our defence sector is on the runway soon when it takes off it will transform the countryeconomy if we want to see india among the top economic powers of the world by the end of amrit kaal we need to take bold steps towards becomingdefence superpower he addedhuge country like india needs to be completely self reliant and not dependant on others for its security he said listing out various steps taken by the government to achieve atmanirbharta in defence these range from the notification of four positive indigenisation lists and increase in the fdi limit in the defence production sector to creatingfavourable environment for indian vendors including msmes and the earmarking ofrecord 75 of the defence capital procurement budget for the domestic industry in 2023 2024

Title: mukhtar ansari up govt demolishes illegal property of mukhtar ansarigang member in ghazipur
Article: up govt demolishes illegal property of mukhtar ansarigang member in ghazipur ghazipur uttar pradesh government on sunday removed illegal portions ofresidential structure belonging to deceased kamlesh singh pradhan who wasgang member of gangster turned politician mukhtar ansari in the ghazipur district the removal action was carried out amid heavy deployment of the police force the administrationcrackdown came amidst the state governmentongoing drive against notorious criminals and goons earlier last month up chief minister yogi adityanath during his address at the state assembly said that the up government will destroy the mafia nexus in the state mafiaon ko mitti me mila denge launchingscathing attack on samajwadi party for nurturing the mafia in the state cm had said the up government would destroy the mafia cm yogi also held the previous samajwadi party led government responsible for nurturing and patronizing criminals and mafia in the state the samajwadi party not only glorified the mafia during its tenure but also garlanded them he had said the chief minister also assured the house that the government would leave no stone unturned to act against mafias

Title: people are there for donkeyyears govt should implement sports code seriously says shooting coach jaspal rana
Article: amid the probe of allegations against wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh by top grapplers ace indian shooting coach jaspal rana has urged the government to implement sports code seriously saying that people are there for donkeyyears in the sports federations infreewheeling chat with ians the 46 year old and dronacharya awardee rana who is not only famous for his shooting skills but also has been someone who is not known for mincing words said that the government should shut the federations which donfollow sports code notably the national sports code was introduced to bring transparency and accountability to the functioning of national sports federations nsfs excerpts of the interviewam the victim myself didnprovide detail on it further see it is not about men or women it could be anyone whoever is wrong why only the federation it could be bureaucrats it could bepolitician it could be anybody who is involved in that sport should be handled inmuch better way we are talking about suchlarge population and we are coming up assports country now so if we can handle this thing right now it will be much better in future also follow the sports code see there isguideline which has been given by the government to follow the sports code just follow it there are certain rules which have been laid by the government first of all they should follow that get the federation on the right track and let there befair election if somebody sits in one place forlong time if you put water in one place which is the purest water it will get stale after some time but the water will be fine if it keeps flowing if somebody new will come then we will have new ideas we will be passionate to work so that should be the process no nodonreally think that onlysportsperson can dogood job anybody can dogood job but the person should be for the sports how are all the ips ias officers they have been in all the departments because they have giventask to improve that department and so is the politician all the politicians get selected by the people and after that they choose who is good for the particular ministry there might be somebody who has nothing to do with sports and becomessports minister but the sports minister is for sports and there isresponsibility given to the sports minister to improve the facilities and the environment of sports in the country thatgood enough so donsay that onlysportsperson can do wondershave seen the sportsperson destroying the sports federation there are people who just use the situation between the government and federation and take advantage of the entire situation and they are everywhere first make the given guideline strict shut down the federation everything will be fine when it will remain closed for one or two years there will be insults when you are not going to compete sports policy is here but they donfollow it

Title: behind amritpal rise deepening political vacuum widening governance gaps growing discontent
Article: the developments over the last few days seemed to be emblematic of what ails punjabmob led bywould be ideologue stormedpolice station in the border district of amritsar bringing back memories of the dark days of militancy and this happened onday when governor banwari lal purohit and chief minister bhagwant singh mann locked horns over convening of the assemblybudget session the aam aadmi party aap led state government finally approached the supreme court which rapped both the governor and the cm while expressing its disappointment over their actions for precipitating the row for long punjab has been trying to erase the memories of militancy while seeking to lower the heat over issues such as the division of river waters and the capital between punjab and haryana besides the demand for more autonomy now it is faced withdouble whammy as amritpal singh30 year old born again evangelist is not only raking up the khalistan issue but also harping on the stateinability to root out the menace of drugs ravaging its youth and to punish the guilty in the 2015 sacrilege cases the audacious takeover of the ajnala police station bylarge mob led by amritpal who returned from dubai six months ago is causing much consternation in the state it is also giving credence to voices that have been warning that the aap government is too inexperienced to governsensitive state like punjab while cm mann has held that not too much should be read into the ajnala incident the point remains that there seems to be discontent on the ground and that amritpal is feeding on it officials who support the let it take its course policy should know that punjab needs an administration that is both strong and sensitive while amritpalact of taking the guru granth sahib with him during the storming of the ajnala police station has angeredsizeable section of the sikh community which says it was tantamount to beadbi disrespect it has also emboldened him as he has got the support of anti social elements who now see him aspowerful leader capable of providing them protection from the police the self styled preacher who is fluent in english has attracted most of his following on the social media landed in the state amidstdeepening political vacuum the overcentury old shiromani akali dal sad which had always claimed to be the political voice of the sikhs has been in retreat in the wake ofstring of sacrilege and related police firing incidents during its tenure the radical outfits that have mostly worked within the framework of the constitution while keeping the demand for khalistan alive also appear to have run out of steam the congress appears to have been discredited and while the aap swept the february 2022 assembly polls bagging 92 of the statetotal 117 seats their legislators often face the charge of being lightweight with little sense of the statehistory or its political economy there has beengripe among the members of several higher education institutions that the stateyouth do not have anyone they can idolise armed with his fiery rhetoric centred onthree pronged pitch calling for drug eradication return topure form of sikhism and the need for khalistan due to injustices perceived or imaginary meted out to sikhs amritpal is trying to appeal to the gullible and disgruntled youth his focus on drugs and the largely unsubstantiated promise to cure addicts at his two drug rehabilitation centres is helping him expand the base of his followers advertisement at the same amritpalsudden rise has also sparked much speculation about his support system on the street people tell you agency da banda hai he is the product of an agency some say it could bebuild up to presidentrule but there are others who flag social media for fuelling his rise pointing out how he has been active on it for several years now stepping backlittle one would see that there were attempts to destabilise punjab during the initial years of the previous capt amarinder singh led congress government as well the national investigation agency nia had then said that the khalistan liberation force backed bypakistan agency had hatchedconspiracy to disturb the communal harmony in the state with eight targeted killings mostly of the bjp rss leaders between january 2016 and october 2017 its victims included rss leader brig retd jagdish gagneja and bjp leader ravinder gosai among others the punjab cms present and past have been complaining of drones from across the border supplying arms and drugs for over three years the centre has now decided to send an additional force of 18 crpf raf companies even as cm mann is makingbig push for its funds to modernise the punjab police advertisement however there seems to bereal fear in punjab about inimical forces trying to vitiate its atmosphere mahaul kharaab karan di koshish hai jitrader in amritsar says echoing similar views offarmer near the border there is no magic bullet for this situation but effective governance and focus on development byvigilant state working in tandem with the centre can keep such forces at bay

Title: rpf rpf constable held for molesting fgn woman in tejas express
Article: kanpurrailway protection force rpf constable jitendra singh accused of molestingforeign woman passenger in tejas express going from delhi to lucknow on thursday was arrested at the kanpur central railway station the constable posted at the central station rpf post was on security duty in the train during escort duty in tejas express he molestedforeign woman in the coach the grp swung into action on the complaint of the woman grp station in charge rk dwivedi said the accused constable jitendra singh has been arrested after being booked under relevant sections of ipc including molestation the foreigner had to go from delhi to agartala the incident happened in coach number one 1 of tejas express tnn

Title: andaman command chief for cbi probe into graft charges against military engineer services
Article: new delhi andaman and nicobar command anc chief lt general ajai singh has asked cbi to probe allegations of rampant corruption in the military engineer services mes establishment at campbell bay the move came afterregistered contractor sunil gupta uploadedvideo on youtube to allege that seven officials includinglt commander two other military personnel and three civilians were regularly taking bribes to clear bills the strategically located campbell bay houses naval air station ins baaz which is the southernmost airbase of the indian armed forces that overlooks the crucial malacca strait while also dominating the six degree channel in an unusual move through the twitter handle of the tri service anc lt gen singh said inmessage to our islanders that he had asked the cbi for an immediate inquiry into the allegations after viewing the video posted by guptahave repeatedly stressed to my command that financial probity is non negotiable at the anchave directed that all those named in the video will remain at their location till the enquiry is completed while honest persons need have no fear no dishonest person will be spared lt gen singh said

Title: rape accused escapes from jail threatens minor survivormom
Article: the victimidentity has not been revealed to protect her privacy as per supreme court directives on cases related to sexual assault varanasi an accused in minor girlrape case raju singh not only fled the district jail on saturday afternoon but also threatened survivormother over phone repeatedly till late night to withdraw the case additional commissioner of police santosh kumar singh on sunday said that after registering an fir against raju with lalpur pandeypur police station police teams including crime branch sleuths were formed for his early arrest complaint regarding threat to survivorfamily has also been included in the investigation the district jail officials who were unaware that raju had fled the jail till police contacted them on saturday evening swung into action to trace rajuwhereabouts officials said that during probe it came to light that raju somehow managed to get his hand stamped like itdone on visitors hands entering jail to meet prisoners concerned raju was arrested by police on charges of rapingminor girl and sent to jail on february 7 when police took him to produce before the court after his arrest he tried to escape from police custody however lawyers and other people present in district court compound caught him and thrashed him after which police took raju in custody again and sent him to jail in judicial remand as per police records six criminal cases are already lodged against raju who ishabitual criminal earlier he was booked infresh case after fleeing the jail raju had already started causing panic especially in the family of rape survivor by calling them with different numbers to threaten for withdrawing the case after that they reported the matter to police when they swung into action and sought details about raju from jail authorities when it could become clear that he was not present inside the jail jail authorities said that role of junior staff is being investigated to know how raju managed stamping on his hand like visitors

Title: eight cell phones seized from prisoners of colvale jail
Article: panaji duringsurprise search at central jail colvale eight cellphones chargers headphones and speakers among other such contraband items were recovered from the possession of the jail inmates inspector general of police igp omvir singh who has taken charge as ig prisons conducted the surprise raid along with irbn and central jail colvale officials the articles have been seized further action will be taken as per the jail manual police said singh issuedstrict warning of zero tolerance against such illegalities and directed all subordinate authorities to maintain strict vigil to curb such unauthorised activities in the central jail staff were also directed not to indulge in illegal activities and warned of strict action

Title: shiv sena mla will write to pm modi for removal of mughal emperor aurangzebgrave from aurangabad
Article: aurangabad shiv sena mla sanjay shirsat who owes allegiance to maharashtra chief minister eknath shinde on monday said he would write to prime minister narendra modi demanding that mughal emperor aurangzebgrave be removed from aurangabad city shirsat termed asbiryani partyprotest being held by the all india majlisittehadul muslimeen aimim against the renaming of aurangabad as chhatrapati sambhajinagarrelay hunger strike led by local mp imtiaz jaleel of aimim is underway at the district collectoroffice here since march 4 speaking to the marathi news channel abp majha shirsat claimed this is not an agitation butbiryani party and photos of this party have also gone viral muslims in aurangabad donhaveproblem with renaming but the people of hyderabad aimim have why do you jaleel haveproblem with the renaming of the city are youdescendant of aurangzeb aimim leader asaduddin owaisi goes to the aurangzebgrave and bows the sena mla said he said no day commemorating aurangzeb should be observed and the remains of the mughal emperorgrave should also be removed from aurangabadwould write to the prime minister with these demandswill also meet the police commissioner as jaleel is trying to disturb the peace and harmony in the city shirsat said the bjp led government at the centre has approved the renaming of maharashtraaurangabad city as chhatrapati sambhajinagar and osmanabad city as dharashiv aurangabad derives its name from aurangzeb while osmanabad was named after20th century ruler of the princely state of hyderabad

Title: man booked for secretly filming couples in cars in dehradun
Article: dehradun police booked31 year old man on charges of stalking and extortion for allegedly secretly making objectionable videos of couples in their parked cars near highways and then using the clips to blackmail them for money threatening to make the clips go viral if not paid the accused gurjit singh isresident of doiwala and works atmotor insurance company in dehradun inspector rajesh shah sho doiwala while confirming the development said that at least three victims have come forward to assist police in the probe after the case was registered under sections 354and 384 of ipc

Title: india can become 3rd largest world economy by skilling youth says pm modi
Article: ahmedabad prime minister narendra modi on monday said skilling the youth holds the key to india becoming the third largest economy in the world from the fifth now virtually addressingrozgar mela or employment fair organised by the gujarat government at the mahatma mandir convention centre in gandhinagar modi said nearly 1 5 lakh youth were given government jobs in the state during the last five years the pm emphasised on the need to createskilled workforce onlarge scale to tap growing opportunities in various sectors for the new opportunities being created in the country we need to create skilled manpower onlarge scale india can achieve the target of becoming the third largest economy only by skilling its youth he said india became the worldfifth largest economy last year modi said nearly 18 lakh youths received jobs through employment exchanges during the last few years in his home state of gujarat ruled by the bharatiya janata party bjp during the last five years the gujarat government gave jobs to 1 5 lakh youths moreover nearly 18 lakh youths received jobs through employment exchanges during the last few years in gujarat said the pm at the event attended by gujarat chief minister bhupendra patel more than 2 500 youths were given appointment letters

Title: electronics innovation undergoing change like minded nations should work together to shape future of tech mos it
Article: new delhi minister of state for it rajeev chandrasekhar on saturday said there isfundamental reset underway in semiconductor electronics and innovation world order post covid and like minded nations need to work together oncooperative framework to shape the future of technology to safeguard citizens from online user harm india has defined the boundary conditions of openness safety and trust as well as accountability for platforms and companies to operate on the indian internet the minister said and hoped that with global cooperation these principles will findwider play among other nations chandrasekhar was speaking atpanel discussion on democracyeleven protecting our technology future at the raisina dialogue 2023 toquestion on internet shutdown in india the minister said that the internet shutdowns as percentage of the total number of online users in india as also the diversity or enormity of content ecosystem is among the smallest in the world moreover any internet shutdown or content takedown is lawfully prescribed and lawfully ordered by the government in exceptional circumstances under the law the minister explained post covid clearly the digital supply chains value chains innovation ecosystem and critical technologies ecosystem are undergoingdeep structural change and while there is indeedre ordering of the world order in semiconductors electronics and innovation no country is going to be able to do this alonefew years ago we allowed insenseconcentration of these technologies and these products and the supply chains around certain economies we blindly believed in the global economic system or the global system of trade and we have realised post covid that those hopes or beliefs were not terribly sound sothink the first is that there is this re ordering of the semiconductor world order electronics world order and innovation world order that is underway he said the minister advocatedcooperative framework among like minded countries in shaping the future of technology sothink what we are proposing in india and we ve been steadily arguing for this for some years now is that among like minded countries there ought to be more ofco operative framework whether through that co operative framework or prism you look at future tech critical tech regulating the internet the rules and go no go areas he said the minister asserted the post covid new world requiresmuch more institutional framework in how nations approach technologies and the future of tech in particular that is what we are doing that is what we believe in and we are looking at this re ordered new world order in semiconductors electronics and critical technologies in terms of partnerships with like minded nations he said there is no difference between democracy and digital democracy and the fundamental values for physical world and cyberspace are the same he said the fundamental rights of our citizens are exactly what we transpose and expect to be implemented and available on the cyberspace on the issue of internet shutdowns andthink there is this narrative thatbeing put out there deliberately because the numbers seem large but aspercentage of the total number of internet users in india and the diversity and the enormity of the content ecosystem the percentage is among the smallest in the world the minister said the laws have lagged behind innovation and progress and growth of big platforms he said observing that governments across the world are trying to catch up with that lag over the last ten years certainly in india we are trying to catch up very fast chandrasekhar said the minister observed that the relationship between governments and tech and governments and the internet is undergoingtectonic change there iscorrection in the way governments are responding to platforms and what the platforms mean in terms of good as also user harm and other issues for many years innovation was left unregulated because it was innovation so you suddenly found afterdecade of being left alone we suddenly have to deal with the so called problems of big tech he said india he said has clearly set the boundary conditions for platforms to operate which is that internet should be open it should certainly not be like the chinese internet internet should besafe and trusted space he said citing the this is important given that 800 million indians are using the internet and the number is set to rise to 1 2 billion indians by 2025 26 so the internet beingsafe and trusted space is an article of faith andduty for the government to deliver to its citizens and the third is accountability principle that regardless of whether you rebig tech headquartered inparticular land or nation if you do business in india you have to be accountable chandrasekhar said certain casted obligations of platforms operating in india are prescribed and enforced through the it rules we have got nine categories of content and information that are absolutely no go areas for platforms and there iscasted obligation on them that if they want to enjoy the immunity and safe harbor under our laws from prosecution and continue to pretend that they are not publishers they have to do these comply with rules on one to nine content issues ranging from csam child sexual abuse material to misinformation at the other end of spectrum he said while there is that predictable conversation about whether or not it infringes on freedom of speech or privacy our contention is that we will protect the fundamental rights of indian citizens but at the same time we haveduty to maintain that internet issafe and trusted space for all indians he said

Title: magnitude 6 9 earthquake strikes kermadec islands in new zealand usgs
Article: an earthquake of magnitude 6 9 struck kermadec islands region in new zealand on saturday the united states geological survey usgs said the quake was atdepth of 152 km 94 miles usgs said the european mediterranean seismological centre earlier estimated the magnitude at 6 6 anddepth at 183 km no tsunami warning was issued after the quake thes tsunami warning system said

Title: short supply of hiv drug creates acute crisis in ne
Article: mumbaishortage of certain anti hiv medications has forced treatment centres to dispense paediatric formulations to adult patients in recent weeks asresult people living with hiv plhiv in several parts of the country including maharashtra are having to consume five pills per day to attain the necessary dosage as opposed tosingle pill the drug combination abacavir lamivudine al which is given as an alternative first line drug has been in short supply since february the shortage has affected several art centres across maharashtra but it has hit the north eastern states more acutely after the stocks didnarrive in february the maharashtra state aids control society msacs that had paediatric formulations of al in excess decided to give it to the adult patients to ensure they didnmiss out on treatmentstate official confirmed that in order to tide over the crisis they decided to start distributing the paediatric formulation as they had stocks of more than five months in northeastern states even pediatric formulations have been in short supply in children al is given as the first line of treatment vijay nayarmember of the ngo udaan stated it is unfortunate that drug stockouts have becomecommon occurrence due tothe procurement process not being completed on time it is not easy to consume so many pills every day several patients are also on other medication for other opportunistic infections he said he added the shortage of one drug or the other is invariablyproblem recently shortages of atazanavir ritonavir atvhave also been reported sources said the drug combination is being replaced with the new medicine dolutegravir the national aids control organisation naco centrally procures all hiv drugs which are then distributed to states that further send them to districts maharashtra state aids control society msacs officials have assured that the crisis will soon be over as the drug supplier has sent the drug to the warehouse and it will be distributed to all centres by monday

Title: cough syrup from india behind deaths of kids says us gambia joint probe
Article: new delhi ajoint investigation by the centers for disease control and prevention cdc us and the gambian health authorities has implicated contaminated cough syrups exported by an indian firm for acute kidney injury aki and deaths among children in the west african nation according tocdc report published on fridaypaediatric nephrologist alerted gambiaministry of health moh tocluster of cases of aki among young children at the countrysole teaching hospital on july 26 last year on august 23 2022 the moh requested assistance from cdc to assist them in characterising the illness describing the epidemiology and identifying potential causalfactors and their sources this investigation strongly suggests that medications contaminated withdiethylene glycol deg or ethylene glycol eg deg or eg imported into the gambia led to this aki clusteramong children the cdc said in its report that was published on friday the cdc report says their investigators reviewed medical records and interviewed caregivers to characterise patients symptoms and identify exposures the investigation implicated syrup based paediatric medications imported fromsingle indian manufacturer maiden pharma that had been administered to the children for aki and death according to the report on october 5 the world health organisation who had issuedmedical product alert which stated that the four drugs being supplied to gambia by maiden pharma were of substandard quality it also issued an alert claiming that the products were linked to the death of many children in gambia

Title: paris 2024 african olympic body supports russian belarusian participation at games as neutrals
Article: african olympic committees passedresolution on saturday supporting the participation of russian and belarusian athletes at the paris 2024 summer olympics as neutrals the international olympic committee ioc set outpath in january for russian and belarusian athletes to earn olympic places through asian qualifying events and to compete as neutrals with no flags or anthems athletes from those countries were banned from many international competitions following russiainvasion of ukraine but some international federations are now allowing them back following the iocguidance the association of national olympic committees of africa anoca passed its resolution followingmeeting in nouakchott mauritania with the bodypresident mustapha berraf saying it aligns with the position of the ioc the members came out unanimously in favour of the participation of russian and belarusian athletes in all international competitions anoca said instatement it will thus bequestion of allowing russian and belarusian athletes to participate in complete neutrality without any sign of identity in the paris 2024 olympic games politics cannot put pressure on sport and withdraw from it all its nobility values which revolve around peace unity and solidarity the athletes must in no case pay the heavy price ofconflict whatever it is and wherever it is advertisement ukraine and its eastern european and baltic neighbours are leading the call for russian and belarusian athletes to be banned from paris 2024 as long as russiatroops maintain their invasion of ukraine which moscow callsspecial operation belarus has beenkey staging area for the invasion in february more than 30 countries including the united states britain and france pledged their support for banning russian and belarusian athletes from international competitions ukraine has also threatened to boycott the olympics over russiaparticipation

Title: judiciary dealt with attempts at interference appropriately to ensure its independence former cji lalit
Article: kolkata former chief justice of india uu lalit said the judiciary has faced instances of challenge and attempts at interference but dealt with these appropriately to ensure its independence he said in order to havethriving democracy one must have an independent judiciary because it is through dispute resolution that society is assured of governance by the rule of law there are various challenges that the judiciary has to face today he said asserting therefore we have to be strong asjudicial fraternity we must bear every kind of pressure onslaught or any kind of interference speaking atsymposium on independent judiciary critical forvibrant democracy held by the bharat chamber of commerce here on saturday evening he said there have been instances of court decisions subjected to executive interference but these have been appropriately dealt with ensuring the independence of the judiciary the former cji said attributes of independence of the judiciary are impartiality fairness in action reasonableness and complete integrity for the purpose of dispute resolution noting that the citadel never falls except from within the former cji said this is the expression with which the district judiciary is to be protected lalit said the district judiciary is not under the control of anybody except the high court in the state all their postings promotions appointments and even transfers are supposed to be only at the recommendation of the high courts he said holding there should be no outside interference with the functioning of the judiciary he saidnumber of articles in the constitution ensure there is no interference in the functioning of every individual judge or the judiciary in general one way to ensure the independence of the judiciary is to have an atmosphere where the people responsible for discharging judicial functions must havesense of complete freedom and lack of interference from any agency he said the ex cji said the shoulders of the judiciary are quite strong to deal with any kind of external onslaught from any force supreme court judge justice hima kohli said the independence of the judiciary is not justprinciple butmoral imperative the relevance of an independent judiciary cannot be overstated especially incountry like ours which is not justdemocratic republic it has been described in the constitution assovereign socialist secular and democratic republic she said justice kohli said to discharge constitutional duties the judiciary must be independent and impartial it must be free from any external and internal influence she said maintaining that judicial independence is not justfacet of the fundamental rights of citizens but also an essential condition for maintainingvibrant and democratic social order she said the independence of the judiciary has been upheld by the supreme court inhost of landmark cases

Title: accountant siphons off rs 2 73 crore from clientdemat account in mumbai held
Article: with inputs from pti mumbai31 year old accountant working inshare trading firm in mumbai was arrested for allegedly siphoning off rs 2 73 crore fromclientaccount police said on sunday based oncomplaint lodged by his employer at mra marg police station in january last year the mumbai crime branch arrested the accused from the western suburb of kandivali on saturday an official said as per the complaintperson had openeddemat account through the share trading company and the accused had helped him with the same he said however the accused did not carry out any transaction in the clientaccount between 2019 and 2021 and siphoned off around rs 2 73 crore the official said the accused who had been on the run was apprehended based ontip off while another person involved in the crime is absconding he saidcase under section 420 cheating and other relevant sections of the indian penal code and information technology act has been registered the official added

Title: rahul gandhi on pegasus intelligence officers warned me to be cautious as my conversations were being recorded
Article: mar 03 2023 02 03pm ist source toi in congress mp rahul gandhi spoke to cambridge mba students at cambridge judge business school he accused the centre of of attacking the fundamental structure of the countrydemocracy he saidmyself had pegasus on my phonelarge number of politicians had pegasus on their phoneshave been called by intelligence officers who told me please be careful about what you are saying on the phone because we are sort of recording the stuff so this is the constant pressure that we feel cases on the oppositionhave gotnumber of criminal liable cases for things that should under no circumstances be criminal liable cases thatwhat we are trying to defend

Title: mann cong to boycott mann sad says henot fit for top post
Article: chandigarhday after cm bhagwant mann and leader of opposition partap singh bajwa argued over the vigilance bureau functioning the congress legislature party decided to boycott mann in the house for his alleged threatening posture against the opposition mlas the sad too opposed the cmbehaviour in the house and inmemorandum to the governor claimed that he was not fit to sit on the chair of chief minister bajwa told the speaker after mondayunfortunate incident we thought the cm will havelarger heart and saym extremely sorry ifhave hurt someonesentiments but there has been no word from him the congress will participate in the deliberations in his absence we have come since the cm is not present right now the congress mlas walked in at the start of the zero hour later when mann arrived to join the resumed discussion on the motion of thanks on the governoraddress barring sukhpal singh khaira they all left khaira wanted to rebut the charges of minister kuldeep singh dhaliwal but left in protest after being unable to speak on monday mann and bajwa had sparred over the functioning of the vigilance bureau amid unruly scenes the house had to be adjourned briefly and the congress mlas abstained from the rest of mondaysession sad also demandeddetailed inquiry into the alleged threats received by the editor ofvernacular newspaper and highlighted how the state government was allegedly trying to suppress the freedom of press by denying advertisements to the print media and barring reporters from covering the assembly proceedings

Title: cbi deported from fiji pearls group director in cbi net
Article: new delhi the cbi has arrested harchand singh gilldirector of the pearls group who was deported from fiji in connection withmulti crore ponzi scam allegedly orchestrated by his company gill hadred notice issued against him by the interpolspecial cbi team had earlier gone to suva in fiji to bring gill back sources said according to cbi over rs 60 000 crore was siphoned by the company which gill was associated with asdirector the agency had started the investigation against the pearls group and its founder nirmal singh bhangoo on february 19 2014 on the allegations of cheating over five crore investors by offering them land in return of their investments cbi officials said that gill hadnon bailable warrant issued against him byspecial court which was followed byred corner notice gill being the director and shareholder of pgfpearls group company was alleged to be present in the board meetings where all the important decisions were taken gill allegedly conspired with other directors of the company to operate the collective investment scheme illegally without any statutory approval these schemes were running illegally and both the companies were allegedly engaged in fraudulent activities including forgery in their day to day operationscbi spokesperson said after registeringcase in february 2014 the cbi had conducted searches at the office premises and residences of directors in delhi jaipur rajasthan chandigarh punjab and haryana which had led to recovery of huge records and data relating to deposits from public and diversion of funds besides other incriminating documents investigation also revealed that the accused fraudulently diverted the alleged funds collected under the aegis of jaipur based private company for purported investment in australian companies it was also alleged that 132 99 million aud approx was found to have been diverted to australian companies the cbi spokesperson said the investors had not allegedly received any land allotment letter from the company and almost all the investors to whom the company had allotted the land were unpaid he said adding that most of the land was either non existent or government land or not sold by the owner the arrest comes as part of operation trishul launched by the agency to bring back fugitives who have fled abroad the operation aims to geo locate proceeds of crimes and fugitives with the help of interpol and bring them back around 30 fugitives have been successfully brought to india under the operation since its launch last year officials said

Title: bains khaira trade barbs over singapore training
Article: chandigarh school education minister harjot singh bains and congress mla sukhpal singh khaira on tuesday hadheated exchange in the house over the criterion for sending school principals for training in singapore later khaira got intospat with panchayats minister kuldeep singh dhaliwal it began when khaira raised the issue sayingthat as the criterion was changed it led to suspicion of favouritism bains responded by saying khaira could also visit singapore along with the third batch of principals triggeringheated exchange between the two bains said they needed to have at least five years of remaining service and should have already served the same period but the number of applications was less and to givechange to young principals so the period of service was reduced to two years there is no favouritism none of them is related to me it is his habit to spread misinformation with his tweets said bains to which khaira responded with mind your language when the speaker asked khaira if it was his tweet the latter replied he bains can get an fir registered against me by approaching the cyber cell later dhaliwal said he had met mp balbir singh seechewal regarding land wherecow shelter was being run and that he was willing to hand it over to the state the congress alleged illegal possession over the land by the two aap mps by seechewal and ashok mittalhave examined both the cases he also raised the issue of alleged illegal possession of land in khairavillage an agitated khaira suggested that the house set uppanel to look into the possession of the three pieces of land if even an inch of panchayat land is linked to mewonenter this house personal allegations have been made he said

Title: 24 year old nri from canada killed in brawl in punjabanandpur sahib
Article: rupnagar punjab24 year old nri from canada was killed inbrawl during the hola mohalla festival at anandpur sahib in punjab police said on wednesday pardeep singhnative of village gazikot in gurdaspur district was visiting anandpur sahib on monday singh hadfight with niranjan singhresident of nurpurbedi in rupnagar over some issue singh sustained serious injuries in the clash and later died the accused niranjan also sustained injuries and was undergoing treatment at the post graduate institute of medical education and research in chandigarh the police said senior superintendent of police vivek sheel soni said singh had come to india in february from canada singh hadpermanent residency in canada soni said further investigation in the matter was underwaycase under sections of 302 murder and 34 acts done by several persons in furtherance of common intention of the indian penal code has been registered against the accused

Title: devender singh babli official says haryana minister devender singh babli misbehaved but contractor backs minister
Article: fatehabadmunicipal engineer me of tohana municipal council has accused haryana development and panchayat minister devender singh babli of misbehaving with him duringmeeting at his residence in bidai khera village in fatehabad district three days ago however on tuesdaycontractor came to the ministerdefence alleging that the engineer was demanding rs 2 lakh as graft from him to passrs 50 lakh billletter has gone viral on social media written by municipal engineer ramandeep who has urged higher authorities to transfer him out of tohana municipal council to any other station contractor anit kumar said he engineer had demanded rs 2 lakh for passing his rs 50 lakh bill and the minister instructed him for payment only but the official refused to he said the engineer also told the minister that he will not clear the bill and he could transfer him if he wanted to babli did not return calls

Title: elon musk says hi instagram was down but memes soared
Article: stories in mocktale are works of fiction intended to bringsmile to your face they bear no connection to events and characters in real life disclaimer this iscompilation of tweets being shared by netizens around the world times of india neither condones nor endorses any of the views shared in this article here meta platforminstagram was down for thousands of users globally on wednesday according to outage tracking website downdetector com more than 46 000 users reported issues with accessing the photo sharing platform in the united states at the peak of the outage according to downdetector which tracks outages by collating status reports fromnumber of sources including user submitted errors on its platform downdetector showed about 2 000 affected users from the uk and more than 1 000 reports each from india and australia several indian users also reported that the social media platform was down for them in the morning downdetector reported that thousands of users were facing issues while accessing the social network in india the reports started to spike around 7 am with over 2 000 users lodging complaints the outage went on forfew hours when users were unable to access the platform before the services were restored while the platform was down memes soared as users vented their frustrations via creativity someonereally happyawwexclusiveboom

Title: pushpendra pal prof pp singh passes away at 53
Article: bhopal pushpendra pal singh former hod of journalism at makhanlal chaturvedi national university of journalism passed away due tocardiac failure on monday night he was 53 singh was givenfinal farewell at bhadbhada vishramghat on tuesday cm shivraj singh chouhan offered his condolences pushpendra pal singh ji was likefriend and family to me his untimely demise is my personal lossqualified simple and diligent personality who fulfilled whatever responsibility was given with excellence senior congress leader kamal nath tweeted pushpendra pal singh hadunique place in mp journalism and public relations union minister jyotiraditya scindia also condoled singhdeath mp agriculture minister kamal patel paid floral tributes at bhadbhada vishramghat hundreds of singhstudents senior bureaucrats government officials and others were also present pp sir as he was fondly called was guru togeneration of students when broadcast print and new media studies were the new rave asteacher singh stood out not only for his imposing figure but one who went beyond the call of duty to chalk outcareer path for manystudent fordecade the name makhanlal university and pp singh were inseparable he moved away from the university around 2015 and was appointed osd to the chief minister in the public relations department

Title: iran us blacklists chinese firms supplying drone parts to iran
