Article: patiala seeking written assurance from the government on providing requisite grants to punjabi university the protesting students on friday said they would intensify their stir and start agitation within classrooms the protesting students and faculty members have got support from various farm and labour unions they also took outprotest march inside the campus we would continue the agitation till the government assures in writing to provide the adequate grant to the university which has been facingfinancial crisis said the students the students have also put up posters near the protest site with crossed pictures of aap leaders including chief minister bhagwant mann the posters also read ban on entry of aap leaders in the university till assurance of grants by the government three days ago the students insymbolic protest had begged for funds vice chancellor punjabi university prof arvind had earlier claimed to have heldmeeting with punjab finance minister harpal singh cheema principal secretary to cm principal secretary finance and principal secretary higher education in chandigarh on monday he had claimed that the state government as per universitydemand had assured him of providinggrant of rs 30 crore per month to the institution however the students wantwritten assurance from the government the government should have revised the university grants announced in the budget they announced only rs 164 crore grant for punjabi university whereas the institution had sought rs 360 crore to run the operations for the financial year 2023 24 the state run university was also facing rs 150 crore liabilities said the students

Title: ajit pawar hits out at bjp mlcnirma powder remarks in maharashtra legislative council
Article: mumbai leader of opposition ajit pawar raised strong objection to bjp mlc ramesh patilremarks in the state legislative council on thursday that any leader who joined the bjp would emerge clean because they had nirma washing powder which came from gujarat patil had spoken in the context of shiv sena ubt leader subhash desaison bhushan joining the eknath shinde led shiv sena it had earlier been alleged that bhushan faced charges of profiting from the sale of midc plots speaking in the state legislative council patil had said people are saying bhushan desai joined the bjp because there isrs 400 crore file against him he has come here to seek justice we have nirma washing powder which comes from gujarat the people who come to us become clean pawar said the common man is watching all these statements the other daybjp leader said he sleeps peacefully at night because he is now in the bjp what kind of impression are you creating pawar also tookdig at bjp mla atul bhatkalkar who had accused bhushan desai of corruption just three months ago you had accused him ofrs 3 000 crore scam in the conversion of midc land to residential land now he has joined the eknath shinde camp and you are not saying anything he has suddenly become clean said the senior ncp leader bhushan desai joined the shiv sena last week his entry wasmajor embarrassment for the shiv sena ubt because his father subhash desai the former industries minister is close to uddhav thackeray

Title: two delivery executives thrashed over not having loose change in delhirajouri garden
Article: with pti inputs new delhi two delivery executives of the online grocery firm blinkit were allegedly beaten up by some people in west delhirajouri garden over not having loose change police said on saturday the incident happened on friday they said according to the police the two delivery agents aman and gurpal singh of online grocery store blinkit were physically assaulted bycustomer when they went to delivergrocery order at his house singh in his statement alleged that he went to tarun surihouse to deliver an order worth rs 1 655 suri started misbehaving with them over not havingchange of money deputy commissioner of police west ghandhyam bansal said following this three to four people thrashed the delivery executives the dcp said we have issued necessary support and cooperation to the authorities to aid their investigation the safety and well being of our delivery partners is of utmost importance to us we have taken immediate action to provide healthcare support and loss of pay for the affected delivery partner to ensure they have all they need to prioritise their recoveryblinkit spokesperson saidcase under sections 295a deliberate and malicious acts intended to outrage reli gious feelings of any class by insulting its religion or reli gious beliefs 323 punishment for voluntarily causing hurt 341 punishment for wrongful restraint 427 mischief causing damage to the amount of fifty rupees and 34 common intension of the ipc was registered and an investigation was taken up police said the accused persons have also levelled allegations against the delivery agents of misbehaving with the women present in the house they added

Title: sandeep sandeep enters opposition exits
Article: cm manohar lal khattar chandigarh heated arguments between opposition and incumbent party mlas which led towalkout by the opposition marked fridayproceedings of haryanabudget session the statebudget session resumed after 21 days on friday the first walkout was by congress mlas led by leader of opposition lop bhupinder hooda after minister of state mos sandeep singh who is accused of sexual harassment bywoman coach entered the house congress mlas while objecting to his presence sought his ouster from the assembly hooda and other mlas had an argument with bjp mlas which intensified when cm manohar lal khattar and speaker gian chand gupta tried to defend sandeep all this began with deputy leader of opposition aftab ahmed asking the speaker if he had allowed sandeep to enter the house or had given him the clean chit as arguments proceeded and speaker gupta tried to divert the issue hooda himself soughtstatement from sandeep on whether he had surrendered the department by choice or was stripped off it after this gupta claimed that the cabinet portfolio allocation was the prerogative of cm only geeta bhukkal the congressjhajjar mla then accused gupta of shielding sandeep this led to arguments between gupta and congress mlas gupta even said that allegations were often levelled against people but could not be proved in many cases in case members have any issue related to any member they may give it in writing he said khattar who too was present in the house asked gupta to expunge the discussions on this issue from proceedings of the day congress mlas took exception to this and stagedwalkout sandeep had skipped all sittings ahead of presentation of budget while attributing poor health the second walkout was after arguments erupted between abhay singh chautala and gupta on the issue of formerquestion on the issue of farmers debt in fact chautala claimed to have asked the details about debt taken by farmers from all banks cooperative minister banwari lal however provided details of loans taken from just cooperative or haryana government banks as abhay got aggressive the speaker tried to correct him and defended yadav this too led to arguments hooda joined the debate too later khattar defended lal by saying that since the question was addressed to him hence he could only reply about cooperative banks even as the issue was yet to die down abhay posed three more queries with khattar saying that the query needed time for departments to reply and speaker saying that the departments concerned and ministers will given written reply to him in 15 days abhay got upset and he walked out

Title: himachal pradesh to be made green energy state by march 2026 cm
Article: shimla having given the slogan of vyavastha parivartan system change chief minister sukhvinder singh sukhu in his maiden budget speech majorly focused on making himachal pradeshgreen energy state by march 31 2026 he said that his government will take effective steps by taking measures for the exploitation of solar energy in addition to hydropower to meet this objective he said thattarget of starting new solar energy projects withcapacity of 500 mw has been set in 2023 24 he also announced plans to develop 5 green corridors for the electric vehicles in the state the chief minister said that with an objective to make himachal pradeshgreen state his government has also decided that himachal pradesh will be developed asmodel state for electric vehicles he said that use of electric vehicles will be encouraged inphased manner to reduce carbon emissions with the collaboration of private and public sectors he said thatsubsidy of rs 25 000 each would be provided to 20 000 meritorious girl students above the age of 18 years studying in government institutions to purchase electric scooty this will not only encourage girl students to pursue higher education but will also help to develop himachal pradesh asgreen state he added he said that in the first national and state highways including parwanoo nalagarh una hamirpur dehra amb mubarakpur sansarpur terrace nurpur paonta nahan solan shimla parwanoo solan shimla rampur peo pooh tabo kaza losar shimla bilaspur hamirpur kangra nurpur banikhet chamba mandi jogindernagar palampur dharamshala kangra pathankot and kiratpur bilaspur mandi kullu manali keylong zingzingbar will be developed as green corridor for electric vehicles he said that the government will developpublic transport system with the help of electric vehicles in the coming years as this will substantially reduce dependence on fossil fuels for this he announced that the private bus operators will be givensubsidy of 50 percent with the maximum limit of rs 50 lakh for purchase ofbuses he said that the private truck operators will be givensubsidy of 50 percent with the maximum limit of rs 50 lakh for purchase oftrucks he said that his governmentefforts will be to reduce air sound and all other types of pollution in order to develop himachal pradesh as green state for this emphasis will be on replacing maximum diesel buses of the himachal road transport corporation withbuses in the coming years himachal road transport corporation is plying 75buses and 50taxis currently in the state he announced to replace 1 500 diesel buses of hrtc with electric buses inphased manner and expenditure of rs 1 000 crore is proposed for the purpose in the first phasenewbus depot will be set up in nadaun and shimla local depot will be converted intobus depot inphased manner

Title: uttarakhand new education schemes focus skill building
Article: gairsain several new projects included in the state budget of uttarakhand government for financial year 2023 24 focus on encouraging education supporting meritorious students and skill development under the mukhya mantri pratibha protsahan yojanaprovision of rs 11 crore has been kept in the budget to provide scholarships to students under the utkrisht cluster vidyalaya rs 51 crore has been allocated under the pm shri project of the new education policy the state has keptprovision of rs 92 7 crore for scholarship to students for higher education the government has reservedfund of rs 10 crore also rs 2 crore has been allocated for creation of research and development cell in the higher education department to promote new concepts skills and industrial ideas the government has madeprovision of rs 7 11 crore speaking about some more projects finance minister prem chand aggarwal said similarly we have keptrs 5 crore provision under the state scholarship scheme rs 15 crore for giving cycles to meritorious girl students rs 25 62 crore for scholarship for sc students above classrs 11 69 crore for scholarship scheme for sc students for class ix andbesides we have been running many schemes which aim to promote education among scs sts and rural pockets

Title: cji govt takes supreme court seriously sensitive to infrastructural demands cji chandrachud
Article: new delhi cji dy chandrachud on friday said that the union government takes the supreme court very seriously and has acceded to its rs 7 000 crore demand forcourts project and judicial infrastructural needs without cutting evensingle rupee even as other departments suffered cuts in budgetary allocations the government takes the sc very seriously we madedetailed project report on rs 7 000 crore budgetary estimate forcourts and judicial infrastructural needs the government sanctioned the entire amount and didncutsingle rupee from what we demanded other departments suffered budgetary cuts said the cji who was heading the bench comprising justices sanjay kishan kaul and ps narasimha his remark came duringhearing onpetition filed by sc bar association seekingdirection to the union government for consideringproposal for acquisition of land and buildings in scvicinity to create chamber space for thousands of advocates when scba president vikas singh raised the acute need of chambers for its members many of whom are waiting for it for decades similar claims were made by sc advocates on record association scaora women advocates and bar council of india creatingcacophony lawyers are part of the institution if the sc passes judicial orders it will give rise todisquiet that judicial powers are being used to further its own interest trust the court to take up lawyers needs with the government on administrative side the bench said the cji said we canbulldoze the government with our administrative needs the tradition is to engage on administrative side we will engage with the government about the infrastructure needs of advocates

Title: ohio pre dawn shooting at ohio nightclub leaves 2 dead 4 wounded
Article: columbuspredawn shooting atcolumbus night club left two people dead and four wounded ohio authorities said officers responded shortly after 5m saturday to an after hours club called tha plug on the citysouth side emergency dispatchers said one person died at the scene and another was dropped off at nationwide childrenhospital and was later pronounced dead dispatchers said two other victims were taken to ohiohealth grant medical center and two more to the ohio state university wexner medical center authorities said there was no immediate word on their conditions the ages of the victims and other details werenimmediately available no arrests have been reported

Title: cbi arrests police head constable for accepting bribe in kathua
Article: jammu the central bureau of investigation cbi on saturday arrestedhead constable posted at women police station kathua red handed while taking rs 3 000 bribe fromcomplainant an official said the arrested head constable has been identified mushtaq ahmed presently posted at womenpolice station in kathuacomplaint was lodged with cbi jammu and kashmir wing alleging therein that accused demanded rs 5 000 forfavour incase registered at womenpolice station kathua said officials quoting the complainant it was further stated that the amount was negotiated at rs 3 000 an officer said following the compliantcase was registered in this regard the official said addingtrap was laid and the accused was caught red handed while demanding and acceptingbribe of rs 3 000 the official added they added that the accused was arrested on the spot with bribe money and will be produced in court for further action

Title: conclave 2023 sachin tendulkar recalls hilarious harbhajan singh story
Article: the big focus of this episode of newstrack is on the karnataka assembly election results and its impact on the national picture so what impact could the karnataka assembly poll results will have on 2024 lok sabha elections watch as panelists discuss this and more on the show

Title: probe paid parking fraud penalise guilty adviser to mc
Article: spl panel meet today chandigarh as the defaulting amount of over rs 6 crore by former paid parking contractor and fake bank guarantee of rs 1 60 crore have rattled the municipal corporation ut adviser dharam pal has asked the civic body to probe the matter in detail and penalise the guilty it ismatter of grave concern that suchhuge amount of government money has been cheatedhave asked the municipal commissioner fordetailed and thorough investigation and strict action against the guilty it is very significant to identify the lapses such things cannot be ignored at any level and not repeated pal told toi the chandigarh police are probing the fake bank guarantee case and have arrested one accused the parking matter remained the centre of discussion during the recent held monthly general house meeting of the mc besides opposition municipal councillors councillors of bjp too spoke on the issue the members of the house had even asked for files related to the matterfinallymeeting of the special committee of municipal councillors constituted in the general house of the mc by the mayor will be held on fridaynotice for the meeting issued on thursday said the meeting will discuss the issue regarding submitting of fake bank guarantee by pashchatya entertainment private limited on account of allotment of paid parking

Title: class 9 student stages own kidnapping in upsitapur to buy an iphone
Article: lucknowstudent of class 9 staged his own kidnapping in sitapur to buy an iphone with the ransom that he planned to collect from his father he took the step after his father who ownssmall garment store expressed his inability to buy him the phone the minor however ran out of luck once police started investigations into the case and traced his location to his friendhouse the boy had used his friendphone to makeransom call demanding rs 5 lakh from his father sitapur kotwali sho tp singh said that the boy studies ingovernment school and lives with his father as his mother had died when he was just one when the student did not return home after school on wednesday his father and other relatives startedmanhunt later around 8 30 pm they gotransom call on whatsapp for rs 5 lakh the amount had to be delivered at khairabad nearmosque said singh after the father informed the police cops cyber and sog teams of the district got on the case we assured the complainant about his sonrescue andteam in civvies was attached with him while he was collecting the amount for the safe release of his son said the sho by 11 pm the police had zeroed in on the location of the mobile phone used for the ransom call when the mobile phone ownerfootwear shop owner was questioned it came to fore that the phone was used by his son who was alsostudent of class 9woman police officer was asked to confront the class 9 student who spilled the beans later another team traced the missing child from his house said the sho the boy was handed over to his father after counselling

Title: vehicle in former pakistan pm imran khanconvoy meets with accident
Article: new delhivehicle in former pakistan prime minister imran khanconvoy met with an accident on saturday while heading to islamabad in connection withhearing of the toshakhana caselocal court in islamabad is set to resume hearing of the toshakhana case against imran khan who avoided arrest despiteprotracted effort by law enforcement personnel to apprehend him for skipping multiple previous hearings taking to twitter khan said it is now clear that despite my having gotten bail in all my cases the pdm govt intends to arrest me imran reiterated that the governmentplan to arrest is part of the london plan to finish all cases against the countryformer premier nawaz sharif meanwhile according to reuters imran has formedcommittee to lead the party in case he is arrested khan the 70 year old chief of the pakistan tehreekinsaf pti party is scheduled to appear before the court of additional district and sessions judge adsj zafar iqbal to attend proceedings on the complaint filed by the election commission of pakistan ecp for allegedly concealing details of gifts in his assets declarations accompanied byconvoy of his party workers the pti chief departed from his residence in zaman park lahore and is en route to islamabad stringent security measures have been put in place outside the judicial complex in islamabadg 11 where imran is expected to arrivelarge contingent of police has been deployed to the area to provide security for khan who survived an assassination attempt in november last year with agency inputs

Title: joshimath 19 houses with cracks sealed
Article: dehradun the chamoli district administration has sealed 19 houses in sinking town joshimath over the last week these structures had earlier been declared unsafe and dangerous byteam of the central building research institute cbri six more buildings are in the process of being sealed district magistrate himanshu khuranna told toi after receivingrequest for settlement money we conductedsurvey of the houses to ascertain their valuation before disbursing the compensation we havededicated staff of engineers who are engaged in the valuation of the affected houses till march 17total 21 families in joshimath have been givensum of rs 5 12 crore as final rehabilitation package under the rehabilitation and resettlement policy passed by the state cabinet last month according to the district administration as percondition laid out in the joshimath rehabilitation policy passed by the cabinet the houses are sealed only after owners voluntarily apply for the final compensation and enter into an agreement with the administration to hand over ownership of the properties to the government joshimath sdm kumkum joshi said that so far 27 families have approached the administration to have their homes sealed and applied for compensation these include the families that have already received compensation the numbers are likely to increase in the days to come an official said notably residents in joshimath have been protesting against the governmentunclear rehabilitation policy around 300 families living in shelter homes in the town who have had to move out of spacious homes into cramped spaces said they donknow for how long they ll be here residents have also questioned how businesses that were closed down will be compensated and what will happen to the livestock left behind the government is working on building alternative prefabricated structures at pipalkoti and other nearby areas and has offered to pay the rent for the first few months to the displaced residents who wish to move to other accommodations in the recently announced budget the state government earmarked rs 1 000 crore for relief and rehabilitation operations in joshimath and other land subsidence areas in the state

Title: 30 passengers from colombo mistakenly dropped off at domestic arrivals of bengaluru airport
Article: bengaluru insignificant security lapse at the kempegowda international airport kia in bengaluru 30 passengers who arrived from colombo were mistakenly dropped at the domestic arrivals gate on friday the passengers who were dropped off at the domestic arrivals bus gate instead of the international arrivals bus gate at the bengaluru airport travelled onsri lankan airlines ul 173 flight according tospokesperson of bial bengaluru international airport limited on march 17 30 passengers who travelled on sri lankan airlines ul 173 were erroneously dropped at the domestic arrivals bus gate of blr airport instead of international arrivals bus gate these passengers entered the domestic baggage claim area the bial spokesperson said however the terminal operations team rushed to the scene where the cisf and immigration were alerted of the mishap the terminal operations team along with cisf central industrial security force and immigration were alerted and the passengers were immediately moved to the international arrivals for immigration after that the passengers proceeded to the international baggage claim area the bial spokesperson added bial stated further thathuman error was responsible for the situation at the airport that ultimately caused the confusion however corrective measures are being taken

Title: harpreet dirty political game by govts jathedar giani harpreet singh on crackdown in punjab
Article: amritsar akal takht officiating jathedar giani harpreet singh on tuesday said the state and central governments were playingdirty political game like three decades ago by the then governments inmessage harpreet said the government was trying to create an atmosphere of panic in the state rumours are being spread due to the internet shutdown as people are not getting correct information he said adding that all these acts were creating instability in punjab beingborder state stability is the most important in punjab for that governments have to talk to sikhs and resolve their issues said harpreet he said it was worrisome that sikh youth as young as 16 and 17 years old were being apprehended he added that the punjab government should clarify its position on what was happening in the state

Title: cctv footage shows how amritpal singh escaped watch
Article: as the hunt for pro khalistani fugitive amritpal singh enters day 4 india today has accessed exclusive cctv footage that shows how the radical leaderconvoy escaped inmercedes his convoy had three cars meanwhile punjab police suspects amritpal singh might have crossed the state borders after his clothes and an abandoned car were found on monday the police said amritpal singh got down frommercedes and fled to shahkot inbrezza later the waris punjab de chief changed his clothes and might have escaped from punjab on the motorbike of one of his aides

Title: hc slams punjab govt for failing to arrest amritpal singh seeks status report from police
Article: the punjab and haryana high court termed the escape of radical sikh preacher amritpal singh as intelligence failure of the statepolice you have 80 000 cops how did amritpal singh escape the punjab and haryana high court asked the punjab government on tuesday and termed it as intelligence failure of the statepolice the court also asked punjab police to submitstatus report on the operation against radical sikh preacher amritpal singh the courtremarks came even as the police is taking action against members of amritpal singhoutfit waris punjab de also read crackdown on amritpal singh forces working against india wonbe spared says punjab cm advertisement amritpal singh however has managed to evade an arrest do far he gave the policeslip and was last seen speeding away onmotorcycle on saturday evening in jalandhar punjab crackdown the punjab government had launchedmajor operation against the separatist preacher and have arrestedlarge number of his supporters so far amritpal singhuncle harjit singh and two other aides were flown to assam on tuesday on sunday his other four arrested associates were also taken to dibrugarh central jail the seven men have been charged under the national security act nsa which allows the police to detain suspects in any prison across the country the operation was reportedlycoordinated effort between punjab government the centre and assam government according to various reports punjab chief minister bhagwant mann had discussed the plan to arrest amritpal singh with home minister amit shah inmeeting on march 2 home ministry sources told ndtv that amritpal singh was planning to launchstate wide procession to baptize the youth to carry out suicide attacks and was using de addiction centres to stockpile weapons illegally sourced from pakistan the centre seems to be moving in to take over the case asterror investigation withfresh fir citing the arms act against amritpal singh mannwarning meanwhile bhagwant mann said that strict action will be taken against those who have been trying to disturb peace and harmony in the state punjabpeace and harmony and countryprogress is our priority we will not spare any force working against the country people of this state want peace and progress mann said adding no incident of violence has been reported after the crackdown against the khalistani leader the suspension of mobile internet and sms services will continue in parts of punjab tarn taran ferozepur moga sangrur and amritsarajnala till thursday noon haryana also is on high alert also read punjab mobile internet services partially restored amritpaluncle moved to dibrugarh jail the massive crackdown against the khalistani leader comesmonth after amritpal singh and his supporters broke intopolice station in ajnala with swords and guns for the release of one of his aides six policemen were injured in the clash

Title: sarabjot singh clinches air pistol gold in shooting world cup
Article: indiasarabjot singh won the menair pistol gold in the issf pistol rifle world cup here to open the host countrymedal account on the first day of competitions on wednesday it was double delight for india as teenage shooter varun tomar also baggedbronze sarabjot the 2021 junior world champion in the team and mixed team categories defeated azerbaijanruslan lunev 16 0 in the gold medal match in the first final of the world cup the 21 year old sarabjot was in awesome form all through as he emerged leader at the end of the qualification round with 585 points sarabjot singh of india wins gold in men10m air pistol on the opening day of the issf world cup in bhopal india pic twitter com 0f98qukuvc indianshooting com march 22 2023 sarabjot was hitting the bulls eye every time he took aim with his scores of 98 97 99 97 97 97 in the six qualification series suggesting he would be hard to beat chinaliu jinyao wasclose second at 584 six other shooters jason solari switzerland 583 points vladimir svechinko uzbekistan 582 frederik larsen denmark 580 zhang jie china 580 ruslan lunev azerbaijan 579 and varun tomar india 579 completed the list of eight marksmen who made it to the ranking round in the ranking or elimination round sarabjot continued to excel while 19 year old varun after qualifying eighth and last began his superb recovery at the end of the ranking round sarabjot 253 2 points and ruslan 251 9 were first and second respectively and both of them entered the gold medal round high on confidence while varun scored 250 3 to settle for bronze advertisement however in the battle for the top podium place the azerbaijan shooter was no match for sarabjot the gold medal match wasrace to 16 points and sarabjot was simply unstoppable winning 16 0

Title: attempts being made to malign akali dal badal in open letter
Article: bathinda five time punjab cm parkash singh badal wrote an open letter to all punjabis on monday alleging deep rooted conspiracy to malign the akali dal by registering an attempt to murder cases against him in the kotkapura firing incident everyone should stand up against such conspiracies he wrote saying that punjabis have contributed immensely in the independence movement by making sacrifices and also made the nation self sufficient in food grains he said the sad fought against pm indira gandhioppressive regime during the emergency but when it comes to getting our rights the yardstick is changed we had to get the state after many struggles but failed to get our capital and our waters were also snatched he wrote nowhave completed 70 years in service to people and crossed the age of 95 during all thisfaced many ups and downs faced oppression for the sake of panth and punjabis spent the better part of my life in jails and also got the chance to serve punjab as its chief minister for five terms tried to do justice with everyone respected everyone despite their religion or faith and ensured peace and communal harmony in the state ensured many developmental works and constructed monuments including virasatkhalsa my life is like an open booknever even can think of conspiring against panth or punjab butam sorry to say that during my government some ugly incidents happened it wasserious conspiracy against peace and communal harmony in punjab during this period some law and order issues too came to the fore which were unfortunatedo feel thatthorough probe should be done to get to the bottom of such happenings earlier congress and now the aap government is playing politics over it what could be worse than that the present punjab government headed by bhagwant mann is being run by arvind kejriwal from delhi and has slapped an attempt to murder case on me it is sheer vendetta he wrote

Title: wala punjab congress action to ensure less crowd at moose wala barsi
Article: mansa punjab congress president amrinder singh raja warring leader of opposition in state assembly partap singh bajwa and party mla sukhpal singh khaira while attending the barsi of sidhu moose wala questioned the timing of the operation to nab waris punjab de head amritpal singh we want amritpal to be arrested for his actions but the timing of the action against him was chosen to sabotage the death anniversary of moose wala the state government wanted to deflect attention from back to back interviews of gangster lawrence bishnoi from jail and expectation ofhuge gathering at moose walabarsi the government by indulging in such tactics cannot supress peoplevoice said the congress leaders while speaking to media

Title: lookout issued against amritpal singh earthquake shakes afghanistan pakistan north india more
Article: punjab police issuedlookout circular loc against khalistani separatist amritpal singh the punjab policehunt for the waris punjab de chief entered the fifth day on wednesday meanwhilemajor earthquake of 6 6 magnitude struck afghanistanhindu kush region on tuesday strong tremors were felt in pakistan and parts of northern india according to the united states geological survey the epicentre of the quake was in afghanistanjurm atdepth of 180 kilometres

Title: punjab assembly to debate war on drugs today
Article: chandigarh as part of the budget session the punjab legislative assembly will havetwo hour debate on the statewar on drugs on wednesday the treasury benches also plan to moveresolution against the himachal governmentordinance to impose water cess on hydro projects and seek withdrawal of the decision saidsource the assembly session will resume afterbreak due to the20 events which had been organised in amritsar last week and close on the heels of the state wide operation undertaken to crack down on waris punjab de and its supporters chief minister bhagwant mann will also moveresolution to request the centre to name the upcoming international airport at halwara in ludhiana after freedom fighter kartar singh sarabha the punjab government has opposed himachalmove to impose water cess on hydro projects on the plea that it would put an additional financial burden on the state and the decision was against the inter state river water disputes act 1956

Title: pb internet shutdown causes glitch in income flow remote work education
Article: chandigarh it was raining in chandigarh on monday afternoon and asha pawacontractual employee with an online food delivery service had to return home to her two children without getting any sales because her internet wasnworking there was no internet in the area sowas unable to take orders even yesterdaygot lost while delivering an order as the connection was disrupted the order was delayed she said asha says she usually makes rs 2 500 to rs 3 000 from deliveries on weekends most of which is spent on petrol for her two wheeler this weekend though she could only earnfew hundred due to the state wide internet shutdown in punjab which has also affected mobile internet in chandigarh asha is the sole bread winner in the family the punjab government has now extended the shutdown to tuesday noon describing the current shutdown in punjab asgross violation of civil liberties raman jit singh chima asia pacific policy director at access nownon profit organisation dedicated to safeguarding digital civil rights of people said the shutdown in punjab is particularly troubling as the entire population has to suffer because ofperson andsmall group it is the less privileged who have to suffer the most restaurant businesses have also been affected due to the shutdown while most restaurants have wi fi delivery partners cantake bookings as they are dependent on mobile internet hunny who runsrestaurant in mohali says usually he receives about 600 700 food orders on the weekends but this weekend almost no orders were booked those whose work is dependent on mobile internet ran huge lossescab driver in mohali one of whose children is doing bds and the other is preparing for neet saidhave to spendlot of money on the childreneducation anddepend on my daily earning ascab driver to run the house this internet shutdown has landed me inprecarious position the internet shutdown took most by surprise as people were not preparedmohali resident said she had to walk in the rain as she wanted to bookcab but could not

Title: manu bhaker to lead india in issf world cup
Article: star female shooter manu bhaker will leadstrong indian field at the international shooting sport federation issf world cup rifle pistol beginning on wednesday it is the first ever shooting world cup stage to be held in india outside new delhi and the menand women10m air pistol finals are scheduled on the opening day three indians each will be in contention for medals in both the events while sarabjot singh varun tomar and sumit raman will go first among the men rhythm sangwan divya ts and bhaker will be in contention among the women the event was officially inaugurated ingrand opening ceremony by shivraj singh chauhan chief minister of madhya pradesh here at the kushabhau thakre international convention centre among the dignitaries present was luciano rossi president issf the men10m air pistol event has24 strong field while the women have 19 vying for the coveted issf world cup medal with both the reigning world champions liu jinyao men and lu kaiman of china in the fray

Title: jdappoints new presidents in 10 organisational districts in bihar
Article: patna jdon monday appointed new presidents in the remaining nine districts where organizational elections could not be held in november last year due to various reasons including gross irregularities in the election process the party has 51 organisational districts in bihar and it announced the election of district presidents for its 42 organisational districts on november 23 last year the election of district presidents in the remaining nine organization districts madhepura muzaffarpur sheikhpura rohtas aurangabad muzaffarpur nagar darbhanga nagar katihar nagar and begusarai nagar were postponed due to different reasons jdstate president umesh singh kushwaha on monday nominated new presidents for these nine districts while former minister ramesh rishideo was nominated as the partydistrict president of madhepura former mla randhir kumar soni sheikhpura former mla ashok kumar singh aurangabad ram babu kushwaha muzaffarpur ajay kushwaha rohtas anupam singh muzaffarpur nagar madhaw jha darbhanga nagar mukesh kumar katihar nagar and sanjay singh was nominated for begusarai nagar districtpress note issued by the party state president said the jdstate president also nominated mohammad arshad as new president of nalanda district the post was vacant after the death of its last president siya sharan thakur in january this year jds then state election officer janardan prasad singh on monday said the election of muzaffarpur district president was postponed due to the ongoing by election in kurhani assembly constituency while the elections in other eight organizational districts were postponed due to complaints of large scale irregularities by the respective district election officers he said the party had formedthree member committee headed by former mlc haroon rashid to inquire into the complaints of irregularities in the eight organizational districts

Title: lone inld mla barred from haryana assembly for day
Article: chandigarh ellenabad mla abhay singh chautala was barred from the haryana assembly proceedings on monday over alleged unparliamentary behaviour there were heated arguments between him and speaker gian chand gupta during the question hour when the lone inld mla sought to know whether the government had taken any steps to raise the level of groundwater in the dark zones an area where the groundwater level has fallen considerably he askedsupplementary question seeking details of the money spent on the upkeep of ponds and their beautification the speaker intervened and asked him to putseparate question on the issue he was raising in his supplementary question however the mla started arguing with the chair asking whether the latter had any takleef problem with him asking the question as the speaker asked abhay to refrain from using unparliamentary language chief minister manohar lal khattar intervened saying the argument with the chair was disrespectful to the entire house abhay retaliated by blaming the speaker instead gupta asked the inla mla to either take back your words or leave the house when abhay did not respond the speaker saidname abhay singh chautala your behaviour is unparliamentary during question hour you can ask supplementary questions but you cannot argue with the chair speaking to media persons later abhay allegedcalculated conspiracy by the ruling bjp jjp government to prevent him from raising the voice of common men he even accused the congress of indirectly supporting the government during the zero hour and discussion on budget congress mlas launchedscathing attack on the bjp jjp government former clp leader kiran choudhry termed the budget as rahu kaal budget while former minister geeta bhukkal said it wascomplete bundle of liesfigure game fudged by cm manohar lal khattar

Title: punjab top cops to face action for 2022 breach in pm narendra modisecurity
Article: chandigarh the punjab government has finally decided to initiate disciplinary proceedings formajor penalty against former dgp siddharth chattopadhyaya then dig ferozepur range inderbir singh and then ssp ferozepur harmandeep singh hans forbreach in the security of pm narendra modi during his punjab visit on january 5 2022 inmajor security lapse the pmmotorcade had remained stuck onflyover on the moga ferozepur highway for nearly 20 minutes as the farmers were protesting against his visit the letter sent by the punjab home affairs and justice department to the personnel department on monday evening mentioned that the chief minister has decided to seek explanations from then adgp law and order naresh arora then adgp cyber crimenageshwara rao then ig patiala range mukhwinder singh chhina then ig counter intelligence cum aslo and nodal officer rakesh agrawal then dig faridkot surjeet singh and then ssp moga charanjit singh as to why disciplinary proceedings should not be initiated against them as recommended by the supreme court constituted inquiry committee headed by retired sc judge indu malhotra since the committee had also raised questions about the role of then chief secretary anirudh tewari the state government has decided to issue himshow cause notice seeking an explanation the committee had on august 25 2022 submitted its report to the sc indicting nine officers for the colossal failure in planning and coordination now the state government will issue chargesheets to then dgp chattopadhyaya then dig ferozepur inderbir and then ssp ferozepur hans and appoint an inquiry officer to givehearing to all officers indicted by the inquiry committee at the time of the security breach the then cm charanjit singh channi had claimed that there was no security lapse

Title: constable dismissed for criminal activities
Article: indorepolice constable was dismissed from service for carrying out criminal activitiescase was registered against him at kshipra police station three days ago for lootingman by throwing chilly powder in his eyes he is alsohabitual offender and has ten cases against him at various police stations additional commissioner manish kapooria said that they had receivedcomplaint against constable jitendra from one mukesh on saturday that the accused had thrown chilly powder on him and made away with rs 10 000 cash from him acting on the informationcase was registered against the accused constable jitendra rathore under section 394 of robbery police said that it was found that there are over 10 cases of violence and others registered against him at various police stations and had been using his power aspoliceman to hurt people acting on increasing number of complaints and cases against him jitendra was dismissed from duties under section 311 2of the constitution tnn

Title: 2 cousins on bike fall into canal in southeast delhi body of one found
Article: new delhi two men who were cousins drowned when they fell intocanal in southeast delhimolarband extension on sunday after their speeding motorcycle lost balance an eyewitness who saw the duo falling into the canal said that the bike was moving athigh speed and jumped overspeed breaker and lost balance police fire tenders and divers afternearly 24 hour hunt fished out the body of one manhunt for the other is still on according to police on the intervening night of saturday and sunday the badarpur police station gotcall that reported the possible drowning of two persons the caller informed the cops that two men had fallen incanal and were drowningteam including the station house officer sho and staff immediately reached the location and foundmotorcycle bearingdelhi number on the bank of the canal opposite atal park in the badarpur area the two men were identified as rahul 32 and hemender singh 30 both residents of molarband extension rahulbody was found on monday rajesh deo the deputy commissioner of police south east said the duo were on their motorcycle and were coming from theblock side towards atal park there the motorcycle got disbalanced and they fell into the canal passers by saw them drowning and tried to save them but to no avail the crime team disaster management team ambulance and divers were called in deo added that effort was made to fish out the bodies around 4 30pm the body of one of them was foundsearch is under wayfire tender five divers from the disaster management team an ambulance and an sho with sufficient staff are present on the spot for the search deo said hemender was working inprivate company in noida as an assistant in hr department he was married and hadfive month old daughter rahul worked aslab technician in the radiology department ofhospital he is unmarried and living with his parents and brother omender singh hemenderfather stated that his son and nephew rahul had gone to meetrelative nearby and were returning home when the accident happened he was my only child he is survived by his wife and five month old daughterjust want some help for themgot to know about the incident after people reached our house after tracing the address as the bike belonged to my son rahulbody has been recovered buthope they find my sonbody too omender said

Title: vaid disproportionate assets vb quizzes ex mla for 6 hours
Article: ludhiana the vigilance bureau ludhiana range quizzed former congress mla from gill constituency kuldeep singh vaid for over six hours in the disproportionate assets case at its office on mondaybureaucrat turned congress leader vaid reached the vb office at 11am and he was questioned till 5 30pm an official of vigilance bureau ludhiana range said vaid has been questioned related to his properties and other assets vaid cooperated with officials during questioning he added he will be summoned again next week he has been asked to bring documents related to his properties investments and bank accounts meanwhile the vb will get details related to vaidproperties from the revenue department ludhiana improvement trust and municipal corporation details of which are awaited after examining the details that we expect to receive soon from the departments and documents submitted by vaid the vb may reach some conclusion the official said on march 13 the vb ludhiana range had conductedraid at kuldeep vaidresidence in posh sarabha nagar areatechnical team from vb headquarter had reached there for evaluation of properties and assets owned by vaid during this raid the bureau team found bottles of imported liquor and liquor meant for sale in chandigarh from his house though vaid and his councillor son harkaran singh vaid had two permits to possess liquor the quantity of bottles was more than the permitted limit therefore an fir under excise act was lodged against vaid thereafter on march 14 the vb team had conductedraid atcommercial building owned by vaid on pakhowal road which is given on rent tobankhotel andrestaurant and bar during the raid the bureau had found that the map of the building approved only two floors of the building whereas the building has five floorsreport on the same has also been sought from the municipal corporation the vb so far got details of nine properties owned by vaid vaidwife has retired asprincipal fromgovernment school while his son harkaran singh vaid is congress councillor

Title: morcha morcha digs in pitches tents at sohana crossing
Article: mohali members of qaumi insaaf morcha qim refused to vacate the traffic crossing at singh shaheedan gurdwara in sohana here on the airport road on the third day of their protest in support of khalistan sympathiser amritpal singh despite rainfall on monday the protesters pitched tents showing their intentions to dig in forlong haul even as cops strengthened security in and around the protest site mohali ssp sandeep garg said we have cordoned off the site the protest is peaceful at the moment diversions have been made and the protest spot declared out of bounds round the clock vigil is being kept on the protesters traffic is being diverted around 500 metres from the crossing on both sides the yps crossing is already closed to public since january 7 within hundreds of morcha activists stationed at the site forfew weeks the dividing road of sectors 52 and 53 had remained closed for vehicular traffic before it was thrown open last week

Title: udaipur raid news udaipur cops arrest over 750 criminals in raids over past 2 days
Article: jaipurday after the major crackdown against criminals associated with various gangs udaipur police arrested 408 more criminals on monday senior police officers of rajasthan police headquarters on monday stated that the outcome of these raids will further fetch good results in crime prevention and maintaining better law and order in the state earlier on sunday massive raids were conducted at 350 places in 7 districts and 367 persons were arrested the raids were conducted in churu sriganganagar bikaner udaipur sirohi pali and jodhpur rural districts it has been found in the investigation that ashish bishnoi aide of lawrence bishnoi was mainly into providing shelter to the shooters and others who had committed the crime on the behest of bishnoi he has also emerged asfinancer of lawrence bishnoi said om prakash inspector general of police bikaner range he added that another accused hari om ramawat an aide of rohit godara had introduced ritik boxer to godara he was into alluring teenagers and youngsters into crime and isclose aide of rohit godara prakash added he further stated that interrogation of various accused arrested by the bikaner range was underway dinesh mn additional director general adg crime said that the arrests of 367 criminals who are directly or indirectly associated with various gangs will fetch the police good results in crime prevention and maintaining better law and order they would be quizzed on their supply chain of arms who is controlling them and whose orders they are following also we will keep on organising similar raids across the state to break the nexus he added

Title: crop ruined by hail farmer dies from shock
Article: i want it mumbaiway backstreet boys back in india after 13 years city

Title: new zealand olympic runner zane robertson slapped with eight year ban
Article: new zealand middle and long distance runner zane robertson who competed at the rio and tokyo olympics has been banned for eight years for doping and interfering with the testing process the sports tribunal of new zealand said on wednesday the 33 year oldbronze medallist in the 5 000 metres at the 2014 commonwealth games received one four year ban for testing positive for the banned substance erythropoietin epo and another for tampering with evidence robertson tested positive for epo which stimulates red blood cell production and enhances performance in endurance events at the manchester great race in may 2022 advertisement scroll to continue mr robertson elected to have hissample tested and this confirmed the original result he subsequently accepted the presence of the prohibited substance but asked to be heard in relation to sanction stnz said inmedia release mr robertson filed evidence which was contested by drug free sport new zealand dfsnz and which led to the allegation of tampering the release said robertson is banned from competitive sport until september 2030 having been credited for time served underprovisional suspension put in place after his positive test last year

Title: have to make it punjab again not afghanistan bhagwant mann
Article: chandigarh punjab chief minister bhagwant mann invideo message in punjabi on friday assured that his government would not let anyone cause unrest in the state mann reiterated that it was his responsibility to ensure that peace and communal brotherhood is maintained and we want to make the state punjab again and not afghanistan the chief minister said some self proclaimed religious leaders who have nothing to do with the state and its people want to disturb its peace and amity but such evil designs will not be allowed at any cost and they will be givenbefitting reply he said we want to see laptops international medals and appointment letters in the hands of our youth they cannot be treated as raw material for factories set up in the name of religion it is the age of learning and progress and we have to move with time mann said it was easy to give sermons of taking up weapons to the sons of other families but such preachers run away when they are faced with the harsh reality emphasising that the sole motive of such leaders was to disturb the hard earned peace of the state through their venomous ideas he pointed out that they were highly mistaken if they thought that they could divide people on communal lines because the peace loving punjabis would thwart any such attempt dwelling on the need to educate the coming generations to make them self reliant the cm saidwant to assure the 3 crore people of the state that the state will help you in your progress mann added that aap knows how to form the government and also to run the statewant to assure punjabis that they should retain their faith as it gives me immense encouragement he said

Title: will rallyists be booked under nsa asks bjp
Article: raipur the opposition bjp in chhattisgarh criticized chief minister bhupesh baghel overprotest rally taken out in support of waris de punjab chief amritpal singh and asked whether they would be booked under the national security act nsa releasingphoto of harpreet singh randhawa alias rinku randhawa with congress leaders former minister and bjp spokesperson rajesh munat expressed apprehension that congress was conspiring to spoil the atmosphere of chhattisgarh before the upcoming assembly elections he alleged that the congress government is trying to disturb law and order in chhattisgarh by giving protection to khalistanis he shared randhawasocial media profile and photographs describing his closeness with senior congress leaders and questioned the relationship between randhawa and the chief minister of chhattisgarh munat said that the congress government recently asked its collectors to book those trying to take law and order into their hands under nsa and now it must clear its stand on what he termedpro khalistan rally the congress hit back at bjp for questioning cm baghelstand congress spokesperson dhananjay singh thakur said that the union home ministry should reply on howperson who came to india from dubai six months ago and carried out anti national activities managed to escape as far as chhattisgarh is concerned the rule of law prevails here national security is of utmost priority for congress the bjp at the centre can only take action against opposition leaders thakur said adding that the state government is taking strict action in this case

Title: amritpal singh khalsa news punjab human rights organisation demands investigations into arrival rise of amritpal singh
Article: amritsar while refusing the accept the police theory of amritpal singh absconding from high police security the punjab human rights organisations phro has demanded an investigation byretired judge of the high court into his sudden arrival in punjab from dubai issuances of armed licences to waris punjab de activists stoic silence made by police over amritpalkhalistan rhetorics and his sudden rise also see amritpal singh live updates phro principal investigator sarabjit singh said that the whole episode appears to bedubious one and now the unprecedented delay in the arrest of amritpal has raised further suspicions of some unseen forces working behind the whole incident which should be investigated while stating that police were showing only february 18 cctv footage to the media he asked why did the police not procure the cctv footage after february 18 or was it deliberately not showing for the reasons best known to the police not arresting amritpal when he went to ajnala from his native village jallupur khera on february 23 and instead of arresting him from his home and launchingmanhunt had raised several questions on the incompetence of punjab police or the hidden forces behind the whole operation he opined he said if the reports of amritpal being traced in haryana were correct then it wascomplete incompetence of punjab police ordeliberate and planned strategy to allow him to run to break his aura in public eyes especially among those who had been following him and involved him in more cases meanwhile senior superintendent of police pathankot harkamal preet singh khakh said that they had laid nakas on the interstate borders with chamba and kangra in himachal pradesh and kathua in jammu and kashmir each naka hasstrength of 25 police personnel who are on round the clock duty to keepcheck on every interstate border movement said khakah beingsecond line of defence he said they had also laid eight strong nakas on the roads leading to the indo pak international border in pathankot district ashok rattan superintendent of police of nurpur in kangra district of himachal pradesh said they had strengthened the security on nurpur pathankot border at kandwal and neelwan borders and had made an extra deployment to monitor the borders round the clock similar security arrangements have been made by the chamaba police near chamba pathankot areashighly placed source in the border security force bsf said that they had also strengthened the security on the entire belt of 553 kilometers of indo pak international border in punjab despite heavy security arrangementsperson inadvertently crossed the border to pakistan from near rattan khurd border out post of bsf in the amritsar sector on march 22 and was held by pak rangers near their gs wala post however he was handed over to bsf on the same day the initial investigation revealed that the inadvertent border crosser was sailesh resident of ballimaran bhopal madhya pradesh

Title: ncb destroys contraband observes drug disposal day
Article: chandigarh the narcotics control bureauchandigarh zonal unit observed drug disposal day on friday wherein seized narcotics were destroyed in the virtual presence of union home minister amit shah amanjit singh irs zonal director ncb said the event was observed at rainbow environments private limited at mohali during this event ncbchandigarh unit burnt 211 75kg poppy straw poppy husk powder 5880 tablets of diphenoxylate 4 78kg of heroin 6 1kg of charas which were seized by the ncn czu in 9 cases of the year 2022 today various zones of the ncb simultaneously conducted disposal of drugs throughout india namely bangaluru delhi chandigarh cochin jodhpur patna indore zones the union home minister minister of cooperation amit shah addressed the regional conference on drug trafficking national security for southern states uts at bengaluru karnataka others present on the occasion included mohinder jit singh assistant director rajneesh dsp crime chandigarh police varinder singh superintendent dri chandigarh meera kumari meena superintendent and other officials of ncb chandigarh unit

Title: jammu couple held over amritpal singh links
Article: the jammu and kashmir police on saturday detainedcouple for alleged links with one of the aides of radical outfit waris punjab de chief amritpal singh police said that the couple was detained froms pura area amrik singh and his wife paramjit kour were handed over to punjab police they have been detained for having reported links with papalpreet singhclose aide of amritpal singh an official said the couplemobile phones have also been seized for further investigation the matter is being investigated by punjab police and they will be questioning the couple sources said earlier district magistrates of kishtwar and ramban districts had cancelled arms licences of two bodyguards accompanying pro khalistan sikh leader amritpal ians

Title: manu bhaker ends 2 year medal drought shoots bronze at issf world cup
Article: aishwary tomar finished fourth in the men50m rifle during the issf world cup rifle pistol competition held at madhya pradesh shooting academy in bhopal on saturday bhopal it wasdouble delight for indian pistol shooter manu bhaker on saturday she won indiasixth medal in the issf world cup bhopal stage and ended her senior international medal drought of two years she won the last internal medal in delhi 2021 china continued their domination with yet another gold medal while cairo gold medallist aishwary pratap tomar had to settle on fourth position china has won 6 gold medals so far 2 silver and 2 bronze india are in second position withgold 1 silver and 4 bronze while germany is in third position withgold andsilver medal on the penultimate day the first event wasdisappointment for home favourite aishwary in the men50m air rifle 3p after securing top spot in the 60 shot qualification round withscore of 591 he appeared to have lost the rhythm in the finalswas not under any pressure but things did not go in my way said aishwary in the bronze medal match swiss 3p specialist jan lochbihler edged out home aishwary in the top eight ranking round he finished the 40 shot round withscore of 407 4 while aishwary courtesy three five shot series in the 40s in the final standing position finished withscore of 405 5 chinadu linshu won the gold defeating hungarypeni istavan 16 10 in the gold medal match in the women25rapid fire pistol manu bhaker third withscore of 584 and esha singh seventh withscore of 581 qualified for the ranking rounds in the presence of packed spectators gallery both esha and manu were in the first ranking match alongwith germanydoreen vennekamp and xiong yaxuan esha could not make it to the medal match as she stood third with 11 hits out of 20 while manu with 14 hits secured place in the medal match manu changed her gear in the medal match as she gavetough fight to chinadu ziyuewas trying to be consistent in scoring the points said manu the intense battle began after both manu and ziyue tied on 14 hits each manu 20 hits tried to fight well and scored well but that was not enough as ziyue 22 hits found better than her the indian had to settle withbronze it wasgood contestam happy to win the medal for the country and will try to change the colour next time said manu in the gold medal match doreen facedtough battle against ziyue this could be gauged from the fact that doreen touched the yellow metal with 30 hits out of 40 against ziyue29 hits finals of women3p and menrapid fire pistol will be played on sunday

Title: issf world cup rifle pistol bhopal varun rhythm win mixed pistol silver rudrankksh narmada claim rifle bronze
Article: shooting india now has one gold silver and two bronze medals in the competition china won both the gold medals on competition day two of the international shooting sport federation issf world cup rifle pistol bhopal even as india picked upsilver and bronze each at thep shooting academy range here in the outskirts of the city reigning men10m air rifle world champion rudrankksh patil andnarmada nithin won bronze in the 10m air rifle mixed team competition while in the daysecond event varun tomar and rhythm sangwan won silver to bolster indiamedal haul to one gold one silver and two bronze medals china on the other hand lead the standings with three gold and two bronze medals with azerbaijan germany and hungary winningsilver medal each thus far rudrankksh and narmada win bronze in 10m air rifle mixed team event in the dayfirst medal event the 10m air rifle mixed team the indian duo of rudrankksh and narmada shotcombined 632 in qualification to finish third and thereby qualify for the bronze medal match against chinazhang qiongyue and yu haonan who finished fourth in the 19 strong field with the same combined score in the bronze medal match however both rudrankksh and narmada were in their elements presentingsolid grouping to beat the chinese pair 16 8 in what wasmuch closer match than the score line suggests both the pairs did not shootsingle shot below the 10 mark in what was shooting of the highest order the high point came in the sixth series when both rudrankksh and narmada shot perfect 10 9s speaking after the match narmada said there was pressure obviously but then we hadreally good match the competition was so good and we quite enjoyed it rudrankksh said there was no lack of motivation even if they did not win gold we were just asked to focus on our process and if we would have got gold we would have been motivated but the bronze motivates us even more to do better next time he said both india and china had entered two teams in the mixed team air rifle while the second chinese team of huang yuting and sheng lihao won gold defeating hungarians istvan peni and denes eszter 16 2 inone sided final the second indian duo of hriday hazarika and tilottoma sen shot 628 1 in qualification to finish ninth indian sports live coverage on khel now varun wins his second medal in bhopal in the second and final medal event of the day indiavarun tomar and rhythm sangwan went down 11 17 to chinaqian wei and liu jinyao in the 10m air pistol mixed team gold medal encounter it was varun tomarsecond medal of the tournament after his bronze winning effort in the individual air pistol on day one in the initial stages of the final it looked as if the chinese pair would run away with it but the indians madestrong comeback going from 15 7 to 15 11 before the chinese clinched the 15th series to seal gold earlier in qualification qian and liu had topped the nine team field withscore of 586 while varun and rhythm came second with 581 rhythm shared her thoughts after the match saying we all try our best and keep our best foot forward and silver ismedal as well of course gold would have been great but we are both happy that we gotsilver medal and we will try better next time varun too was philosophical on missing out on gold saying we try our best and try to make ourselves better and we believe whatever happens it is for the best divya ts and sarabjot singh the second indian team in fray missed the bronze medal match bypoint finishing fifth withscore of 574 competition day three competition day three friday again has two finals on schedule the 10m air rifle men final begins at 11 15am while the 10m air rifle women final is slated for 1 30pm qualifications begin from 9 00am for more updates follow khel now on facebook twitter and instagram and join our community on telegram

Title: gritty kaur samra clinches 50m 3p bronze as anjum moudgil fails to impress in shooting wc
Article: indiaupcoming shooter sift kaur samra came up with an inspired performance to clinch her second senior medal at the international level beatingtough field to win the 50m rifle 3p bronze on the penultimate day of the issf rifle pistol world cup here on sunday onday when china continued their domination with zhang qiongyue winning gold in the event samra the reigning national champion scoredtotal of 403 9 points in the ranking round to finish third even as zhang 414 7 points and czech republicaneta brabcova 411 3 entered the title round in the gold medal round zhand defeated her czech rival 16 8 india are currently second on the medals table behind china with one gold one silver and five bronze medals samra added to the bronze medal she had won last year at the world cup in changwon china all eyes were on world championships silver medallist in air rifle anjum moudgil in the preliminary round of the 3p event but samra was indifferent zone on sunday shooting superb series in all three positions to emerge second best at the end of the qualification round withscore of 588 samra shottotal of 194 99 95 in kneeling positionperfect 200 in prone 100 100 and 194 in standing 97 97 while anjum slipped to 17th withscore of 583 the third indian manini kaushik barley missed the eighth and last qualification spot on the count of inner 10s advertisement samra 21 who had some of the best scores in the trials held in new delhi ahead of the world cup had three awful standing rounds in the ranking match which allowed zhang and brabcova to race away to the top while the indian did well in kneeling position 102 2 51 7 50 5 and prone 103 4 51 8 51 6 her standing scores let her down she came up with an average 50 4 in the first standing series but thereafter her scores went down further and she managed just 196 3 50 4 49 0 49 2 and 49 7 in that position to end up with bronze

Title: amritpal singh sandhu news haryana woman baljit kaur held for providing shelter to amritpal singh his aide
Article: 02 19 probe reveals amritpal singh waris punjab de received foreign funds worth crores 00 56 no hard proof against amritpal presumptions by intel agencies simranjit singh mann shahabad kurukshetra innew development in connection with the case of wanted waris punjab de head amritpal singh the kurukshetra police in haryana handed overwoman of shahabad town to punjab police on thursday on suspicion of providing shelter to the pro khalistan leader and his associate papalpreet singh at her residence the woman has been identified as baljit kaur who lived in sidharth colony of shahabad markanda town of kurukshetra district kurukshetra superintendent of police surender singh bhoria said baljit kaur was in contact with papalpreet singh it is suspected that papalpreet and amritpal stayed at baljithouse in siddharth colony of shahabad for one night on march 19 sunday the sp said as it iscase of punjab police we provided all the required support and handed over the woman to jalandhar police for further investigation during preliminary investigation baljit who did not know amritpal revealed that her contact papalpreet and with him amritpal stayed at her place said sp bhoria toquery about the womanoccupation the sp said she is educated but is presently free at her home we are in constant touch with punjab police and providing them all the inputs to assist them in their investigation we are also obtaining the feeds of cctv cameras said sp kurukshetra punjab police had launchedmassive cordon and search operation against amritpal singh and his associates in shahkot area of jalandhar on march 18

Title: manipur to ink deal with aiff to set up football academy
Article: imphal in order to groom young football enthusiasts in the state and develop and promote the game further manipur will signmemorandum of understanding mou with the all india football federation aiff for logistics and other support to set upfootball academy addressingpacked khuman lampak stadium during the inauguration of the tri nation international tournament on wednesday evening chief ministerbiren singhformer footballer himself said it is indeed very fortunate for manipur to host the tri nation international tournament and alsomoment of pride that the national team consists of five to six players from the state talking about the deal biren said it will be signed in imphal when aiff president kalyan chaubey attends the closing match of the ongoing tournament at the stadium expressing his gratitude to aiff the cm appreciated chaubey and his team for acknowledging the potential of the players from manipur and the love for football in the state he also thanked the gamenational governing body for providing the state with an opportunity to host their first international football tournament biren appealed to the people of manipur to attend the matches and urged them to show discipline and decency during the tournament taking to facebook biren said the historic occasion of manipur hosting the indian football team for the first time is indeedmoment of pride the credit for this achievement goes to the number of talented football players that the state has produced and pure love for games and sports among the people of the state despitecloud coverwhopping 29 341 people turned up to cheer sunil chhetri co as india won bysolitary goal against myanmar with anirudh thapa scoring in the first minute of the extra time in the first half

Title: haryana chief minister manohar lal kahttar pays tribute to martyrs at national war memorial in delhi
Article: gurgaon chief minister manohar lal kahttar along with cabinet minister of state members of parliament from haryana and senior government officials visited national war memorial in delhi and paid floral tribute to the brave soldiers who laid down their lives for safeguarding the integrity of india the visit was to mark martyrdom day shaheed diwas of shaheed bhagat singh rajguru and sukhdev later interacting with media persons the chief minister said he feels proud as he gotchance to visit the national war memorial we should be proud of our brave soldiers as only because of their supreme sacrifices we got freedom khattar said he said that in the year 2019 under the guidance of prime minister this national war memorial was constructed in this memorial the martyrdom of about 26 500 soldiers of the three armed forces including army navy and air force has been portrayed out of these 26 500 soldiers more than 2 500 soldiers belong to haryana this is another inspiring thing also the representation of youth of the state in the armed forces is 10 percent which certainly proves the statestrength said khattar the chief minister also paid tribute and saluted the families and the mothers of these great martyrs appealing to the people of the state and the country khattar said that the citizens must visit this war memorial and take inspiration from the martyrdom of the martyrs and contribute to nation building

Title: 4 killed 10 critical after muv bus collide in ferozepur
Article: ferozepur four people including three teachers and the driver of their vehicle died while 10 others were injured critically inmajor road accident near khai feme ki village on ferozepur fazilka road on friday morning according to information the tempo trax carrying 14 passengers collided head on withbus near khai village in ferozepur according to an eye witness the impact of the collision was so powerful that the front part of the vehicle squeezed killing four of the passengers on the spot while injuring ten others occupants the injured have been taken to the hospitals and their condition is also stated to be critical on getting informationpolice team rushed to the spot and started rescue operation as per information the victim teachers were from jalalabad town who were posted at government school in valtoha block in taran taran distirct the victim teachers have been identified as kanchan prince and maninder singh all residents of jalalabad town in fazilka district punjab school education minister harjot singh bains has expressed profound grief over the death of three teachers anddriver in the mishap he extended heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved families

Title: 40 yr old gets life term for killing brother
Article: hyderabad40 year old man who murdered his brother in bhongir in 2017 was sentenced to life imprisonment bylocal court on thursday the accusedyadagiri from pochammawada in bhongir town killed his brotherparvathalu according to police yadagiri was an alcoholic and his family deserted him due to his addiction on january 17 2017 yadagiri picked up an argument with parvathalu for not giving him money to buy liquor during the argument the accused attacked parvathalu withstick and killed him after committing the murder he set the body ablaze with kerosene tnn

Title: soon policy to promote local festivals lab on wheels service in uttarakhand
Article: dehradun the pushkar singh dhami government completed one year in office on thursday and on the occasion the cm made 16 announcements which included50 discount on transportation rates to candidates appearing in competitive exams addressing the gathering at rangers ground of dehradun the cm said we will start computer and information technology education in government schools from class 6 lab on wheels mobile laboratories service would be started in all 13 districts to ensure the best possible education facilities for students in far flung areas uttarakhand will be developed as the state science technology and information technology corridor he added that the state would soon bringscience and technology innovation policy to help the children of labourers get an education cm dhami said that the government would start mobile schools in the state dhami stressed the need to encourage and promote local festivals an integrated policy will be made to give wide recognition to the folk festivals of uttarakhand like uttarayani phooldai harela egas and budhi diwali and to celebrate them with full devotion and enthusiasm this will inform the youngsters about our culture and tradition he addedsports university would be opened at the sports stadium in haldwani we will upgrade the existing international stadium in haldwani and developsports university the cm said under the mukhkya mantri gram sadak yojna the government aims to connect villages withpopulation of 250 to main areas through roads besides dhami also announced the chief ministerhorticulture scheme chief ministerstate livestock mission and chief minister skill development and employment scheme to benefit different sections of society

Title: pau ittime for farmer fairs at pau gadvasu
Article: ludhiana campuses of punjab agricultural university pau and guru angad dev veterinary and animal sciences university gadvasu will come to life as farmers and experts from different parts of punjab and other states are expected to throng kisan mela and pashu palan mela respectively on friday and saturday punjab agriculture minister kuldeep singh dhaliwal will inaugurate the event which would be presided over by pau vc satbir singh gosal and gadvasu vc inderjeet singh the campuses have been decked up various departments will put up stalls to fine tune skills and enhance agricultural knowledge of farmers through close interaction with scientists extending an open invitation to the agricultural community to participate in the mela gosal said the university has worked hard to uplift
