the socio economic conditions of farmers by evolving cost effective technologies for facilitating agro based industries and generating self employment opportunities for the youths major highlights will include live demonstrations on pmh 14 variety of maize and sl 46 of sorghum nursery raising techniques kitchen garden model newly released varieties of horticultural crops mini herbal garden vermicompost unit integrated farming system unit organic production technologies sub surface drip irrigation and fertigation exhibitions will be organised on protected cultivation mushroom cultivation beekeeping safe use of pesticides and insect pest and disease management in various crops besides field demonstrations will be given on processing technologies such as agro processing complex pau maize dryer turmeric processing vegetable washing machine onion storage structure improved grain methods jaggery processing vodka production from kufri pukhraj value addition of button mushroom paddy straw management technologies like happy seeder super straw management system smart seeder baler and mulcher and other machines such as lucky seed drill drone self propelled rotary weeder mechanical paddy transplanters etc in addition renewable energy technologies comprising biogas generation from paddy straw various types of biogas plants and solar cookers will be displayed for this yearpashu palan mela the authorities have come up withslogan to rear livestock incongenial manner with respect to ecology and nature gadvasu vc inderjeet singh said whereas cattle buffalos goats and different species including ornamental fish will be the main attraction country side scenes of university will bespecial attraction for the urban children he said pashu palan mela will be more useful to vocational courses students studying animal husbandry and rural culture as they will get more valuable information about the latest interventions in the field of animal husbandry dairying fisheries etc

Title: ex wwe chief vincent mcmahon pays back 17 4 million in investigation costs
Article: world wrestling entertainment inc wwe wwesaid on friday executive chairman vincent mcmahon had paid 17 4 million to the company to cover costs related to an investigation into his alleged misconduct mcmahon credited with transforming wwe fromregional player toglobal giant retired as ceo and chairman of the company in july last year he returned to the board in january after the probe was wrapped up the wall street journal had reported that he was being investigated by the board for agreements to pay 12 million over the past 16 years to suppress allegations of sexual misconduct and infidelity wwe said in january that it would explore strategic alternatives mcmahon said he would involve himself in the companymedia rights acquisition process as it looks to capitalize on growing demand for content and live entertainment

Title: goof up russian anthem played incorrectly at world championships
Article: in an embarrassing moment for hosts india and boxingglobal governing body the russian national anthem was played incorrectly during the 70kg medal ceremony of the womenworld championships here on saturday we apologise for playing the wrong russian anthem we request you to givehuge round of applause to demurchian anastasiia the announcer said after almost all the spectators had left the kd jadhav indoor hall demurchian anastasiia who won the gold after defeating australiascott kaye frances later stood on the podium alone as the correct russian anthem was played it is worth mentioning here that the president of the international boxing association iba umar kremlev isrussian the local organising committee took the anthem from the russian coach checked it and handed it over to the iba events team who are in charge of the entire medal ceremony there wasmeeting regarding this and iba is doing its own investigation and bfi will fully cooperate with the processboxing federation of india bfi spokesperson said after the gaffe the members of the russian contingent however cheered and applauded their compatriot after lodging their protest following the goof up it is to be noted that over 10 countries including usa britain ireland and netherlands boycotted the tournament because the international boxing association iba allowed the russian and belarusian boxers to compete under their respective flags

Title: ravideep singh sahi is new chief of crpf south zone
Article: hyderabad crpf additional director general ravideep singh sahi took over command of south zone at hyderabad on thursday sahi joined as an assistant commandant in crpf and during the 37 years of service he served ink chhattisgarh and the north east after attack on parliament in december 2001 sahi was selected for deputation with ls secretariat as joint director security in 2002 and served there till 2007 upgrading security apparatus he served as ig srinagar sector of crpf for longest period from december 2016 to march 2020 and playedkey role in anti terrorist operations and handling law and order challenges pre and post article 370 abrogation tnn

Title: pash kin to make memorial for slain poet pash
Article: bathinda the family of poet avtar singh sandhu aka pash has decided to constructmemorial dedicated to him 35 years after his murder the family has earmarked two acres of land which include the well where pash was fired at and the mango tree where he fell pash was killed on march 23 1988 at talwandi salem village in jalandhar district according to sources pashfather sohan singh and mother had desired to buildmemorial when his sisters had visited india in 2019 it would have been better had it been materialised during the lifetime of our parents sohan singh died in 2013 but now the entire family including pashdaughter winkle sandhu wife rajwinder kaur brother onkar singh and sister rajinder kaur have unanimously decided to complete the paperwork immediately and provide the land totrust we would prefer that those two spots well and mango tree are preserved and an auditorium orlibrary is constructed to keep his memory alive said pashsister parminder kaur

Title: raipur injured tiger that killed 2 men rescued
Article: foreign secretary assures no indian will be left behind in conflict hit sudan india

Title: one dead as car rams into pole
Article: tribune news service faridabad march 2825 year old man died and two persons were injured ascar rammed into an electric pole on the malerna road in ballabgarh late yesterday night the deceased was identified as nishant of sector 65 he was travelling with his friends bharat and rupesh the victims were pulled out from the vehicle before it caught fire the car was completely gutted the body was shifted to the civil hospital for post mortemprobe has been launched

Title: indian embassy requests nepal govt to arrest amritpal singh if he tries to flee
Article: sc stays promotion of 68 judges including judge who convicted rahul 12 may 2023 8 30 pm new delhi may 12 uni the supreme court in its order on friday stayed the promotion of 68 judges in gujarat district courts including the judge who convicted rahul gandhi in the criminal defamation case and sent them back to the original posts pending final orders see more eam meets new nepalese fm np saud in dhaka 12 may 2023 7 32 pm new delhi dhaka may 12 uni external affairs ministerjaishankar who is in dhaka for the 6th indian ocean conference on friday met new nepalese foreign minister narayan prakash saud see more india eu trade technology council to hold first ministerial meet on may 16 12 may 2023 5 54 pm new delhi may 12 uni the india eu trade and technology council ttc will hold its first ministerial meeting in brussels on may 16 it will be co chaired on the indian side by external affairs ministerjaishankar minister of commerce piyush goyal and communications electronics and information technology minister ashwini vaishnaw see more sc to pass order monday on sebiplea in hindenburg adani case 12 may 2023 5 26 pm new delhi may 12 uni supreme court on friday said it would pronounce its order on monday on market regulator securities and exchange board of indiasebi plea seeking six more months to complete the probe into us short seller hindenburgallegations against indialeading business conglomerate adani group see more

Title: himachal cm sukhvinder singh sukhu this isbattle to save democracy not rahul gandhiindividual battle
Article: himachal pradesh chief minister sukhvinder singh sukhu 59 is actively campaigning to oppose disqualification of rahul gandhi from parliament sukhu tells sukhbir siwach this can weaken democracy in the country and justifies water cess on hydropower projects in himachal pradesh even though punjab and haryana are opposing this move excerpts do you think rahul gandhidisqualification from parliament may lead tochange in political equations in the country rahul gandhidisqualification from parliament ispolitical conspiracy there is only one leader rahul gandhi in the country who is honestly voicing peoplesentiments in the public court there is no other leader who is raising the bjp failures inside and outside the house there is an atmosphere of fear us dar ko rahul gandhi nikalana chahte hain rahul gandhi wants to get rid of this fear this isbattle to save democracy and this is not an individual battle of rahul gandhi what will be the fallout of this episode such politics will weaken democracy and the constitutional institutions democracy can be alive only if the opposition is alive do you think the politics of the country may takenew turn after this episode at this stage itnot appropriate to say where we will reach before the next lok sabha elections butbelieve the public knows all what is happening and where can it prove counterproductive for your opponents certainly it can being the strongest leader of the biggest opposition party he rahul gandhi was disqualified to suppress his voice but rahul gandhi isleader who walks on the path of truth and he is not going to be scared advertisement will you make efforts to unite the opposition on rahuldisqualification our high command will do that all the opposition parties have to be united to save democracy it does not matter who becomes prime minister in 2024 what do you think about water cess on hydropower projects advertisement when dams are built and electricity is produced it leads to evaporation and fog which impacts cities the cess will be imposed on the people of himachal too who make dams and produce electricity the formula of water cess was imposed in sikkim uttarakhand and jammu kashmir much earlier but we have introduced it just now will this move not impact punjab and haryana there will be no impact on haryana and punjab but only on those who are engaged in power generation like bbmb bhakra beas management board the water cess will be imposed on the electricity generated from bbmbdams situated in himachal pradesh punjab haryana himachal pradesh and rajasthan have shares in the power generated from these dams the water cess will be imposed on all 172 hydro projects including himachal pradeshelectricity board power corporation and private projects do you think there will be no financial implications for punjab and haryana there may be financial implications for these states but imposition of suchcess isright of himachal pradesh there are no such power projects of punjab and haryana in himachal pradesh so they should not oppose

Title: archana claims sprint double in indian gp2
Article: tamil naduarchana suseendran defeated hima das in the 100m final and made the most of the assam sprinterdisqualification in the 200m to claimdouble gold in the afi indian grand prix 2 on monday archana won the 100m in 11 52 seconds 0 22 seconds ahead of hima and the 200m in 23 21 seconds the 24 year old muhammed ajmal clockedsub 47 second time this season improving on the 46 90 seconds that helped him to win the afi national 400m championships title earlier this month despite winning the national games crown in 46 29 seconds he was only fifth best indian in 2022 and will be looking to establish himself as the leading quarter miler in the asian games this year withbest of 19 76m the left handed tajinderpal singh toor dominated the menshot put each of his four valid efforts were better than the 19 17m that his punjab team mate karanveer singh managed to edge out sahib singh delhi and claim the second place toor however is still looking for his first 20m effort of the year commonwealth games gold medallist eldhose paul kerala won the mentriple jump contest withbest effort of 16 27m advertisement karthik unnikrishnan and abdulla aboobacker ensuredpodium sweep for kerala with the former getting his nose ahead bymere 3 cm interestingly the commonwealth games silver medallist abdulla aboobacker cleared 15 77m in his only valid try muhammed anas yahiya won his first national level race since returning from the commonwealth games last year he clocked 21 54 seconds to push maldives hassan saaid to second place earlier sanjeet singh haryana edged out amiya kumar mallick odisha byhundredth ofsecond in the men100m advertisement the 2018 asian games 1500m gold medallist jinson johnson returned to the track for only his second race since he finished fifth at the world military games in wuhan china in october 2019 having finished third in the federation cup in april last year he tasted victory clocking 3 44 52 on monday leaving delhirahul and maharashtraprakash balu gadade behind the afi indian grands prix 3 and 4 will be held in bengaluru on april 10 and 15

Title: rahul gandhi getting an ass to runhorserace hardeep singh puripulls no punches commenting on rahul gandhi
Article: new delhi union minister hardeep singh puri on monday lashed out at rahul gandhi who was disqualified as lok sabha mp recently and said that the congress leader should fight the courtaction in the court instead of speaking against veer savarkar you are getting an ass to runhorserace they really deserve to do some serious introspection people of india would judge them for what they are fight courtaction in the court you are invoking mahabharat and savarkar puri said on friday rahul gandhi was disqualified asmember of the lok sabhaday aftersurat court sentenced him to two years imprisonment indefamation case filed against him over his modi surname remark in april 2019 he made the remark how come all the thieves have modi as the common surname atlok sabha election rally at kolar in karnataka the court approved rahul gandhibail onsurety and stayed the sentence for 30 days to allow him to approach the higher courts after his disqualification congress leader rahul gandhi said that he was not veer savarkar and that he will not apologise addressingpress conference in the national capitalday after he was convicted indefamation case and subsequently disqualified from lok sabha rahul gandhi said on saturday my name in not savarkar my name is gandhi gandhis donapologise to anyone he further stated that he is not scared of going to prison and that his disqualification from parliament was aimed at distracting people from the adani issue meanwhile congress mps in the lok sabha and rajya sabha today attended the parliament session by wearing black clothes besides rahul gandhidisqualification the congress has since the start of the budget session of parliament been registering their protest over the adani hindbenburg issue and questioning prime minister narendra modirelation with the adani group congress had demandedjoint parliamentary committee probe into the adani issue and staged protests in the parliamentongoing budget session the ongoing second part of the budget session began on march 13 and will continue till april 6

Title: india and africa face common threats like terrorism collective experience helpful to deal with emerging security threats army chief pande
Article: pune india and africa face common threats like terrorism and violent extremism and the collective experience can help to prepare better to deal with emerging security challenges chief of army staff general manoj pande said on tuesday speaking at the conclave of army chiefs in which 31 delegates from african nations participated including 10 army chiefs general pande said 25 partner nations are participating in the current edition of the afindex military exercise which concludes on wednesday our collective experience can help us to better prepare for the emerging security threats the army chief said he said many african armies have experience operating in difficult and challenging environments and can offer valuable insights into their tactics techniques and procedures we face common threats of terrorism and violent extremism that have the potential to adversely affect our development goals general pande said

Title: varinder singh fir against waris punjab de chief amritpalaide varinder singh
Article: mar 30 2023 08 22am ist source times now cops file fir against amritpal singhaide varinder singh continuing its crackdown on the waris punjab de chief amritpal singhassociates earlier police arrested another close associate of the separatist leader in relation to the ajnala violence case the arrested accused has been identified as varinder singh of johal raju singh wala village which falls under the patti sub division of tarn taran district following the invocation of the national security act nsa varinder has since been sent to assamdibrugarh jail

Title: amritpal singh latest news akal takht jathedar asks punjab government to free all amritpal aides in 24 hours
Article: 02 00 amritpal singhseven faces released by punjab police suspects he might have changed appearance 02 00 amritpal singh how did the khalistani preacher give police the slip 02 35 amritpal singh arrest who funds terror in punjab khalsa raj flags 01 44 amritpal singhbodyguard makes startling disclosures about khalistan plan claims punjab police daduwal abstains amritsar akal takht jathedar giani harpreet singh who had convenedmeeting of panthic organisations on monday issued24 hour ultimatum for the release of all supporters of khalistan sympathiser amritpal singh arrested by the punjab police since the launch of its crackdown on march 18 the jathedar on saturday had urged the fugitive chief of waris punjab de to surrender and face the legal process the meeting decided that if the ultimatum is not honoured the akal takht will launch khalsa wahir to expose the governmentmachinations at the village level amritpal was to start the second leg of his khalsa wahir from march 19 the jathedar said that during this wahir apart from propagation of the religion an anti drug campaign would also be carried out all the sikh bodies including sgpc and sad will go to people and highlight how the sikhs are being terrorised and defamed sgpc president harjinder singh dhami said while briefing the media the meeting also held the punjab and the central governments along withfew national media houses responsible for creating an atmosphere of hatred against the sikhs as part ofconspiracy the jathedar has directed sgpc to take legal action against the forces bent upon defaming sikhs in india and abroad and we have already set uppanel of lawyers for this the representatives ofsikh bodies issued another ultimatum to restore the 100 odd sikh channels closed by the punjab government they asked all the sikh bodies to unitedly fight against the alleged suppression of sikhs at the meeting in akal takhtfew sikhs raised slogans in favour of khalistan in support of amritpal and against some national media houses the meeting also agreed to provide free legal support to all those arrested during the ongoing operation against amritpal the jathedar has issued an open invitation to all the families whosechildren have been arrested in unnecessary cases to contact sgpc our panel of lawyers will contest their cases and the sgpc will pay the fees of lawyers already hired by the aggrieved families dhami said the sikh bodies also decided to move the high court against the imposition of the stringent national security act against the seven sikhs expressing concern over false representation of flags of different sikh states including maharaja ranjit singhempire as khalistan flags bythe police the akal takht jathedar directed sgpc to take action against police officials he also urged sikhs to fly flags of khalsa raj atop their houses and on their vehicles observing thatdiplomatic conspiracy was being hatched against sikhs the jathedar said the sikhs should reply in diplomatic terms and not violently despite some differences all the panthic representatives unanimously decided to abide by the jathedardecisions prominent among those present at the meeting were golden temple head granthi giani jagtar singh takhtkesgarh sahib baljit singh jathedar giani raghubir singh sgpc chief harjinder singh dhami shiromani panth akali buddha dalbaba balvir singh baba avtar singh sursingh former akal takht jathedar jasvir singh rode former delhi sikh gurdwara management committee chief manjit singh gk and damdami taksal representative sukhdev singh baljit singh daduwal former head of haryana sikh gurdwara management committee hsgmc which is at odds with sgpc over control of haryana gurdwaras said he was not allowed to attend the meeting akal takht had issued an open invitation for the special meeting said daduwal so he had decided to attend it but the entry was restricted tofew select groupsarrived to attend the meeting but only paid obeisance at golden temple and akal takht for the release of the sikh youth he said the jathedar represents the community and notparticular group orfamily so everyone should have been invited

Title: new cctv footage shows fugitive amritpal singh without turban
Article: on tuesdaynew video emerged on social media featuring amritpal singh and his key aide papalpreet singh both wearing masks with singh notably withoutturbannew video of amritpal singh with his key aide papalpreet singh surfaced on social media on tuesday showing the pro khalistan preacher withoutturban and wearingmask the undated cctv footage said to be frommarket in delhi showed the fugitive walking downstreet wearing dark glasses behind him papalpreet singh could be seen walking withbag there is no official word from punjab police on the fresh footage also read amritpal case release youths or face global stir akal takht24 hr ultimatum advertisement the video has emergedday afterpicture of amritpal singh and papalpreet singh widely circulated on social media that image showed both these men looking relaxed and amritpal singh holdingbeverage can papalpreet singh is said to be amritpal singhmentor he was allegedly in contact with pakistanspy agency isi waris punjab de chief amritpal singh whoon the run was spotted withoutturban and withmask on his face in delhi on march 21 visuals confirmed by police pic twitter com 3yhmtnrgp5 ani march 28 2023 several images and videos of the radical preacher have surfaced on social media since the police crackdown on him and his outfit waris punjab de began on march 18 amritpal singh however managed to dodge the crackdown in jalandhar and escaped in different vehicles by changing his appearance multiple times police said they said amritpal singh and papalpreet singh were allegedly harboured bywoman at her home in shahabad in haryanakurukshetra district on march 19 on march 25 cctv footage emerged purportedly showing amritpal singh talking onmobile phone also read amritpal believed to be hiding in nepal india asks nepal not to let him flee the police action began about three weeks after amritpal singh and his supporters stormed the ajnala police station near amritsar to secure the release of an arrested man six police personnel were injured punjab police have arrested or detainednumber of his associates under criminal cases related to spreading disharmony attempt to murder and attack police personnel and creating obstructions in the lawful discharge duty by public servants they have slapped the stringent national security act against some of them on sunday punjab police said they have released 197 people out of 353 taken into preventive custody till then on apprehension of breach of peace and disturbance of law and order with agency inputs

Title: amritpal singh hunt on for amritpal singh akal takht jathedar issues ultimatum to punjab government
Article: mar 28 2023 03 29pm ist source toi in akal takht jathedar giani harpreet singh who had convenedmeeting of panthic organisations on monday issued24 hour ultimatum for the release of all supporters of khalistan sympathiser amritpal singh arrested by the punjab police since the launch of its crackdown on march 18 the jathedar on saturday had urged the fugitive chief of waris punjab de to surrender and face the legal process

Title: experts reckon peter bol alleged botched test could have potentially massive global ramifications guardian
Article: the guardian reported that sport integrity australia and the government laboratory accused of botching peter bolanti doping test sample are staying silent as pressure builds and experts believe it could have potentially massive global ramifications the tokyo 2020 star and commonwealth games silver medallist bol had tested positive for synthetic erythropoietinperformance enhancing drug in january but last month hissample returned an atypical finding allowing bol to return to competition according to guardian details of two independent scientific reports commissioned by bollawyers became public on wednesday and both found no evidence of synthetic epo in bolsamples raising questions about testing methods used in his case epo isnaturally occurring hormone butsynthetic equivalent can aid performance and improve recovery inletter providing the reports to sia bollawyer peter greene described the body as completely wrong and called on it to end the investigation and admit its mistake according to australian guardian sia and the australian sports drug testing laboratorygovernment body which tests for sia stayed silent on wednesday refusing to respond to greeneallegations the guardian reported sia and asdtl declined multiple requests for comment the australian sports drug testing laboratory carries out testing on behalf of sport integrity australia the asdtl said it would not be appropriate to comment on an operational matter of sport integrity australia bolagent james templeton hit out at sia telling guardian australia he was disappointed it had not yet dropped the investigation and cleared the athletename sia are being disingenuous in stating that they are still investigating he said they have nothing to investigate advertisement templeton said sia had postponed an interview with bol in februarymonth after they had downloaded everything from his electronic devices they have nothing to ask him zero the agent added to guardian itdespicable to continue to throw shade on peter bol they donhave the good grace to properly clear his name observers are highlighting the international significance of wednesdaydevelopments sports integrity expert catherine ordwayresearch lead at the university of canberra and senior fellow at the university of melbourne law school told guardian there would be major ramifications if the world anti doping agency accepted the independent reports this is an international issue for wada she was quoted as saying by guardian it will impact the sydney lab and any of the other wada accredited labs doing epo testing it will impact previous epo cases and future epo analysis it is potentially massive and much bigger than australia advertisement but ordway suggested that more time was needed for wadaexpert group to review the independent reports and either concede that errors had been made or suggest an alternative explanation the information from bollawyers looks damning butm notscientist andm really keen to see what wada comes back with guardian spoke toprominent australian sports lawyer who requested anonymity to speak frankly about the saga calling the situationfarce they described it as the least likely of all the outcomes but certainly the best outcome for bolsake the lawyer addedhope sia drop this apologise and move on the allegedly botched testing was carried out by the asdtlwada accredited lab at the national measurement institute part of the federal department of industry the independent reports are highly critical of the testing methods used the first report by prof david chen at the university of british columbia guardian reported noted that the lab should have immediately recognised issues with the testing and followed the procedure described in the wada technical document td chen identified that another obvious phenomenon that should have been noticed but wasnis the intense band observed on one of the samples research has shown that people who have recently taken synthetic epo do not have high levels of naturally occurring epo the gel pattern showed very strong natural epo intensity indicating it did not come fromperson who recently used synthetic epo chen wrote in his report as reported by guardian advertisement the researcher was also critical of the poor quality of the standards chen concluded the reported finding ofpositive result was improper and did not meet the criteria required by the wada td the second report by norwegian researchers prof jon nissen meyer prof erik boye prof bjarne sterud and tore skotland made similarly critical findings the report said that we have carefully evaluated the documents that report the tests performed on peter bola sample and find no scientific evidence in this document which proves the presence of synthetic epo in bolurine advertisement chen was engaged independently bythird party and was kept unaware of the identity of bol as per guardian the norwegian experts were engaged directly by bollawyers but in an independent unpaid capacity

Title: periyar univ vc union seeks action against periyar univ vc
Article: salem members of the periyar university employees union pueu have submittedpetition with the secretary of the department of the labour welfare and skill development seeking action against the vice chancellor and the registrar of the university for dismissing four temporary consolidated payment workers without following due procedures they also sought the labour department to direct the university to rescind the termination orders the general secretary of the unionsakthivel told toi four temporary employeessakthivel pueu presidentkanivannan organising secretarykrishnaveni vice presidentsenthil kumar were terminated when they pointed out irregularities committed by senior university officialscase to make 208 temporary workers who have been employed for 20 years has been pending with the industrial tribunal chennai from may 13 2019 without servingmonthnotice or giving out the notice pay or getting any permission from the industrial tribunal the university dismissed the four employees on january 28 this year he said when contacted by toi vice chancellorjagannathan said the university is yet to receivecopy of the petition we could comment on this only after checking with the university legal advisers he said

Title: sebi sebi clears asba like facility for stock trades
Article: mumbai the sebi board on wednesday approved asba like facility for secondary market trading where the funds earmarked for trading by an investor will be blocked and released only when there isdemand from the clearing corporation to settle such trades the regulatorboard also gave nod to set upmechanism under which brokers can alert market abuse and fraudsebi release said asba application supported by blocked amount is an ipo application process under under which the application money by an investor is blocked in that investorbank account and once the ipo application is approved the application money is debited from the investoraccount the investor earns interest on the blocked amount till itdebited in case the investor doesnget allotment the block is releasedsimilar process will now be introduced in the secondary market this facility will be optional for investors as well as stock brokerssebi release said the regulator said that there were several benefits for suchfacility among those the investor will earn interest on his blocked funds in his savings account till the time amount is debited it will also facilitate direct settlement with the clearing corporation cc without passing through pool accounts of the intermediaries thereby providing client level settlement visibility to the cc and thus avoiding the risk of co mingling of clients funds and securities this facility will also eliminate the risk of inadvertently erroneous or fraudulent reporting by intermediaries this will also eliminate the risk of default and no adverse impact on client pay out it shall bring efficiency in the secondary market by allowing usage of the same blocked amount towards margin and settlement obligations and thus result in lower working capital requirements sebi said

Title: iba says ioc misused information about its officials
Article: the international boxing association iba on monday upped the ante in its battle for control of olympic boxing by accusing the international olympic committee ioc of misuse of information about its officials in an open letter to ioc chief thomas bach and executive board members before their meeting in lausanne on tuesday the iba said it had deep concerns regarding basic ioc governance impartiality and transparency principles during the monitoring process ahead of next yearparis olympics the ioc suspended the iba in 2019 over governance finance refereeing and ethical issues and did not involve it in running the boxing events at the tokyo olympics the ioc also plans to stage its own boxing qualifier for paris the iba said it was concerned about confidential data relating to its competition officials adding that the paris 2024 boxing unit had contacted it about acting as volunteer officials at qualification competitions and the games this was done without prior approval or communication to iba with whom the competition officials are certified and showedlack of basic communication that demonstrates once again the lack of transparency and cooperation with the iba from the respective ioc staff the iba said in its letter it added the iocactions were in breach ofdata transfer agreement signed in 2019 the ioc is aware of the ibamost recent allegations an ioc spokesperson told reuters advertisement the ioc will continue to monitor the practice and activities of the iba in conformity with the roadmap previously communicated to them and in view of takingdecision on their recognition status in 2023 the iba added it would reserve all rights to seek redress before the competent court against ioc to request damages for breach of the agreement illegitimate use of our intellectual property and breach of the general data protection regulation amongst other breaches in which the ioc has committed relations between the ioc and the iba further soured following russiainvasion of ukraine last year advertisement amateur boxinggoverning body defied ioc guidance and liftedban on russian and belarusian boxers competing under their flags last october boxing is not on the initial programme for the 2028 los angeles games

Title: table tennis plans to allow russian paddlers back ittf says itacting on iocadvice
Article: russian players are set to return to table tennis events after the sportgoverning body on thursday followed the international olympic committeeadvice to let them compete as neutrals the decision by the international table tennis federation paves the way for players from russia and its ally belarus to endyear long exclusion from competitions during russiawar in ukraine they could resume competing from may at the earliest under strict conditions of neutrality and canenter the world championships in late may because they have missed the qualification events the ittf said table tennis is followingframework presented by the ioc on tuesday which also recommended excluding any russians and belarusians who are contracted to the military and allowing them to only take part as individuals not teams the ittf said it would create its own guidelines drawing on the ioc recommendations but didncommit to any specific measures the ittf justified its decision by the example of ping pong diplomacy when american table tennis players traveled to china in 1971 to playseries of exhibition games which helped thaw relations between the two countries during the cold war table tennis haslong history of bringing people together even when political ties have been tenuous the ittf said it can build bridges leading to better understanding among peoples and open the door for peacebuilding in ways that exclusion and division cannot table tennis is the first sport to commit to readmitting russians and belarusians since the ioc published its guidelines two other olympic sports judo and fencing had committed to doing so earlier in 2023 but havenheld any competitions this year with russian or belarusian athletes tennis and cycling allow individual russians and belarusians to compete in tour events but not in national team competitions

Title: mexican migrant facility fire deadly fire erupts in mexican immigration detention center migrants protest deportation dozens killed
Article: mar 29 2023 09 43am ist source toi infire at an immigration detention centre in northern mexico has resulted in the deaths of at least 40 people with 29 others injured the fire was started by migrants protesting against their deportation according to president andres manuel lopez obrador the facility in ciudad juarez held 68 men from central and south america at the time of the blaze the dead and injured were fromrange of countries including guatemala honduras el salvador venezuela colombia and ecuador the incident reflects high levels of frustration among migrants waiting to cross into the us or claim asylum there

Title: bbc punjabitwitter account blocked restored hours later
Article: tribune news service new delhi march 28 after the twitter handles of many punjabi journalists were withheld the twitter now blocks the official account of bbc punjabinews organisation the decision is learnt to have been taken by the twitter on the request of the union government the government in its request to the twitter had claimed that bbc punjabi had violated the information technology it act 2000 while doing stories on the fugitive amritpal singh amritpal has been on the run since the police crackdown on march 18 earlier the twitter accounts of many punjabi journalists who had been covering the crackdown against amritpal were withheld in india the government had also withheld the twitter accounts of canadian politician jagmeet singh poet rupi kaur voluntary organisation united sikhs mp from sangrur simranjit singh mann and three prominent punjab based journalists sources said over 70 twitter handles and many youtube channels had been blocked ever since the crackdown against amritpal started aap convener and delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal had already claimed that the aap government in punjab got the support of the union government in the crackdown against amritpal later in the day the suspension of bbc punjabitwitter handle was revoked and the account was restored

Title: bjp new bjp team charts out strategies for civic ls polls
Article: lucknow the newly formed up bjp organisational team went intohuddle in lucknow on wednesday to chart out strategies for the upcoming urban local bodies elections and the lok sabha elections due next year while the bjp termed itmere introductory meeting party sources said up bjp chief bhupendra chaudhary and state general secretary organisation dharampal singh soughtdetailed feedback from the new team about the prevailing political situation in their respective areas bjp national vice president and up incharge radha mohan singh was also present at the meeting the meeting was attended by all 51 state leaders including the six new regional presidents sources said the state leadership discussed the measures to be taken up to counter the oppositionaggressive positioning the meeting holds significance since up bjp is stepping up spadework to consolidate its position in up another significance is that the state will go for bypolls on suar and chhanbey assembly seats on may 10 while suar fell vacant after disqualification of sp leader azam khanabdullah azam the bypoll on chhanbey was necessitated after the demise of apna dalmla rahul kol in february speaking to reporters after the wednesday meeting up bjp chief said the party organisation will throw its entire strength in the upcoming elections he said that the party would reach out to every urban local body to ensure the victory of its candidate in the civic polls the state president also accused the sp of being anti obc sources said the state leadership stressed on close coordination between the organisation and the yogi government and on communicating the public welfare programmes initiated by the centre and the state government to the people bjp has been organising booth level programmes centred on president droupadi murmubudget session speech in parliament where she had detailed the achievements and initiatives of the modi government sources said the party leadership also discussed an array of programmes to be taken up to amplify the partypublic outreach in the coming days the upcoming 43rd foundation day of the bjp on april 6 and birth anniversary of br ambedkar on april 14 hovered prominently in the meetingsenior bjp leader said chaudhary asked his team members to speed up the work of booth restructuring and strengthening an exercise which the bjp considers key to cement its organisational network in fact the state unit has been reconstituting the committees at the booth sector and division levels

Title: haryana cm manohar lal khattar releases coffee table book sikh business leaders of india
Article: gurgaon haryana chief minister manohar lal khattar releasedcoffee table book titled sikh business leaders of india authored by dr prabhleen atfunction organized in delhi and urges the industrialists to set up industries in the state he said that the state government has createdconducive environment and is providing various facilities addressing the gathering the chief minister said that industrialists will not face any problem in doing business in haryana the government has createdsingle roof system under which all types of clearances to industries are given in 45 days the power supply situation is also comfortable now the state government has made four categoriesbandif industries are set up in categoryandzones the state government will reimburse rs 4 000 per worker per month as incentive for the next 4 years said khattar cm said the sikh community has madehuge contribution to the state the country and the world as well this community isworking community and has worked hard with struggle to promote their business family country and society they are also working to take forward and uplift the needy who have been left behind from the mainstream due to some reason said khattar sharing the story of the supreme sacrifice made by guru tegh bahadur the cm said that when bhai jaita while going to anandpur sahib reached sonipat with guru teg bahadurhead at that time in order to escape from the army of mughals bhai kushal singh of village badkhalsa sonipat offered his head to bhai jaita ji as his face resembled guruthe mughals took kushalhead and returned back thinking that it was of guru and in this way guruhead could be taken to anandpur sahib haryana sikh gurdwara parbandhak committee president mahant karamjeet singh said that incomparable work has been done for sikhism and punjabi language under the leadership of chief minister manohar lal khattar the state government has also createdseparate foundation for baba banda singh bahadur said singh

Title: rs 48 20 69 00 00 000 corruption under congress rule bjp releases first episode of congress files
Article: new delhi the bharatiya janata party bjp on sunday released the first episode of congress files which highlights the corruption allegations against the party during its tenure the official twitter handle of bjp tweeted the first episode of congress files see how one after the other corruption and scams took place under the congress rule the bjp releasedvideo message titled congress means corruption in which they claimed that the congress party had lootedstaggering rs 48 20 69 00 00 000 from the public during its 70 years of rule the party further added that this massive sum of money could have been utilized for numerous areas of development and security but instead it was misused by the congress using this much amount 24 ins vikrant 300 rafale jets and 1000 mangal missions could have been made or purchased but the country had to bear the cost of congress corruption and it lagged behind in the race of progress the video message added bjp further attacked the congress party and termed its tenure from 2004 2014 aslost decade bjp further said in the video keeping the whole 70 years aside if we only look at the last tenure of 2004 14 it waslost decade the government was led by manmohan singh who turnedblind eye to all the corruption that kept on happening under his rule in those days papers were filled with the news of corruption looking at which the heads of every indian hung in shame coal scam of rs 1 86 lakh crore 2g spectrum scam of rs 1 76 lakh crore mnrega scam of rs 10 lakh crore commonwealth scam of rs 70 000 crorebribe of rs 362 crores in the helicopter deal with italy 12 crores bribe for the chairman of railway board it further added at the end of the video message bjp stated this is only the jhanki trailer of congress corruption the movie is still not over

Title: paper leak case main accused bjp functionary held in haridwar
Article: haridwar bjp member sanjay dhariwal one of the main accused in the patwari and je ae paper leak case which came to light in january this year has finally been arrested by haridwar police on saturday dhariwal whose brother had earlier been arrested in the same case carriedreward of rs 50 000 he allegedly had close links with sanjeev chaturvedi the section officer of ukpsc arrested for leaking and selling exam papers he also allegedly helpedcoaching centre where the leaked papers were solved get candidates willing to pay and clear the exams police had recovered rs 4 lakh cash and blank cheques from him possibly taken from applicants who bought the leaked papers sanjay dhariwal is also the head of mohammadpur jat village in haridwar he was trying to surrender before the court but police managed to arrest him from narsan haridwar ssp ajay singh said sanjay is one of the main accused and he wanted to surrender before the court to escape police questioning but we managed to arrest him so far 38 accused have been arrested including two section officers of ukpsc in the case more arrests will happen soon

Title: congress will come to power again in rajasthan cm ashok gehlot
Article: ajmer chief minister ashok gehlot on friday said that the disqualification of rahul gandhi from parliamentary politics wasconspiratorial reaction to the latterforceful raising of issues related to adani gehlot said rahul gandhi always talks about keeping the country united whereas bjp and narendra modi try to break the country the country is with rahul gandhi as the common citizens now understand the consequences of bjp rule said gehlot in his address to the first division level congress workers conference attended by thousands of party workers from ajmer bhilwara nagaur and tonk districts as soon as gehlot reached the programme venue at government jawahar senior secondary school at civil lines in ajmer it started pouring today lord indra is also happy to see this congress programme congress will repeat its government in the state said the cm congress state in charge sukhjinder singh randhawa and pcc president govind singh dotasra also addressed the programme and asked the party workers to make people aware of the welfare schemes and initiatives started for the common citizens they urged the party workers to verify if the governmentschemes were reaching the grassroot levels they also asked people not to believe fake news circulating and urged congress workers to bring the truth to society tnn

Title: walas moose waladad says will highlight rising lawlessness
Article: bathinda slain singer sidhu moose walafather balkaur singh on sunday announced he would be campaigning for the may 10 lok sabha bypoll from jalandhar seat to tell people about worsening law and order in punjab addressing the fans of his son at his home in moosa village of mansa balkaur said when he and his wife had protested outside punjab legislative assembly during the budget session on march 7 they were promisedmeeting with the cm but that assurance had not been fulfilled even aftermonth two interviews of gangster lawrence bishnoi have been aired onnews channel but the state has not cleared howgangster in its custody could give interview from jail the government claims it is still investigating about the place of interviews while my sources from delhi said the first interview seemed to have been done in kharar and second in bathinda going by thiswill go to jalandhar to raise my voice for justice he said he said when the cm had visited him after the killing of his son he had promisedjudicial commission to look into all aspects of the killing but that too had not been done he also accused the state government of trying to sabotage the death anniversary of his son by starting an operation to nab fugitive radical amritpal singh which should have done on the day he had stormed ajnala police station balkaur added he was still getting threats in the name of lawrence bishnoidonfear death but the government must look into all this he said

Title: sidhu punjab is waiting for him says media advisor as navjot sidhu slated to come out of jail
Article: apr 01 2023 06 31pm ist source ani navjot singh sidhumedia advisor surinder dalla on april 01 said that the whole of punjab is waiting for sidhu to come out of jail he said navjot singh sidhu did not take leave from jail forsingle day be disciplined today the whole of punjab is waiting for him to come out people from every village are blessing navjot singh sidhu today

Title: punjab cabinet enhances crop compensation by 25 percent at rs 15000 per acre
Article: chandigarh inmajor pro farmer decision aimed at safeguarding their interests during natural calamities the punjab cabinet led by chief minister bhagwant mann on friday gave nod for hiking the compensation due to naturefury by 25 per acre thereby givingmajor respite to the food growersdecision to this effect was taken by the council of ministers in its meeting held here at the punjab civil secretariatunder the chairmanship of the chief minister divulging more detailsspokesperson of the chief ministeroffice said that keeping in view the loss incurred by the farmers recently due to heavy rains hailstorms and strong winds the cabinet has decided to enhance the relief amount from rs 12 000 per acre to rs 15 000 per acre for 76 100 percent for loss of crops this measure will givehealing touch to the affected farmers who will be able to getreasonable financial relief from the government these relief rates will be applicable from march 1 2023 nod to extend exemption of 2 25 stamp duty and fees land registration by april 30 keeping in view the larger public interest the cabinet also gave its consent to extend the exemption of 2 25 stamp duty and fees to those registering their property land by april 30 those opting for registration of land will now be exempted from 1 additional stamp duty 1 pidb fees and 0 25 special fees the cabinet also gave approval for hiring 2574 kisan mitras and 108 field supervisors in the agriculture department these kisan mitras and field supervisors will encourage the farmers to get out of the rut of wheat paddy circle and cultivate less water guzzling crops like cotton and basmati this step will act ascatalyst to save precious groundwater of the state by boosting crop diversification program on one hand and providing employment to the youth of the state on the other

Title: bhagwant manns aap slams reports of threat to cmdaughter
Article: chandigarh condemning reports of punjab chief minister bhagwant manndaughter receiving death threats in the us aap chief spokesperson malvinder singh kang said it only showed the mindset of anti social elements who can stoop to any level expressing concerns over punjab cmdaughter reportedly receiving death threats in the us delhi commission for women dcw chief swati maliwal on friday appealed to the indian embassy in the us to ensure her safety meanwhile punjab ministers aman arora and kuldeep singh dhaliwal said they were not aware of the threats to the cmdaughter arora however added that such things would not deter mann led government from taking steps to maintain peace in the state replying toquestion arora and dhaliwal who were addressing media persons about decisions taken at the cabinet meeting said they were not aware of the issue mann has not shared any such thing with us said arora tnn

Title: peace harmony jal bypoll plank sad
Article: chandigarh the shiromani akali dal sad core committee on saturday decided to contest the jalandhar lok sabha bypoll on the plank of peace and communal harmony as well as to ensure justice for weaker sections of society the core committee meeting held under sad chief sukhbir singh badal authorised the party president to select the candidate for the jalandhar bypoll it was also announced thatcoordination committee meeting between the sad and its alliance partner in punjab the bahujan samaj party bsp would be held before naming the alliance candidate sources in the sad said their party believed that former chief parliamentary secretary and former mla from adampur pawan kumar tinu would be the alliancebest bet for the bypoll the sad core committee noted that efforts were on to spoil the peace in punjab and that aap had become party to the conspiracy to destabilise the state and cm bhagwant mann was solely responsible the sad condemned mann for insulting the akal takht jathedar and gagging the media intelligentsia and artists he said the party will seek justice for all innocent sikh youth who had been arrested on trivial charges by the aap government

Title: at rajput mahapanchayat in jaipur karni sena pushes for higher ews quota welfare board
Article: months before the assembly elections in rajasthanrajput outfit on sunday demanded an increase in the reservation for the economically weaker sections ews from 10 per cent to 14 per cent atkesariya mahapanchayat in jaipur the mahapanchayat was organised by the shree rashtriya rajput karni sena srrks we want our rights this gathering is not political but this kesariya mahapanchayat has been convened to demand from the government the rights of our youth we demand that the ews reservation be increased from 10 per cent to 14 per cent and that the state government constitutekshatriya rajput kalyan board the central government should relax the conditions of ews reservation in central government recruitment said srrks national president sukhdev singh gogamedi we wantrelaxation of five years in age and also similar relaxations in educational qualifications when it comes to the ews category as is available to other reserved categories our ancestors have always sacrificed for this country and the hindu religion said gogamedi among those in attendance were bjp mp from kaiserganj in uttar pradesh brij bhushan sharan singh and raghuraj singh mos in the uttar pradesh government the government said that the rajput men who helped the police nab the assailants of kanhaiya lal will be awarded government jobs what happened to that promise do you want us to protest with lakhs of community members said gogamedi the gogamedi led srrks is one of the two major karni senas in rajasthan the other being the shree rajput karni sena srks during the time of the previous bjp government both the karni senas had protested against the bjpparty traditionally supported by rajputs over issues such as the encounter of gangster anandpal singh and the sidelining of rajput leaders such as former union minister jaswant singh by former chief minister vasundhara raje at the kesariya mahapanchayat held on sunday the karni sena paid tribute to rajput leader lokendra singh kalvi who died recently the mahapanchayat was the latest amongstring of caste mahapanchayats earlier jat and brahmin communities had held similar events at the same venue near the vidhyadhar nagar stadium advertisement as the event by karni sena was in progress another mahapanchayat was held in jaipur by the scheduled caste sc and scheduled tribe st communities

Title: etwg regulatory frameworks will boost green hydrogen ecosystem
Article: gandhinagar speakers at the second energy transition working group etwg meeting of the g20 which got underway in gandhinagar on sunday said that policy mechanisms common protocol for hydrogen certification and regulatory frameworks along with collaborations between countries could accelerategreen hydrogen ecosystem bhupinder singh bhalla secretary union ministry of new and renewable energy mnre said creating policy mechanisms and regulatory frameworks along with establishing collaborations between countries could accelerategreen hydrogen ecosystem developing consensus oncommon framework for hydrogen certification would be extremely critical to enable global hydrogen trade achieving this will be of paramount importance as part of g20 deliberations and discussions delegates from solar energy corporation of india seci international solar alliance isa and world resources institute india wri india along with participants from international research organizations industry participants regulatory bodies and other key stakeholders are attending the etwg meeting givingglobal perspective on green hydrogen gauri singh deputy director general irena international renewable energy agency said at present about 100mt of hydrogen is produced globally and 98 of that comes from fossil fuels madhav pai interim ceo program executive director sustainable cities transport wri india said that green hydrogen is poised to playvital role in the cross sectoral decarbonisation of hard to abate sectors and is thereforecrucial element forsustainable low carbon future he said

Title: bionest bionest bhu selected under up start up policy
Article: varanasi in its attempt to implement the up start up policy 2020 and createwide network of start up incubators in up the state government has selected bionest bhu for financial support of rs 1 5 crores to provide incubation support to the entrepreneurs and start ups of uttar pradesh the bionest bhu was established in the central discovery centre of banaras hindu university in 2019 withgenerous support of biotechnology industry research assistance council birac new delhi under the leadership of prof anil kumar tripathiprofessor of biotechnology and director of the institute of science bionest bhu has created 15 furnished rooms with two well equipped laboratories to provide incubation support to faculty members researchers innovators and start ups working in the field of life sciences biotechnology healthcare agriculture food technology energy waste management and other allied areas prof tripathi said that the bionest bhu helps startups innovators in writing grant applications and pitch ideas before investors to support the development of research based products currently 8 start ups of bionest bhu are working in different fields that have the potential to become unicorns in the coming years the start in up grant will be used to support the entrepreneurs of up by providing them guidance mentorship access to research and analytical facilities in promoting bio based entrepreneurship with the continued efforts of the bionest bhu team to promote entrepreneurship in bhu and neighboring regions three entrepreneurs of bionest bhu succeeded in getting the prestigious biotechnology ignition grant worth rs 50 lakhs each from the department of biotechnology

Title: driver killed 11 hurt as 2 vehicles collide in uttarakhand
Article: rudrapurtaxi on its way from ramnagara madhotanda in pilibhit uttar pradesh to rudrapur udham singh nagar collided head on withcar near the paheniya toll plaza in khatima town the impact was such that the taxi turned turtle killing its driver on the spot the other occupants of the two vehicles nine passengers of the taxi and two persons in the car have been sent to the sub district hospital in khatima police have impounded both vehicles and sent the victimbody for post mortem and later handed it over to his family the dead has been identified as 46 year old rajeev saxena from punjabi colony ward 10 kichha ravindra kumar45 year old bareilly resident and his daughter arshiya anand are also critical and have been referred tohigher centre we are investigating the incident to determine the cause of the accident we will take the required legal actions said khatima ssi ashok kumar

Title: oscar pistorius denied parole for murder of reeva steenkamp parole board says he hasnserved enough time
Article: former olympic runner oscar pistorius was denied parole on friday and will have to stay in prison at least another year and four months after it was decided that he had not served the minimum detention period required to be released following his murder conviction for the 2013 killing of girlfriend reeva steenkamp the parole board hearing pistorius application ruled he would be able to apply again in august 2024 south africadepartment of corrections said instatement the board citednew clarification on pistorius sentence that was issued by south africasupreme court of appeal three days ago according to the statement the result wassurprise but there has been legal wrangling over when pistorius should be eligible for parole because of the series of appeals in his case he was initially convicted of culpable homicidecharge comparable to manslaughter in 2014 but the case went throughnumber of appeals before pistorius was finally sentenced to 13 years and five months in prison for murder in 2017 serious offenders must serve at least half their sentence to be eligible for parole in south africa and pistorius lawyers had gone to court to argue that he was now eligible because he had served the required portion of time in jail from late 2014 following his culpable homicide conviction june steenkamp the mother of reeva steenkamp attended pistorius hearing friday to oppose his parole the parents of reeva steenkamp have said they still do not believe pistorius account of their daughterkilling pistorius has always claimed he killed steenkamp in the pre dawn hours of valentineday 2013 after mistaking her fordangerous intruder in his home the steenkamps said they think he killed her intentionally afterlate night argument and want him to stay in prison

Title: public library opened in east delhi
Article: new delhilibrary built by local mp gautam gambhir in east delhipriya enclave has been opened to the public the library which was handed over to the mcd by the mp is named after freedom fighter shaheed bhagat singh it will be open all days from 8am to 2pm the roughly 1 500 sq ft library has over 2 000 books and more are being added gambhir said it hasreading hallchildrensection and two computers with wi fi facilities the library has been set up at what was previouslydumpsite in priya enclave he said

Title: ips dg prisons among 5 senior ips officers shunted in state
Article: lucknow five senior ips officers were reshuffled after the superannuation of ds chauhan special dg law and order prashant kumar was given additional charge of economic offences wing while special dg crime mk bashal was made special dg in up power corporation dg cb cid vijay kumar was given the additional charge of vigilance establishment the charge of vigilance was until now with chauhan dg up power corporation sn sabat was made dg prisons while dg prisons anand kumar was shifted to cooperation cell recently illegal meetings had taken place between sbsp mla abbas ansari with his wife nikhat at chitrakoot jail in connivance with the jail officials five jail officials were also arrested in the case meanwhile in bareilly central jail jailer deputy jailer along with four other jail personnel were suspended for allegedly facilitating meetings between former mla ashraf brother of atiq ahmed and his aides illegally in the bareilly district jail

Title: now you can monitor relaying of roads in chennai
Article: chennai gone are the days when the greater chennai corporation secretly laid roads at midnight to bring in transparency and citizen participation the corporation has begun publishing details of roads being relaid onspecific day this will include type of relaying name of contractor and name of project consultant the civic body has also published the contact details of the consultants and its own engineers for residents to reach out and check road status on saturday details of 58 roads being relaid across the city were published online corporation commissioner gagandeep singh bedi said we want the public to know about the roads being laid so that there is transparency in the implementation process we have also asked the contractors to relay badly laid roads if there is transparency the quality of work will be better senior officials had also been asked to inspect the roads at night he added chief ministerk stalin mayorpriya and chief secretary irai anbu have all conducted midnight inspections of road laying in the city in the last couple of months last year several newly laid roads were relaid as they were not milled corporation officials said that with the details now in public residents too can monitor the work and help the civic body save on relaying costs civic activists welcomed the move and urged residents to take part in the relaying process activist dayanand krishnan said transparency was welcome contractors must ensure the roads are milled and the height is not increased he said satish galley of omr said earlier the contractors used to put up notice boards with all the project details this is not followed now and the corporation should ask the contractors to put up the boards again to make residents aware of the work he said

Title: venkatesh iyer yearns to regain his mojo at kkr in ipl 2023
Article: in 2021 venkatesh iyer suddenly found himself in the arclight with his exploits in the purple and gold of the kolkata knight riders the side having experimented with nine other opening combinations since 2019 without much success finally found the answer to its batting woes in powerplay overs in the unheralded all rounder from indore the arrival of iyer right after the five month covid induced hiatus was likewhiff of fresh air opening alongside shubman gill the 6 foot 4 inch tall left handed batter helped the team register back to back wins against virat kohliroyal challengers bangalore and archrival mumbai indians led by the exuberant rohit sharma he scored 41 not out vs rcb and 53 vs mi in that edition he ended up scoring 370 runs in 10 matches at an average of 41 11 his consistent performances didngo unnoticed and november 2021 was when iyer arguably lived his best 30 days immediately after being fast tracked into the indian white ball team for the new zealand series he was retained by kkr ahead of the following season the figure was 8 crore which translates tomind boggling 3900 per cent annual hike in his salary the grin says it allmoment to cherish for as he makes his debut bcci november 17 2021 all that cash besides of course making iyer way richer even changed his perspective life has changed inmanner whereve started looking at things more professionally obviously when you play more cricket you tend to bring professionalism into everything but thathow life has changed my approach towards the gameknow thathave to be precise and professional when it comes to each and everything and yeahve learnedlotnow feel thatneed to be more professional more focused thanever was he says the hefty investment however fetched modest returns in the first year iyeripl batting average dropped to 16 54 in 2022 his top score being an unbeaten half century against mumbai it was his only fifty of the season compared to the four he had clobbered in the previous iteration of the league even in india colours he failed to make heads turn in seven t20i innings he scored 133 in two odis he could only get 24 the hullabaloo had suddenly died down and he was dropped from the national side the knights however have decided to go ahead with him in the upcoming edition once again and iyer is thankful he says kkr has faith in me ascricket franchise they understand that you re not going to havegood season every time more than performances they are looking at the attitudeplayer brings to the team they look at the approach and see whether the guy is sincere and putting in the hard yardsfamiliar face in the kkr dugout might help iyer to quickly find his feet again the two time champion franchise has appointed chandrakant pandit who led madhya pradesh to its maiden ranji trophy title in 2022 as head coachhave worked with chandu sir at mp for about three years now itbeen an amazing journey andm really excited to work with him in kkr we all know that hea taskmastermaster tactician som waiting to see how he takes the stage in ipl iyer tells sportstar venkatesh iyerfigures under the tutelage of chandrakant pandit at madhya pradesh first class 1 match 26 runs hs 19 ave 13 list11 matches 652 runs hs 198 ave 58 88 100s 3 50s 1 12 wickets bbi 3 55 eco 5 62 t20s 14 matches 571 runs hs 88 ave 63 44 50s 6 13 wickets bbi 6 20 eco 8 25 he added coaching is not just about tactics itabout man management knowing your players knowing your resources in and out we do sharegood chemistry and thatgoing to help chandu sir has been so successful because of the way he man manages at micro level sic the time he takes to understand people is very less that isskill he knows how to get the best out ofcertain player while panditcoming on board is good news kkr has also been dealtmajor blow it would have to start the season in the absence of skipper shreyas iyer his lower back issue might not see the star batter return this season at all although it is being widely reported that the 28 year old has decided to delay his surgery and visit the national cricket academy nca to undergo periodic treatment in the meantime nitish rana has been asked to step in iyer wishes the senior iyer well lethope for the best more than the ipl or anything else we all want shreyas to be 100 per cent fit we all want him to play everything although shreyas unavailability will botch the tactical equations toconsiderable extent the team looks forward to the season withsteely resolve iyer says we re going to be ruthless this season as always kkr is known for playing aggressive cricket we have been givenclear template on how to go about our business chandu sir always emphasises on one thing when it comes to cricket and life that he wants us to be very disciplined iyer himself had been struggling with injuries last september he was hit on the neck bythrow from the bowler duringduleep trophy game although he madequick recovery thenfreak accident in october saw him twist his ankle and miss four months of the domestic seasonve been unlucky it was very unfortunate but then again these are parts of the gamecouldncontrol it the only thing in my hand was to do my rehab and get back to playingm really thankful to the staff in nca who took really good care of me and the latest update is thatfew weeks agowas declared 100 per cent fitwas cleared for all formats venkatesh iyer is down in pain after being hit bywild throw form bowler chintan gaja photo credit periasamythe hindu on whether he has been briefed about his role in the knights club iyer says my role remains the sameve spoken to the coaches on how to approach this season especially sincem coming back afterlong injury gap the communication has been very clearve always maintainedwant to be flexible ascricketer be it batting bowling or fielding iffeel thatm only going to open then it might be training my mind tocomfortable position som ready to bat anywhere in the lineup be it opening middle order or finishing the inningsm also ready to provide four overs with the ball to my teamhave the confidence so as and when requiredwill not shy away from bowling and maybe pickingfew wickets for the team kolkata had been very active during the trade window it acquired the services of afghanistan opener rahmanullah gurbaz and pacers lockie ferguson new zealand and shardul thakur during the auctions it snapped up two proven wicketkeeper batters injagadeesan and litton das bangladesh while also shoring up the all rounder department with the likes of david wiese namibia and shakib al hasan bangladesh iyer washappy man when he hadlook at the team sheet even before the auction we already hadset team we ve made some very good purchases and overallm really happy with the combination italwaysgood headache to have multiple players forsingle position we ve donegreat job the boys are raring to go ready to provepoint all of iyerfour appearances at the eden gardens have been in india colours as the home away format returns iyer will be looking to launchfew maximums into the stands to soak in the korbo lorbo jeetbo cheer he says itbeen my dream to play an ipl game at the eden gardens to play for kkr in front ofpacked crowd and hopefully shah rukh khan bhai cheering for us these are all moments thatve seen only on tvwanted to live these moments as the next season beckons iyer would be desperate to find his superpowers back again and there can be no better stage than the ipl to witness that epic moment for here is where the magic happensdonplay the ipl with the intention of playing in the indian teamjust go out there and focus on the task in hand thathowfunctiondonset long term goals for myself right now my priority is to represent kkr and do well ifhave to come back into the indian team it will happen if itmeant to be the only thing in my hand is to go out there and give my best for my team and leave the rest to god

Title: brar brar appointed additional judge of hc
Article: chandigarh the central government on friday notified the appointment of senior advocate harpreet singh brar as additional judge of the punjab and haryana high court the supreme court collegium had recently recommended brarname for appointment as judge in exercise of the power conferred by clause 1 of article 224 of the constitution the president is pleased to appoint harpreet singh brar to be an additional judge of the punjab and haryana high court forperiod of two years says the notification brar has also served as chairman of the state bar bar council of the punjab and haryana and president of the punjab and haryana high court bar tnn

Title: mamata banerjee has created islamic state like environment in west bengal giriraj singh
Article: mar 31 2023 09 38pm ist source toi in union minister giriraj singh slammed west bengal chief minister mamata banerjee saying that she has created an islamic state like environment in the state giriraj singh further said it is not only howrah but there is an atmosphere of fear in the whole of bengal the speech mamta banerjee was giving is going to embarrass the country there islimit to appeasement the news of arson started only after her statement came mamata banerjee wants to make west bengal into an islamic state

Title: si shoots self with service weapon after wifesuicide in telanganajangaon
Article: jangaon the sub inspector si of jangaon town shot himself on thursday after he found his wife had died by suicide according to cops sisrinivas wife swaroopa 45 hanged herself in the bathroom on thursday when neighbours found the body they immediately informed the husband who rushed to the spot soon the dcp of jangaon west zoneseetaram and local police reached the sihouse to console him the dcp enquired about the incident from the neighbours who told him that the couple had got intoheated argument the night before the neighbours said the couple had recently got their son married and since then the two had been arguing frequentlycop said incidentally sensing that srinivas was very emotionally charged and might resort to some extreme step the dcp asked him about his service revolver as well but srinivas somehow dodged the query under the pretext of using the washroom he went inside his room and shot himself with the revolver though all the policemen present there rushed in upon hearing the sound it was too late the si had died on the spot the cop added dcp seetaram saidcase has been registered under section 174 suspicious death of the crpc

Title: ambala 2 arrested in ambala with 4kg opium 2 others with 1 5kg charas
Article: ambala the crime investigation agency cia ii and anti narcotics cell anc of district police arrested four persons in two separate cases with 4kg opium and 1 50 kg charas hashish said ambala superintendent of police sp jashandeep singh randhawa on wednesday he said two residents of barnala in punjab baljinder singh alias lucky and raghubir singh alias ramu were arrested with 4kg opium andcar from an overbridge near shahpur railway crossing on the national highway nh 44 on tuesday about the second case the sp said two residents of naraingarh in ambala sanjeev kumar and vinod kumar were nabbed by police on tuesday with 1 50kg charas he said both were arrested on raipur rani naraingarh road at dhanaura villagecase was registered against both under the ndps act on tuesday he said the cops had received information that the accused sold charas in naraingarh area after procuring the contraband from hp
