Title: chouhan state govt is dedicated to uplifting women chouhan
Article: indore chief minister shivraj singh chouhan on tuesday addressedgathering of thousands of women in khandwa to promote ladli behna yojana and said the state government is dedicated to uplift women chouhan carried out1 5km long road show from the municipal corporation square to indira chowk that saw locals and party workers givingfloral welcome from the stages erected on the route inprogramme ladli behna mahasammelan organized in ratagarh village the cm was presentedportrait of him made from rakhi before chouhan took the mike and addressed the gathering as an orator while walking on150 square feet long ramp chouhan who started his speech by singingbollywood moviesong phulo ka taro ka sabka kehna hain ek hazaaron mein meri behna hain and expressed gratitude on receiving an incredible reception he emphasized on improving the childbirth ratio while the state governmentschemes like ladli laxmi yojana ladli behna yojana and mukhyamantri kanya vivah yojana are helpful in it the cm announced that at least 30 of posts in police department will be reserved and filled by women as around one crore women of mp are expected to be benefitted under ladli behna yojana it will be an additional burden of rs 12 000 crore inyear to give them financial assistance of rs 1 000 month chouhan said adding that he will manage to arrange said money to distribute among the beneficiaries the last date to apply under the scheme is april 30 he said further asking the gathering of thousands of women to support him and bjp and asked them to stay alert from congress and mpcc chief kamal natham also giving you my words thatwill live and die only for you he said during chouhanvisit to khandwa local police arrested around 10 congress workers including corporator for allegedly planning to stageprotest before the cm by showing him black flags over disqualification of rahul gandhi from lok sabha the enraged congress workers claimed that they had sought time to meet the cm but the police arrested them

Title: himachal pradesh cm invites balika ashram children to witness assembly session
Article: shimla himachal pradesh chief minister sukhvinder singh sukhu on tuesday invited 69 children of balika ashram tutikandi including 16 orphans to watch the proceedings of the state assembly the chief minister interacted with the destitute children during their visit to the assembly sukhu who had lunch with them asked them about their experience in the house during conversations with the children he highlighted the governmentinitiatives for their welfare including the mukhya mantri sukh aashray scheme and other initiatives for students

Title: punjab directs enhanced testing amid rising cases
Article: chandigarh in view of the rise in number of new covid 19 cases the punjab health department on wednesday issued directions for ramping up testing and enhancing preventive measures punjab has been witnessingrise in cases from february last week and has recorded 771 fresh cases between march 1 to april 4 20 cases per day on average against the testing capacity of close to 45 000 only about 2 000 tests are being conducted ondaily basis inreview meeting held with deputy commissioners and civil surgeons the principal secretary health asked them to monitor testing of each district and ensure that sufficient tests are conducted ondaily basis the officials were also advised to visit the field to monitor covid preparedness and take corrective action where required as the number of patients requiring hospitalisations may increase the principal secretary health also ordered to ensure the smooth functioning of all the commissioned psa plants in the state and to ascertain the supply of oxygen to each level 3 bed the state hascapacity of 9 887 oxygen beds 4 004 in government hospitals and 5 883 in private hospitals of which 2 16 are currently occupied 612 government and 1 180 private it also has 1 432 icu beds with ventilators 481 government and 951 private the current occupancy rate of icu beds in the state without ventilators and with ventilators stands at 16 40 and 9 21 respectively

Title: charanjit singh in laws of ex cmson attacked
Article: mohali police have arrested two people and booked 15 others for allegedly assaulting in laws of the son of former punjab chief minister charanjit singh channi at amlala village in derabassi the accused allegedly vandalised paternal house of channidaughter in law and injured her 80 year old grandmother dharam kaur and four others the case was registered on the complaint of kaur she alleged she had sent her grandson taranveer singh to the market to fetch some items while he was returning home the accused began hurling abuses at him he narrated the incident to his father nachattar singh and other family members while the family members were discussing about the wedding function of their granddaughter in the early hours of tuesday the accused assembled outside their house and again began hurling abuses whenrelative questioned them the accused allegedly pelted stones broke into the house and vandalised the property prabhjot singh one of the family members said the accused were involved in illegal liquor trade and the family had been opposing their activity the two arrested accused are sahil and gurjit singh said asp darpan ahluwaliacase under different sections of the ipc was registered

Title: dontry to create panic ahead of baisakhi akal takht jathedar to punjab govt
Article: 03 02 hunt on for amritpal singh akal takht jathedar issues ultimatum to punjab government 04 28 amritpal singh wonbe allowed to surrender at akal takht sgpc gen sec gurcharan singh with pti inputs bathinda akal takht jathedar giani harpreet singh on friday accused the punjab government of trying to create panic by increasing security in talwandi sabo in bathinda ahead of baisakhi festival the jathedar again asked radical preacher amritpal singh to surrender he appealed to people to come for the baisakhi event at takht sri damdama sahib here in large number the jathedar asked media not to twist this statement to suggest that he is callingsarbat khalsa congregation of the community that amritpal singh wanted summoned fugitive amritpal singh in his two video messages had asked the jathedar to callsarbat khalsa on baisakhi to discuss the issues concerning the community however the jathedar had earlier announcedthree day gurmat samagam religious programme at takht damdama sahib in bathinda from april 12 to 15 harpreet singh calledspecial gathering at takht damdama sahib on friday to discuss the role of sikh and punjabi journalism sikh media contribution and challenges the state is facing at present the gathering comes attime when concerns about the rise of secessionist forces in the border state are being expressed especially in the wake ofmajor law and order breach in ajnala police station attack led by amritpal singhradical preacher declared fugitive by police the jathedar called for the formation ofbody to track and bust anti sikh phobia or punjab phobic content in the media such an organisation will be formed to track and crack whatever fake news is being circulated he said addressing the gathering the jathedar of the akal takht the highest temporal seat of sikhs said because of the tight security arrangements onlyfraction of the usual number of devotees have come here this time ahead of baisakhi every year we seebig gathering which starts from april 5 for baisakhi but at present the number of sangat is just 10 per cent the reason is the panic created by the government he saidwant to tell the punjab government through this platform that this strictness has createdpanic and it should be ended he asserted referring to certain media reports the jathedar said earlier they said amritpal singh will surrender here now they will start saying that he will surrender on baisakhi day and an attempt will be made to create panic in his name the government should avoid it the jathedar said when suchsituation is created it does not affect only the image of punjabis and punjab but also the government which is ruling punjab at least save your image he said the jathedar said leaves of police staff in punjab have been cancelled and they have been asked to be present for duty all of them have been sent to damdama sahib what will happen here he said according to sources punjab police has cancelled the leaves of all its staff till april 14 the jathedar said 10 to 15 lakh sikh devotees gather here on the occasion of baisakhiflag march was taken out on thursday while police personnel have been deployed in every nook and cranny he said an attempt was being made to project the situation as dangerous and it was very unfortunate he said baisakhi one of punjabbiggest festivals in north india marks the foundation day of the khalsa panth sikh order by the 10th sikh guru gobind singh it also marks the onset of harvest season on the day of the festival people across punjab offer prayers at gurdwaras the jathedar said not even 75 commitments made to the sikh community by successive governments at the centre have been fulfilled in the last 75 years even then we are quiet and even then we are called secessionists and terrorists how long will this continue if you suppress our voice in punjab we will speak as haryanvi from haryana as marathas from maharashtra from usa and england he said we do not want any conflict with the central government he said adding only dialogue can resolve matters speaking to reporters the jathedar again asked amritpal singh to surrenderhad earlier appealed to him he should surrender said the jathedar he also directed the shiromani gurdwara parbandhak committee the apex religious body of the sikhs to filecomplaint against the terming of flags of erstwhile sikh rule as khalistan flags by police the jathedar lamented that the sgpc had earlier too been told to filecomplaint but it did not take any meaningful step in the matter

Title: warring aap not getting candidate for jalandhar bypoll warring
Article: patiala punjab congress president amrinder singh raja warring on tuesday said that the ruling aap had failed to getcandidate for the jalandhar bypoll whereas congress was going to rev up the party campaign in the next two days warring was in patiala for the samvidhan bachao muhimprogramme that was launched from chandigarh withsatyagrah on march 26 and followed by various party meetings and marches across the state before patiala the yatras were held in amritsar and jalandhar however key congress campaigner and former pcc chief navjot singh sidhu was nowhere to be seen at the event or press conference even at the time of sidhurelease on saturday the patiala dcc office bearers did not turn up to welcome him nor did warring skirting queries regarding sidhuabsence warring wanted to know why the absence of other leaders was not questioned the pcc president slammed the centre government for trying to stifle the freedom of the fourth pillar of democracy by thwarting the opposition parties from raising national issues in parliament which is the highest forum of discussion and debate on public issues and national policy it is disrespecting the temple of democracy to fulfil its vicious motives he said warring also accused the central government of hoodwinking the citizens of the country by failing to take action against adani and silencing the voice of congress leader rahul gandhi

Title: wrestling federation to conduct two tournaments the first activity since controversy over abuse allegations
Article: the wrestling federation of india wfi announced on thursday that it would conduct national championships in the17 category as well as the senior open national ranking wrestling tournament from april 16 to april 18 the tournaments will be conducted at nandini nagar in gonda uttar pradesh these will be the first tournaments conducted by the wfi since january 21 when the indian government suspended all activities of the federation the suspended assistant secretary vinod tomar cancelled all ongoing tournaments and appointed an oversight committee to look into the day to day activities of the federation following public protests by indiatop wrestlers who made allegations of sexual harassment and financial impropriety against the wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh according to wfi general secretary vn prasood the wfi had resumed their day to day functioning earlier this week after the oversight committee submittedfact finding report into the allegations made against the wfi president the oversight committee which was supposed to conduct the day to day activity of the federation was originally to haveterm of four weeks to submit its fact finding report on 23 rd february this term was extended to another two weeks it is learned that the oversight committee had sought the help of the wfi in matters including obtaining visas for international tournaments as well as conductingselection trial to pickteam for the asian championships after the oversight committee submitted their report to the government they also submitted bills for legal costs that they incurred in their activities to the wfi that meant that their role in running day to day activities of the federation is over prasood said the wfi is also sitting at tops target olympic podium meetings now the federation says it is looking to conduct tournaments as per its calendar when the federation was suspended we had to stop the national ranking series after the first day of competition now we are completing that tournament as well as conducting the17 nationals prasood said prasood added that with the players allegations primarily being made against the wfi president there was no restriction on the wfi itself resuming its activities the wfi president is still not involved in the day to day activities of the federation he said while brij bhushan sharan singh might not be involved in the day to day activities of the federation the tournaments incidentally are set to be held on the grounds of nandini nagar mahavidyalaya which he chairs the college is located in gonda which lies in the kaiserganj lok sabha constituency from where brij bhushan has been elected multiple times asmember of parliament

Title: sec 99 set for power infra revamp to get 3 transformers
Article: noida sector 99 which has been facing frequent outages for lack of adequate power infrastructure is set to getrevamp with the pvvnl sanctioning rs 1 2 crore budget the sector will soon get three new transformers of 400kva capacity each work on installing the three new transformers along with some cables panels and feeder boxes is expected to start by next week it will takelittle overmonth to complete the work pvvnl executive engineer and area in charge rachit khanna said rishipal singh awana rwa president said the demands were finally being met afterdecade long fight we havesingle panel box for electrical connection in the sector which has 190 plots ranging from 112sqm to 450sqm residents have been facing problems in obtaining electric connections in absence of adequate infrastructure he said awana who has been pursuing the matter with both the noida authoritypower department as well as the discom attributed the delay to the two authorities passing the buck over the issue

Title: man befriends wife of patient at hosp rapes her at hotel
Article: ludhiana police have bookedman for rapingmarried woman after befriending her athospital in ludhiana the accused belonged tovillage in ludhiana district in her complaint to the police the woman claimed that from july 10 to 26 last year her husband was admitted at dmc hospital for treatment another patient was admitted in the same ward whose relative stayed at the hospital to take care of him she said there she became friends with the accused and started talking to him over the phone the complainant said on august 8 last year the man called her toplace and asked her to take him to her house as he wanted to meet her husband she said when she went to pick him up the accused told her that he had some work athotel and they will go there first the woman claimed that at the hotel he gave hercold drink which contained sedatives as she started feeling dizzy the accused forcibly took her toroom and had sexual relations with her he repeated the act while threatening to expose her sexual relationship the woman said she lodgedcomplaint with the police as lately the accused had been threatening to kill her police have booked the accused under sections 376 rape and 506 criminal intimidation of the ipc inspector kulwinder singh said the accused is yet to be arrested

Title: ambasamudram asptooth plucking incident sp put on wait
Article: no decision yet on post poll alliancetaka jds prez 12 may 2023 6 51 pm bengaluru may 12 uni on the eve of counting day for the karnataka assembly election state jds president cm ibrahim on friday denied that the party has finalised its decision about post poll alliance in the event of hung verdict see more privatization of psus central trade unions stage dharna in kakinada 12 may 2023 6 30 pm kakinada andhra pradesh may 12 uni central trade unions have staged dharna in front of the head post office here on friday demanding restoration of recognition to national federation of postal employees nfpe and dispensing with the plan of privatization of public sector undertakings psus see more ap cm launches de notification of dotted lands prog 12 may 2023 6 17 pm nellore may 12 uni andhra pradesh chief ministers jagan mohan reddy formally launched the programme of de notifying the dotted lands from the prohibited list thereby benefiting 97 471 farmer families across the state see more ap cm participates in raja syamala maha yagnam in vijayawada 12 may 2023 6 04 pm vijayawada may 12 uni andhra pradesh chief ministers jagan mohan reddy participated in the ashtottara satha kundatmaka 108 chandi rudra raja syamala sudarshana sahitha sri lakshmi maha yagnam at the indira gandhi municipal corporation igmc stadium here on friday and took the yagna sankalpam see more

Title: paper leak impossible to tell whoguilty govt tells uttarakhand hc
Article: dehradun during the hearing ofpetition in uttarakhand high court against the cancellation of recruitment to groupposts after the paper leak case surfaced the state government stated that it is impossible to segregate the guilty and the innocent candidates as the question paper was heavily circulated and leaked through whatsapp the uttarakhand subordinate services selection commission uksssc secretary surendra singh on monday filed the affidavit in the hc on behalf of the state government in the recruitment examination paper leak case the hc was hearing the petition ofcandidate jagat singh and others who had approached the court after the government cancelled the recruitment to 919 posts along with the result after the paper leak incident surfaced the commission said the company that was given the contract to conduct the exam has been debarred so that such irregularities do not happen in future its officials were also arrested and sent to jail notably uksssc had conducted the exam for recruitment to groupposts in december 2021 and the result for 916 successful candidates was declared on april 7 2022 more than 1 5 lakh applicants had appeared in the exam an fir was registered on july 22 2022 the matter is now being probed by the stf and the cyber cell in its preliminary findings the stf said that 114 candidates were directly involved in the question paper leak case and there ispossibility that other candidates might also be involved

Title: lawrence bishnoi panel set up to probe jailed gangsterinterviews
Article: chandigarh the punjab government has constitutedtwo member committee to inquire into the reasons behind gangster lawrence bishnoi presently lodged in high security bathinda central jail giving two interviews toprivate channel last month special dgp of anti drug special task force kuldeep singh would head the committee while adgp prisonschandra sekhar would be the other member the committee has been directed to submit its report by april 12 two interviews of gangster lawrence bishnoi went viral on tv channels social media in the given circumstances there wasneed to holddetailed inquiry into the matter therefore an inquiry committee was set up previous committee has been revived as follows reads the order issued by chief secretary vijay kumar janjua on march 29 which the government had kept under wrapsprivate news channel had aired bishnoifirst interview on march 14 and the second on march 17 while he was inside central jail bathinda the punjab government had claimed that the interviews were not conducted in any of the jails in the state but in rajasthan where he was taken on production warrant incase in february however even the jaipur police denied that bishnoi could have given any interview under its tight security

Title: quran not recited at karnataka temple fest as groups oppose old custom
Article: hassan the management committee of chennakeshava temple in karnatakabelur said verses of the quran were not recited during the annual brahmarathotsava that ended on tuesday amid tight security following hardline groups demand to do away with the age old custom ofmoulvi attending the event and saying portions from the holy book after accepting cash and grains handed over by the temple committee he only offered mujure thanksgiving prayer said narayana swamy head of the committee he said moulvi sajjad basha khadri saheb had issuedwritten confirmation that he didnrecite the quran the groups had earlier submittedmemorandum to register their opposition to the ritual of reciting quranic verses during rathotsava

Title: nri goons beat up nri livestream act on video call
Article: ludhiana raikot police have booked miscreants for allegedly thrashingnew zealand based nri eight to 10 unidentified men even live streamed the assault for the main accused deepak joshi of patiala presently in new zealand who hadgrudge against the victim amit sharma of guru teg bahadur colony in sanhpur amit who had come to india from new zealand on february 11 told cops that the girl with whom deepak has an affair lived with him inseparate room atrented house in new zealand he said deepak suspected him to be involved with his girlfriend and because of that he had also threatened him of dire consequences he had reported the matter to new zealand police the complainant said on march 13 he along with his friend surendra singh of dirba had come to raikot to buy clothes while going towards sangrur they tooklink road on the way two cars gavechase to their vehicle road closure forced the duo to stop their vehicle soon 8 to 10 men got down from two cars and started beating them up while one of assaulters snatched the gold chain from his neck another accused showed the assault to deepak joshi in new zealand onvideo call he said they threatened him that if he messed up with deepak in future he would have to pay with his life amit later informed police about the incident city raikot police later booked the accused under sections 379snatching 323 voluntarily causing hurt 341 wrongful restraint 506 criminal intimidation 148 rioting armed with deadly weapon 149 unlawful assembly 120criminal conspiracy of the ipc and relevant sections of information and technology act inspector kulwinder singh investigating officer from city raikot police station said the accused are yet to be arrested

Title: govt teacher wanted in rpsc paper leak nabbed from odisha
Article: jaipur suspended government school vice principal anil kumar meena alias sher singh wanted in the rpsc senior teacher recruitment exam question paper leak was nabbed from odisha byteam of special operations group sog of the rajasthan police on thursday rajasthan police had announcedreward of rs 1 lakh for information on meena leading to his arrestnative of kaladera in chomu town near jaipur meena is suspected to have provided the question paper to kingpins bhupendra saran and suresh dhaka before the exam which led to the cancellation of the recruitment exam in december last year the accused was also the vice principal ofgovernment school in sirohi police said that meena would be brought to jaipur for questioning according to sources sog teams have been tracking the accused forlong time after saranarrest he fled to odisha after spending various spells hiding in various cities cops said that meena had moved to the kalahandi district and started working aslabourer meena first came under the scanner as the first in the chain of suspects for leaking the question paper after saran claimed he had purchased the questions paper from him forhefty price speaking to toisenior police official said that meenaarrest would help the police discover how the paper kept under heightened security was leaked the exam which was to be held on december 24 was cancelled after it was found that some students in udaipur had received the paper before the exam police arrested over 50 persons including students and launchedmanhunt to arrest saran and dhaka while saran was held in february from bengaluru both dhaka and meena were on the run last week the udaipur police arrestedwoman banker from jaipur who was allegedly inrelationship with meena and also playedrole in the paper leak meenaarrest is important he can reveal to us how he first managed to get the question paper kept under heavy security said an officer the investigation into the case was handed over to the sog

Title: weightlifter sanjita chanu handed four year ban for failing dope test
Article: sanjita chanu was banned by the international weightlifting federation iwf in 2018 after she had tested for an anabolic steroid testosterone prior to the world championships in us 2017 picture credit twitter in another blow indian weightlifter sanjita chanu has been handedfour year ban after failingdope test last year the national anti doping agency nada on tuesday april 4 announced this decision as reported by the nada the two time commonwealth games champion was tested positive for an anabolic steroid called drostanolone metabolite this substance is among the listed prohibited materials by the world anti doping agency wada the concerned body further added that the 29 year old weightliftersamples were collected during the national games in gujarat in the september october 2022 this decision of the nada was even confirmed by the indian weightlifting federation iwf president sahdev yadav yes she has been handedfour year ban by nada he told pti as quoted by toi sanjita to be stripped of silver medal seeing this development the indian weightlifter will be stripped off her national games silver medal the 29 year old still has the option of appealing the decision made by nada notably this is not the first time the weightlifter has been involved indope controversy sanjita chanu was banned by the international weightlifting federation iwf in 2018 after she had tested for an anabolic steroid testosterone prior to the world championships in us 2017

Title: wrestling vinesh phogat says wrestlers to consider going to court in fight against wfi chief
Article: indiastar wrestler vinesh phogat said that indian wrestlers will have no choice but to approach courts if the findings of the oversight committee which was set up to probe allegations of sexual harassment against wrestling federation of india president brij bhushan sharan singh is not released wrestlers including but not limited to phogat tokyo olympics bronze medallist bajrang punia and rio olympics bronze medallist sakshi malik organisedsit in protest in new delhi jantar mantar in january to protest the functioning of the wfi while brij bhushan singh denied the allegations the union sports ministry asked the bjp mp from kaiserganj to step down from his role and set up an oversight committee to probe the allegations and setdeadline of one month to submit its findings phogat punia and malik had expressed their disappointment in not being consulted by the sports ministry in the setting up of the oc also read with pending criminal cases wrestling chief accused of sexual abuse is no stranger to controversy why is there secrecy over the findings of the oversight committee and the details about how they went about the probe women wrestlers have shown the courage to speak about what they faced but it seems like their words donmatter we have raisedvery sensitive issue which concerns the safety of women wrestlers phogatthree time commonwealth games gold medallist told the indian express we have lost faith in the committee we received some assurances from the government but they were not fulfilled too we do not know the status of the report filed by the committee as well every time we ask what is the status and finding of the oversight committee report there is no response from anyone she added phogat also said that she and punia tried to reach out to oc member mc mary kom and sports minister anurag thakur but received no response we are left with no other option but to approach the court in our fight for justice stepping back is not an option now phogat said the 28 year old also alleged that though the brij bhushan had been removed from his post of wfi chief he still runs the day to day affairs of the federation she pointed out that the open national senior ranking wrestling tournament for women and greco roman has been scheduled to be held at nandini nagar in gonda from april 16 to 18 brij bhushan hails from gonda and the district ispart of his lok sabha constituency and is considered to be his stronghold unbelievable wfi which has resumed functioning why announces u17 nationals 2023 when april 16 18 where nandini nagar gondanagar gonda is the area in which accused brij bhusan is the ruler king and everything how can this be possible pic twitter com smt6sqt8ez vinay siwach april 6 2023 nandini nagar in gonda was chosen despite us saying what all had happened to women wrestlers earlier how can this even happen whensaw that the venue of the senior ranking tournament was in gondadid try to reach members of the oversight committee but nobody seems to have any answer she added the oc includes boxing legend and rajya sabha member mc mary kom olympic medalist and former wrestler yogeshwar dutt former badminton player and mission olympic cell member trupti murgunde former ceo of the target olympic podium scheme rajesh rajagopalan and former sports authority of india executive director teams radhica sreeman later on 2012 world championships bronze medal winning wrestler babita phogat was also added to the committee

Title: wfi case signed report with objections says member of sports ministry appointed oversight committee
Article: a member of the sports ministry appointed oversight committee that probed allegations of sexual harassment and financial mismanagement levelled against the wrestling federation of india wfi and its chief brij bhushan sharan singh has raised objections to the manner in which the report was compiled and says to have signed the final report which was submitted to the ministry three days back under protest members of the committee had to sign the report before it was submitted to the sports ministrywrote on the report thatwill sign with objections to this report the member told sportstar on condition of anonymity the sports ministry on january 23 had appointedsix person committee headed by olympic boxing bronze medallist mc mary kom following public protests by several of indiatop wrestlers at jantar mantar in new delhi in january this year the other members of the committee were former ceo of target olympic podium scheme tops capt rajagopalan former sai executive director teams radhika sreeman former badminton national champion trupti murgunde olympic bronze medallist yogeshwar dutt and commonwealth wrestling champion babita phogat also read wrestling federation to conduct two tournaments the first activity since controversy over abuse allegationswas not allowed to read the final report in full andhad objected about it the report was submitted to the sports ministry on the april 5 and that morningrealised that certain objectionshad earlier raised had not been included in the report whenasked the committee to include these points this was not donesigned and registering my protest the member said the member also raised concerns regarding the committeeevidence collection methodwrote in my objection that no document submitted by witnesses or the wrestling federation or recording of witness statement was shared with the members of the committee none of the witness deposition was signed by either the witness or by the members of the committee we did not cross check or verify with any of the witnesses if their testimony was right or wrong we only recorded what was said there were individuals who had an incentive to speak in favour of one party the member said the member further alleged that brij bhushan sharan singh the six time member of parliament and president of the wrestling federation of india against whom allegations of harassment had been made recorded his statement in the absence oflawyer in matters of sexual harassment all statements are to be taken in the presence ofthird party who islawyer this was done in the case of the athletes who had complained but it was not done for the wfi president the member said the committee member said objections were raised several times prior to the finalisation of the report any objectionraised during meetings of the committee was not recorded in the minutes of the meeting whenasked why this was not recordedwas told that the matter would be discussed later the member said in this way my objections were ignored decisions were taken unilaterally when trials to select the team for the asian championships were heldhad objections since this was the first time we had trials where we called20 athletes but several senior players were not able to compete added the committee member several athletes were later allowed to compete in the trials after approaching the court the member added that the committee has not made any suggestions on the most serious allegations raised by the protesting wrestlers they have not made any recommendations regarding the various allegations that had been madehave mentioned in the report that no suggestions have been made which will either support or contradict what the athletes have said the member said

Title: wfi sexual harassment after committee memberobjections bajrang punia questions probe report
Article: new delhi olympic and world championships medallist bajrang punia who ledprotest against wrestling federation of india president brij bhushan sharan singh over allegations of sexual harassment has said now come out to question the probe into the allegations against singhnews report recently claimed that one of the members of the oversight committee which was constituted by the sports ministry to probe the allegations was not in agreement with its final report it indicates something suspicious is being done either by the committee or the ministry someone is doing something wrong punia told the news indian express on january 23 after weeks of protest bynumber of prominent indian wrestlers the union sports ministry constitutedsix member committee headed by olympic medallist and boxer mary kom the other members of the committee were former ceo of target olympic podium scheme tops capt rajagopalan former sai executive director teams radhika sreeman former badminton national champion trupti murgunde olympic bronze medallist yogeshwar dutt and commonwealth wrestling champion babita phogat phogat was added only after wrestlers expressed displeasure at the committeemembership one of the members of the committee told sportstar on the condition anonymity that they had objections to the way the committeereport was drafted and so have signed it with objections members of the committee had to sign the report before it was submitted to the sports ministrywrote on the report thatwill sign with objections to this report the member saidwas not allowed to read the final report in full andhad objected about it the report was submitted to the sports ministry on the april 5 and that morningrealised that certain objectionshad earlier raised had not been included in the report whenasked the committee to include these points this was not donesigned and registering my protestwrote in my objection that no document submitted by witnesses or the wrestling federation or recording of witness statement was shared with the members of the committee none of the witness deposition was signed by either the witness or by the members of the committee we did not cross check or verify with any of the witnesses if their testimony was right or wrong we only recorded what was said there were individuals who had an incentive to speak in favour of one party the member continued responding to this report punia told the new indian express through your newspaperwanted to tell the people of this country that the statements given by the women wrestlers against the wfi chief should be made public so that they also know the truth the whole process was videographed these videos should be run on news channels these statements should be made public to decide whether he singh was guilty or notdonknow who wants to save him who all are supporting him we had faith in the government that it would give justice to us however the way things are going on we donfeel like the government will support us or go with the truth two upcoming events announced by the wfi have also come under the scanner according to the print because they are being held in singhstronghold uttar pradeshgonda both the17 national championships on april 16 and senior open national ranking wrestling tournament on april 18 are to be held at the nandini nagar mahavidyalayacollege that singh helped found wfi general secretaryn prasood told the print that the events were being held because the investigation committee had submitted its report to the government punia told the new indian express that it was unfair for the wfi to resume functioning without telling the complainants or the public the findings of the probe the wfi has resumed its activities even as the report of the oversight committee has not been made public yet we donknow whether the committee has submitted its report or not we donhave any information on it yet he said

Title: rinku 2 mins silence for those who missed it rinku singhlast over heroics bring down internet
Article: disclaimer this iscompilation of tweets being shared by netizens around the world times of india neither condones nor endorses any of the views shared in this article here kolkata knight riders swashbuckling batter rinku singh smashed five consecutive sixes to pull offthrilling three wicket win over gujarat titans in the indian premier league at the narendra modi stadium in ahmedabad on sunday needing 29 runs off the last over rinku whacked left arm pacer yash dayal for five maximums on the trot to registerlast ball sensational victory for kolkata knight riders rinku singh the road to success has beenlong and arduous one but never did he flinch or give up and addedglorious chapter to the ipl story by doing the unthinkable here on sunday the 25 year old from uttar pradeshaligarh blasted 48 off 21 balls to see kolkata knight riders home withthree wicket win against defending champions gujarat titans on sunday the win has propelled kkr to second in the table with four points after three matches rinku48 not out from 21 balls included six sixes and one four with kkr nailing down200 plus chase in dying moments in the game not even the worldbest batters would have backed themselves to hit five consecutive sixes with their team requiring 28 from the last five balls but kkrleft handed rinku did exactly that producingterrific knock that will be remembered and talked about for years rinkuknock set the internet ablaze withdownpour of memes and jokes hailing the finisher

Title: i believedcould do it rinku singh on his sensational 5 sixes in final over for kkr vs gt
Article: by india today sports desk the equation in the final over looked improbable for kolkata knight riders they needed 29 runs in the final over against gujarat titans instunning ipl 2023 match on sunday april 9 however rinku singh who was batting with no 9 batter umesh yadav believed that he could pull it off yash dayal the young gujarat titans bowler who impressed in his winning campaign in ipl 2022 was handed the responsibility of bowling the final over kkrcamp looked in distress as they had nearly fluffedgood chance to win after100 run stand between captain nitish rana and venkatesh iyer 83 alazarri joseph struck twice to remove the well set batters advertisement then came rashid khan who redeemed himself after giving away 35 runs in his first 3 overs by picking uphat trick in his final over sending back andre russell sunil narina and shardul thakur gtkkr ipl 2023 highlights however rinku singh pulled off one of the most stunning chases in the history of ipl hitting 5 sixes in the final over 1 6 6 6 6 6 read the scoreboard as rinku was punching the air in delight after breaking the hearts of thousands of gujarat fans at the narendra modi stadium kkr pulled off205 run chase to clinch their second successive win in ipl 2023 reflecting on his stunning onslaught in the final over rinku singh revealed the chat with his captain nitish saying the latter had told him to take the chase deephad belief thatcan do this rana bhai said to keep belief and to bat till the end then we will see what happens riku singh said the left hander who fell short of pulling offsimilar chase when kkr needed 21 runs in the final over against lucknow super giants last year said he did not think much but wanted to hit sixes in the final over and he did that withlot of precision rinku hit dayal who missed his length indifficult final overwas just trying to hit sixes umesh bhaiya was asking me not to think much and just play the ballwas not thinkinglot was just reacting to the ball it kept coming out of the middlehad belief and it came off in the end rinku added rinku singh was awarded the player of the match award for his stunning knock inmatch that will be remembered forlong long time in the ipl history

Title: govt by 2047 india to get 9 of its electricity fromsources
Article: india will get 9 of its electricity from nuclear sources by 2047 when the country will celebrate 100 years of independence union minister jitendra singh said on sunday this will help in getting closer to the governmentcommitment of achieving net zero emission target by 2070 he added india also committed to reaching 500gw of non fossil electricity capacity generating half of all energy requirements from renewables and reducing emissions by one billion tonnes by 2030 after holdingreview meeting withgroup of senior scientists from bhabha atomic research centre barc in mumbai the minister said that the other target laid down by the department of atomic energy is achieving20 gigawatt capacity of nuclear power generation by the year 2030 which according to him will bemajor milestone placing india as the third largest producer of atomic energy after the us and france during 2021 22 nuclear power reactors generated 47 112 million units of electricity thatabout 3 15 of the countrytotal power generation singh had recently informed lok sabha the present installed nuclear power capacity is set to increase from 6 780 mw to 22 480 mw by 2031 on progressive completion of projects under construction and accorded sanction he had said

Title: union minister hardeep singh puri lauds ttdcontributions to healthcare education
Article: tirupati the tirumala tirupati devasthanams ttd received appreciation from union petroleum minister hardeep singh puri for its contributions in the areas of healthcare and education on the sidelines of his two day tour to the temple city of tirupati hardeep puri offered prayers to lord venkateswara at the tirumala temple on tuesday morning later the union minister visited sri padmavathi childrensuper specialty hospital which was recently established by the ttd in tirupati and lauded the temple trust for establishingstate of the art hospital exclusively for the children hardeep puri also visited the ttd run birrd hospital in tirupati on tuesday

Title: sukhvinder singh sukhu we aim to make himachal most progressive sukhu
Article: shimla chief minister sukhvinder singh sukhu on sunday said his government was making efforts to bring the economy of the state back on track we will work on the goal to make himachal pradesh one of the most progressive and prosperous states of the country in the next 10 years the cm said while addressing the himachali population in new delhi he said the budget presented by his government focused on growth of all sectors especially uplifting the rural economy himachal is on its way to becominggreen state by 2026 sukhu added the cm further said the state government was sincerely chalking out strategies for the speedy development of the state he also invited himachalis residing outside the state to visit the state in coming years to see positive and constructive changes in the state due to the visionary policies and programmes of his government sukhu said his government was taking various other initiatives like connecting all districts with heliports expansion of kangra airport and speeding up of work on roads we are also promoting tourism in kangra district and coming up with many ambitious projects to attract more tourists to the area he said the cm also elaborated on the initiatives taken by his government to encourage use of electric vehicles and solar energy he also highlighted the steps taken by the state government to providerespectable life to orphan children in the state through mukhya mantri sukh aashray scheme

Title: mann dares mann to debate on law order
Article: jalandhar alleging that the mafiainfluence had inreased in punjab punjab congress leader navjot singh sidhu who was released from jail last week on saturday asked punjab chief minister bhagwant mann to debate with him on the issue in the presence of media he has also dared the punjab government to take back his remaining security cover speaking to media at the residence of congress candidate karamjit kaur where he had come to condole the death of her husband and late mp santokh singh chaudhary sidhu alleged that the aap government was running the mafia it is clear that mafia canrun without patronage it has rather doubled in the last one year and is thriving in different sectors he said and asked the cm to sit with him fordebate in the presence of tv cameras he also dig at aap fielding former congress mla sushil rinku tnn

Title: congress leaders want navjot singh sidhu to playmajor role in punjab politics but others question his sincerity
Article: amritsar noting the significance of cricketer turned politician navjot singh sidhu who arrived at his amritsar home after nearly ten months of what many congressmen refer to asjail yatra and the rousing welcome given to him by the congress leaders it is clear that he will play an important role in the punjab congress especially after meeting rahul gandhi and priyanka gandhi before travelling to amritsar congress workers and leaders had arrived with dholto welcome sidhu and raised high pitched slogans upon his arrival at golden gate while accepting peoples greetings and siropasidhu vowed that he wouldnlet anyone cause any harm to the interests of punjab the conspicuous absence offew congress leaders certainly raisedquestion marks on sidhuacceptance among all congress leaders of the region like other politicians sidhu former mla and mp had promised to root out corrupt practices and injustice but unfortunately the promises remained unfulfilled and then comesshattering blow to congress when he was sent to jail inroad rage case in his meeting with the gandhis navjot reportedly expresseddesire to concentrate his political efforts in punjab according to sources in sidhucamp using words likementor for rahul philosopher and guide for priyanka isclassic example of navjotservility to the gandhi family as many other politicians are doing saidpolitical observer and analyst dr avtar singh he claimed that in the past sidhu had failed to deliver the promises made to him and nowcommon man didnhave many hopes for him he may be an ardent speaker but that alone is not enough he said common people long for employment and social justice and it is natural for people to raise questions when their basic demands were not fulfilled by the politicians whom they had sent to the assembly or the parliament avtar singh said contrary to avtarobservation senior congress leader and former mla sunil dutti said navjot singh sidhu had the capacity to enthuse fresh spirit among the workers and they were expecting sidhu to playsignificant role in the party sidhu would be paying obeisance at golden temple durgiana temple and sri ram teerath on sunday and could also hold meetings with congress leaders to chalk out the future course of action

Title: male leopard run over by vehicle in uttarakhandus nagar
Article: rudrapur on friday nightleopard was killed inhit and run accident on national highway 74 near maheshpura village of bazpur in the district udham singh nagar the identity of the vehicle that struck the feline remains unknown the forest officials were alerted to the scene and quickly took control of the situation transporting the carcass of the leopard away from the busy highway range officer of the banna khera forest laxman mahtolia said that the big cat sustained head injuries and died on the spot it wasmale leopard around eight years old all its body parts were intact and the carcass was cremated after the postmortem examination police were also notified of the incident and registeredcase against the unknown driver responsible for the fatal accident he added

Title: ctm 36 yr old mentally unstable woman strangled to death
Article: ahmedabad36 year old mentally unstable woman from the jashodanagar area of the city was found murdered near the ctm bridge on saturday night the post mortem report of the deceased tulsi makwana revealed that she had been strangled to death tulsibrother akha bhati who works asplumber withprivate firm in vatva gidc said that she had marriedman from vasna named chaman makwana however following domestic disputes they had not been living together for the past four years tulsi who has two daughters aged 18 and 13 had been living with bhati since moving out of her husbandhouse however following the separation she had been suffering from mental illness and would often leave the house and roam around bhati reportedly told the cops he said that even tulsihusband had been suffering from mental illness and he too roamed around on friday at around 5pm tulsi came to her brotherhouse but left infew minutes since then she had been missing and the family was unable to trace her on saturday night bhaticousin sentpicture of tulsibody lying near the ctm bridge towards express highwaytravel firm owner who had his office near sahjanand residential society near where the body was found called up the police the body was sent for postmortem at civil hospital in asarwa the report suggested that she had been strangled to death bhati stated in the fir ramol police registeredcase of murder against an unidentified person and began an investigation

Title: army to clear snow clogged hemkund sahib yatra trek route
Article: dehradunteam of the army will conductspecial operation to clear the snow clogged trek route for the hemkund sahib pilgrimage site situated at an altitude of over 13500 feet in chamoli the work to clear the snow and maketrek route through the heap of snow will start on april 20 while the yatra to hemkund sahibrevered sikh shrine will start on may 20 this year on sunday the brigade commander of the armyjoshimath unit brigadier aman anand accompanied by other army officers visited the hemkund sahib to take stock of the situation according to the hemkund sahib management trust seva singh general manager of gurdwara at govindghat informed that there is 8 12 feet of snow on the atlakoti glacier ahead of the sikh shrine the office bearers of the trust and other workers will start proceeding to ghangaria gurdwara from april 15 onwards for the yatra preparations they will also holdlangar for the army personnel said seva singh besides as many as 70 workers from the statepublic works department pwd are already working between pulna and ghangriya according to the gurudwara trust
