Title: congress congress digs up video of cmson praising islam
Article: bhopal while the war of words between chief minister shivraj singh chouhan and state congress president kamal nath over communal unrest and iftar rages on the congress on saturday dug out an old video of kartikeya chouhan the eldest son of the cm where the youngster says he salutes muslims who love the nation and have sympathy for the poor this week chouhan and nath locked horns overvideo of an iftar party which was hosted in chhindwaravideo of nath at the gathering shows him saying bjp will destroy the country he is also seen speaking to muslim community elders about communal unrest in parts of the country during ram navami after this the exchange of barbs between chouhan and nath got acrimonious chouhan accused nath of instigating communal tension in the state and even called him mad nath retaliated by saying that chouhan as chief minister has destroyed an entire generation on saturday state congress media cell chief kk mishra postedvideo on his twitter handle in which kartikeya is seen addressingpublic meeting in sehore district islam means peace islam means amity islam means lovesalute the religion that teaches peace amity love and humanity kartikeya says in the video adding what is the meaning of muslim it means mussallam imaan vadaaperson who believes in khuda god and follows the rulesperson who loves his nation and country who loves elders orphans and poorperson in whose heart there is sympathy for the poor and helpless kartikeya chouhan salutes such muslims mishra tweeted our worthy nephew kartikeya singh chouhan has become promising therefore the 64 year old chief minister father should either sit at home or learn something from his son there is no age for abilities but now age has started dominating you what happened to you

Title: jgovt appoints 4 dyssp as incharge superintendents of police
Article: post by rk online desk on monday april 10 2023 the jammu and kashmir government on monday ordered the placement of four deputy superintendents of police selection grade as incharge superintendents of police according to an order issued by additional chief secretaryk goyal sanction is hereby accorded to the placement of the following deputy superintendents of police selection grade as incharge superintendent of police in their own pay and grade with immediate effectsajad ahmad sheikh kps 16055 ii vishal manhas kps 116201 iii vinod kumar kps 116212 and iv ajay sharma kps 116202 the arrangement is purely onstop gap basis and shall not confer any right on the incumbents to claim preferential treatment for their promotion as and when the same is made in accordance with the rules further the placements shall be without prejudice to the outcome of writ petitiono if any pending consideration before the courttribunalof competent jurisdiction it reads

Title: pandemic scare 2 deaths reported
Article: raipur amid the fear of rising covid 19 cases chhattisgarh recorded one more covid death in the capital city on saturday earlier that day48 year old man who had been undergoing treatment for covid at aiims raipur and suffering from co morbidities kidney failure and diabetes was reported dead in view of rising cases the state health authorities have taken steps to scale up testing across the state an elderly woman residing in raipur died on saturday following suffered renal failure after complaining of uneasiness she was admitted to the aiims raipur and was later tested positive for covid said the state epidemic controller dr subhash mishra the patient was under observation but her health kept deteriorating her death was recorded under death with co morbidities and was also fully vaccinated he added this was third death reported in april while the fourth in the year 2023 all the reported deaths this year have been of patients with co morbidities later precautionary testing of the family was done and no one was tested positive

Title: nihangs clash at morcha stir site 1 almost loses his hand
Article: mohali two groups of nihangs clashed at the quami insaaf morcha protest site here in the early hours of sunday leaving one of them with almostsevered hand the two warring groups belonged to baba amna singh during the fight one of them tookswipe at zora singh alias babbar 29 withsharp edged weapon nearly slashing his left hand that was left dangling from the skin he was rushed to civil hospital from where doctors referred him to pgi on receiving information about the clash cops reached the site ssp sandeep garg said we have arrested the accused identified as mela singh he is booked for attempt to murder we have also registeredcase against seven to eight unidentified persons search is on to arrest them we have recovered the weapons used in the clash police said the fir was registered under sections 307 120148 149 of the ipc the arrested accused will be produced in the court on monday police said an argument broke out between the two sides over some issue and escalated intofight on february 8 members of the quami insaaf morcha had clashed with cops and vandalised police vehicles at the road dividing sectors 52 and 53 around 1 2km away from the original protest site at dolphin crossing where the group has camped since january 7 demanding the release of sikh convicts languishing in jails despite completing their sentences

Title: woman found dead saree around neck
Article: mumbai the partially decomposed body of25 year old woman was found in her rented flat in vasai on sunday the matter came to light when residents complained offoul smell fromflat on the first floor manickpur police said the flat was rented out bycouple mumtaz kazi and mubin kazi the rent agreement stated they were husband and wife the body of mumtaz was lying on the bedsaree wrapped around the neck indicating that it could have been suicide the police said they have launchedsearch for mubin tnn

Title: why antim panghalrise should be cause of worry for ace wrestler vinesh phogat
Article: wrestling the 19 year old competes in the same weight bracket as the veteran and recently won silver in the asian championships while vinesh phogat has established herself as one of the greatest female wrestlers from india antim panghal is making waves and is perceived to havebright future in the sport despite belonging to the same weight class the two wrestlers have been working on distinctive goals lately they are none other than three time commonwealth games gold medalist vinesh phogat and rising star antim panghal why has vinesh phogat been out of international events for vinesh the battle is not just about herself but evenmuch greater cause besides vinesh many indian wrestlers including tokyo olympics bronze medalist bajrang punia rio olympics medalist sakshi malik and sangeeta phogat led the sit in protest in delhijantar mantar on january 18 2023 against the wrestling federation of indiawfi president brij bhushan sharan singh accusing him and other coaches of sexual misconduct harassment and mental torture vinesh also stated that at least 10 to 20 girls have encountered sexual harassment at the wrestling camps the protest led to the stepping down of wfi president brij bhushan till the issue was resolved however elite wrestlers like vinesh bajrang and sakshi opted out from participating in international wrestling tournaments like the united world wrestling uww ranking series tournament until the indian sports ministryoversight committee submitted their report regarding the case on brij bhushan antim panghalperformance at the asian wrestling championships 2023 however vinesh phogat withdrawing her name from the international wrestling events implied that it was the perfect opportunity for antim panghal to becomestandout performer in the women53kg event antim exactly did so in the absence of her experienced compatriot she capitalized on all the chances with her fine performance in the national selection trials conducted under the supervision of the oversight committee at the indira gandhi arena she thus booked herselfspot in the asian wrestling championships 2023 at the asian wrestling championships 2023 the 19 year old antim lived up to the expectations by advancing to the finals of the women53kg on her way to the final she overcame the challenges from aktenge keunimjaeva in the semi final li deng in the quarter final and alvina lim during the qualifications in the final she facedstiff challenge from akari fujinami the reigning world champion and eventually lost by 0 10 to end up with the silver medal indian sports live coverage on khel now vinesh phogat vs antim panghal considering antimrise in the sport in suchshort span of time there is no doubt that the women53kg will be an anticipated clash in the coming times especially at the national level it is interesting to note that in the matchups held between antim and vinesh phogat the latter defeated the youngster on two occasions during the selection trials for commonwealth games 2022 the two wrestlers locked horns although antim was leading by 3 0 initially vinesh used her experience to turn the tables in her favour the next time the two wrestlers met at the national selection trials 2022 with the women53kg slot up for grabs for the world wrestling championships 2022 unlike last time vinesh was the stronger opponent right from the start as she defeated antim 7 0 by blocking all of her attacks and striking on the counter this came just two weeks after antim had scripted history for india becoming the first ever20 world champion will antimrise in the sport affect vinesh phogatchances although vinesh emerged as the better opponent in their previous encounters antim has shown tremendous potential invery short period this silver medal victory at the asian wrestling championships 2023 will surely add up to her confidence if vinesh continues to miss out on the selection trials antim will be rewarded with experience through her participation at international events against some top level wrestlers of the world the three time commonwealth games champion vinesh might also miss the opportunity to represent india at prestigious events like asian games 2022 if the sports ministry decides to send athletes based on their latest performance and records asresult she might lose out onchance to defend her asian games title as she was the gold medalist in the asian games 2018 held in jakarta indonesia for more updates follow khel now on facebook twitter and instagram and join our community on telegram

Title: ed said sisodia destroyed his phones while five of them are in agencycustody claims aap
Article: ed said sisodia destroyed his phones while five of them are in agencycustody claims aap new delhi apr 14 uni aam aadmi party aap on friday claimed that the enforcement directorate said that former delhi deputy chief minister manish sisodia destroyed his phones while five of them are in edcustody the party alleged that the whole matter was fabricated addressingpress conference here aap leader and rajya sabha mp sanjay singh alleged the false allegations fabricated by the enforcement directorate ed against sisodia and revealed that the 14 phones that the ed had alleged were destroyed by sisodia were still active with five of them in the edcustody itself

Title: world renowned islamic scholar moulana rabey hasani nadwi passes away aged 93
Article: world renowned islamic scholar moulana rabey hasani nadwi passes away aged 93 vartha bharati 13 04 2023 16 06 00 ist lucknow moulana rabey hasani nadwiworld renowned islamic scholar and president of the all india muslim personal law board aimplb passed away afterbrief illness on thursday april 13 at the age of 93 he waswell respected figure in the muslim community in india and had contributed immensely to the fields of islamic education jurisprudence and interfaith dialogue born in the raebareli district of uttar pradesh in 1929 moulana rabey nadwi began his career asteacher of islamic studies at nadwatul ulamaprominent islamic seminary in lucknow he was later appointed as the chancellor of the institution in 2011 and held the position until his death he was the nephew of author and reformer abul hasan ali nadwi he was also an accomplished author and had written several books on islamic theology includingcommentary on the holy quran he wasstrong advocate of interfaith dialogue and had participated in several conferences and seminars aimed at promoting understanding and cooperation between different religious communities moulana rabey nadwi wasmember and president of the aimplb an organization that represents the muslim community in legal and social matters he served as the general secretary of the board for overdecade and was instrumental in the boardefforts to uphold the rights of the muslim community in india nadwi was also an active member of several other organizations including the all india muslim majlismushawarat an umbrella body of muslim organizations in the country he wasstrong advocate of communal harmony and had playedkey role in promoting peace and understanding between different communities the legacy of moulana rabey hasani nadwi will continue to inspire future generations of muslims in india and beyond as his tireless work towards promoting education interfaith dialogue and communal harmony will forever be etched in the annals of indian history let the truth be known if you read vb and like vb please bevb supporter and help us deliver the truth to one and all

Title: jlg greets people on baisakhi
Article: jlg greets people on baisakhi jammu apr 13 uni jammu and kashmir lieutenant governor manoj sinha on thursday greeted the people on the eve of baisakhi inmessage the lt governor said on the joyous occasion of baisakhiconvey my warmest felicitations and good wishes to all baisakhi marks the beginning of the harvest season heralding happiness and prosperity it is also an occasion to remember with gratitude about the contribution of our farmers to the progress of the nation the lt governor observed

Title: karnataka polls bjp announces second list of 23 candidates denies tickets to 7 sitting mlas
Article: karnataka polls bjp announces second list of 23 candidates denies tickets to 7 sitting mlasateam udayavani apr 13 2023 5 55 am ist the bjp on wednesday announced its second list of 23 candidates for the may 10 assembly polls in karnataka denying tickets to seven sitting mlas including madal virupakshappa who was recently arrested on corruption charges the party released its first list of 189 candidates on tuesday the latest list does not include hubli dharwad central segment from where former chief minister jagadish shettar wants to contest it also does not include candidate for the shivamogga city segment where sitting mla and former ministers eshwarappa has announced his retirement from electoral politics shettar has been asked by the partytop brass to make way for youngsters but he has asserted that he wants to contest one last time the list includes four scheduled caste one scheduled tribe and two women candidates channagiri mla virupakshappa who was recently arrested by lokayukta police on corruption charges was among the incumbent mlas who were not included in the list shiv kumar has been fielded from the channagiri seat in haveri sitting mla nehru olekar was replaced by gavisiddappa dyamannavar while in byndoor sitting mlasukumar shetty made way for gururaj gantihole mudigere sitting mlap kumaraswamy was dropped and deepak doddaiah was named in his place recently there waslarge scale protest against hd kumaraswamy bysection of party workers in the constituency when veteran leader bs yediyurappa visited there kalghatgi mlam nimbannavar 76 has been replaced by nagaraj chabbi who quit congress and joined the party recently and in mayakonda basavaraja naik has been given the ticket instead of sitting mlalinganna davangere north mlaa ravindranath 76 was denied renomination instead lokikere nagraj got the ticket discontent seems to be brewing within the ruling bjp in karnataka with the party facing the heat after announcing its first list of candidates on tuesday after some aspirants who missed the bus expressing displeasure the party has so far announced candidates for 212 of the total 224 seats

Title: stranger things actress millie bobby brown engaged to bon jovison
Article: london actress millie bobby brown is engaged to jon bon jovison jake bongiovi she has revealed on social media the stranger things star 19 has been dating jake bongiovi for two andhalf years now and they frequently share aspects of their relationship with their followers reports mirror co uk however jake 20 decided to take their relationship to the next level and got down on one knee and proposed to the teen actress sharing their exciting news millie took to instagram to shareloved up snap of the pair on what appeared to be the beach as she looked rather emotional shortly after saying yesve loved you three summers now honeywant em all millie captioned her upload which saw jake wrapping his arms around his new fiancee while she placed her hands on his arm her diamond ring was clear to see as their romantic moment was caught on camera for all to see milliefriends and fans flocked to the comment section to congratulate the couple with singer hrvy penning wooooo congrats guys added hannah dodd former towie star jess wright exclaimed ommmmggggg congratulations this is amazing so so happy for you darling jake also took to his instagram page to sharestring of snaps of the happy couple as he wrote forever some fans however appeared confused as millie was seen sportingwhite dress leading some to believe they had already tied the knot jake and millie met via instagram and instantly struck upfriendship before this blossomed intoromance she said we met on instagram and we were friends forbit and then what cansay the couple went public with their relationship in june 2021 as she sharedsnap of jake kissing her cheek noting that they were instagram official ians

Title: tum ho kaun yaar tum dalal aadmi ho senior congress leader slams amish devgan on news debate show
Article: tum ho kaun yaar tum dalal aadmi ho senior congress leader slams amish devgan on news debate show vartha bharati 12 04 2023 14 00 00 ist screengrab twitter new delhi former mp and senior congress leader dr udit raj duringnews debate show slammed news anchor amish devgan for reportedly calling him disrespectfully invideo that is going viral on social media platforms dr udit raj can be heard saying you are calling me udit raj udit raj amyour servant the senior congress leader took offence over devgan addressing him disrespectfully and slammed him he further called devgandalal broker asserting that the anchor was not inposition to address him disrespectfully tum ho kaun yaar tum dalal aadmi ho who are you you aremiddleman udit raj can be heard saying in the video let the truth be known if you read vb and like vb please bevb supporter and help us deliver the truth to one and all

Title: antim wins asian championships silver now comes the vinesh question
Article: indiaantim panghal won silver at the 2023 asian wrestling championships in the 53kg division after10 0 loss to japanese phenom akari fujinami in astana kazakhstan the medal also pushes into sharp context the major issue around indian wrestling fujinami the reigning world champion successfully defended her asian crown on wednesday in comfortable fashion the 19 year old led 4 0 in the opening minute before closing out the match inside the first round antim had reached the final in style winning two bouts by vfa victory by fall and one by vpo victory by points but despite her superb defensive skill she was no match for the best in the world fujinami has now won 114 bouts on the trot her last loss came in 2017 and has in fact not concededsingle point in senior international competition antim who became u20 world champion last year fujinami missed the tournament through injury was competing in only her second major international tournament in normal circumstances india would have been represented in the women53kg division by the hugely successful vinesh phogat instead phogat is now in sonepat training alongside olympic medalist bajrang punia antim had last competed against vinesh in the qualifiers for the 2022 commonwealth gamesbout narrowly won by vinesh who went on to win gold in birmingham now though vinesh along with bajrang ravi dahiya and other senior wrestlers is sitting out the competition in protest against the functioning of the wrestling federation of india and its president brij bhushan sharan singh this iscrucial period for the wrestlers with the asian games and world championships in september this year and the paris olympics in july august 2024 vinesh may have the pedigree and the most recent trials win but antimasian silver bolsters her claims tospot on the senior team she is now the form athlete thereno certainty over what will happen prior to the asiad and the worlds indian wrestling isndoing normal in 2023 vinesh and the other protesting wrestlers are unhappy with the conduct of the investigation and if they continue to be at loggerheads antim could take the 53kg spot moving forward using this tournamentperformances as the backing what then of vinesh the future remains murky while the narrative around the individual careers of the protesting athletes has now become even more compelling

Title: sexual harassment allegations against wfi chief could not be proved sources
Article: no concrete evidence of sexual harassment has been found against wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh who was accused of exploitation by the countrytop wrestlers it has been learnt in an unprecedented move top achievers such as vinesh phogat bajrang punia and sakshi malik stagedsit in protest at delhijantar mantar in january and accused the wfi boss of sexual exploitation and intimidation the wrestlers had demanded that wfi be disbanded and its president be removed the sports ministry had formedfive member oversight committee headed by legendary boxer mc mary kom on january 23 and asked it to submit its findings in one month later it extended the deadline by two weeks and also added babita phogat to the probe panel as its sixth member on the insistence of the protesting wrestlers the committee submitted its report in the first week of april but the ministry is yet to make its findings public however multiple sources confirmed that the wrestlers could not prove the sexual harassment allegations against the wfi boss after several hearings the wrestlers could not prove their sexual harassment allegations during the probe it was alleged that one female physio name withheld was asked by brij bhushan to give him massage to treat his back pain last year in bulgaria duringcompetition however during the hearing the same physio denied any such happeningsource told pti on thursday instead she revealed that all brij bhushan wanted waspain killer for headache and when she offered one and was accompanied byfemale coach at that time the wfi boss even refused to take tablet disprin it was male coach anil who had actually helped brij bhushan wfi officials however did not make any official comment when approached it has also been learnt that vinesh and sakshi have submitted written affidavits to the ioa probe panel which is investigating into the allegations separately but ended up submitting wrong information in her affidavit vinesh claimed that brij bhushan touched her inappropriately in turkey in 2015 however later it was found that vinesh had not competed in turkey that year later she said it actually happened in 2016 and in mongolia sakshi in her affidavit wrote that brij bhushan hugged her in 2015 brij bhushan sensed her discomfort and said that he hugged her likefather according to another sourcefew former female wrestlers said that brij bhushan asked for their numbers but when asked if he ever called them they replied in the negative they said brij bhushah clicked pictures with them with his hands on their shoulders but could not produce those pictures when demanded by the panel said the source not only brij bhushan butfew coaches also faced allegations one such coach was greco roman trainer mahabir prasad the droncharya awardee was asked by the panel why he visited vineshhome after her debacle in the tokyo olympics to which he replied that he wanted to sayfew motivating words because he felt that the top wrestler was going throughtough period vinesh had madeshock first round exit from the olympics and was later suspended by wfi for indiscipline she had revealed that she was suffering from depression and was struggling badly to cope with the situation mahabir replied that he was not alone when he paidvisit to vinesh he was accompanied withcoach andjournalist so there was no question of having any ill will in him meeting vinesh saidsource it has also been learnt that two sai officials had gone to the sonepat centre where the training camp for male wrestlers is held to extract adverse statement from the coaches against brij bhushan when an oversight committee was probing the matter what the sai officials were doing there at sonepat sai centre evenrelative of one of members of the committee was also there how did sai centre allow that relative inside the sai complex he was not part of the camp said the source calls to sai officials including director general sandip pradhan went unanswered

Title: sexual harassment allegations on wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh couldnbe proven reports
Article: brij bhushan sharan singh acquitted in over 30 criminal cases including one in the tada act was accused of sexual harassment in january 2023 according to recent reports in the media the allegations of sexual harassment against the chief of the wrestling federation of india brij bhushan sharan singh couldnbe proven because oflack of evidence to the contrary the 6 time mp currently serving from kaiserganj has seenfair share of controversies even before his three decade long political career brij bhushan sharan singh acquitted in over 30 criminal cases including one in the tada act was accused of sexual harassment in january earlier this year bygroup of wrestlers including vinesh phogat sakshi malik and bajranj punia among others duringprotest staged at the jantar mantar they also demanded the wfi president be removed and the entire organisation be disbanded with such grave allegations being made against singh by the wrestlers the ministry of youth affairs and sports formed an oversight committee of five members including mc mary kom to find out what had happened in the case inmonth they later added babita phogat to the committee at the behest of the wrestlers and extended the deadline by two weeks the findings of the sexual harassment case were submitted in early april by the oversight committee but its results are yet to be made public by the sports ministrysource of pti revealed the details of the matter the wrestlers could not prove their sexual harassment allegations during the probe it was alleged that one female physio name withheld was asked by brij bhushan to give him massage to treat his back pain last year in bulgaria duringcompetition however during the hearing the same physio denied any such happening instead she revealed that all brij bhushan wanted waspain killer for headache and when she offered one and was accompanied byfemale coach at that time the wfi boss even refused to take tablet disprin it was male coach anil who had actually helped brij bhushan also vinesh phogat and sakshi malik had submitted their version of events in separate written affidavits to the probe panel set up by the indian olympic association ioa but they were deemed to have put forward the wrong information regarding the matter

Article: provided by free press journal rcb fan shares photo of dramebaaz brother pepsi reacts on twitter are you an rcb fan who is cheering for the team that has faf du plessis and virat kohli among others herea tweet that will interest youtwitter user sharedphoto of her brother drinkingsoft drink pepsi after the match between rcb and lsg purportedly to not celebrate but calm onesadness with the drink she called her brother dramebaaz drama queen and said rcb lost and he is drinking pepsi like this on april 10 lucknow super giants won the match against royal challengers bangalore with one wicket the sister seemed to believe that it was more ofcelebration drink however the carbonated soft drink brand took note of the image that went viral and replied to it the companyreply came duringvictory day for the ipl franchise as rcb defeated delhi capitals on saturday meanwhile it was also noted that the boy inway became the ambassador for pepsi at the stadium sharingphoto of the boy from the cricket ground holdingthank you placard for the brand they wrote rise up baby life is too short to be sad check tweet replies apart from pepsi the tweet also attracted the attention of netizens in general several people hit the like button while some also gave itquote tweet those who did the second part were the ones sharing relatable memes on the scenario takelook at some reactions

Article: from student politics to becoming maharashtrachief minister four times anddecade long stint asunion minister sharad pawar has beenmaster at political moves on may 2 pawar madeshocking announcement to quit as president of ncp the party he founded 24 years ago this decision has sent shockwaves in the political circles and amongst ncp supporters here we look back at pawarinfluential career in indian politics which stretches over five decades

Title: heroes are not made they are born ms dhoni makes 88 year old fanwish come true
Article: new delhi ms dhoni continues to rule the hearts of his fans and even after retiring from international cricket there is no dip in his popularity chennai super kings skipper dhoni recently met probably his oldest fan ever in chennai the former india captain made the dream come true of his 88 year old fan by payingvisit to her house the octogenarian fan of dhoni is mother in law of famous indian actor khushbu sundar khushbu took to twitter to share images of the meeting and expressed her gratitude for his warmth and hospitality heroes are not made they are born dhoni proves thatam at loss for words for our csk at his warmth hospitality he met my ma in law who at 88 hero worships dhoni cannot see beyond him mahi you have added many years of good health happiness to her life my pranaams to you for this my gratitude to for making this possible csk kku whistle podu khushbu tweeted the 41 year old dhoni has been in brilliant form in the ongoing ipl he smashed an unbeaten 32 off 17 balls and dragged the super kings chase of 176 right down to the last ball against rajasthan royals the veteran batter has hit 58 runs in three innings atstrike rate of almost 215 including six sixes and two fours

Title: punjab vigilance bureau asks channi to appear on friday congress calls it harassment
Article: provided by news18 punjab vigilance bureau asks channi to appear on friday congress calls it harassment onday he shared the stage with his partytop leadership in the state to presentpicture of unity former punjab chief minister and congress leader charanjit channi was asked by the vigilance bureau to present himself for questioning on friday and turned down his request for appearance on april 20 indisproportionate assets case the vigilance bureau had earlier asked him to appear before it on wednesday but channi had requested postponement till april 20 however on thursday afternoon the agency shot offletter to the congress leader directing him to present himself on april 14 the bureau said that since officials were not available on that day he should turn up for questioning on friday the congress was quick to term it harassment claiming that rattled by the presence of chhani in the campaigning for the may 10 jalandhar lok sabha bypoll the letter had been issued this is sheer attempt at intimidation the aap government is rattled by todayshow of strength alleged leader of opposition in the assembly partap bajwa trying to givemessage that there is no infighting and the congress leadership stands behind its candidate karamjit kaur chaudhary for the by poll the party put upunited face during the filing of her nomination papers on thursday all leaders including channi and rajinder kaur bhattal ex state unit chief navjot sidhu party punjab incharge harish chaudhary present state unit president amarinderraja warring partap bajwa mp gurjit aujla state unit working president bharat bhushan ashu ex ministers avtar henry and amarjit samra and party bypoll incharge rana gurjeet singh came together at congress bhawan ex jalandhar mp ms kaypee who had been sulking over not gettingticket also joined them after the candidate and her son and phillaur mla vikramjit chaudhary visited him last evening we are united and support our candidate karamjit chaudhary after the death of her husband and jalandhar mp santokh singh chaudhary said warring the vigilance bureau saysdetailed dossier has been prepared byteam to question the former chief minister regarding assets owned by him this would be the first time that channi will appear before the agency last month the vigilance bureau issuedlookout notice against channi fearing that he may attempt to fly out channi was under the enforcement directoratescanner after his nephew bhupinder singh honey was arrested in connection with an alleged corruption case last year and approximately rs 10 crore was seized from his possession the ed has been scrutinising channi his brothers family members and some aides for allegedly amassing wealth beyond their declared sources of income agencies suspect that the former cm had provided undue favours to certain contractors according to the ed honey had accumulated money by assisting mining contractors and facilitating the transfer and posting of officials read all the latest india news here

Title: punjab kings aim to bounce back against gujarat titans
Article: mohali apr 12 uni punjab kings pbks will lock horns with defending champions gujarat titans gt in their fourth match of the ongoing ipl at the punjab cricket association is bindra stadium here on thursday the shikhar dhawan led punjab will look to bounce back after suffering their first defeat of ipl 2023 against sunrisers hyderabad at the rajiv gandhi international stadium on sunday put into bat skipper dhawan once again led from the front by slamming an unbeaten 99 off just 66 balls to help punjab post 143 9 in their 20 overs however hyderabad rode on rahul tripathiunbeaten 48 ball 74 and aiden markam37 not out off 21 balls to register an eight wicket victory

Title: iba menworld boxing championship 2023 indian mencontingent leaves for tashkent to take part in multi nation training camp
Article: new delhi april 17 pti19 member indian menboxing team on monday left for tashkent to take part inmulti nation training camp ahead of the world championship scheduled to be held from april 30 to may 14 six time asian championships medallist shiva thapa and 2019 asian championships silver medallist deepak bhoria will headline the indian squad for the showpiece event the gold medallists will walk away withprize money of usd 200 000 the silver medallists will to be given usd 100 000 and both bronze medallists will be awarded usd 50 000 each there are 13 men who will be taking part in the marquee event however another six boxers have been added for the multi nation training camp which includes 2018 asian games gold medallist amit panghal wrestlers protest sexual harassment allegations against wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh could not be proved say sources the tashkent championships have already seenregistration of around 640 boxers from 104 countries including seven defending world champions like sofiane oumiha from france japantomoya tsuboi and sewonrets okazawa loren alfonso from azerbaijan saken bibossinov from kazakhstan and cubayoenlis hernandez martinez and julio la cruz in six weight categories 51kg 57kg 63 5kg 71kg 80kg and 92kg two indian boxers each will participate in the training camp as reserve boxers are also accompanying the main team nikhat zareen clinches gold medal in womenworld boxing championships 2023 beats vietnamese opponent 5 0 in final indian squad for the world championships govind sahani 48kg deepak bhoria 51kg sachin siwach 54kg mohammad hussamuddin 57kg varinder singh 60kg shiva thapa 63 5kg akash sangwan 67kg nishant dev 71kg sumit kundu 75kg ashish chaudhary 80kg harsh choudhary 86kg naveen kumar 92kg and narender berwal 5kg akash sangwan 67kg nishant dev 71kg hemant yadav 71kg sumit kundu 75kg ashish chaudhary 80kg sanjay 80kg harsh choudhary 86kg naveen kumar 92kg sanjeet 92kg and narender berwal 92 kg this is an Title: explained chinanew electromagnetic weapon to quell protests
Article: after reporting rare large scale protests largely peaceful over stringent covid 19 curbs last year china has now come up withnew method to prevent violent demonstrations according to reports the asian giant has unveiled an electromagnetic gun that fires coin shaped bullets in order to control riots the cs lw21 gun was revealed inmilitary technology show broadcasted on the state broadcaster cctv on 28 march according tosouth china morning post scmp report what are the features of this electromagnetic gun and why has china introduced it what do last yearcovid protests say about the country we explain features of cs lw21 gun developed by china north industries group corporation limited and other technology teams the cs lw21 gun is designed on the basis of coilgun technology which uses electromagnets to fireprojectile according to bloomberg scmp report says that the gun with an estimated firing frequency of many thousand rounds per minute hassleek design which makes it easier to handle china pioneers portable electromagnetic gun sets development trend for future weapons pic twitter com wb5pgyn3in zhang heqing april 3 2023 the gun is equipped withdisplay screen at the front that informs about battery level frequency bullet capacity rail temperature and firing mode the report added it also hasdouble chamber magazine for continuous firing and quick reloading the gun is designed like coil guns which use electric power to accelerate the projectile when the nine level coil is electrified corresponding magnetic fields are formed which allow the bullet to be sucked out byrelay race method the gundesigner lei fengqiao was quoted as saying by scmp it is powered bybuilt in lithium ion battery that can continuously fire hundreds of rounds when fully charged the charging time is also very short with little influence from temperature the gun also offerstrajectory with superior control and multiple point hits as per the scmp report the coin shaped bullets are also advantageous as they are cheaper and easier to store and transport the gun emitslow firing sound and does not have flash smoke or shells with its small recoil the weapon can be used in populated areas where traditional firearms may trigger panic or more violence the report added also readbrush with revolution how teacher li brought chinacovid protests to the limelight non lethal weapon the weapon has been called non lethal as its round shaped bullets reduce the risk of killing civilians during riots the device is designed inway to reduce the chances of seriously hurting people while dispersing crowds during violent demonstrations these bullets do not penetrate the body thus lessening the risk of injuries during field tests the coin projectiles penetrated double layered 3mm thick plywood and damaged cola and beer bottles reported scmp as per bloomberg in electromagnetic weapons users can select the intensity and frequency of the firing gun however the device can still be used to cause grave injury if the bullets are exchanged with pointed ammunition that can pierce the body also read rise of the people as covid protests spreadbrief history of rare acts of dissent in china protests in china widespread protests are not common in china where the government heavily cracks down on any form of dissent so last novemberlarge scale demonstrations against nearly three years of snap lockdowns with some raising slogans like xi jinping step down and communist party step down were surprisingblaze at an apartment block in urumqi the capital of the western xinjiang region was behind the unusual wave of protests which spread across beijing shanghai and other regions many demonstrators held blank pieces of white papersymbol of defiance against the ruling partycensorship which led some to describing it as the a4 revolution the biggest protests in decades in the country which saw urban chinese students young people and workers hit the streets were mostly peaceful however some incidents of violence where people clashed with the police were reported the protests which eventually petered out had an impact as the government relaxed some lockdown protocols before abruptly scrapping the zero covid policy as per time magazine the government did not resort to repressive measures to quell these protests but adopted other nuisance measures such as checking phones and identity papers to discourage people from joining the marches the agitation showed that the state has learned valuable lessons about how most effectively to deter or demobilise protesters without resort to costly in terms of both resources and reputation and dangerous repression william hurst the chong hua professor of chinese development at the university of cambridge wrote for time magazine in december 2022 notably npr reported in january that the police were tacitly rounding up people they believed were behind the demonstrations they have also shown us that grievances have likely not been assuaged and if anything deeper issues have taken root in the hearts of many that could lead them to take bigger risks in challenging the ccp chinese communist party in the future hurst wrote for time magazine with inputs from agencies read all the latest news trending news cricket news bollywood news india news and entertainment news here follow us on facebook twitter and instagram

Title: massive fire damages 6 residential houses shopping complex in srinagar
Article: srinagar apr 17 uni at least six residential houses andmulti storeyed shopping complex were gutted indevastating fire that broke out at hazratbal causing damage to the property worth crores on monday officials said fire and emergency service officials saidmassive fire broke out at around 11 58 am in one of the rooms ofu shaped shopping complex and engulfed other compartments housing several food outlets and residential houses at hazratbal in srinagar causing extensive damage to the property more thandozen fire tenders were rushed from the nearby fire stations of hazratbal nowshera rainawari babademb and shalimar to control the fire they said the fire is under control at present the fire and emergency service officials said and added that the cause of fire is being ascertained more details are awaited they added uni qab sy rkm

Title: is the up model that of bulldozers and encounters
Article: atiq ahmed who was shot dead on live tv while in police custody wasdespicable character whomonce met atconstruction site in prayagraj then allahabad he was contesting in 2004 general elections andwas covering them accompanied then byfellow woman journalist both of us were distinctively uncomfortable surrounded bygangster and his henchmen and it washeightened experience that we have never forgotten there was no doubt we were engaging withpsychopathic violent killer for hire thus the grave discomfort is not over ahmed being dead but at what the extra judicial killing reveals about the nationlargest state uttar pradesh the men who pulled the guns and shot the gangster did so in the presence of policemen and media the shooters are seen in videos and reported in media as shouting jai shri ram as they surrender to the police invideo interview to the media the distraught mother of one of the three shooters describes her son asdeeply religious who did darshans and sang bhajans in another interview the father describes his son asdrug addict the police fir reportedly says that the three shooters have said during interrogation that they wanted to kill the gangster and his brother to become popular presuming the police version is to be believed and the episode was notset up tough questions about the breakdown of law and order in uttar pradesh remain this execution can be seen as an escalation of due process of law being ignored in the state chief minister yogi adityanath is described as bulldozer baba as bulldozers are now used against whomsoever the government sees as trouble makers this is popular with sections of society as some of the targets whose homes and businesses have been bulldozed are feared individuals and social oppressors also read appalling state of affairs in prayagraj frequently bulldozers are also used against the weak and inconvenient such as protesting members of the minority community escalating prejudice against muslims is nowpart of state craft in the bjp bastion this is the uttar pradesh model the template for governance in the state ispitched hindutva on every possible front enrolment of young men in the ranks of militia style groups who would be enforcers of the state ideology and incite fear in opponents this is combined with the doling of free rations very efficiently necessary to offset the inability of the state to provide jobs or genuine economic growth given the polarised politics endemic violence itunlikely any significant industry would move to the interiors since real socio economic justice cannot be given there isneed to provide spectacles of instant justice from bulldozers to now apparently public murders therefore the state finance minister suresh khanna said an hour after the assassination that ita judgement decision from the heavens the heavens are apparently kind to the dons in the bharatiya janata party bjp there is for instance the party mlc from mirzapur vineet singh as tough and nasty as gangsters can be there is brajesh singh of varanasi who spent years in jail but is now out and known to back bjp candidates he began his career assharpshooter of the dawood ibrahim gang of the mumbai underworld fame but is currently arguablydesh bhakt gangster there is of course brij bhushan sharan singh six term mp five terms in the bjp and the chief of the wrestling federation of india wfi whom award winning wrestlers recently accused of sexual harassment the scandal broke in january and an inquiry was supposed to have been completed inmonth but itapril now besides many gangsters surviving radicalised youth and celebration of instant justice makelethal cocktail there are fears expressed by ordinary citizens beyond minorities who wonder if any dispute or disagreement with those in power can have violent consequences should political opponents start worrying that some radicalised youth will come after them to become popular in the short term however there is no electoral damage to the bjp the countdown has begun for the urban local bodies elections that will take place on may 4 and 11 for 760 municipal bodies and mayors will be elected to 17 corporations there is no real challenge to the bjp comfortably winning these elections the results will be announced on may 13 the same day the results from the karnataka assembly elections will be announced saba naqvi isjournalist and author disclaimer the views expressed above are the authorown they do not necessarily reflect the views of dh

Title: asian wrestling championships 2023 review indiamedalists highs and lows from the tournament
Article: wrestling indian contingent returned from astana as the hosts kazakhstan ended the asian wrestling championships 2023 campaign in style as they defeated womenwrestling powerhouse japan to top the medal standings kazakhstan grabbed seven gold four silver and nine bronze medals to finish with the same number of medals as japan but with more gold japan collected six gold medals out of which five were in womenfreestyle wrestling in addition they earned four silver and 10 bronze medals to bag the second position iran were placed third with six gold three silver and four bronze at the asian wrestling championships 2023 kazakhstan bagged the hosting rights of the asian wrestling championships 2023 after the previous host india were stripped of their rights this was because ofpending investigation on brij bhushan sharan singh who was the president of the wrestling federation of india wfi the organizing body for the wrestling sport in india previously in january many top wrestlers from india like vinesh phogat sakshi malik and bajrang punia had alleged harassment and misconduct by the wfi president indian sports live coverage on khel now indiaperformance at asian wrestling championships 2023 mengreco roman team rank 6th points 115 courtesy of rupin gahlawatsilver medal triumph india took the sixth spot in the team rankings in the mengreco roman wrestling at the asian wrestling championships 2023 besides rupin the medalists in this event were neeraj chhikara sunil kumar and vikas dalal who won their respective bronze medal bouts neeraj and sunil got the better of their opponents jinseob song of south korea by 5 2 and masato sumi by 4 1 victory by points to win the bronze medal in the men63kg vikas defeated his chinese rival by 8 0 via superiority womenwrestling team rank 3rd points 143 in the womenfreestyle at the asian wrestling championships 2023 antim panghal 53kg and nisha dahiya 68kg were the best performers as they both clinched the silver medals in their respective weight classes the other medalists in this category were anshu malik sonam malik manisha bhanwala reetika hooda and priya malik who all won the bronze medal india finished as the third best nation in womenfreestyle wrestling with 143 points behind japan 205 and china 149 menfreestyle team rank 7th points 99 although aman sehrawat bagged the gold medal for india in men57kg freestyle the event recorded indiaworst performance in terms of medals among the three disciplines in this edition the other medalists in the menfreestyle were deepak mirka in the men79 kg and anirudh gulia in the men125kg who collected the bronze in the bronze medal match of the men79kg deepak got past shuhrat bozorov of tajikistan by 12 1 on the last day of the continental meet when the majority of the indian wrestlers disappointed anirudh emerged as the best wrestler at the asian wrestling championships 2023 he did so by defeating uzbekistansardorbek kholmatov via technical superiority by 12 2 to finish indiacampaign with 14 medals indiamedalists at asian wrestling championships 2023 no athlete category medal 1 aman sehrawat men57 kg freestyle gold 2 antim panghal women53 kg freestyle silver 3 nisha dahiya women68 kg freestyle silver 4 rupin gahlawat men55 kg greco roman silver 5 deepak mirka men79 kg freestyle bronze 6 anirudh gulia men125 kg freestyle bronze 7 neeraj chhikara men63 kg greco roman bronze 8 sunil kumar men87 kg greco roman bronze 9 vikas dalal men72 kg greco roman bronze 10 anshu malik women57 kg freestyle bronze 11 sonam malik women62 kg freestyle bronze 12 manisha bhanwala women65 kg freestyle bronze 13 reetika hooda women72 kg freestyle bronze 14 priya malik women76 kg freestyle bronze asian wrestling championships 2023 wrestlers who impressed most aman sehrawat the 19 year old aman sehrawat was indiastar wrestler at the asian wrestling championships 2023 his gold medal triumph not only guided india to seventh place overall but also ensured indiafourth consecutive gold medal in this weight category before aman it was tokyo olympics silver medalist ravi kumar dahiya who had won three successive golds from 2020 to 2022 however ravi had to withdraw his name from the trials owing to an injury which was an opportunity for aman to represent india and impress everyone the23 world champion lived up to the hype and went on to claim the gold medal in the men57kg freestyle to give india its only gold in the continental meeting to accomplish this feat he defeated almaz smanbekov by 9 4 in the gold medal match wanhao zou by 7 4 in the semis and rikuto arai in the quarters by 7 1 antim panghal antim panghal has been making waves since becoming the world20 champion at the asian wrestling championships 2023 she once again stunned everyone with her performance by reaching the finals of the continental meet on her way to the finals she overcame the challenges of aktenge keunimjaeva of uzbekistan li deng of china and singaporealvina lim although she had to settle for the silver medal as she faced akari fujinami the 2021 world champion antimrise in the sport has been nothing short of phenomenal rupin gahlawat rupin gahlawat gave indiagreat start by claiming his first international medal in the form of silver on the first day of the championship in the men55 kg greco roman the 19 year old rupin lost to the reigning23 world champion pouya dadmarz and had to settle forsecond place finish earlier rupin had progressed to the final by winning all his games from the qualification rounds till the final nisha dahiya another indian who put upsolid show in the continental meet was nisha dahiya nisha who wasbronze medalist for india last year was competing this time in the women65kg in the semi final she upset the asian games 2014 gold medalist and two time olympian feng zhou in the semis by 7 6 to advance to the final however ami ishi of japan proved to be the better wrestler in the final and nisha had to settle for the silver medal asian wrestling championships 2023 wrestlers who disappointed most deepak punialot was expected from the commonwealth games 2022 gold medalist deepak punia since the indian side didnfeature the likes of bajrang punia vinesh phogat sakshi malik and ravi kumar dahiya however deepak couldnlive up to the expectations as he crashed out in the quarter finals of the competition after losing to bahrainmagomed sharipov by 0 5 in the men92kg this washuge blow to the indian contingent as he was consideredserious medal contender at the continental meet sarita mor another experienced campaigner who couldndeliver was sarita mortwo time champion sarita failed to reach the semi final after losing her round 2 and round 3 matches against yui sakano of japan and chinazhuomalaga deepak punia and sarita mor two of indiabiggest medal hopes had to return home empty handed for more updates follow khel now on facebook twitter and instagram and join our community on telegram

Title: three kg heroin airdropped by pak drone near ib in punjabamritsar recovered
Article: three kg heroin airdropped by pak drone near ib in punjabamritsar recoveredapti apr 16 2023 12 33 pm ist representative image source pexels chandigarh bsf troops recovered three kg heroin airdropped bypakistani drone near the international border in punjabamritsarbsf spokesman said on sunday the border security force bsf personnel heard the buzzing sound of the drone entering the indian territory from across the border in an area near village dhanoe kalan in amritsar at 8 22 pm on saturday said the official bsf troops immediately opened fire at it said the official duringsearch of the area the bsf troops recoveredbag containing three packets of heroin weighing 3 kg fromwheat field said the official an iron ring withhook and four luminous strips were also found attached with the bag said the bsf official

Title: bengaluru congress mla akhanda srinivas murthy expected to resign
Article: bengaluru congress mla akhanda srinivas murthy expected to resign vartha bharati 16 04 2023 18 13 00 ist congress mla akhanda srinivas murthy bengaluru congress mla from pulikeshi nagar akhanda srinivas murthy is expected to resign as legislator since the party is yet to announce its candidate from the constituency the leaders of minority communities here have accused akhanda srinivas murthy of causing the riots in dj halli and kg halli in 2020 with his discriminatory attitude it is also reported that the leaders urged the congress high command not to give ticket to shrinivasa murthy for the assembly elections in may the congress leaders are apparently yet to confirm on the party candidate from the constituency following said developments in pulikeshi nagar in relation to the violence in 2020 there are also rumours of srinivas murthy desiring to resign from his post upset by the continued uncertainty on who the party would field from the constituency this year let the truth be known if you read vb and like vb please bevb supporter and help us deliver the truth to one and all

Title: woncontest for presidentpost in wfi elections on may 7 will follow sports code brij bhushan
Article: april 16 2023 10 20 pm updated 10 20 pm ist gonda uttar pradesh brij bhushan sharan singh who is awaitingreport bygovernment panel on the sexual harassment allegations against him confirmed on april 16 that he will not contest for the presidentpost in wfi election on may 7 but hinted that he might look fornew role within the federation at its emergency general council and executive committee meeting chaired by secretary generaln prasood the wrestling federation of india wfi announced the election schedule brij bhushan has served three four year terms as president inrow and according to the sports code after completing 12 years as wfi chief he is ineligible to contest for the top post also read wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh appears before the oversight committee we had to schedule elections earlier but due to the recent controversy we could not hold the elections earlier but now we will move forwardwill follow the sports code and not contest for presidentpost brij bhushan told pti after the meeting so does that mean that he will not be involved with wfi anymorehave saidwill not contest for presidentposthave not saidwill not contest elections brij bhushan 66 will have to servefour year cooling off period to regain the eligibility to contest for an office bearerpost however he can be part of the five member wfi executive committee by the time he serves the cooling off period in 2027 he would have attained the age of 70 and that will again make him ineligible to contest according to the code that has placed the age cap on all officials it will be interesting to see if his son karan who is the president ofp wrestling association throws his hat into the ring asked if he was allowed to attend the agm in the wake of sexual harassment and intimidation accusations levelled against him by the top wrestlers of the country the wfi president said he has worked within the rules in writingwas asked to step aside for three weeks and later it was extended to six weeks anddid thathave appeared at ioa and oversight panel hearingscan work as wfi official now there is no question of flouting any rule the findings of the committee are with the government andam waiting for that report the countrytop wrestlers including vinesh phogat bajrang punia sakshi malik and sarita mor along with several others alleged that the wfi chief has sexually harassed female wrestlers and also intimidates the athletes brij bhushan said it was laughable what the wrestlers said during the hearingscould not stop laughing what these wrestlers were saying ifhad anything inappropriate with sakshi malik then why did she invite me to her wedding they come to me with their personal matters and also family issues they sit with my son and daughter in law and have food together and now suddenly they are alleging thathave harassed them if thatthe case why do they come to my home the wfi boss said the federation will not have revenge in mind when the issue is sorted there arelot of people who canface me now not just these protesting wrestlers but if they want to play the process remains the same for everyone all eligible candidates can compete but wfi is not going to exempt any wrestler from olympic trials even ifwrestler wins quota inspecific category if bajrang books olympic quota he will have to beat the winner of the national trials to compete in olympics if he loses he will still begivenchance after 15 days forre match and earnplace in the indian team there will be no discriminationhave not done anything wrong these wrestlers were justpawn someone else is behind this controversy the wrestlers have been used for thishave not spent one day in any sort of guilthave kept doing my work and the federation will continue to do that whetherremain part of it or not

Title: mumbai chain snatcher nabbed after screening over 150 cctv cameras 4 lakh booty recovered
Article: provided by free press journal mumbai chain snatcher nabbed after screening over 150 cctv cameras 4 lakh booty recovered mumbai after scanning footage from 150 cctv cameras the vasai road railway police succeeded in catching30 year old history sheeter who is allegedly involved in several chain snatching cases six gold chains worth rs4 16 lakh were recovered from his possession the suspect was identified as mohammad aman hussainnalasopara resident the rising menace of chain snatching in vasai mira road and nalasopara prompted the police to launchprobe the investigation began last week however it was proving difficult to identify the suspect as he was seen wearingmask and cap in every footage cops tracked accused based on hunch the police noticed that the man who was first spotted in the footage captured at the vasai railway station deliberately avoided cameras based onhunch cops started tracking the suspect with the help of cctvs even after scanning visuals from more than 100 cameras mounted around vasai and nalasopara they were unable to identify the suspect as he never dropped his guard and continued to cover his face finally the awaited moment arrived when the man uncovered his face after which the police sent his visuals to their sources to identify himtip off was received that he would be coming to nalasopara accordinglytrap was laid and aman was apprehended he has confessed to four chain snatching cases registered at police stations in vasai nalasopara and mira roadcase has been registered against him under the indian penal code section 392 robbery

Title: brock jarvis splits from trainer aussie boxing legend jeff fenech
Article: australian boxer brock jarvis has split with with long time trainer jeff fenech as he plansshock move up to las vegas inbid to move up in weight the 25 year old sydneysider parted ways amicably with fenech although they reportedly fell out over his fighting weight with the 21 1 19kofighter looking to move up jarvis was seen asgenuine world title contender at super featherweight in 2021 but moved up to super lightweight in october last year to fight fellow aussie liam paro coppingfirst round knockout read more afl legend sues league two clubs read more scary protest stops snooker world champs read more late cleary hit could ve sparked 41 year first in his bounce back fight jarvis took on marlon paniamogantough filipino fighter who almost dropped the aussie in the second round of his no limit headliner leaving him dazed but jarvis fought back forstoppage winperformance fenech described as special brock jarvis gets the win fox sports but now jarvis wants to move up in weight again and will fight at either super welterweight or middleweight which could bejump of 9kgmassive risk forfighter who has been rocked by fighters atlower weight in his last two fights thatwhat sparked fenechopposition to the move however jarvis is said to be done with stripping down in weight citingnotable impact on his power in the ring right throughout my careerve always cutlot of weight he told fox sports been battling the scales for years now liam paro is ecstatic after knocking brock jarvis to the canvas russell freeman getty images andactually feel likeve been going too light and thataffecting my performance sowant to try something different and middleweight junior middleweightfeelcan campaign there for some time jarvis will travel to las vegas on his own and spar atfew gyms inbid to find the right fit for him moving forward wide world of sports contacted fenech for comment and he acknowledged the split the situation also hits fenech onpersonal level with jarvis with the 25 year old ending his relationship with fenechdaughter kaylafew months back fordaily dose of the best of the breaking news and exclusive content from wide world of sports subscribe to Title: ipl 2023 ms dhoni will be banned or forced to take rest
Article: in their second match against lucknow super giants lsg the csk bowlers had given 18 extra runs dhoni had warned them post the match and asserted that if they doncut on the extras they will have to play undernew captain they ll have to bowl no no balls and fewer wides we are bowling too many extra deliveries and need to cut them out otherwise they ll be playing undernew captain dhoni had said in the following match against mumbai indians mi and rajasthan royals rr eight and ten extras were conceded dhoni was not looking happy because he has mentioned it before that he wants the bowlers to reduce the number of no balls and wides csk had bowled two three overs of extra and against rcb they bowled another extra over it shouldngo tostage where dhoni gets banned and csk has to take the field without their captain sehwag told cricbuzz with the kind of knee injury he has it appears he might play onlyhandful of matches more anyway he is constantly pushing himself but if his bowlers are bowling so many wides and no balls then dhoni will have to take rest he added terming cskbowling attack weak the former india opener said if csk will have to work on the bowlers they have in the squadm saying from day 1 that cskbowling is weak they need to work on that department but what more can they do they will have to use whatever resources they have this season the bowlers have to be more accurate if look at their performance against rcb they have bowled 30 35 dot balls so they didnlet rcb scorerun in six overs despite that they ended up conceding 218 because they leaked far too many sixes and fours he said csk will next face sunrisers hyderabad srh on friday april 21

Title: cbi arrests tmc mla jiban krishna saha in bengal teachers recruitment scam
Article: new delhi central bureau of investigation cbi on monday arrested trinamool congress tmc mla jiban krishna saha in the west bengal teachers recruitment scam case sources in the agency confirmed saha is an mla from the burwan constituency of west bengal he was arrested from his residence in burwan in murshidabad district on sunday evening in the course of the cbi raidmobile phone of the tmc mla was fished out frompond next to the mlahouse the agency retrieved the phone by after pumping out all water from the pond on april 14 cbi conducted searches at six locations including at the premises of saha in an ongoing investigation of the alleged west bengal teachers recruitment scam the cbi teams conducted searches at the premises of saha in birbhum murshidabad and kolkata the case was registered on the orders of the high court of calcutta it was alleged that the accused acted asconduit in collecting money from the candidates by promising them jobs in the education department as teachers in the recruitment process of the first west bengal state level selection test slst 2016 for classes 9 and 10 during searches several incriminating materials including primary and upper teachers recruitment and documents containing the list of the candidates and amounts mentioned against them were recovered he was arrested after detailed questioning by cbi officials saha is now the third tmc mla after partha chatterjee and manik bhattacharya to be arrested by cbi in its probe into the matter ani

Title: nitish rana hrithik shokeen rivalry spills into ipl
Article: pti mumbai apr 16 pti the rivalry between two players in the indian domestic circuit came to the fore at the ipl stage here on sunday with kolkata knight riders captain nitish rana and mumbai indians hrithik shokeen engaging inwar of words in the first innings the incident happened in the ninth over of their match at the wankhede stadium when the mumbai indians bowler gave an earful to rana after dismissing the kkr captain who stopped in his tracks to turn around and hurl some words back at the bowler shokeen had rana caught at long on by substitute fielder ramandeep singh and immediately looked in the direction of the batter to sayfew words but as rana turned back to respond to the young playercharge at him mumbai indians stand in skipper suryakumar yadav and the senior most player in the game piyush chawla stepped in to diffuse the tension pti it must be noted that both rana and shokeen are teammates in the delhi side in domestic cricket but they are not on talking terms even in the dressing room the flare up that happened on sunday afternoon was not one off since these two players have hadhistory between them if rana had an ordinary game with the bat falling for five off 10 balls shokeen wasbusy player on sunday as after takingsharp catch to dismiss the strugglingjagadeesan early on off cameron green at cover point he returned with 4 0 39 2 while also accounting for kkr all rounder shardul thakur

Title: watch andrey rublev and grigor dimitrov square off with old fashioned rackets
Article: pa images andrey rublev antics do you wish you could go back to the start of the weekend well sadly we canhelp with that but we can help to create some feelings of nostalgia check out andrey rublev and grigor dimitrov square off with some old fashioned tennis rackets the tennis world has comelong way and we have seen numerous changes made to certain aspects of the game like the tennis racket tennis rackets are crucial to the game and making sure that you have the right one is essential to your overall game letlook at some changes that have been made over the years to increase the efficiency of the racket the head sizes have increased in size with most models today being measured at 100 square inches the size of the beam neck of the racket has also been raised measuring between 23 26mm newer rackets are alsolot stiffer and have more open string patterns they are alsolot lighter than their ancestral counterparts rublev plays withcustomized version of the head gravity pro and like many pros has added weight to the frame this has allowed him to gain more power and stability not only that but adding weight to oneracket also helps with transmitting less shock thanlighter racket however this does lower the rate at whichplayer can swing their racket and it also reduces the amount of topspin they can put on the ball dimitrov plays withstandard wilson pro staff 97s the racket offers many benefits to the bulgarian star like his power and ability to spin the ball however it does offerdownside as it is considered to havehefty swing we can see in the video the importance of having the right racket as we see rublev and dimitrov struggle to match their usual strike speed the pair brought us an enjoyable moment and we can see they also enjoyed it the stars playedquick rally that had some funny comments oh wow said dimitrov after playingbackhand shot that didnwork out how he is used to the bulgarian star delivered an excellent backhand shot that found itself sailing parallel to the line and past rublevracket to finish off the rally we can see that he certainly enjoyed playing that shot as he softly punches the air and says yes sorry rublev will certainly not forget his racket when he faces holger rune in the monte carlo masters final later today read more andrey rublev ends taylor fritzclay title hopes in monte carlo if you want to follow up on some more tennis excitement or live updates watch more atp content here

Title: congress fully prepared even if elections are held today hooda
Article: former haryana chief minister bhupinder singh hooda on sunday said the congress is fully prepared for the assembly elections even if the polls are held today and exuded confidence of registeringresounding win the state is scheduled to go to polls towards the end of next year congress is fully prepared and we will registerresounding win people of haryana are eagerly waiting for the elections and have made up their mind to vote out the bjp jjp alliance and form the congress government hooda said speaking on the ongoing protest of the countrytop wrestlers in delhi the congress leader said an impartial inquiry into the matter is necessary it is an unfortunate situation if the sportspersons who have brought glory to the entire country all over the world have to protest like this he said countrytop wrestlers including bajrang punia and vinesh phogat returned to protest site jantar mantar on sunday and demanded that the government makes public the findings of the oversight panel that investigated into sexual harassment allegations against wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh hitting out at the bjp led government in haryana hooda who is also leader of the opposition lop in the state said the claims made by the government for payment within 72 hours after crop procurement minimum support price msp to farmers and compensation for damages are nowhere visible on the ground from sonipat panipat karnal to kurukshetrahave myself talked to the farmers by going to many mandis mustard farmers had to sell their crop at rs 500 1000 per quintal below msp like mustard wheat farmers are also facing problems earlier the farmers were facing problems because the government portal was not running now they are being hit by the imposition of value cut lustre loss and non uptake the arrival of wheat in the mandis is in full swing but the process of lifting the grain is going on atsnailpace he claimed the claim of payment within 72 hours by the government is proving to be completely baseless the lifting is not happening because the government did not give the tenders for transport in time he added he said haryana which was ahead in several fields during the previous congress regime is today number one in terms of unemployment crime drug menace and corruption if we talk about hisar itself several development works including setting up ofpower plant and buildinguniversity took place in the area during the congress tenure he claimed but no such work of development was done during the past eight years of tenure of the bjp led government he claimed not only hisar this is the condition of the entire haryana in the last eight andhalf years no power plant was built in the state no medical college no big university metro rail was not extended no new railway line was built no big project or big industry was established in haryana he added with pti input
