Title: daily briefing akali architect parkash singh badal no more india and quantum computing falinariman on basic structure doctrine and more
Article: big story five time chief minister of punjab sardar parkash singh badal is no more with this the shiromani akali dal badal has lost its architect and the state its great reconcilerleader who believed in building bridges with disparate ideologies to keep it on the path of peace badal spent much of his life in contest with the congress there ishistory to it while he was seen assecular voice among the akalis his secularism was severely tested when the army entered golden temple as part of operation blue star to capture jarnail singh bhindranwale he never forgave the congress for this he was accused of calling sikh soldiers to mutiny from the indian army over operation blue star and was jailed for sedition badal passed away onday the sit probing cases of sacrilege and the kotkapura police firing filed2 400 page supplementary chargesheet against him the then home minister sukhbir singh badal former dgp sumedh singh saini and five others this was one case that continued to haunt badal only in the express express interview on the 50th year of the basic structure doctrine that restricts the power of parliament to alter the fundamental features of the constitution veteran senior advocate fali nariman expressed confidence that the doctrine which is now cemented in the constitution is here to stay in his weekly columnraja mohan writes about the significance of the upcoming shanghai cooperation organisation sco meet in new delhi how it highlights chinagrowing role in inner asia and the challenges it places before india delhiengagement with the sco all these decades was premised on russian primacy in the region and moscowsupport of indiaregional interests that may be changing from the front page calling the sexual harassment allegations against wrestling federation of india wfi president and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh serious the supreme court issuednotice onpetition filed by seven wrestlers seeking an fir advertisement nitish kumar is settinghorrible precedent saiduma krishnaiah wife of dalit ias officerkrishnaiah who was killed by former mp anand mohan she was speaking to the indian expressday after the bihar government notified the release of 27 prisoners including mohan after amending the bihar prison manual the cbi filedsupplementary chargesheet in the delhi liquor policy case naming former delhi deputy chief minister manish sisodia as the prime accused among four people must read nearly three years after the indian institutes of technology iits boycotted the times higher education world university rankings over issues of transparency the ranking agency has tweaked its performance parameters this year which it believes will address their concerns advertisement the recent arrest of senior ysrcp leader bhaskar reddy for the murder of his cousin vivekananda has cast the spotlight on the machinations within the ys family withyear to go for the state elections party sources admit that the events over the last few years are likely to taketoll on the family read the story of how ambition and power fuelled the rise of and propelled one of the most powerful political dynasties in andhra pradesh across the six assembly constituencies in karnatakakolar district milk has been an integral part of life from socio economics of the region to politics inregion where milk was never an election issue it has now become one on account of the opposition congress and janata dal secular raisingrow over the integration of the karnataka milk federation kmf with the anand milk union ltd amul and finally last week india decided to join inglobal effort to research the full potential of quantum computers by setting uprs 6 000 crore national mission on quantum technologies and applications why are quantum computers special what doesnew mission to develop them mean for science in india we explain delhi confidential on the sidelines of the two day chintan shivir of sports ministers union minister anurag thakur playedquick game of table tennis with indian legend rajya sabha and president of the indian olympic associationt usha advertisement in todayepisode of 3 things we discuss indiaefforts to evacuate its citizens from crisis hit sudan why indiatop wrestlers are protesting once again and the controversy over pregnancy tests forgovernment marriage scheme in madhya pradesh until tomorrow rahel philipose and varsha sriram

Title: babita alleges oversight panel member snatched report from her ridiculous says radhica
Article: new delhi former wrestler babita phogat on tuesday claimed that fellow oversight committee member radhica sreeman snatched the final report on sexual harassment allegations against wfi chief bri bhushan sharan singh from her before she could read the findings in fullcharge vehemently denied by the former sports administrator babita who was included in the governmentprobe panel to investigate the allegations on the insistence of protesting wrestlers alleged that she had some objections but radhica did not let her read the report in fullhad read justfew pages of the final report andhad some objections but radhica sreeman came and snatched the report she said sincebelong to the same family phogat that is holding the protestcanread the report babita told pti she was working on behalf of the chairman mary kom and told me that the chairman has takendecision on signing of the report when contacted by pti radhica dismissed the charge as ridiculous why willdo that what benefitwill accrue by doing something like that in fact she read the report 4 5 times and agreed to the findings each and every word that was written in the report was explained to her radhica said whatever was written in the report is based on testimonies of all those who appeared in the hearing and everything is video recorded it canbe tampered with if at allsnatched the report from her why didnshe write that in her dissent note questioned the veteran administrator this isbaseless charge in fact on the eve of holi all the members sat and whatever was being drafted based on the hearings babita was explained each and every word and she was satisfied radhica also said that all members of the committee were requested to assemble at sai headquarters on april 4 for the signing of the report but babita did not turn up even her phone was switched off that day she said her baby was unwell so we asked her to come on april 5 and sign the report since everyone else had arrived on april 4 the chairman mary kom decided that members who are present can sign the report and babita can do that later explained radhica the government had formed the oversight committee headed by legendary boxer mc mary kom to look into the allegations levelled by the wrestlers including vinesh phogat sakshi malik and bajrang punia others in the six member panel included former wrestler yogeshwar dutt former shuttler trupti murgunde radhica and rajesh rajagopalan ex ceo target olympic podium scheme the panel submitted its report on april 5 but the government has not yet made public its findings however pti has learnt that the probe panel has given brij bhushanclean chit with5 1 verdict as the wrestlers returned to jantar mantar to resume their protest and approach the supreme court vinesh said babita is more worried about her political career than the cause of the wrestlers when asked why she has not visited the protest site like she did the last time in january babita saidwas with the wrestlers and will remain with themam under no political pressure

Title: delhi police register two firs against wrestling chief brij bhushan sharan singh
Article: the delhi police late on friday evening registered two firs against wrestling federation of india wfi president and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh who has been accused of sexually harassing seven women wrestlers including one charge relating to sexual offences againstminorstatement from pranav tayal deputy commissioner of police confirmed that two firs were registered in the police station in connaught place new delhi district which was where the wrestlers had filedcomplaint eight days ago the first one pertains to allegations levelled byminor victim which is registered under pocso act along with relevant ipc sections concerning outraging of modesty etc the second fir is registered for carrying out comprehensive investigations into the complaints tendered by other adult complainants under relevant sections pertaining to outraging of modesty etc said tayal the decision come hours after solicitor general tushar mehta announced in the supreme court on friday morning that delhi police had agreed to register an fir against brij bhushanbench headed by the chief justice was hearingpetition filed by the wrestlers earlier today senior advocate kapil sibal who appeared for the wrestlers has also asked the court to guarantee police security tominor whoone of the complainants chief justice dy chandrachud told the delhi police to make an adequate assessment of threat perception and provide security the matter will be heard again in the court after one week the move comes after countrytop wrestlers led by olympic medallists bajrang punia and sakshi malik and worlds medallist vinesh phogat moved the supreme court withpetition seeking registration of an fir against singh the wrestlers who resumed their protest on april 23 after starting it back in january said they had raisedcomplaint at connaught place police station in new delhi against singh but the police had refused to file an fir on thursday the indian olympic association ioa set upthree member ad hoc committee to handle the day to day affairs of the wfi on the directions of the sports ministry the ad hoc committee comprises suma shirur bhupendra singh bajwa andretired high court judge who will be named in the coming days the committee will conduct the wfi elections within 45 days starting from thursday reacting to the protest by the wrestlers the ioa president pt usha said the wrestlers should have shown discipline and not taken their protest to the streets thoda toh discipline hona chahiye there should be some discipline she said aftermeeting of the ioaexecutive committee instead of coming to us they have gone straight to the streets itnot good for sport our feeling is that for sexual harassment complaints ioa hascommittee and athletes commission instead of going to the street again they should have come to us but they have not at all come to ioa however ushacomments were inaccurate as the ioa had formedseven member committee on january 20 led by mary kom to investigate the wrestlers claims when the protests had first begun this committee was overshadowed when the sports ministry announced its own committee responding to ushacomments bajrang punia the tokyo olympics bronze medallist and one of the protesting wrestlers said she herself was an athlete and she is alsowoman we did not expect this harsh reaction from her we expected support the wrestlers had earlier appealed directly to prime minister narendra modi and the minister in his cabinet in charge of womenaffairs pm modi sir talks about beti bachao and betipadhao and listens to everyonemann ki baat canhe listen to our mann ki baat rio games bronze medallist sakshi malik asked inmedia interaction with pti he invites us to his home when we win medals and gives uslot of respect and calls us his daughters today we appeal to him that he listens to our mann ki baat

Title: wfi chief brij bhushan singh says ready for probe but wonresign blames congress
Article: april 29 2023 04 03 pm updated 08 34 pm ist gondap facing allegations of sexual harassment by seven women wrestlers wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh on april 29 said he is ready for any kind of investigation but wonresign from his post as it would mean he has accepted the charges against himam completely innocent and have full faith in supreme court and delhi policeam ready to face any kind of investigation mr singh told reporters at his residence in bishnoharpur about 40 km from gonda city resigning as president of wrestling federation of india is notbig deal for me butwill not resign ascriminal takingstrong exception to congress leader priyanka gandhi vadrameeting with the wrestlers on april 29 morning mr singh said today it has been seen who is behind this controversyhave been saying from the beginning that an industrialist and the congress havehand in this they are upset with me he however did not elaborate priyanka gandhi visited the wrestlers at jantar mantar in new delhi and expressed solidarity with them accusing the government of protecting the wfi chief also read wrestlers vs wfi sexual harassment row from jantar mantar to the supreme court the story so far several wrestlers have resumed their agitation and sat ondharna since april 23 demanding that an fir be filed against the gonda strongman they also demand that mr singh be removed from from all posts he holds the congress has said that he should be arrested immediately on friday night delhi police registered two firs against singh while the first fir pertained to allegations ofminor wrestler and was registered under the pocso act the second was related to outraging modestym notcriminal resigning meanshave accepted their allegations mr singh the bjp mp from kaiserganj in uttar pradesh said he claimed all the demands of women wrestlers have been accepted an fir has been lodged against me yet they are sitting on dharna why he asked mr singhsixth term lawmaker said his tenure as the wfi chief is complete and he will automatically resign with the election of the new president he is only playing the role ofcaretaker till the election mr singh has completed 12 years as wfi chief and is ineligible to contest for another term he asked why are the wrestlers still sitting on dharna now when an fir has been registered against him why are they constantly speaking against prime minister narendra modi and the sports ministry mr singh said the ongoing dharna by the wrestlers is notprotest of sportspersons butprotest of the conspirators they did not wait for the investigation report to be made public and went to the supreme court and there raisednew allegation they are saying that the sport has to be saved but they are not saving the game by doing this they have causedhuge loss in the last four months he said he also asked if he had been sexually abusing players for 12 years why they never tookcomplaint to the police station federation or the government till date they went straight to jantar mantar he said mr singh said he has submitted an audio clip to the probe committee in whichman is heard speaking about arranginggirl to implicate him stressing that he fully respects the decision of the supreme court and the government mr singh alleged the protestors are coming up with new demands everyday first they demanded an fir and now that the fir has been lodged they are demanding to put me in jailammember of the lok sabha mr singh said claiming that the entire haryana andp akhadas are with him the mp said it is only one familyakhada which is against himhave full faith in the law of the landwill definitely be proved innocent it has been troubling me forlong timeand my family are being abused our supporters are also being targeted but my supporters and family have full faith thatam innocent soon the country will also come to know about it he added

Title: wrestlers protest brij bhushan says he is innocent calls stirmotivated campaign
Article: under fire wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh staunchly defended himself on saturday refuting sexual harassment allegations by top wrestlers and claiming that the congress party andprominent industrialist were behind the weeklong sit in protests wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh ani addressing the media at his residence in bishnoharpur near gonda the sixth term bjp mp from upkaiserganj saidam completely innocent and have full faith in supreme court and delhi policeam ready to face any kind of investigation resigning as president of the wrestling federation of india is notbig deal for me butwill not resign ascriminal ifresign it would mean thathave accepted their allegations the delhi police have registered two firs including one under the pocso protection of children from sexual offences act as one of the seven complainants isjuvenile the firs were registered on friday after the wrestlers who resumed their sit in at jantar mantar last sunday petitioned the supreme court singh said the wrestlers were moving the goalposts every day they are coming up with new demands they wanted an fir and that has been done now they are sayingshould be sent to jail and resign from all postsam an mp because of the people of my constituency and not because of vinesh phogat only one family and akhara are protesting why arenpeople from any other place complaining one fir was registered under indian penal codesections 354 molestation 354sexual harassment 354stalking and 34 common intention clubbing the complaints of the six adult wrestlers the second fir was based on the complaint of the juvenile wrestler invoking section 10 of the pocso act in addition to the four ipc sections from the first firpolice officer said section 34 means involvement of more than one person in the crime though police did not say if anyone else has been accused by the complainants police is likely to record the statements of the complainants from sunday singh is yet to be servednotice asking him to appear before the investigating team and join the probe of the seven complainants some are on the sit in protest at jantar mantar where some politicians met them on saturday the juvenile wrestler is not there the investigating team will meet each of them and record their statement an officer said along with the victims we will also record statements of people who will be identified by them as witnesses to the sexual harassment as the allegations date back to between 2012 and 2022 in and outside delhi and abroad as well it will be difficult for us to get any electronic evidence such as cctv footage we will ask the complainants to share with us any electronic evidence such as sexually coloured messages if any that they may have saved with themsecond officer said the first official said at least one police officer has been deployed with each complainant alleging conspiracy singh 66 saidhave audio ofmale wrestler telling someone to arrangevictimhave shared that audio recording with the oversight committee of the union sports ministrywonresign till the charges against me arenproved he criticised congress general secretary priyanka gandhi visiting the protesters on saturday today it became clear who is behind this controversyhave been saying from the beginning that an industrialist and the congress havehand in this they are upset with me he claimed that the protesting wrestlers had tried to avoid the nationals by seeking exemption vinesh phogat denied it ever sincebegan competing in 2009have skipped only four nationalsgot injured during the rio games 2016 which was the first yearskipped the nationals during covid near tokyo gamesmyself was down with covid the third nationalskipped was after tokyo becausewas not ingood mental state after the defeatcould have done anything to myself at that time due to depression the fourthmissed was this yearhad requested permission to skip the world championships trials because cutting weight thrice inmonth is difficulthave competed in 10 nationals and have not lost once tokyo games bronze medallist bajrang punia said this issue is not about nationals this is about sexual harassment he should answer those questions there wastwitter spat between cousins vinesh and wrestler turned bjp politician babita phogat sportspersons are capable to fight their own battles their stage should not be used to claim brownie political points babita tweeted referring to politicians visiting the protest site vinesh tweeted in response if you are not standing for the rights of aggrieved female wrestlers babita sisterrequest you not to weaken our movement it has taken years for female wrestlers to speak up against their abusers you are alsowoman try to understand our pain share this article on

Title: newsmaker why bjp still in brij bhushan sharan singhcorner despite several knocks
Article: brij bhushan sharan singhties to the sangh parivar go back to before he joined the bjp facebook brij bhushan sharan singh while pressure is growing on the bjp to take action against its kaiserganj mp and wrestling federation of india president brijbhushan sharan singh over allegations of sexual exploitation and harassment of wrestlers the party has held out for four months and it might not proceed against him inhurry anytime soon elected to the lok sabha for the first time in 1991 the 66 year old or his wife have been an mp from uttar pradesh almost ever since in 1996 when singh was deniedticket after he was indicted intada case for allegedly harbouring associates of dawood ibrahim his wife kektidevi singh was fielded by the bjp from gonda and won in 1998 singh sufferedrare poll loss to the samajwadi partykirtivardhan singh from gonda apart from his impressive poll influence singh wields clout viachain of nearly 50 educational institutions run by him spread across100 km belt from ayodhya till shravasti in his wake his relatives have also established such institutions and local bjp sources say that singhpoll machinery is run almost entirely by this set up independent of the party they give the example of 2009 when singh sensing the dwindling fortunes of the bjp switched to the sp and won defeatingbjp candidate from kaiserganj the 2009 elections at the centre were won by the upa with the sp as an ally singh announced this decision during the nuclear deal debate in july 2008 at the time asbjp mp singhties to the sangh parivar go back to before he joined the bjp considered close to the late vhp chief ashok singhal singh who had studied at ayodhya and was involved in student politics was at the temple town when the babri masjid was demolished on december 6 1992 and was booked along with others for provoking kar sevaks to demolish the structure by then singh had already won his first election asbjp candidate

Title: modi ji keh dijiye priyanka gandhiswipe at pm over brij bhushanremark
Article: congress general secretary priyanka gandhi vadra on monday tookswipe at prime minister narendra modi after the wrestling federation of india wfi chief and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh reportedly said he will resign if the top party leaders ask him to saying justice is waiting for your yes facing allegations of sexual harassment from some of indiatop wrestlers wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh reportedly said that he will step down from the post if any of the top leaders will ask him to quit congress general secretary priyanka gandhi vadra ani if the pm askswill resign immediately even if union home minister amit shah and bjp president jp nadda askwill do so singh was quoted as saying by news24 reacting to his statement priyanka gandhi vadra who met and extended her support to the protesting wrestlers at delhijantar mantar said intweet ji keh dijiye nyay ko aapki haan ka intezaar hai ji ask him justice awaits your yes two firs have been filed against the bjp mp following the supreme courtintervention the first pertaining to allegations levelled byminor which has been registered under the protection of children from sexual offences pocso act along with relevant sections of the indian penal code ipc concerning outraging modesty the protests against the wfi chief first broke out in january but the indian olympic association ioa and the government then managed to placate the situation by formingprobe panel top indian wrestlers including bajrang punia sakshi malik and vinesh phogat among others renewed their protest last week demanding action against the bjp leader on monday singh said that all activity in the sport had come tostandstill in the last four months due to protests by the countrytop wrestlers the wfi chief added that he is ready to be hanged but wrestling activity including national championships and camps should not stop as it would be detrimental to the cadet and junior wrestlers all wrestling activity has come tostandstill in the the last four monthssay hang me but donstop wrestling activity donplay with the future of children allow the cadet nationals to take place whosoever organises it be it maharashtra tamil nadu tripura but donstop the wrestling activity said brij bhushan in an interaction with the media share this article on

Title: on the mat
Article: every great wrestler has his signature move american professional wrestler hulk hogan was famous for the leg drop dwayne johnson or the rock is known for moves like rock bottom peopleelbow samoan drop and spinebuster and indiavery own the great khali is known for his vice grip wherein he crushes the cranium of his opponent before all of them there was ghulam mohammad bux or gama pehlwan the boy from datia madhya pradesh it is said that his career ended forlack of opponents in august of 1910 an american show wrestler known as doc roller agreed to face him those days gama was in england and the face off was organised attheatre in leicester square the sportsman reported the event thus the end came in 9 min 9 sec it may interest mr rudyard kipling to know that the gallery greeted the dusky victor as gunga din mansplanation advertisement wrestling has been an olympic sport since 1896 but wrestling in india traces its origin to the fifth century bce in akbarcourt in the 16th century there were many wrestlers the ainakbari contains references to mirza khan of gilan in iran muhammad quli of tabriz in iran cadiq of bukhara in uzbekistan murad of turkistan in kazakhstan hilal of abyssinia kanhya mangol ganesh bajmath the role of akharas in indiastruggle for independence is legendary menwrestling is tied to ideas of machismo physical prowess there is also an entire narrative around wrestling the disciplining of the body mind morals there are scholarly pieces on how wrestlers model themselves on sannyasis or ascetics the switch womenwrestling in its present day avatar is said to have started in france in the 1960s 1970s and was rooted in the second feminist movement this was when contraception was legalised as was abortion if menwrestling is about celebrating the body womenwrestling has been about using the body to channelisespirit and to defy traditional perceptions women were wrestling in norway in the early 1970s japan took to it in the late 1980s in 2004 womenwrestling was added to the olympic repertoire in 1997 no sooner than the announcement was made ace wrestler chandgi ram started training his two daughters sonika and deepika kaliraman in 2001 sonika won the bharat kesri title butdecade later when she levelled charges of sexual misdemeanour against the wrestling federation of india wfi the selection committee and the coaching staff she found herself intakedown like no other last week after much grappling with lawkeepers seven women wrestlers have finally managed to file two firs against wfi boss and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh who they have accused of sexual harassment doncheer yet singh iswrestler before anything else there would be wisdom in anticipating and preparing forsprawl out

Title: put systems in place to deal with players issues with respect and dignity athletes commission
Article: new delhi the athletes commission of the ioa has recommended the national olympic body to put systems in place to deal with issues of the players with respect and dignity in the light of the protest by top wrestlers of the country against wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh the athletes commission of the indian olympic association met on saturday to discuss the ongoing protest by the wrestlers who have made sexual harassment and intimidation charges against singh six members out of the 10 attended the meeting on saturday and they have sent recommendations to the ioasource privy to the development told pti on conditions of anonymity the athletes commission felt that it should playmore active role in representing the voices of the athletes in front of the ioa and put systems in place to deal with the issues of the athletes with respect and dignity it is learnt that athletes commission chairperson and olympics bronze medallist boxer mc mary kom was not present at the meeting she headsseven member committee formed by the ioa on january 20 to look into the allegations of sexual harassment made by the wrestlers the committee is yet to submit its report mary kom was also the head of the oversight committee constituted by the sports ministry to probe sexual harassment and intimidation charges against singh that committee submitted its report to the sports ministry earlier this month besides mary kom other members of the ioa athletes commission are table tennis star achanta sharath kamal vice chairperson olympic medallists gagan narang mirabai chanu pv sindhu winter olympian shiva keshavan rower bajrang lal fencer bhavani devi hockey player rani rampal and former shot putter op karhana indiafirst individual olympic gold medallist shooter abhinav bindra and former india hockey team captain sardar singh are also members of the athletes commission representing international olympic committee and olympic council of asia respectively the meeting of the athletes commission came two days after ioa chieft usha on thursday came down heavily on the aggrieved wrestlers saying they lacked discipline and their protest on the streets tarnished the image of the country decorated wrestlers vinesh phogat bajrang punia and sakshi malik are the three central characters in the renewed protest against the wrestling federation of india president who has been accused of sexual harassment and intimidation by the grapplers the delhi police on friday filed two firs including one under the pocso act against the bjp mp who has completed 12 years as wfi president and is ineligible to become an office bearer again

Title: vinesh phogat at idea exchange when women raise their voices they are targeted first
Article: the sports minister and the government are doing some good for sportsagree that funding has been good and facilities have improved but the respect for athletes is the same as before in their eyes when we get medals they get photos clicked to show they are proud of us but the reality is quite different and for women iteven more difficult those involved in the system wonder howwoman can speak so much against the system they arenhappy when women talk against the system when other athletes raise their voices when it comes to trials etc itokay but when women raise their voices they are targeted first they ask how did we get so much courage to speak against the system they say something but in their heart there is something else and they portray something totally different how we were being treated earlier itthe same thereno change in that aspect nihal koshie how difficult was it for the victims and you to take that step it was difficult to explain to the girls families to explain to ourselves and those around us that we ve started this fight and have to continue we were scared too we fear the police the first day when we took all the girls and went to the police station with the complaints we feared the police so much because we had not faced them before advertisement yes we do have family members in the police but we ve never faced them in suchsituation we didnknow how the cops talk at the police station or how they behavehave not yet received the fir copywill speak onceve received the fir copy says brijbhushan sharan singh president wrestling federation of india on wrestlers protest against him and firs registered by delhi police pic twitter com fvu1fxki35 ani april 29 2023 the ministry told us to give them time and they would file an fir according to the results of their finding they told us not to worry about anything and that they would do everything now we think that we should have filed an fir at that time itself and not waited actually we didnhave courage at the time to file an fir because we were wondering what would happen and whom would we have to explain to media also sometimes troubles the victim by asking questions about the incident and what proof do we have the families are also scared wondering what their children are talking about openly advertisement we got fired up and started this fight we thought it wasmistake to take on the system we could ve just not bothered and been happy wrestlingmeancan compete for another four five yearsll compete at the paris olympics for sure the family is crazy for an olympic medal and just before that we are protesting so many situations have risen but somewhere we have found the courage the fire for justice doesndie we know that we will get support from somewhere god is not stone hearted to see us struggle and fight so much and then make us suffer nihal koshie what led you to file an fir now to be honest we didnplan to file the fir and those who we are against never expected us to file the fir either they thought that if we actually wanted to file an fir we would have filed it then as female athletes they knew the problem or perhaps were trying to ignore it on purpose they took advantage of our situation they knew we were scared and respected people after the fir itlike telling people that we are truthful we have done nothing wrong itgood to get so much support we have fought for smaller things not for suchbig thingbelieve in god and that he hasplan for everything we have fought so much and he ll not let it go to waste hein control of everything his plans are executed through us mihir vasavda you could ve finished your career comfortably gone to olympics brij bhushantenure as president was also getting over what was the thinking behind picking up this fight now actually at trials and competitions where brij bhushan used to be there he would say things likell be in wrestling for another 20 years we thought this is not going to stop if he continues for 20 years so many wrestlers will come into the sport and he ll still be around in my family too girls are getting into wrestling they will becertain age but brij bhushan will still be around we tolerated somehow and got out of the situation with courage but what if the new athletes doneven reach that level where they ll be heard that was worrying that hehere for the long haul he considers it his fiefdom and everyone will be crushed under his feet he ll do whatever he feels like advertisement mihir vasavda how was it dealing with the federation officials how doexplain this supposehave to go late to the national camp for that you have to call assistant secretary vinod tomar tomar will ask neta brij bhushan thenhave to ask the chief coach he will ask for an application even if nothing is in his hands then tomar wonpick up the call the next day if heangry with me he ll issueshow cause notice if my family has to getcertificate signed forcash award from the haryana government ifm not around they woneven sign and will demand the athlete comes herself they ll keep troubling for the smallest of things they ll act obnoxiously and threaten by using the netaname the treatment was awful eventea seller there had this attitude that who the hell are youam the boss even the water boy hadlot of attitude advertisement the way any athlete would be treated when we were going for any competition and the facilities given to us would be of zero quality we would mail asking them to send us two days in advance or forphysio that we need desperately or to give usgood coach itnot like we can wrestle till 50 years our career span is small half of it goes in gaining experience and when we are experienced these people donsupport us we would be more exhausted dealing with them rather than in training or competition athletes are of no value in their eyes mihir vasavda you have madelot of comments about the federation sports ministry and sports authority of india if the solution is reached to your satisfaction how easy or difficult will it be for you to makereturn to top level competitions thata difficult question we are thinking about what the situation can be in the future but now that we have put our hand in the lionmouth why be afraid if we donsay anything then too we will be targeted and if we open our mouths something bad will happen to us so letsay it and face the consequences advertisement also read an idol crumbles how pt usha missed the podium again we know that we will face tough times even if we win this fight not just during our careers even after that attempts will be made to remove any trace of our name and achievements from the sporting world and the sports community but why care about those people and their feelings who have never achieved anything ifhave wonmedal that is registered in history they canerase it shivani naik wrestling hasculture of giving respect of listening to and following everything that people in authority say was that culture misused when brij bhushan was new in wrestling he used to respect any good and upcoming wrestler but as he started gettingfirm foothold he began to show his true colours iffew wrestlers were good friends and training well together he would send his own people there to break their friendship he used to practise divide and rule policy most wrestlers come from haryana punjab and maharashtra and are big on respect brij bhushan has taken undue advantage of thatwould also blame athletes as we stayed silent forlong time and toleratedlot if we had drawnline earlier things wouldnhave come to this athletes would have faced difficulty in drawingline against the system there is not one brij bhushan but several how can we fight against so many but if we can successfully deal with one that will bebig thing in itself sandeep dwivedi winning an olympic or world championship medal takeslifetime of effort but no upcoming athlete would know how to counter these other challenges what will be your message to them the tough journey is appreciated only by an athlete and their family the toughest sports are taken up by those from the lower income level families who are used to hardships and difficulties they think that they donhave anything and so have no option but to work hard they donhaveplanthey only know they have to go ahead also read for wrestlers protesting against wfi chief day and night bouts at jantar mantar the craze of wrestling and other sports is growing especially in haryana people sell off their land to fund this dream to fundyoungstertraining diet and participation in competitions to ensure that they stay fit and healthy parents even stay awake with them they save money to accompany them to competitions if they donhave money they borrow it thinking they will repay it infew months they put everything in it in the hope that if their child becomestop athlete they will get everything money prestige social status thinking about all this we thought what will come out of this struggle even if we are successful what will be our future we knew we would perish regardless of whether we fought or not but we thought that if we fought and won we could form something better but if we didnfight we would have hadregret in life that we didneven try sandeep dwivedi what gives you the strength to keep going on we donknow from where we are getting the strengthdonknow if we are actually normal or we are acting to be normal we have stopped feeling anything we doneven know where the path we have chosen will lead us there are so many obstacles along the way if we clear one hurdle something else will come up but yes if all the athletes come together if they gather the strength that we have to fight then no one can do anything to an athlete not just wrestlers but every sportsperson the entire country worships cricket but notsingle cricketer has spoken up we arensaying you speak in our favour but at least put outneutral message and say there should be justice for whichever party this is what pains me also read brij bhushan sharan singh and anand mohan how justice is politically mediated every sports federation hasproblem andlot of athletes are my friends as well but there should be no pretensionsgo to their matches they come for mine we getphoto clicked together congratulate one another upon winningmedal put nice messages like onwards and upwards athletes need to get out of the social media bubble and express real world emotions they should look beyond their personal gains and ask their conscience we are human we will also quit the sport someday we should leavelegacy outside sports too sriram veera you spoke about lack of support some might fear oh this issensitive issue how do we know what really happened how can we get into this what do you have to say to those people what do they think will we do these things just to get exemption from trials or not take part in national championships we dontake these allegations lightly they should have this common sense if you canraise your voice against the system if this was suchsmall issue then why would we fight this battle that ll only lead to lifelong animosity log kehte hai wrestlers ka dimaag ghutno mein hota hai people say wrestlers are not intelligent butll say our dil heart dimaag brain everything is in the right place other athletes need to check where their brain is dil toh unke paas hai hi nahi they donhaveheart if we dondeserve their support in these times of struggle then god willing if we winmedal tomorrow and we will work very hard for it then doncome to congratulate us donsay you had faith in our abilities because you didnthatwhy you are doubting us now sriram veera can you talk about your courage where does it spring from itmy mother our relationship is stronger than the bond between friends we share everything she was about 32 when she becamewidowfeel sad thinking about it she struggled for us in that struggle we didneven realise when we grew upsingle woman she would be taunted by others how they treated her before my father died my mother didneven step out of the house she didneven know what was the price of tomatoes suddenly tragedy struck then she suffered from cancer and would go to rohtak for chemotherapy totally illiterate she didneven know where to sit where to get off no one supported her we grew up seeing her struggle ifsingle woman like that illiterate could fight the society on her own and made us big wrestlers then we can do it too if we donspeak out today then all the struggles of my mother would have gone to wastewon medals thatall right but if we win this battle she will proudly saygave birth to themam proud that my mother showed so much strength and characterguess thatin me as well even my father was like thatam also like thatspeak straight and honestly and say whatfeel itbeen misunderstood some feel arre yeh toh moofatt hai sheoutspoken but what cantell themspeak my mind whatinside is what comes out take it or leave it and go home laughs

Title: justice awaits your yes priyanka gandhijibe at pm modi over brij bhushanremark
Article: by india today news desk congress leader priyanka gandhi vadra tookdig at prime minister narendra modi after embattled wrestling federation of india wfi chief and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh reportedly said he would resign from his post if asked by top party leaders tagging pm modi intweet priyanka gandhi said ji speak up justice is waiting for your yes advertisement on april 29 priyanka gandhi vadra met protesting wrestlers at delhijantar mantar and expressed solidarity with them brij bhushan sharan singh is facing allegations of sexual harassment from some of indiatop wrestlers includingminor he reportedly said that he would step down as wfi chief if the bjp asked him to quit several top wrestlers including vinesh phogat sakshi malik and bajrang punia have been protesting at delhijantar mantar seeking brij bhushan sharan singharrest and ouster from the federation also read truth will come out soon says wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh amid intensifying wrestlers protest acting on the supreme courtdirections the delhi police on april 28 filed two firs against the bjp mp the first one pertains to allegations levelled byminor victim which has been registered under the protection of children from sexual offences pocso act along with relevant sections of the indian penal code concerning outraging of modesty etc the second fir has been registered for carrying out comprehensive investigations into the complaints tendered by other adult complainants under relevant sections pertaining to outraging of modesty despite the firs and brij bhushan sharan singh offering to resign from his post the protesting wrestlers have stayed their ground saying they would continue their agitation until the bjp mp is arrested also read learn from my brother priyanka gandhi on pm modiabused me 91 times remark

Title: assam political parties stage protest against sexual harassment by bjp mp brij bhushan
Article: guwahati may 1 several political parties of assam on monday stagedprotest at dighalipukhuri against sexual harassment by bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh they staged the protest in solidarity with the wrestlers in their struggle against sexual harassment by the bjp mp lok sabha mp ajit kumar bhuyan assam pradesh women congress president mira barthakur and others political parties members attended at the protest in guwahati wrestlers continued their protest for the 8th day in delhi on the sexual harassment case just two days back two firs were registered against the mp speaking to media persons lok sabha mp ajit kumar bhuyan said we are protesting against the government for safeguarding their mp brij bhushan sharan singh wrestlers who had made india proud alleged that brij bhushan sharan singh sexually assaulted them the wrestlers are protesting at jantar mantar in delhi against brij bhushan sharan singh we are with the wrestlers and demand immediate arrest of brij bhushan sharan singh he is person with criminal background and the bjp has been using such persons for political interest bhuyan added mira borthakur president of assam pradesh women congress said prime minister narendra modi gives slogan of beti bacchao beti padao but the wrestlers who had made india proud are not getting justice the bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh should be arrested immediately but the government has been safeguarding him the women wrestlers have made serious accusations against him for sexually harassing the women wrestlers but the government has been silent on this issue we demand his arrest within 48 hours and if they fail to arrest him then we will intensify our protest borthakur added we stand with the wrestlers in their struggle against sexual harassment by the bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh and we need justice on this issue saidprotester

Title: thorough probe into allegations by women wrestlers must says union minister ramdas athawale
Article: tribune news service karnal april 30 union minister ramdas athawale on sunday demandedthorough probe into the allegations levelled by women wrestlers against chairman of the wrestling federation of india wfi brij bhushan sharan singh there should bethorough probe in this case he said in response toquestion asked by the mediapersons here where he listened to pm narendra modi100th episode of mann ki baat after this programme he addressed party workers at the dr mangal sen auditorium athawale who is also the national president of the republican party of india said they would approach the bjp for an alliance for the haryana assembly elections if the alliance is forged we will extend our support to the bjp else we will contest some seats and on remaining seats we will support the bjp candidates said the union minister he praised modi for his working style about former congress president rahul gandhi he said under rahulleadership the tally of the congress will not increase on the third and fourth fronts the union minister said it would have no impact there will be no impact on the nda by the formation of any third or fourth front we will not allow entry of nitish kumar in the nda even if he wishes to join the nda government will be in power till 2039 athawale said bhushan sharan singh
