Title: i ve at least 3 4 years left in the ring mary kom mulls turning pro next year
Article: despite undergoing an acl tear surgery indian boxing superstar mc mary kom on sunday said she still has at least three to four years to pursueprofessional career mary kom who was in charge of the oversight committee looking into allegations of sexual harassment against brij bhushan sharan singh president of the wrestling federation of india wfi kept mum about the ongoing crisis after failing to winsecond olympic medal in tokyo in 2020 the six time world champion tore the anterior cruciate ligament in her left knee during the 2022 commonwealth games trials in june last year the injury is much better nowcan walk run though not on hard surfacejust started running ontread mill mary kom told reporters after she was awarded the pc chandra puraskaar 2023 herem pushing myself after one monthll be fully fit and recoveredll be ready to fight in the ring in two months time she said asked whether she will compete at the asian games in hangzhou mary kom said this yearvechance to compete in any competition next year by forcem not eligible her bid forsecond olympic medal is finished because she will be 40 in november and will thus be ineligible to compete in any international event including the 2024 olympics in paris mary kom however said that while rules can stop her from competing in another olympics nobody can stop me from fighting by forcem not eligible to fight in the olympics because of the age limitm very sorry for that butwant to continue keep fighting for another three four yearsstill have that confidence and willpowerm thinkingcan also becomeprove that confidence nobody can stop me from fighting the boxing legend underwent surgery atmumbai hospital in august last year terming it as the worst phase of her career mary kom said she would have preferred death to the painful phase it was so painfuldidnexpect this injury it was bad luck it wasna minor injury butmajor grade iii acl tear people saidwonbe able to run again forget about fighting six months after the operation there was still unbearable pain thatpreferred death in my lifeve struggledlot did hard work so much thatnever cried and took all the pain but this recovery was unbearable only once before in my lifehad cried whenhad lost my passport and thenattempted suicide asdid not have the money to apply forfresh passport she recalled india made history earlier this year winning four gold medals nitu ghanghas nikhat zareen lovlina borgohain and saweety boora at the womenworld boxing championships in 2006 the quartet of mary kom sarita devi jenny lalremliani and lekha kc had achieved the feat for the first time

Title: country will by run by supreme court and constitution not from jantar mantar brij bhushan sharan singh
Article: apr 29 2023 09 20pm ist source ani even as the protest against bjp mp and the former wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh is continuing he has takenconsistent stand that he hasndone anything wrong brij bhushan sharan singh today visited ayodhya but was not very forthcoming on answering reporters queries saying he had donepress meet earlier in the day and would now speak only tomorrow however insign that he intends to fight to clear his name the bjp mp said that the country would be run by the supreme court and the constitution and not from jantar mantar video source ani

Title: wrestlers protest delhi police tells sc fir will be registered today against wfi chief brij bhushan
Article: the delhi police apprised the supreme court that it has decided to register an fir on friday over sexual harassment allegations levelled by seven women wrestlers against wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh solicitor general tushar mehta appearing for the delhi police toldbench comprising chief justicey chandrachud and justices narasimha that the fir would be registered today

Title: on pretext of checking breath brij bhushan touched breast stomach 2 wrestlers to police
Article: multiple incidents of sexual harassment and misconduct that include groping inappropriate touching and physical contact during tournaments warm ups and even in the office of the wrestling federation of india wfi in new delhi these have been put on record in complaints filed by two of the seven women wrestlers both adults against the federationpresident and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh the indian express has learnt the two separate complaints filed on april 21 at new delhiconnaught place police station list at least eight incidents from spending most of 2022 out of boxing ring to world championship medal the story of nishant dev both the complainants have put on record how singh allegedly used the pretext of checking their breathing patterns to touch them inappropriately and sexually the indian express has learnt has called the allegations part ofpolitical vendetta has called the allegations part ofpolitical vendetta according to the complaints singhinfluence as wfi president and the fear that he would create hurdles in their career were why these wrestlers didnspeak up earlier although they were mentally and physically exploited in her complaint wrestler 1 her name has been with held to protect her identity has put down at least five incidents of alleged sexual harassment against singh one was atrestaurant duringtournament in 2016 when singh allegedly touched her breast and stomach after asking her to join him at the table in the complaint wrestler 1 is said to have mentioned that after this alleged incident she did not feel like eating her sleep was disturbed and she was distressed she alleged thatsimilar incident where singh once again touched her breast and stomach happened at another tournament in 2019 advertisement in her complaint wrestler 1 is said to have accused singh of touching her inappropriately and groping her on two days when she was called to the wfi office thatlocated within singhmp bungalow at 21 ashoka road in new delhi on the first day she is said to have written in her complaint singh touched her thighs and shoulder without her consent and when she was asked to report to the wfi office two days later he touched her breast and put his hand on her stomach saying he wanted to check her breathing pattern in 2018 duringtournament singh allegedly hugged wrestler 1 tightly forprolonged period of time and during another tournament wrestler 1 had to wriggle out of the hug because singhhand was close to her breast advertisement the second complainant wrestler 2 her name has been with held to protect her identity has alleged that when she was warming up singh lifted her training jersey without her consent in 2018 and touching her breast and stomach saying he wanted to check her breathing pattern in her complaint wrestler 2 has reportedly said this left her traumatised and shocked wrestler 2 has alleged that the second incident occurredyear later at the wfi office at singhashoka road bungalow when she entered his office she is said to have complained singh allegedly asked the others to leave following which he allegedly pulled wrestler 2 close and tried to grope her singh also allegedly exchanged numbers with wrestler 2 at his office when contacted both the wrestlers declined to comment on their complaints against singh incidentally earlier this week both these wrestlers also recorded their statements to the delhi police under section 161 of the code of criminal procedure singh was unavailable for comment despite several calls he has consistently denied any wrongdoing and called the allegations part ofpolitical vendetta andconspiracy by rivals who want to displace him from the wrestling establishment some of the countrytop wrestlers olympic medallists bajrang punia and sakshi malik and two time world championship medalist vinesh phogat have been protesting at jantar mantar since april 23 demanding singharrest advertisement complaints of sexual harassment and criminal intimidation including one byminor were filed on april 21 but when the police didnfile firs the wrestlers approached the supreme court subsequently the police filed two firs one under the pocso act andsecond based on the complaints of the adult women wrestlers on thursdaybench headed by chief justice of indiay chandrachud did not entertainplea by the wrestlers that the ongoing police investigation against singh be monitored byretired judge of the supreme court or high court advertisement the apex court said they were at liberty to move the jurisdictional magistrate court or the delhi high court if they felt further directions were needed significantly these two wrestlers were among those who also appeared before the oversight committee set up by the sports ministry in january after the first protests in jantar mantar advertisement the sports ministry in what it called major findings based on the preliminary scrutiny of the oversight committee report highlighted the lack of an internal complaints committee in the wfi as stipulated under the prevention of sexual harassment act 2013 but named no one and didnaddress the allegations against singh

Title: wrestler sakshee malikkh misidentified as vinesh phogat praising brij bhushan
Article: a clipped interview of national level wrestler sakshee malikkh has recently been shared on social media misidentifying her as wrestler vinesh phogat crediting wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan saran singh for winninggold medal the video is being shared as wrestlers such as vinesh phogat sakshee malikkh bajrang punia are sitting in protest at new delhijantar mantar against the wfi chief accusing him of sexually harassing multiple female wrestlers singh who is also the bharatiya janata pary mp from uttar pradesh has remainedcontroversial figure over the years and earlier slappedwrestler for confronting him on stage in jharkhand the wrestlers atrecent media interaction made strong allegations against singh and alleged that earlier attempts to file an fir against the wfi president were roadblocked due to his strong political influence however boom found that the video showsclipped interview of sakshee malikkh where she can be seen talking about her first gold medal win in the 2022 commonwealth games and crediting the victory to brij bhushan saran singh as the wfi headtwitter user named adv ashutoshdubey tweeted the video along withpicture of the indian olympic association ioa president pt usha at jantar mantar saying here is the same day video where vinesh phogat mentioned all credit goes to wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh ji click here to view the tweet fact check boom noticed that the date stamp in the video is august 6 2022 andrelated keyword search for this led us to the same video uploaded on ndtvofficial youtube channel the description with the video says sakshi malik won her first commonwealth games gold medal on friday and she was elted with her performance she told ndtvrica roy about her strategy of watching the opponent closely before going for the attack during the interview when malikkh was asked about her view about the success of indian wrestling in the birmingham 2022 commonwealth games she replies with we have donegreat performance today one or two more gold could comefeel sad about it but leaving it we will do better next time she further continues sayinglot of this credit goes to our president sir of indian wrestling federation cause nowlot of tournaments happening in india and the competitions there have increased so much that it feels like fighting in india is tough it feels that we can do better when outside we are working too hard for the victory in the indian tournaments so the credits go to the wrestling federation and brij bhushan sir for uplifting the wrestling to suchhigh level

Title: lord hanuman is my saviour brij bhushan saran singh on supreme court decision
Article: lucknow wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh travelled to ayodhya on thursday evening to pay obeisance at the hanuman garhi temple saying he wanted to thank the deity for the supreme court sc decision to close the petition against him wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh has denied the sexual harassment charges and claimed that there waspolitical conspiracy against him twitter b_bhushansharanamdevotee of lord hanuman wheneverget into trouble lord hanuman protects me and becomes my saviour singh told reporters as he emerged from the temple on thursday referring to the supreme court decision on thursday to dispose of the petition filed by three woman wrestlers against singhbharatiya janata party bjp lawmaker from the kaiserganj lok sabha seat the supreme court noted that the petition sought registration offirst information report fir against singh and the delhi police have filed two cases against brij bhushan sharan singh the bench comprising chief justice of india dy chandrachud and justices ps narsimsha and jb pardiwala said keeping in mind the ambit of these proceedings and following the registration of fir we close the proceedings at this stage the petitioners are at liberty to seek further directions before the jurisdictional magistrate or the high court under article 226have faith in supreme court andthank the court for closing proceedings against me the wfi president added standing outside the temple in ayodhya the wrestlers protesting at delhijantar mantar have said that their sit in will continue till brij bhushan sharan singh is arrested by the police on sexual assault charges we welcome the supreme courtdecision said vinesh we have all options on the table including going back to the sc if we are not satisfied with the lower courtsdonthink it issetback vinesh phogatdouble world championship medallist toldmedia briefing on thursday the sit in will continue till singh is arrested that has been our demand from the beginning and we are sticking to it tokyo bronze medallist bajrang punia said

Title: will resign if wrestling body chief facing protest tells ndtv
Article: bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh reiterated that the allegations against him are baseless drawing fire over sexual harassment allegations by top wrestlers bjp mp and chief of the countrywrestling federation brij bhushan sharan singh has reiterated that the charges are baseless but added that he is ready to step down if prime minister narendra modi or bjp asks him to mr singhrecent remark in which he said he would resign if pm modi union home minister amit shah or bjp chief jp nadda asked him to has put the bjp inspot opposition parties which have been accusing the bjp leadership of shielding mr singh despite the serious allegations are now demanding that the pm asked the mp to step down in an interview to ndtv mr singh said why will prime minister modi ji ask me to resign and if he asks me towill if my party is suffering because of me its image is being maligned then if modi ji or the party asks me to resignwill the countrytop wrestlers including vinesh phogat sakshi malik and bajrang punia have been protesting at delhijantar mantar forweek now they have been demanding action into allegations of sexual harassment against mr singh by several wrestlers includingminor delhi police has filed two cases against mr singh following the recent allegations of sexual harassment one of them has been registered under the stringent protection of children from sexual offences pocso act onminorcomplaint several opposition leaders have met the wrestlers and extended their support to them they have also raised the matter during the campaign for the upcoming assembly polls in karnataka asked about the wrestlers protest turning intopoll issue in karnataka mr singh said in our camps wrestlers from karnataka come too so do wrestlers from kerala bengal odisha maharashtra madhya pradesh bihar himachal pradesh why donsuch incidents happen to them why only with these people the protesting wrestlershave given the slogan one family one akhada you tell me where are the others mr singh said rattling the names of several wrestlers who had not joined the protest so far the six time mp from uttar pradesh has allegedpolitical conspiracy against him while he did not name the family it is an apparent reference to the phogat family which has given the country many top wrestlers and has come out strongly against mr singh vinesh and bajrang punia her brother in law are among the prominent faces of the ongoing protest geeta phogat vineshcousin and the eldest of the phogat sisters whose story inspired the movie dangal has been backing the protest geetayounger sister babitaleader of bjpyouth wing has come under criticism with the wrestlers asking her not to weaken their protest deepender hoodarajya sabha mp has trashed mr singhallegations against him accusing him of trying to divert attention from his crimes mr hooda said ita criminal issue related to respect for our daughterswould like to tell bjp that this is notpolitical issue

Title: union governmentindifference towards protesting wrestlers is baffling
Article: imagine if wrestling federation of india wfi head brij bhushan sharan singh accused by seven women includingminor of sexual harassment was notmember of parliament belonging to the ruling bharatiya janata party bjp how would have the law caught up with him would there have been propaganda unleashed against those who have accused him by labelling them anti government incruel sense singh is lucky that he belongs to the bjp because otherwise he might have even been in jail by now evensupreme court intervention has not prompted the delhi police to arrest him instead of feeling ashamed he is holding press conferences accusing the congress and wrestlers of conspiring against him to discredit him also read delhi police yet to record statement of women wrestlers protesting against wfi chief this is symptomatic of the malaise which has inflicted the police system and even threatens the judicial system which if allowed to continue can lead to its collapse it smacks of partisanship of the highest order and exposes the hypocrisy ofgovernment which gloats about its programme focused on the girl child beti padao beti bachao this also reflects the fact that some of those who take great pride in the hindu ethos of very exalted status of women and quote the shloka yatra naryastu pujyante ramante tatra devata where women are honoured divinity blossoms there are duplicitous in practice in case of sexual harassment the law is explicit that the word of the woman is sufficient to arrest the accusedsexual harassment charge is criminal in nature and the wheels of justice should have moved immediately instead the government formedcommittee led by renowned boxer mary kom to probe the allegations this could have been justified if intent of the government was to get to the bottom of the matter to cleanse the system and put things in order so that no women athlete would face the same ignominy in future unfortunately the intent was to findpolitical solution the strategy did not work and it is not surprising that the athletes are unhappy with the conduct of the union government the union government has further exposed itself by not making public the findings of the committee report which was submitted in first week of april babita phogatmember of the committee has alleged that she was not allowed to read the report and that the report was snatched away from her before she could glance through if true this further increases the intentions of the government if the government was serious about the problem it should have not only published the report but also acted by now dissatisfied with the governmentresponse the protesting wrestlers knocked on the supreme courtdoor where the delhi police unashamedly has said that if the court desired an fir could be lodged the same day itself it took four months and prodding from the top court for the delhi police to file two firs both naming singh it is obvious that the police is not interested in pursuing this case but what is it that makes it so brazen ideally the police should have arrested singh in january itself but two things worked for him one he isbjp mp who is supposedly very close topowerful minister in the union cabinet two he belongs to the politically powerful community of the rajputs the rajputs in uttar pradesh are very influential and the bjp does not want to upset the community singh himself isseasoned leader and can impact electoral fortunes of the bjp in four five lok sabha seats around gonda districtthird reason is that the delhi police is allegedlycompromised force many senior officers in it are either eyeing post retirement sinecures or are those who toe the governmentideological line without questioning these police officers either do not take cognisance of complaints cases against the ruling alliance or when it does it is not inhurry to do its jobfew years back whenfew masked men and women unleashed violence in front of the tv cameras in jnu and later whenfew were identified as abvp activists bytv channel the delhi police did precious little more thandozen aam aadmi party aap mlas and leaders were arrested on frivolous charges in most cases the courts were livid about the way the investigation was carried out most of them were exonerated by the courts in the past the police has not taken notice of the provocative statements made by bjp leaders such as anurag thakur parvesh verma and kapil mishra serious allegations were levelled against the delhi police during the 2020 delhi riots in which 53 persons lost their lives two third of which were muslims during the investigations into the riots even lawyers who were helping the muslim community were intimidated and their houses were raided it is not surprising that the delhi police has not taken any action based on the wrestlers complaint what is surprising is its audacity despite the apex courtintervention it is disinclined to arrest singh this is not possible unless the delhi police has clear instructions from up the hierarchy is itcoincidence that the delhi police reports to the union government and amit shah is the home minister ashutosh is editor satyahindi and author of hindu rashtra twitter disclaimer the views expressed above are the authorown they do not necessarily reflect the views of dh

Title: non protesting wrestlers call for resumption of national camp
Article: new delhi the national camp shut and the controversy surrounding wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh still raging several non protesting grapplers on tuesday demanded that the sports authority of india sai must reopen its centres for them since the lack of proper training is having an adverse impact on their preparations for the asian games the mennational camp for free style and greco roman wrestlers is held at the sai centre in bahalgarh sonepat while the womencamp is organised in lucknow the countrypremier wrestlers including bajrang punia and vinesh phogat have levelled sexual harassment allegations against brij bhushan and resumed their protest at jantar mantar on april 23 the national camp was closed on april 8day before the asian championship in astana kazakhstan and has not yet restarted more than 300 wrestlers in 10 weight categories senior junior cadet and15 train at the sai centre in sonepat while the lucknow centre accommodates more than 100 women wrestlersdonhave proper sparring partners with me to train we need to be in national camp the asian games trials are just two months away the sai should restart the camp why should the junior wrestlers suffer narsingh pancham yadav said from mumbai there are about 25 wrestlers wheretrain and most of them are junior so obviouslydonhave proper training partners they are inexperienced not much time is left for asian games and after that the world championship is also scheduled the national camp must restart said the national championship silver medallist asked about the ongoing protest by the top wresters narsingh saiddonknow the truth if something like that sexual harassment has happened then itwrong sandeep deshwal who competes in greco roman style in 82kg category also said it has beenstruggle for him since the national camp shutam in rohtak since the camp closed itreally difficulthave spoken to the coaches also several times but no one knows why the national camp is not restarting national greco roman coach hargobind singh also appeared cluelesshave spoken to sai officials multiple times but have not gotdefinitive answerlot of time has passed since the asian championship in astana april 9 14 by this time the camp should have resumed said hargobind itan asian games year and there should not be this biggap in training he added the indian wrestlers had won 14 medals at the asian championship with the women winning seven of them while bajrang punia ravi dahiya injury and vinesh phogat chose not to compete in astana other prominent wrestlers like deepak punia and sarita mor who are world championships medallists could not winmedal lalita sharma the executive director at sai sonpeat centre said they have not received any communication regarding the national camp as of now the pti tried to reach out to sai dg sandip pradhan but several calls to him went unanswered he also did not respond to messages meanwhilewoman wrestler said unless there is clarity she wonlike to join the national campam doing fine at my training centre there has to be clarity who the coaches will be at the camp and who do we need to reach out to in case there is an issue wrestling is as much mental as physical in the current scenario itdifficult to say anything ifwould like to rejoin the camp if the camp resumes at lucknow centre only then it should be fine but if itshifted to some other place we need to get clarity onfew things otherwise also not many women wrestlers join the camp most of them prefer to train at their own training centres she said

Title: wrestlers protest vinesh phogat alleges sports minister wfi hushed up sexual harassment complaints
Article: vinesh phogat has alleged that complaints related to sexual harassment have been hushed up in the past by the wrestling federation of india wfi and that sports minister anurag thakur did the same by forming an oversight panel instead of taking concrete action vinesh the biggest face of the wrestlers protest claimed that sexual harassment cases were reported twice in the past during the national camp but the wfi succeeded in sweeping the matter under the carpet the world championship medallist said the complainants had shared their ordeal inmeeting with the sports minister but he did not do anything except for constituting an oversight panel the wrestlers had called off their protest in january after getting assurances from the government that the matter would be probed andfive member panel was formed to look into the allegations of sexual harassment against wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh during the 2012 national campsexual harassment complaint was lodged atpolice station within 24 hours that case was hushed up in 2014physio who was also trainer of geeta phogat raisedsimilar matter and he was removed from the camp within 24 hours from that day his wife could not participate in any competition vinesh said before we started our protest three months back we had explained everything togovernment official how sexual harassment was taking place and how women wrestlers were being tortured mentally the athletes were being pushed tostage where they could have done anything with their lives she added she continued we waited for three four months but when nothing happened we came to jantar mantar when we met the sports minister the women wrestlers shared individual incidents related to sexual harassment the girls were crying before him but no action was taken at that time sports minister tried to hush up matter yet again by formingcommittee we have tried to raise this issue at every level but the matter was always suppressed said vinesh the asian games gold medallist also opined that people could now understand why they were silent for 12 years we had to play sport our career life was at stake and thatwhy we could not muster enough courage now we have reachedstage in our careers where we could speak itnot easy to stand againstpowerful man she said sakshi malik refuted allegations that the protests weremeans to claim exemption from wrestling trials vipin kumar hindustan times via getty images sakshi malik said the motive behind the protest as being projected was not to seek exemptions from trials she claimed she was asked to appear intrial abroad when she had already wontrial in india another girl in 2012 was asked to reappear intrial within 24 hours of winning she was vomiting during the retrial boutshad told her that we do not have status to fight with these men added vinesh vinesh also alleged that the delhi police was not doing its job properly the delhi police has not yet recorded any statement they are helping in breaking the victims using power and position delhi police is trying to delay the matter they are giving information to brij bhushan maybe we will get justice only from the supreme court the kind of language he wfi chief is using on national television gives an indication how he can behave with women inclosed room if he wantsfair probe he should himself go to the police station get himself arrested and co operate with police in probe after that if nothing comes out we should be held guilty said vinesh who added that she has not met brij bhushan in the last two years bajrang punia also claimed that they have support of many wrestlers but they do not want to disturb their training and that is why not many are at the protest site

Title: wrestlers protest difficult to stand against power vinesh phogat
Article: amid the ongoing wrestlers protest at jantar mantar delhi against wrestling federation of india wfi chief and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh indiaace wrestler vinesh phogat has said that it is tough to stand againstpowerful person who is misusing his power and position forvery long time the wrestlers are continuously protesting against sexual harassment charges against the wfi chief and are demanding his arrest while addressing the media olympian vinesh said it is very difficult to stand againstperson who is misusing his power and position for so long also read wrestlers protest request you with folded hands not to vinesh phogat to sister babita she further revealed that the wrestlers had met an official before they started their protest in jantar mantar for the first time but no action was taken she said three four months before we sat at jantar mantar we had met an official we had told him everything that how women athletes are sexually harassed and mentally tortured when no action was taken then we sat on dharna she also slammed union sports minister anurag thakur for not taking any action and suppressing the matter by formingcommittee we ended our protest after talking to union sports minister anurag thakur and all the athletes had told him about the sexual harassment he by formingcommittee tried to suppress the matter there no action was taken that time she said bajrang punia addressed the allegations that they are protesting against new rules introduced for the olympics he said he brij bhusan is saying that we have made some rules for the olympics and therefore these athletes are protesting firstly this is not about the olympics this is against sexual harassment and iftalk about the olympic rule the federation will take trails of athletes coming from the olympics whoever they want earlier on monday brij bhushan shran singh said that he would resign if his party asked him to in an interview with ani he said if my party asks me to resignwill resign forces involved in tukde tukde gang shaheen bagh kisaan andolan seem to be involved in it wrestlers protestam not their target party bjp is their target these athletes are paid protest is expanding like shaheen bagh they want to divide up and haryana he also alleged that wrestler bajrang punia had asked someone to arrangegirl in order to level sexual harassment charges under the pocso act earlier on saturday the wfi chief asserted that if he resigns from his post it would mean that he has accepted the allegations which have been raised by the wrestlers reacting to world wrestling federation chief brij bhushan sharan singhremark she said that all they wanted was justice the delhi police on friday registered two firs against wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh over allegations of sexual harassment and exploitation of female wrestlers by him he also said that 90 per cent of haryana players stand with him while only one wrestling family continues to protest at jantar mantar new delhi earlier on april 26 wrestlers heldcandle march at jantar mantar urging prime minister narendra modi to listen to their mann ki baat while talking to the media sakshee said we urge pm modi to listen to our mann ki baat even smriti irani ji is not listening to us we are trying to show them the light through this candle march said sakshee to the media tokyo olympic bronze medallist wrestler bajrang punia and star wrestlers like vinesh phogat and sakshi malik on friday said that they will continue their protest against wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh until he is sent behind bars top indian grapplers such as vinesh phogat sakshee malikkh bajrang punia and many others wrestlers are involved in the protest against the wfi chief over the last six days the wrestlers have slept and trained at the protest site near jantar mantar in the national capital with inputs from ani

Title: neither complainants nor brij bhushan sharan singh questioned yet says sakshi malik
Article: tribune news service vinayak padmadeo new delhi may 2 bajrang punia and sakshi malik have accepted that the fight to get justice in the sexual harassment case against wrestling federation of india wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh would belong drawn out affair the protesting wrestlers said they have decided to put the other charges including financial irregularities against the wfi on the back burner because the issue of female athletes safety is paramount bajrang punia vinesh phogat and sakshi malik in new delhi on tuesday tribune photo manas ranjan bhui our sport tests us both mentally and physically the struggle and anxiety beforecompetition is very different we do not have the same feeling here this is no struggle we are fighting for justice sakshi malik the wrestlers once again questioned why singh has not yet been called in for questioning especially when one of the alleged offences is abusingminor the delhi police had registered two firs on april 28 the delhi police have not done anything so far bajrang said sakshi said the victims statements are yet to be recorded what kind of an investigation is this brij bhushan is yet to be summoned the duo said that training for the asian games was not even on their minds currently brij bhushan has retired us already and we are ready to sacrifice everything to get justice bajrang said we know that till the time either he or his people are in the federation we will not be allowed to compete so we wantcomplete clean up of the body singh and his people should leave he added usha mary are politicians sakshi and bajrang said that they were hurt by the comments of former sprinter pt usha who in her new avatar as the indian olympic association ioa president criticised the wrestlers for continuing the protest ioa joint secretary kalyan chaubey had alluded that the protest was harming the countryimage we are much better than people like mary kom and pt usha sakshi said if former athletes such as them do not support us ita matter of shame we do not want them to sit here with us we just want them to support us she addedhave been hearing since my childhood that politicians cannot be trusted as they turn on their families they usha and mary have proved it these are the peoplegrew up watching and aspired to become buthave learnt my lessons the hard way the rio olympics bronze medal winner added bajrang said pt usha must realise that she got this position because of her sports achievements but she has becomepolitician now punia bhushan sharan singh

Title: daily briefing what went wrong in manipur brij bhushan touched breast stomach wrestlers tell police the kerala story review and more
Article: good morning get your weekend started with the top 5 stories from the indian express 1 ground report with manipur witnessing violent clashes over the last three days close to 20 000 residents of haokip veng an old settlement of the kuki tribe have taken shelter in relief camps after their vehicles upturned and homes and buildings were torched in the area just metres away from cmbiren singhofficial residence there is no sign of life counter mobilisation by some meitei groups againstdemonstration of kukis the state police reacting late and growing anxiety among the two communities these are some of the factors which resulted in the violence the ongoing violence between the kuki zomi tribals and the largely hindu meiteis is the first time in three decades that the state has witnessed direct clashes between two ethnic groups we explain 2 from groping and inappropriate touching to physical contact during tournaments and warm up sessions multiple incidents of sexual harassment and misconduct have been placed on record in complaints filed by two of the seven women wrestlers against the federationpresident and bjp mp brij bhushan sharan singh 3 the ncp patriarch has laid out his complex chess board how the game will progress depends onhost of imponderables including his opponentcounter moves advertisement in her weekly column neerja chowdhury writes on how what will happen when 83 year old sharad pawar who works round the clock for his party starts to speak of the betrayal of the very people whose political careers he built 4 after three years the world health organisation who said that covid 19 was no longerpublic health emergency of international concern and that the focus would now be on the long term management of the infection we explain what it means for the world 5 what to watch this weekend this week shubhra gupta reviews sudipto senthe kerala story the film itself is nothing butpoorly made poorly acted rant which is not interested in interrogating the social complexities of kerala an india state proud of its multi religious multi ethnic identity 1 until tomorrow varsha sriram advertisement

Title: up urban body polls on bjpcampaign trailmissing brij bhushan
Article: facing allegations of sexual exploitation and harassment by women wrestlers bjpkaiserganj mp and wrestling federation of india wfi president brij bhushan sharan singh has not campaigned for any party candidate in the uttar pradesh urban local body elections so far even as he has been camping in his home district gonda for more than 10 days in the ongoing polls the bjp has given all the party mps and mlas from the state tasks related to the campaign such as holding of public meetings and running door to door programmes in support of their candidates singh is the only mp sources said who has stayed away from the partycampaign in the elections sources said that after the fresh round of controversy singh stopped attending political programmes the last political event he attended wasmeeting of the bjpawadh region at the partystate headquarters in lucknow on april 25 on the civic body poll preparations two days after the agitating wrestlers returned to jantar mantar in new delhi straddling the districts of gonda and bahraich the kaiserganj lok sabha constituency comprises several nagar palikas and nagar panchayats also read why bjp still in brij bhushan sharan singhcorner despite several knocks having skipped the campaign singh on tuesday invideo message appealed to the voters from gonda bahraich and balrampur districts to vote for the bjp candidates the wfi chief said that he could not meet the voters directly since he was going throughrough patch followingconspiracy hatched against himbjp leader at the partystate headquarters said that all the party mps were asked to do canvassing for candidates but singh did notparty functionary in bahraich said the local unit did not invite him for the campaign singhsupporters are candidates from several seats on bjp tickets but he did not campaign for them as well he said advertisement singh however meets people ondaily basis in gonda where he has been camping on wednesdaydelegation of village pradhans led by muslim clerics met the mp in bahraich and extended support to him on april 30 singh organised the screening of 100th episode of prime minister narendra modimann ki baatradio message on an lcd screen on the campus ofcollege run by him same daygroup of sadhus from ayodhya and hastinapur nepal met him in gonda extended their support to him over the controversy assuring that they were ready to stagesit in at jantar mantar to seek justice for him explained probing wfi in january govt had flagged the need for sexual harassment panel away from political activities singh in gonda is following his daily routine of visitinggaushala cowshedstable andgymnasium besides attending weddings and other family functions of his supporters advertisement speaking to the indian express the mp saidam staying away from the campaign for the urban local body polls and political programmes because of the ongoing controversy and allegations buthave issued appeal to the voters all the sections of society were supporting him he claimed interaction with people is essential to me andwill contest the 2024 lok sabha election he added

Title: wrestlerprotest wrestlers protesting against wfi chief brij bhushan sharan singh for 10 days abp news
